Westjet package but for $ nicer places for very little more that would include btreakfast

Summary Heading: Great Convention Center and Disneyland hotel!!!
Summary: What a fantastic hotel. It is an older hotel but has tons of charm. Rooms were clean, suited our needs with coffee maker and staff was over the top in taking care of our needs. Attended an event at the convention center but perfect location for Disneyland too. Near CVS and other walkable eateries. Resort fee was more affordable then other parking and resort fees and it felt safe to park and walk around the hotel. It was rainy but the pool area is also great with ample areas to relax. Will be back and thank you to Nellie and Jenn for making our Anaheim trip a fabulous one.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The front desk staff was rude to my family onn3 different occasions. We had 3 rooms and 2 of the rooms experienced major attitudes.  I also left my retainers by accident.  I have tried on numerous occasions to ask for help and they continue to say I am with a guest and put me on hold.  .5 hours later and still nothing.  I called them back and received major attitude and said sorry I don't know when I will be with you as I am with a guest there and have not been able to get anyone to call me back.  So I could have stayed at a much nicer hotel because my retainers are costing me $400 to replace.  I still don't know if they have them or not. Horrible waste of money on this hotel!

I love how close it was to Disneyland, about 12 minutes walking distance. We only stayed one night, I think if we were there longer I would prefer a different hotel.

Summary Heading: We found bugs in our bed

We also saw bed bugs on the upper bunk bed crawling by the stairs. We flipped the pillow on the lower bunk bed and recorded a video of a bed crawling across the pillow. It is critical to note here that we did not sleep on either of the bunk beds nor placed our belongings on the bunk beds. We also captured a bed bug crawling on the wall next to the queen bed we were sleeping on. Finally, as we left the room to head downstairs, a bed bug crawled on my husband's jacket arm!  As a

Summary Heading: Hotel is in disrepair and needs a deep cleaning.
Summary: This hotel was a conference hotel for the AAP national convention, so I had higher expectations for it. On arrival, I noted a heavy perfumed smell in the lobby. The clerks at the desk are kind and helpful.  Room was on 2nd floor of the main hotel. Entering the elevator, noted a slight smell - a bit stale and a bit like the sewer. When the elevator opened on the 2nd floor, the sewer smell was much stronger. I could smell it on entry into my room but was much lighter than the hallway smell. The carpet has a stiffness to it that suggests it is old and brittle or just poor quality. When barefoot, it just doesn't feel clean. The furniture is well-worn and, in some areas, dented/scratched. The armchair's paint was mostly worn away with something that looked like old gum stuck to it.

Summary: Although the hotel staff was friendly and accommodating, and the location was great (just a 10 minute walk to disney) this hotel left much to be desired. Elevators were hot and floors sticky, hallways were not air conditioned and smelled. Door to our room wasn’t hung straight and there was a gap at the bottom. The carpets were damp and stained, furniture was outdated and scratched. Couch was dirty and stained. Towels were old and dingy and there was mold in bathrooms. We were told we qualified for housekeeping but they never showed. The air conditioning vents were placed above beds and spewed dank, musty air all night. At almost $300/night I had higher expectations. The grounds were clean and even though the customer service was great, it’s just not enough to make us return.

Let’s not forget about the $10 a day resort fee! Still not sure what that was for. Daily room service was not available. Everyone is asked to bag their own trash and leave in the hall. Imagine all the stinky trash lining the hallway! If you need more towels or toilet paper you have walk to the front desk and ask. Yep, you read that right! The water had to run a very long time before it was somewhat hot. The rooms are run down, outdated, not very clean and

When we returned that evening the trash was full and the towels were still on the floor. I called the front desk and they immediately came up with fresh towels and emptied the garbage. When my son went to retrieve his clothing we found ants all over his suitcase. They had been attracted by food left on

There was a hair ball in the shower and the water pressure was so light I could barely rinse the soap out of my thick hair. It was nice to have the second sink outside of the bathroom, but with the brand new Springhill Suites next door and Hyatt House across the street, I would much rather stay at one of those hotels next time.  The Portofino needs to remodel their rooms if they want to keep charging high rates.

Hotels like this know they can get away with it bc they know people will still book their rooms due to their proximity to Disneyland.

Loved that they were within walking distance to Disneyland, and that saved us on parking for the day! Would like to see the rooms a little more updated. Over all loved the kids suite. It was like they had their own little space.
Manager Response: redroseblaque13, thank you for choosing us. We are pleased you loved our efficient check-in service, location, and kids' rooms. We value your comments regarding the update of our rooms and have taken note of it. We hope you will choose to stay with us whenever your travel brings you back to our area.   Best regards, Mark O'Neal General Manager

Summary: I’m just going to be straightforward, this hotel is dirty and disgusting. I wanted it to be decent since the suite (king bed and bunk beds) was ideal for our family but no. We cut our stay early despite booking through a third party and sacrificed the money, that’s how bad it is. The lobby seemed clean enough and the staff were pleasant despite the working conditions. Elevator was sketchy. Hallways were dirty, sliding doors were left open to let the heat in. Then we got into the room. The floors were black and felt sticky! The bathroom was beyond horrific. We even felt dirty in the shower. The bottom line is the entire property needs to be gutted and redone. It’s harsh but it’s the truth. Hopefully this happens because the location and suites are ideal.
Manager Response: Heatherhogsette, we want to thank you for choosing us and taking the time to post your review. We sincerely apologize for any oversights made when servicing your room and our property. Your feedback is essential to improving our guest experience, and we will take the appropriate action to ensure this is not repeated. Moreover, we are evaluating the concern you had with the elevator as we are committed to offering better service for our guests. We hope you will revisit as we would welcome another opportunity to make your next stay exceptional.  Best regards, Mark O'Neal General Manager

Summary: This is not your first choice, not your second or third or fourth but if all else fails you should stay here. Better than the street but only by a bit. Staff is friendly but managed poorly, and overall, stay some where else.
Manager Response: cjyudel, thank you for choosing us and for taking the time to share your review. We are always grateful for comments like yours to help us continuously improve what we do. We have shared your concerns with our team as part of our commitment to providing exceptional experiences. Summary: It was nice that the park was within walking distance from Disneyland, so we did not need to worry about parking or traffic. Summary: We celebrated our daughter's 10th birthday and our sons 13th birthday on this trip, when we checked in there was a slight hiccup with our reservation and Ichel was extremely helpful and professional, she got us checked in and settled into our room in a timely manner.  it's people like Ichel that are great examples of professionalism and what customer service should be, Thank you !
Manager Response: Anime, thank you for the wonderful review, particularly the generous comments about the great service you received from Ichel. Summary: Stayed here for 2 nights with our two young kids. Great location close to Disneyland, but we couldn’t let our 8 month old crawl around on the floor. After 5 minutes of crawling his hands and feet were black from the dirty carpet. The bathroom floor looked like it wasn’t mopped from the previous guest. My husband stepped out of the shower on to the bathroom floor to grab something from the counter and when he stepped back in the shower there was a black footprint from dirt from the bathroom floor. The room smelled stale and just generally looked like it had not received a good cleaning in quite some time.  Although the room was setup nicely for families it was outdated and dirty. The staff seemed nice, but spoke little or no english and we had a hard time communicating with them
Manager Response: CoreyMB123, we want to thank you for choosing us and taking the time to post your review. We sincerely apologize for the cleanliness issues you had with your room. Summary: Once we got into the hotel to get all checked in and everything we had some belongings that we didn’t feel comfortable keeping in the car but a nice young lady helped us put it away in a nice secure place! Summary Heading: Great Location, but trouble with rooms

However, the rooms and check-in were the worst parts.  We had a few problems and we could hear others in the hotel upset over missing things and missing room necessities such as microwaves.  There was quite a bit of black stuff on the ceilings and in the vents as well.  I don’t know if it was mold or not (so I won’t make assumptions) but it still is concerning as a guest.  Besides for the actual condition of the room and the issues that seemed to be occurring to others staying there, it wasn’t bad but it definitely wasn’t good.

Summary: When we go to Disneyland or the Convention Center this is our go-to hotel. It isn't the fanciest place, but the rooms are clean and comfy and the location is perfect. Just a short walk up the street to Disneyland and walking distance to lots of restaurants. CVS is right next door which is very handy for extra supplies (like half & half for coffee and sunscreen)  We especially love it for the family suite rooms. They have a king bed for us parents in one room. Go thru the french doors to the back room where there is a bunk bed with 2 twins and a pull out sofa couch. Plus a fridge and coffee maker, and tvs in each room.   The French doors have glass and thin curtains. So you wont get 100% privacy. But it does give a little separation from the kids in the other room.   Pool and hot

Front staff just said they would launch an investigation, nothing happened. Feels like it was inside job. It was disappointing.
Manager Response: Thank you for your candid feedback. Our apologies for the inconvenience. We did investigate and we did not see any other keys open that rooms door. I wouldn’t want to speculate however I can say we have a very trustworthy staff and most have been here for many years. Perhaps the door was slightly open with the latch and someone was just closing the door. If you would like to discuss further please give me a call at your convenience. Thank you very much for staying with us and I do hope we get to welcome you back in the future.

Summary: The hotel itself was nice. I wish they would have had more staff manning the front desk so that checking in and out would have gone faster. The couch bed in the suite was not great. The bathroom was clean but looked beat up. It's a good place for families on a budget.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your thoughts with us.  We appreciate the time you've taken to leave us your feedback. Hearing our guests' suggestions are extremely important to us. With that being said, we'll be sure to look into your concerns moving forward. We want to make sure those missteps​ are erased for our future guests.  Once again, we appreciate the time you've taken to leave us a review. If there's any way we can accommodate you during a future visit, please let us know. Have a great day!

Summary: Night front desk staff was horrible.  Rude and unhelpful.  Our room had a hole that resembled a Peephole in the bathtub ceiling.  Solution was to cover it with masking tape.  Room was right next to fitness center and hotel entrance. Extremely loud.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback,0d38nca7ty.  We sincerely apologize for these inconveniences you faced during your stay. We will have our team quickly remedy these issues. Thank you very much for your candid feedback. We hope you will enjoy your stay and appreciate your business. Thank you!

Summary: I would definitely stay here again.  The customer service was awesome!!!  We had booked our room on Expedia and Expedia charged me but, hadn’t sent the order over to the hotel.  Needless to say after a long journey to get there I was not happy that my room wasn’t fully booked yet.  The helpful staff (shout out to Therese and Marina) was very knowledgeable and quickly figured out the error and corrected it.  They were so so sweet, helpful and wonderful and gave each of us an “otter popsicle” while we waited.  That was treat since I haven’t had those for years and I thoroughly enjoyed it!  Within a short wait we got everything completed.  The room was nice and featured a den that had 2 bunks, sleeper sofa and 2nd tv.  It allowed our whole family space to sleep and enjoy.  It is a
Manager Response: Thanks for the fantastic review!  It's excellent you had such an amazing stay at Portofino Inn & Suites Anaheim! We're delighted our team made you feel so welcome and valued during your time in our hotel. We endeavor to go above and beyond to ensure our guests have a memorable experience. That's what we like to see!  We can't wait until your next visit so we can share another fantastic experience with you soon!

Summary: You can certainly get something of equal value in the vicinity that is cleaner and a little more modern. This is our first night here, and I’m dreading the remaining 5. The carpet in the “kids suite” is filthy, you can’t walk bare feet as they’ll stick to “gooey sticky”spots “ . The adjoining glass doors were full of slobber and finger prints , window sill had a thick film of dust , headboard another thick film of dust, air intake vents had gobs of dust blowing out! My first day was spent cleaning cabinets, vents, window sills , bath tub, bottom of toilet ( you see I’m treating my immune compromised niece to a mini vacation before her treatment starts🙄) Electrical outlets by the bunk beds are not secured to the wall, potential safety hazard  . Walking the stairs to the 3rd
Manager Response: Our sincerest apologies! We appreciate your candid feedback, and we will review with our team to make necessary improvements immediately. We pride ourselves on providing clean and comfortable accommodations with outstanding service. We do hope we have the opportunity to welcome you back on a future visit and earn your business once again. Thank you and safe travels!

Summary Heading: You get what you pay for
Summary: The outside of the hotel looks nice, but inside it’s VERY outdated and not very clean. There were old crackers and wrappers underneath our bed, and stains on the sheets 😅 The bathroom and actual hotel room looked like I needed a deep cleaning There was a dark ring around the inside of the tub, one of the drains in the sinks didn’t work properly, the wall paper was peeling off in multiple spots around the room, carpet turned our white socks black, walls are paper thin (you hear EVERYONE coming and going)… it’s a cheap place for a reason 🥴 Also, the girl that checked us out was rude. She isn’t great at handling multiple guests in line. There were 2 other parties on the lobby, and she was honestly getting snippy with  everyone. We definitely won’t be coming back here.
Manager Response: Thank you for bringing this to my attention. I have spoken with our team to ensure all areas of the hotel are thoroughly cleaned for our guests. We will be doing scheduled renovations in the near future so we look forward to the opportunity to welcome you back in the future. Our sincerest apologies for your experience, as it is of course our goal to meet and exceed your expectations. Thank you!

Summary: We were overall satisfied with our stay. We got there early and didn't think we would be able to check in. But they had a room ready for us. Everyone was nice and checking was quick and easy. Would stay here again.
Manager Response: Thanks for the splendid review, Wanderlust_Miranda!  It's fantastic you had such an excellent experience at Portofino Inn & Suites Anaheim and that our team took such great care of you. We want you to feel right at home as soon as you walk through our doors! Our team will love to hear they made such a wonderful impression on you. If there is anything we can do to better accommodate you next time, please don't hesitate to let us know.  We look forward to hosting you again soon so we can share another amazing experience with you.

Summary Heading: Not clean and not good for those with disabilities
Summary: Both elevators were out of order.  One elevator was closing when my wife and kids were trying to get off and would respond when you try to hold it, it closed and piched her wheelchair. Room had lots of mold, a hair covered bar of soap and old socks from last guest.  Just spring an extra couple bucks and stay somewhere nicer, it's really not worth it.  I would never stay here again nor reccomend anyone to.
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to share your feedback.  It's unfortunate your stay in our hotel didn't exceed your expectations. We regret you weren't entirely satisfied with our furnishings and accommodations. We care deeply about the happiness and satisfaction of our guests so we'll address all of your concerns with our team moving forward.  We do hope you give us another opportunity to share a more positive experience with you soon.

Summary: Hotel has quick access to Disney. Also next to cvs and coffee bean. I enjoyed being able to use a parking structure. Hotel was also clean. Downside is mattress was not comfortable and the hotel is noisy as I can hear the neighbors walking around.
Manager Response: Thank you for the fabulous review!  We're happy to hear you had an enjoyable stay with us at Portofino Inn & Suites Anaheim! We strive for excellence, so it's great to know you appreciated our convenient location with quick access to Disney, our parking structure, and clean accommodations. However, we regret the challenges caused by our bedding and the sound levels in your room. Please know we care deeply about our guests' happiness, so we'll be addressing your concerns with our team moving forward.  We look forward to sharing a more positive experience with you soon!

Summary: Electrical outlets in the rooms did not work.  Coffee maker in the room was broken.  In room refrigerator did not keep food cold.  Coffee amenities kit missing items (creamer and stirrers).  Shower heads clogged and poor water pressure.  Elevators not working or malfunctioning during my entire 3-day stay.  All this luxury for $270/night....such a deal.....NOT!
Manager Response: We appreciate the feedback, Pat.  We're disappointed your time with us was less than ideal. We care deeply about the satisfaction of our guests so we regret that our features and amenities didn't meet your expectations. Thank you again for your feedback. We'll be sure to address your concerns with our team moving forward.  We do hope you give us another opportunity to share a more positive experience with you soon.

Summary: I stayed here to attend a conference at the Anaheim convention center. It's very close and easy to walk to from the hotel. The back wall of Disneyland (cali adventure)  is right across the street. It was clean and quiet, which is surprising considering how busy it was. There's always going to be those people who let their hotel room door slam but other than that, I enjoyed my stay.
Manager Response: We're delighted your time at Portofino Inn & Suites Anaheim was so outstanding as providing our guests with an excellent experience is very important to us. It's fantastic you appreciated our great location and cleanliness as well as our quiet ambiance. We look forward to hosting you again soon for another fantastic experience.

Summary: We only stayed one night thankfully. The room was dated but clean. It was so loud all night outside (sirens and yelling and what sounded like people opening and closing a garbage lid)  and then in the morning on our day off from Disney you could hear families walking upstairs and showers being turned off and on and also the noise from outside.  Definitely not a good night sleep.
Manager Response: Thank you for reaching out to us, stephanielL1656TN.  We apologize for the noise and we will address your concerns with the appropriate members of our staff moving forward. We hope we can host you again for a more positive experience.

Summary Heading: Close location to Disney - average hotel
Summary: Just returned from a 4 night stay at the Portofino Inn & Suites on a girls trip! Our room was not ready at check in so we headed to Disneyland instead. Front desk seemed short staffed, a bit unorganized and advised they would call us when our room was ready but we didn’t receive a call. I ended up contacting the hotel and confirmed we had a room. Room was big but dated. I really don’t think the beds are queen size. They seemed small. Noise level was fine except for one night. - there was a lot of loud banging and door slamming around 12-4am. Hot tub and pool area need some work but we enjoyed it to ease our sore back and feet at the end of the night lol Angel was the nicest staff member we encountered and seemed present. Very helpful and professional. I’d stay here again mainly
Manager Response: Although we’re delighted to hear that you enjoyed our helpful team, it’s disappointing to hear that you weren't completely satisfied with our check in process, location, overall ambiance and cleanliness. We do hope you allow us another opportunity to share a more positive experience with you soon.

Summary: Very close to disneyland walk 5 mins, very clean room, nice staff, rooms are spacious, a fridge mini coffee maker, not noisy.  I would like to have a microwave and an option for breakfast, kitchen starts at 11 am
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to leave this great review, mduraz246516!  We're thrilled to know you enjoyed your stay with us here at Portofino Inn & Suites Anaheim so much! Please know that your concerns regarding out amenities and breakfast options, will be addressed with the appropriate members of our team so we may improve moving forward.  We can't wait to host you again soon - Have a lovely day!

Summary: Just need more atención and make the bed . And the A/C can't control it. The staff of front desk in the night so super nice , helping us a lot, all the time.  My deposit never back so  I don't know what happens,.
Manager Response: Thank you for the 4-star rating!  It's pleasing to know we've left you with a great impression. Don't hesitate to contact us directly at the hotel so that we may be of further assistance. We can't wait to see you again soon so we can share an even better experience with you at Portofino Inn & Suites Anaheim. Thank you again for sharing!

Summary: Was overal un impressed by this hotel seemed like it was a good fit being so close to Disney during our family trip,however not what I was expecting staff was great during check in. Everything was good until the actual room experience the rooms are smaller than expected definitely felt cramped with 4 people two being kids but my major complaint was the bathroom there was an overbearing sewage smell that was coming up from either the sink or the shower floor I had to keep the door closed and the air blasting because the smell was seeping out into the room and made it hard to sleep luckily we were all tired from the Disney park that we eventually fell asleep and check out was the next morning so yeah that’s my experience will not recommend or stay there again.
Manager Response: Thank you for submitting your feedback with us.  We are always working as hard as we can to provide the most enjoyable of visits for our guests. We hope you plan on staying with us again soon as we'd love to improve your opinion of us.

Summary: We had an excellent stay at the Portofino! Verenice was more than exceptional and upgraded our party so that could have rooms next to each other. Best value for the money and only a 15 minute walk to Disney. We will definitely stay here for years to come!
Manager Response: Thanks for sharing this lovely review!  We're thrilled to hear you enjoyed your stay at Portofino Inn & Suites Anaheim. You can see why we love having her here so much!  We're looking forward to sharing another amazing experience with you soon.

Summary: It has been over 10 years since we have been to this Portofino Hotel. This was a perfect choice for a Disney birthday celebration. From start to finish. When we arrived we were greeted by one of the friendliest front desk staff I have ever had the pleasure of meeting. She was super nice and informative and made our birthday trip even better by leaving a little birthday gift in the room and made him feel special. Her name was Verenice and I would give her extra stars if I could. Would highly recommend this place for anyone visiting Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thanks for the wonderful review!  It's fantastic you had such a memorable and rewarding experience at Portofino Inn & Suites. We're thrilled we could help your family celebrate such a special occasion. That's what we like to see!  We're looking forward to sharing another amazing experience with you soon! Have a beautiful day!

Summary: The hotel is in a good location. Unfortunately, we found our room extremely dirty. There was food on the floor, dust bunnies in the corners larger than my fingers, dirt all over and just grungy. I asked if they could re clean and sanitize it as we have twin toddlers who touch everything. I don’t think they did clean it as I had to ask again, and I cleaned up the food myself so my babies didn’t eat the almonds laying in the floor. They came to re clean it again and it was still dirty after. Super disappointing. The beds were extremely uncomfortable- the mattress was lumpy and felt very old. One of the reasons we booked the room we did (bunk bed suite) was because it had doors to divide the room that our 4 kids were in and the adult space. The doors have shear curtains on them so
Manager Response: We appreciate the feedback, Mykytec.  We're deeply disappointed you had such challenges during your time with us. We regret that your room wasn't refreshed properly. We hold ourselves to a much higher standard so we will be meeting with our housekeeping team to discuss proper room cleaning and refreshing procedures. We will be meeting with our management team to discuss the issues you ran into with your beds and to discuss the possibility of adding blackout curtains on the bunk bed suite doors.  We do hope you give us another opportunity to share a more positive experience with you soon.

Summary: Verenice was an excellent way to start our trip. She was super helpful with a great welcoming presence. She absolutely made us feel at home and brought a little bit of the Disney magic to our hotel. She made sure that Portofino would be at the top of our list of hotels to return to in the future.

Summary: Verenice was the extremely helpful front desk attendant. She was amazing to my family and myself. She helped me upgrade my room to the kids sweet. I’m so happy they have honest workers here. We left our daughter iPad in our room. The staff recovered it for us.  We are so thankful to the workers and of course Verenice. She was so helpful and went out of her way many times for us. Thank you. We already booked our next trip for our daughter birthday.

Summary: We checked in on the reservation of our friends.  Room was dirty and we had to switch rooms.  Front desk staff was overworked but tried their best.  Second room was OK but not worth what we paid.  Very disappointed in what we paid for what we got. Loved the Annabella for the ambiance and the convenience when the Grand Californian was booked.  We will not stay here again. VR KQ

Summary: VERENICE was the name if the gal who helped us and was friendly, happy, saw her smile thru mask. She answered all our questions and got us everything needed before asking.   The best experience we've had w a hotel in a while and we travel a lot.  If this hotel has more like her they will be a success. Walk right to Disney in 10 mins. Straight shot and only 1 major street to cross

Summary: I have stayed at Portofino on multiple occasion and it has always been good but Verenice at the front desk made it amazing! When we checked in she was immediately a breath of fresh air with her upbeat and helpful attitude! Me and my girlfriend were in town to spend a few days at Disneyland and she started talking with us about it and gave us some awesome pointers and we were able to get on one of the digital queue rides because of her! She made our trip so immensely better! We came back in on our last night and she was working the front desk and immediately greeted us as we walked through the door and made us feel completely welcome. She even remembered us and made sure to ask if we were able to get on the ride. You can tell she truly enjoys her job. She is 100% the reason we

Summary Heading: Not the worst but not the best !!!
Summary: So we chose this inn because of the location . It is about a 20 minute walk to Disneyland . However the check in was horrible didn’t explain anything to us WiFi passwords or told us they don’t service the rooms every day . Yes minor problems but still problems . Then since they didn’t have any parking in the Front lot got sent to a parking garage they share with another hotel. Our room was ok however we had only one small garbage can. And on vacation we could use another can of two with how much garbage we have . The toilet paper wasn’t stocked everyday and room just didn’t seem all tidy and clean . We came back from the park and there weren’t enough wash cloths. I think this should be all taken care of daily . I also did miss a loading zone and unloading zone because being

We hope for the opportunity to demonstrate the high-caliber service we're capable of sharing with our guests.

Summary: The night staff is extremely nice and helpful. Walking distance from Disneyland. It would take longer to walk to your car versus here. I will absolutely stay here again 10/10. The location is great, the service is awesome. Also very clean!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing this wonderful review!  We are very pleased to hear that you had an enjoyable experience at Portofino Inn & Suites! Summary: To start things off, this hotel was very close to Disneyland so we were very pleased about that. I got the suit room with bunk beds for me and my friends for the night. We had been at Disneyland all day long so we were tired and ready to shower and go to bed at this time it was 11:30pm. I checked in up front, they gave me a key, never even told me where our room would be,(1st, or 2nd tower) so we were just guessing where to go, we went to that wrong area so we went back to ask and then they told us it was across the road and on the fifth floor so we luged all of our stuff up there and finally got to the room, (meanwhile my husband is having a hard time finding parking). The hallways leading up to the room had no air conditioning so it was hot.We opened the door and the room was

Summary Heading: First family trip in a year
Summary: Staff at this hotel is amazing! Always greeting you while entering and exiting the property! Very friendly and making sure to advise of policies and changes during the current pandemic! Hope everyone else has a magical time there! Alex is the best!!

Summary: Our little family had a great time. This is a nice simple hotel. Nothing crazy but perfect for children. The bunk beds were a great hit! King bed was cozy. Microwave, small fridge and the little coffee pot were all a plus!
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review, A_4_awesome.  It's outstanding you enjoyed your time at Portofino Inn & Suites Anaheim. Summary: We liked the rooms were clean and it had all the nessesary toiletries and everything was neat when we entered nothing missing it was really nice i would come again.everyone was so nice i would recomend to all my friends.

Summary: I was really unhappy with this hotel. Stains on walls! Bathroom floor dirty! Curtains had stains and drips! Mirror was filthy with dust! Stains on sheets! Toilet clogged asked for plunger sent someone who refused to enter the room wanted me to move my whole family out told him to just leave the plunger he set it by door and walked away. I feel like if they are going to be open and charge the prices they do they need to provide better service and make sure there rooms are more cleaner and not so dirty! Room 2405 is where we stayed. I will never stay here again

Summary: We stayed here as a large group for a conference. The hotel rooms were filthy. A colleague brought wipes for us to use and the surfaces were gross. Bathroom, tables, doorknobs, etc. The fixtures in some rooms were broken. The housekeeping staff was very nice as was the front desk staff. There are hotels closer to the conference center that provide breakfast and food. This is not it.
Manager Response: We appreciate your feedback, Kim Varney C.  It's disheartening to hear that you had such challenges during your time with us. We're disappointed that our cleanliness didn't meet your expectations and that your room wasn't refreshed properly. The comfort and satisfaction of our guests is important to us so we'll be sure to address your concerns with our team moving forward.  We do hope for the chance to demonstrate the high-caliber service we're accustomed to sharing with our guests.

Summary Heading: Almost perfect for parents of young kids, with one fatal flaw
Summary: The layout of the suite is excellent, nearest the door is the bathroom and king bed for the parents, further in the room, behind a partial wall is the bunk-bed and couch for kids.  This works great when you want to put them to bed but aren't ready to turn the lights out yourself.  There are two sliding doors that close to completely isolate the kids "room" from your "room".  This all works wonderfully, except that the sliding doors are not opaque, they are glass!  There is a curtain hung on them, but it is so thin that you can see completely through it from the inner room.  It doesn't block light at all, thus defeating the whole point.  We worked around this by pulling blankets off the beds and using them to help block the light out.  Next time we'll be ready with binder clips
Manager Response: none

Summary: Amada at this hotel was too kind and beautiful!! Been trying to cancel and reschedule my trip as I’m unable to travel with the health issues at this time and Booking.com wouldn’t call back from a week + but Amada was able to get me fixed up and now I can reschedule with no penalty! Thank you once again and thank you for being so kind and helpful, you rock!!!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Good location close to restaurants but avoid if you are in a wheelchair
Summary: Great location. We had a family room on level 2 so was grateful they had a lift. Unfortunately the family rooms were in the second building which required you use a card to open the door. I had broken bones in my foot before the trip so had hired an electric wheelchair. You can’t swipe the card and  open the door in a wheelchair without getting out of the chair which which was inconvenient. I could also hear what was happening in the rooms around us and hear people coming back at night and leaving in the morning. The walls are like paper between the rooms so if you are a light sleeper that could be an issue.
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest and for sharing a review with us. I am very happy to hear that you found the location of the hotel to be ideal for your needs. I am, however, sorry to hear you experienced an issues with noise from other guests and entry into the building. We will certainly look into these issues and see what can be done to correct these concerns. We appreciate you staying with us and thank you for your feedback.

Summary: We spent 4 nights here so that we could visit Disneyland. We were disappointed in quite a few ways. When we arrived at the hotel there was no welcome - just an overworked receptionist trying to do a million different things, we had to wait and there was no apology. Our room was old and dated, everything in the room felt old and it was very dark. The bathroom was small and pokey. There was just nothing at all special about this hotel and it wasn’t like it was cheap! We’d come all the way from the UK and wanted just a tiny bit of magic! We’ve stayed in other hotels in the area - there’s better out there, I’d give this one a miss!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback, Rach.  We were disappointed to learn that the condition of our hotel did not meet your expectations. Please be assured that this is not the standard that we aspire to and we will share your concerns with the appropriate members of our team moving forward.  We hope you allow us the chance to share a more positive experience with you soon.

Summary: Hotel was nice, could use some updating but location was great. We try to stay within walking distance , its about a 10 min walk but one day we bought $6 all day ART pass and came in handy when walking all day at both parks. Buses are constantly running so never waited long for one.
Manager Response: Thanks for the fantastic review, jsy49ers!  We're happy you enjoyed your time with us so much at Portofino Inn & Suites Anaheim! We care deeply about the happiness and satisfaction of our guests so it's excellent you appreciated our prime location. We love seeing our guests take advantage of our proximity to so many wonderful attractions.  We look forward to hosting you again soon! Have an amazing day!

Summary: My family and I enjoyed our stay at this hotel. The staff was very friendly and the room was spacious and clean. If you are visiting Disneyland, I highly recommend as this hotel is walking distance from the park.  The hotel does offer a shuttle to and from the park at certain hours daily. Our family would book here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to leave this wonderful review!  We're thrilled to know you and your family enjoyed your stay at Portofino Inn & Suites Anaheim so much! We strive for excellence so we're pleased to hear you appreciated not only our clean and comfortable rooms, but also our close proximity to Disneyland! Your praise lets us know we're succeeding!  We can't wait to host you again for yet another unforgettable visit! Have a lovely day!

Summary: The outside of the building makes you believe the hotel is nice, unfortunately the outside is the only place that is nice. Our room was old and grungy 3/10 big holes in the curtains, stains on the floors, wall paper rubbed off, used Lysol wipes on bunk beds and they came out black. We were in the main building. Had all hotels close to Disney not have been booked we would have switched. Only great thing about this hotel is location to Disney (3 blocks) and the two awesome ladies at the front counter. I would not recommend this hotel or stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest and for your review.  I am very sorry to hear that we did not meet your expectations for cleanliness. I want to assure you that your review has been heard and will be shared with our housekeeping department. Projects are underway across the hotel to address condition issues, such as the drapes you mentioned. Since January, we have replaced beds and installed new door lock systems in all of our guest rooms. We are actively working to improve our hotel for our guests and I want to assure you that your concerns have been heard and will be addressed.

Summary: Terrible service in this hotel. Sofa bed has no pillows called the front desk 3 times NO answer, walk to the reception area and found 2 employees just totally ignoring all phone calls as there were no guess in sight. Requested the items needed and promised to send it right away. Guess what? No one arrived, following morning went to the reception area looking for the manager gave me the tound around by the receptionist. I asked to have the manager call me but no avail. This is quite unbelievable, I am writing this review while I am still here in the hotel checking out tomorrow, cant wait really. There are other hotels that are better than this, avoid it at all cost.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your feedback, Jampogi.  I am very sorry to hear you experienced an issue with service from our staff. What you described is certainly not the behavior, or expectation of service, that is expected from my staff. I want to assure you that your concerns have been heard and we welcome you to discuss them with us.

Summary Heading: These folks are friendly, accommodating, and do a great job!
Summary: I've been travelling to the Anaheim Convention Center annually for a trade show for 20+ years and have walked by the Portofino probably hundreds of times.  This year, when I couldn't get a room for a reasonable any of the places where I get loyalty points, I decided to give it a try.  The staff is super friendly and professional.  The rooms and common areas are clean and well maintained.  I suspect they know they need to keep up with all the newer hotels in the area.  Well, they've succeeded.  I wouldn't hesitate to stay there again.  And, did I mention, parking is complimentary...a rarity in the Anaheim Resort Area.
Manager Response: Thanks for sharing the excellent review with us, Andy!  We're so glad that you had an exceptional experience at Portofino Inn & Suites Anaheim from beginning to end. It's wonderful to know that our staff treated you so well and made you feel welcome throughout the entirety of your time with us. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon!  Have a lovely day!

Summary: The location from the Disneyland Resort entrance was slightly further than what we had anticipated. Not awful (15 minutes at a brisk pace) but far after a full day of hiking around the parks. The other thing that was a bit of a disappointment was the lack and quality of electrical outlets throughout the room. At the time of this writing, the hotel was in the process of updating their power outlets and had currently completed the 5th floor and working their way down. This was the story according to the hotel staff. The other item I should mention ren't quite as grand as what they appear online. I should have taken some pics and posted them. The hotel is fairly mediocre. Not horrible but don't set the bar too high.  is, don't be fooled by the online hotel promotional photos. The
Manager Response: We appreciate the time you’ve taken to share your feedback, michaelhM245FR.  Although we’re delighted to hear that you enjoyed our pleasant and helpful staff, it’s disappointing to hear that you weren't completely satisfied with our accommodations and location. We pride ourselves on providing excellent service and a comfortable environment to our guests at all times so please know that your concerns will be addressed to the appropriate members of our team moving forward.  We do hope you allow us another opportunity to share a more positive experience with you soon.

Summary: Wonderful location to stay as we attended Disneyland.  It is within walking distance.  Some really nice stores within a block of the hotel which allowed for a wide variety of needs.  Our room was very roomy and lots of sleeping options.  Fridge; microwave and coffee maker.  Coffee could be a little better quality.  The room had a funny smell, as if the carpet needs to be shampooed.  The air conditioning seems to not keep the coolness that we had set.  They should never leave the curtains open as it really heats up the room.  All in all was very satisfied with our room and stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share this 4/5 review, Denise!  We're so glad to hear your time with us was so enjoyable! We're delighted you appreciated our wonderful location and amenities. We care deeply about the comfort and satisfaction of our guests so we'll address your concerns regarding our air conditioning and carpets with the appropriate members of our team so that we may improve moving forward. We strive for excellence so we look forward to sharing an even more positive experience with you soon!  Have a wonderful day!

Summary: Let’s start with pros: - The hotel is close-ish to the park entrance, but there’s definitely closer options.  - the bunk bed room was great with our two kids  - front desk staff was friendly.   Cons  - YOU HEAR EVERYTHING. the walls are paper thin. The doors all slam so if you’re a light sleeper like me you’ll hwR everyone arrive and leave their rooms. We could clearly hear our neighbors room too. Just an extremely loud hotel.  - there was no space in the room for our stuff, had to have everything in the suitcases. Didn’t even have a suitcase holder.  - our room didn’t get cleaned for 2 days straight.  - the rooms don’t have safes!!! This really bothered me as I don’t like leaving our passports out. In this day in age the room should have a safe!!  - the pool is gross. A nasty
Manager Response: We appreciate the feedback, Kayla D.  We're disappointed you had such challenges during your time with us. We regret the problems you had with the sound levels in the rooms and that your stay didn't exceed your expectations. We care about the comfort of our guests so we'll address your concerns with our team moving forward.  We do hope you give us another opportunity to share a more positive experience with you soon.

Summary Heading: Not as nice as it used to be. Go to the Marriott.
Summary: Started off by arriving and having the incorrect rooms booked, and then stating that a water main had broken a week prior rendering all the family suites unusable. I was never contacted prior to my arrival so I could reschedule rooms at a different hotel.  2 days later I requested a different room, and magically they had a family suite available?  The rooms feel dirty.  They are clean in a sense of being vacuumed and wiped down, but furniture needs to be replaced, and carpet should be torn out.  They staff was friendly, but the accommodations compared to other hotels was well below normal.  Portofino is holding on to their location as their biggest value, however, with comparable prices at the adjacent Marriott hotels, they are going to need a major upgrade, or cut their prices
Manager Response: We appreciate the feedback, Paula.  It's unfortunate your stay in our hotel didn't meet your expectations. We regret you weren't satisfied with our furnishings and accommodations. We care deeply about the happiness and satisfaction of our guests so we'll address all of your concerns with our team moving forward.  We do hope you give us another opportunity to share a more positive experience with you soon.

Summary Heading: Cancelled my reservation without notice (on Christmas Eve)
Summary: I reserved three rooms with them starting on Christmas.  On Christmas Eve (at 3pm), they emailed me auto-notifications that my reservation had been cancelled (with no explanation).  After hours on the phone, I found out that they were overbooked so decided to run my credit card before I arrived (in violation of their stated policy).  The card I'd originally used to hold the reservation had been replaced because of unrelated fraud.  Rather than call me and ask for a new card, they just cancelled my reservation.  And because they were overbooked, even after I called and offered a new card, they said I was out of luck.  I was forced to spend Christmas Eve fighting on the phone with them, and scrambling to find a new hotel for the next day.    I also emailed them a detailed
Manager Response: We appreciate your feedback, josha260.  Your experience is not on par with the level of service we're accustomed to sharing with our guests. We do hope for the chance to share a more positive experience with you soon.

Summary: All basics are there, very polite and helpful front desk staff.  Though when I asked for utensils, they didn't have any :).  I could hear the kids' heavy footsteps in the room above us, but that should be more about the guests, not the hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing this glowing review!  We are delighted to hear about your experience at Portofino Inn & Suites Anaheim! We truly appreciate your kind words regarding our team. It's wonderful that you felt valued by each member of our top-notch team. We strive to provide our guests with the warmest hospitality and most efficient service, so this is fantastic to hear! Your compliments are not only rewarding, but also encouraging.  We'd love to share another positive, fun experience with you in the future. Have a fantastic day!

Summary: Check in was ok, I think their resort fee is a bit high. Wifi worked well. Car parking was complimentary but very hard to get a park, even in the multi-storey car park.p, and it’s a long way from the rooms. Good location from Disneyland. Check in service was good, check out was very unattentive, she looked at us once then turned away and continued on her phone call rather than a smile or something to acknowledge us, so we left the key and went. Rooms are fine, clean and comfortable enough.
Manager Response: We appreciate the feedback, Tabitha.  We're happy you had a pleasant stay with us despite our services not exceeding your expectations. We'll address your concerns with the appropriate members of our team moving forward.  We do hope to host you again soon for a more positive experience.

Summary: After reading favourable reviews and seeing great photos on their website, made a reservation. Did not get the kind of room we reserved, but a ground floor dungeon where we heard people in the rooms next to and above us, including someone throwing up, yuck. Hot tub is tiny and has excessive amount of chemicals so that your eyes start burning before you are even in. Shower floor is slippery, be careful!  Definitely NOT the place for romance.   Not the happiest place on Earth, try somewhere else.
Manager Response: We appreciate the feedback, Freddy.  We're disappointed that your stay with us was less than ideal. It's unfortunate you've noticed a decline in the quality of our accommodations. Firstly, I left my 'Do Not Disturb' sign on my door and when I came back after my conference, housekeeping had come in and cleaned my room. I tried to call down to the front desk but as soon as they picked up the line disconnected. I tried this twice. The next morning when I told the front desk what happened their response was 'Maybe the sign fell off your door handle. Most of our guests let us know they don't want room service.' That is not normal. I've NEVER been to a hotel where the 'Do Not Disturb' sign is flat out ignored. Even if it did fall on the floor you should

Summary: Stayed with a group of eight (8). Six adults and two kids. They have really nice family rooms with a king size bed and bunk beds for the kids. All the family suites are in a different building than the queen suites which was disappointing as we wanted connecting rooms.  Rooms were clean and comfortable. No breakfast though and only public transport to Disneyland. However it's a 15 minute or so walk so it's not bad

Summary: I was hesitant to stay here after reading reviews. We were looking for a decent place to sleep after long days at the park. We have stayed at many hotels closer to the park gates along harbour in years past but I liked the idea of the family suite and the expedia deal was really good. This hotel was clean and in good similar shape to other hotels. Nice bedding and towels. Staff was friendly and accommodating to our late check in and room requests.CVS next door is super handy for fresh snacks etc. There is art bus that runs to disney for a fee. If you dont mind using s bus or walking 10 minutes then this is a good place to stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great rating, Laura C!  It's wonderful we could provide a pleasant experience for you. We care about the happiness of our guests so we look forward to hosting you again soon. We'd like to share an even better experience with you soon.  Have a lovely day!

Summary: We had a great time at this hotel.  The parking was included in the "resort fee".  We parked in a parking ramp with an elevator.  We arrived before noon, but they let us park our rental and then we headed to the parks.  When we returned the check in was smooth and quick.  We got a very close room on the ground level.  The hotel was quiet and clean.  We used the pool and hot tub outside.  They had pool towels for us to use on a shelf outside by the pool.   The front desk people were kind enough to open a bottle of wine for me that we bought at the CVS right next door.    The walk to the park was more than two blocks.  After two days , the walk seemed longer !  I called ahead to see if they had a shuttle, and the front desk told me yes and even gave me the price, but I never saw a
Manager Response: Thank you for the great rating, Wendy.  We're delighted you enjoyed your stay with us. Although it's disheartening that our lack of breakfast hindered your experience, it's wonderful you appreciated our convenient parking as well as our smooth and quick check-in. We can't wait to host you again for an even better experience. Have a lovely day.

Summary Heading: What is that Smell?!?! Poop on the curtain?????!!!!!!
Summary: I stayed at this hotel about 20 years ago and absolutely LOVED it...but when I stayed there for a more recent Disneyland trip I was shocked at how much this hotel had fallen down hill.  We stayed in a two queen room and when we entered, it smelled bad! The room was hot, so we turned on the a/c which is a central air system and the smell coming out of that was almost as bad. Thankfully we had a balcony, so we could open the window to let it air out. It almost smelled like sewage being covered up by cleaning products.  THEN WE FOUND THE CULPRIT! It looked (and smelled) like there was feces on the curtains...disgusting.   Walking around the hotel, every room had a different smell. The fitness centre stunk, the kids activity room stunk, the room with the guest laundry machines, ice

Cyprian Doblon-General Manager Cyprian.doblon@interstatehotels.com

Summary: I stayed at Portofino several years ago and it was a good experience.  This time.... disappointed.  We had 2 adults, a baby, and a 4 year old so we got the kids suite.  Main room had a king bed and back room had a fold out couch and bunk beds.  The good:  room was large and had separate sleeping areas, close enough to disneyland to walk, clean.  The bad:  paper thin walls (we could hear someone in the next room snoring and   anyone who talked in the hallway), maintenance never came when called, maid service didn't show up the first day, sliding doors between rooms were very difficult to close (didn't slide properly), took 3 requests to finally get a crib up to the room, and no counter space (only had a small area around the sink and then a small table by the couch. Overall...

Summary: The hotel is nice but we got placed in a room with two full size beds for a family of 6! We reserved a family sweet but the hotel overbooked. My kids had to sleep on the floor no extra beds. The hotel was not willing to help us so we had to leave early

Summary: We stayed for one night so we could visit Disneyland and not drive home exhausted. We got a parking pass to leave our car so we didn't have to pay to park at Disneyland ($25). We finally checked in at 10 p.m. and were quickly checked in and into our room! Somehow we got a handicap room, no big deal. There is a CVS right next door which makes it nice and within walking distance to the entrance to The Magic Kingdom. No complaints here!
Manager Response: Thank you for the fantastic review!  We're delighted your time with us was so wonderful! It's fantastic you took advantage of our convenient location in the heart of the city. Summary: We very much enjoyed our stay at the Portofino Inn and Suites. Very conveniently located to Disneyland. If you're a walker, you could walk, but we used Uber. 😂 A 24 hour iHop is directly across the street and a CVS is right next door. We had a King Suite which was very spacious for the two of us. Bed was comfortable. Our only complaint is that the wi-fi was down for our entire 4 day trip. We kept being told "it's being worked on" but it remained down. Other than that, I recommend this hotel!

I'm not too sure if it was mold smell but it was definitely not a pleasant smell. The rooms themselves had a weird smell too.   - cleanliness : lets say, other than the cleaning ladies coming to tidy up the sheets and change the towels, everything else was non-existence . The hotel is old, The suites were terribly dirty and old. A/C vents were filled with dust that's so thick you can't really see the sidewall of the vents. There was a vent inside the washroom that was blowing air at the towel rack. The mirrors were dirty. The sinks and
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to leave us this feedback, Kenny.  We regret that you had such difficulty during your time with us. Summary: Pros- Location is amazing if you’re going to a convention and it’s also close to Disneyland. The lobby area is nice and the parking is free. The room itself was pretty spacious as well.   Cons- The hallways often smelled like mold or cleaner. The bed is probably the worst bed I’ve ever had at a hotel- super flat pillows and no support to the mattress. Signs of aging in the hotel.   Overall, it was a decent place because of the location.

Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to submit this feedback, ETQtravel.  We are always working as hard as we can to provide the best stays for our guests. Summary: As expected, its cheap enough, quite close and great places close by to eat and shop.  We regularly go to Disneyland, would we go back?  Prob try another place.... what really blows is the "resort fee".  When I asked what is was for, they told me to cover "parking"... I didnt drive, then it was for "wifi" but it was to be included (as advertised)....on and on it went.  This is simply a cash grab that everyone is including....perhaps its for toilet paper? Like I said if you can get a good deal...stay its very close and a really nice spot.....MEH!

Summary: Our room at this hotel was smelly, it seemed to come from the air conditioner, smelled like septic tank.  The bathroom smelled like old pee.  Overall it was not a clean room,  everything needs updating.  The pool area and hot tub were ok, however the pool towels when there was some, were old and shredding.  The close proximity to Disney was it's redeeming feature.  My advice is to look for a better hotel.

The hotel is old, outdated, and in great need of renovations. Our room felt dirty, which in turn made ME feel gross. The fabric armchair and couch appeared old and stained. The armoire had a handprint on it (Pledge, anyone?!!) and the bathroom was, by far, the grossest part of the whole room. The tile was stained and disgusting. The shower grout was stained, giving the shower the appearance of being unclean. The air vent was covered in dust. The mirror had mildewy stains around it. This was NOT a place that made me feel confident about housing my children for any amount of time.   The website mentions a shuttle, which is misleading. It is not the

Summary: We stayed here for one night recently. They accommodated a late checkout (gave us an extra hour, which was helpful).  Pro's: Big room. We had a two bedroom suite, and a hideabed. 3 flat screen tv's. Plenty of room for our family of 7.   Con's: Needs updating. If you look closely, you can see the hotel is in need of an overhaul.  No breakfast. Resort fee? Why a resort fee? This certainly isn't a resort. We used the pool, just like we do at any other hotel that does NOT have a resort fee.  Dump the resort fee, and take extra attention to really clean the rooms and commons areas, and fix little issues that pop up. The attention to detail will really show.

I highly recommend it.

Summary: This is a budget friendly hotel near Disneyland.  Beware of hidden resort fees.  We paid in full prior to arriving.  However when we checked in, we had to pay an additional $30 a day for “resort” fees.  We spent all of our time at Disney and didn’t use any resort amenities.    It would be nice to find a place where paid in full meant no additional charges.  2 stars for this

Summary: Booked the Portofino because I thought we were getting a high grade place to stay with a free shuttle to Disneyland. There is no free shuttle offered as the web site I saw indicated. When I inquired at the front desk I was shown a different site stating there may be a fee for a shuttle.  I was told it would be $5.50 a day per person.  There is no breakfast.  Our curtain had been previously torn and was hand sewn together.   Our room cleaning consisted of the bed made and fresh towels. Toiletry's consisted of a facial bar and body bar of soap, small bottles of shampoo, conditioner and body lotion which I had to get from front desk because none was left after our first night.  We were there 4 days.  Neighboring rooms above and next to could easily be heard.  I did have really nice

Summary: Only good thing was its location. Poorly maintained property.  Dirty rooms with aging decor.  Our last stay at Hyatt down the street with bunks was much better.  Front end staff was fine and they allowed us to to check our luggage.

Summary: We booked sort of a last minute trip to Disneyland and this property really delivered. It has a pretty good trifecta of location, price, and value. It’s close to the park (walking distance), it was noticeably more affordable than some other similar properties, and the size of the room we got was totally satisfactory for our family of four. Now, it’s not fancy, there is some wear and tear in the rooms, and you’re not exactly overwhelmed with “Disney Magic.” However, if you’re not too picky about where you stay and you’re looking for a safe and affordable way to stay close to the park, the Portofino fits the bill.

Summary: Chose this hotel because it is within easy walking distance of Disneyland, approx 1/2 mile. A very clean and tidy hotel which was good for our 4 night stay.Close to CVS and Walgreens so snacks were readily available. All staff were very friendly and helpful.

We love seeing our guests take advantage of our proximity to so many wonderful attractions.  We look forward to hosting you again soon! Have an amazing day!

Summary: This hotel is truly just ok.  It might have been quite nice in the 90’s but I don’t think there have been any upgrades in well over 20 years and it’s very dated!    Let’s go over the good, the bad and the ugly:  The good:  -very close to Disney land (15 minute walk) -parking is free  The bad:  -no continental breakfast like most hotels nearby  -there is no air conditioning in the second building common areas, making it unbearably hot  -ice machine on our floor didn’t work  -VERY dated  -rough crowd and lots of weed smoking in the building and the stairwells   The ugly:  We booked through a vacation package and later upgraded our room to a kids suite.  We got there and they put us in a regular room.  We went back to tell them and they told us none of the rooms we paid an extra
Manager Response: We appreciate your feedback, kimslater478.  It's unfortunate your stay in our hotel didn't exceed your expectations. We regret that you weren't entirely satisfied with our amenities and our accommodations. We care deeply about the happiness and the satisfaction of our guests so we'll address your concerns regarding the lack of continental breakfast and air conditioning, the broken ice machine, our ambiance and decor, and the crowds smoking in the building and the stairwells with the appropriate members of our team. Although we're delighted to hear that you loved our free parking and our amazing proximity to Disney, we regret to hear about the problems involving your upgraded suite. It's upsetting that our staff did not go above and beyond to make your stay the best it could be and that you had to fight for your upgraded room. This is not a reflection of the service we're accustomed to providing. We pride ourselves in providing top-notch service and offering a comfortable and relaxing environment for our guests.  We do hope you give us another opportunity to share a more positive experience with you soon.

Summary: This is an OK hotel with nothing of any particular note. Facilities are somewhat run down and the staff are moderately helpful.  On a positive note the pool and jacuzzi is a decent size and within ten to twelve minutes walking distance to Disneyland.
Manager Response: We appreciate the feedback, ricom811.  We're happy you had a pleasant stay with us and enjoyed our central location. However, we're disappointed that your stay with us was less than ideal. We regret that the conditions of our accommodations didn't meet your expectations. We'll address your concerns with our team moving forward.  We look forward to hosting you again soon for a more positive experience.

Summary: We had a great experience at this hotel. Close enough to Disneyland that we were able to walk there and back, even after walking all day in both parks. The room we stayed had a separate room with bunk beds and it’s own TV. My daughter loved it!!
Manager Response: Thank you for the excellent review, Lararosario!  We are thrilled to hear that you had such a wonderful experience at our hotel. Glad to see you and your family loved our prime location near Disneyland and we are delighted that you found your accommodations suitable to your needs. We look forward to seeing you again soon! Have a great day!

Summary: I really took a lot into consideration before booking this room!  A lot of pros and cons for sure!  Not entirely bad!  Just needs some improvements...booked for a few nights due to location to Disney. Went thru actual website to save a few bucks. Location is excellent!!!  Loved that. Parking is okay if you dont mind parking structures.. Because outside parking near rooms.. Is impossible!  Unless u have a hound dog watching..  Room location was in 2nd Bldg.. Room 2112...requested room close to po downstairs and this is where I got put.  Paid full price on their website too!  Won't do that again.  Requested a freshly cleaned carpet due to bad alergies to dust mites and dirt... Nope!  Didnt get that either  so moving on.. Room is okay for size.  Just not a well thought out layout
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback, Sj J.  We care deeply about the happiness and satisfaction of our guests so it's excellent you appreciated our prime location. However, we're disappointed your time with us was less than ideal and that you had such challenges with our furnishings and accomodations. We care about the satisfaction of our guests so we'll be sure to address your concerns with our team moving forward.  We look forward to hosting you again soon for a more positive experience.

Summary: Our first room had a smell to it and they quickly changed our room. No hassle at all. The halls and elevators are very hot, it could use some air conditioning. Hannah made check in and out very easy. The kid suite is perfect for a family as it will sleep 6 easily. But best of all it is a ten minute walk to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for the fantastic review!  We're delighted your time with us was so wonderful! It's fantastic you took advantage of our convenient location in the heart of the city. We endeavor to offer a memorable experience for all of our guests. We look forward to hosting you again soon for another excellent experience!  Have a splendid day!

Summary: We stayed a few nights. The suite was spacious, price was reasonable, and the hotel was within easy walking distance of Disneyland. However, it is definitely in need of upgrades: the walls were definitely too thin, the hair dryer only worked for about 2 minutes before it would quit (I have very short hair and it wouldn't stay on long enough to dry my short hair), the bathroom floor tiles were cracked, and not all electical outlets had covers.
Manager Response: We appreciate the feedback, Lillith.  We're disappointed that your stay with us was less than ideal. It's unfortunate you've noticed a decline in the quality of our accommodations. We care about the comfort of our guests so we'll address your concerns with our team moving forward.  We hope for the opportunity to host you again soon for a more positive experience.

Summary: We had a great place to stay. The kids had there own bunk bed. We had our own bed that had French doors to close off so the kids could watch TV and we could relax after a long day at Disneyland. The front desk was very helpful and courteous and the rooms were clean. Will stay again next time we do to Disneyland
Manager Response: Thanks for the excellent review, Isaac!  We're delighted your time with us was so outstanding as providing our guests with an excellent experience is very important to us. It's fantastic you appreciated the layout of your room and helpful staff as well as our clean facilities. That's what we like to see! We look forward to hosting you again soon for another fantastic experience.  Have an amazing day!

Summary: The only thing the hotel does have is a safe in the room. Friendly staff very clean and great location just a short walk the Disneyland . Shops all around and restaurants everywhere it is great value for money..
Manager Response: Thank you for the fantastic review!  We're delighted your time with us was so wonderful! It's fantastic you took advantage of our convenient location in the heart of the city. We endeavor to offer a memorable experience for all of our guests. We look forward to hosting you again soon for another excellent experience!  Have a splendid day!

Summary: Spent a few nights here last week, lovely room, comfy bed, clean resort and nice staff. 10 mins (if that) walk to Disneyland! Walgreens, 7/11 & CVS within 5 min walk as well as restaurants. Pool and pool area tiny but still nice. Would recommend and stay here again!
Manager Response: Thanks for the wonderful review!  It's fantastic you had such a lovely experience with us. We're thrilled you enjoyed our prime location and proximity to so many of the city's best attractions. That's what we like to see! We're looking forward to sharing another amazing experience with you soon!  Have a beautiful day!

Summary: This was our first trip to Disney and our first stay at the Portofino Inn and it definitely will not be our last!   Check in was a breeze and they were able to upgrade our room to the family suite last minute which was GREATLY appreciated (travelling with a one year old who sleeps on her own, the separate room was much needed).   The girls at the front are all so wonderful and treated my daughter like a princess! On our second day they gave her a princess balloon and that was great entertainment for her for the rest of the trip! Special shoutout to Amada and Hannah who went above and beyond to make our stay amazing! You girls are fantastic!  The room itself was great. It was the cleanest in the way that there were some items left behind under surfaces such as the dresser, which
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing this wonderful review!  We are very pleased to hear that you had an enjoyable experience with us at our convenient location! We also appreciate your praise for our team; they work very hard to ensure every guest feels right at home. We are delighted you felt welcomed and valued during your time with us!  We'd love to share another positive experience with you in the future! Have a beautiful day, and thanks again for sharing!

Summary: This is the 2nd time we stayed at the Portofino Hotel and we LOVE it here! There were 15 of us and check in was a breeze. Super clean rooms, friendly staff at a great price. Close to restaurants and convenient stores. We will be coming back in the future. Also nice walk to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thanks for the great review!  It's wonderful you enjoyed your stay with us so much! We strive for excellence so we're thrilled you appreciated not only our clean rooms and friendly service, but also our convenient location! Your praise lets us know we're doing our job!  We can't wait to host you again soon for another amazing experience! Have a fantastic day!

Summary Heading: Great access to Disney and Amenities
Summary: While not the nicest place on the block, it more than met our needs.  We had a family suite, with bunk beds and additional pull out. It was perfect for everyone’s comfort and space.  The room wasn’t the cleanest, but it wasn’t disgusting by any means.  Aprox 900 meters from door to Disney gates, it was perfect for our family.  Great access to 24 hour Ihop, CVS and Walgreens.  Easy walk to garden walk for food amenities.   Staff were pleasant, pool was simple but clean and the kids liked it.  Parking was free (huge bonus).  We would stay here again. I really think the negative comments are people not managing expectations.  My only negative would be, I wish the elevators were faster given the amount of rooms and knowing it’s mainly young families with strollers and gear.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback.  It's great you had a pleasant stay with us. We're happy you enjoyed our close proximity to Disneyland and our welcoming staff. However, we're disappointed your time with us was anything less than ideal and that you had such challenges with our elevator service. We also regret that we could not do more for you regarding the cleanliness of your room. We care about the satisfaction of our guests so we'll be sure to address your concerns with our team moving forward.  We look forward to hosting you again soon for a more positive experience.

Summary Heading: Old and tired hotel - hotel photos are misleading - good location
Summary: Check in went smoothly and we went to our room into the second building, what a total shock it turned out to be. The room was dark and dingy and we paid for a 2 bedroom, 2 bathroom suite. The 2nd bedroom had old dirty see through curtains so if you were getting changed in that room the person sitting in the living area could see everything, no privacy whatsoever. The bathrooms were quite okay but the exhaust fan  did nothing to help with ventilation. The aircon worked quite well but the return air in the main bedroom was very noisy. The walls are paper thin and we could also hear people walking around in the room above us and kids running and jumping all the time which was very annoying. The TV in the 2nd bedroom had a line through the screen so not sure how old it was but not
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to leave us this feedback, Catbar57.  We regret that you had such difficulty during your time with us. We strive to offer quality service and comfort for our guests and it's unfortunate your room wasn't cleaned to the high standards we aspire to provide. We'll be sure to address your feedback with our team moving forward.  We do hope you allow us to host you again soon so we can share a more positive experience with you.

Summary: We love staying here when we're go to Disneyland. The atmosphere is nice. They have a weight room and pool. It's walking distance from the park and the staff is nice. We always enjoy our stay. We recommend it.
Manager Response: Thanks for the splendid review, Vincent!  We're elated knowing you had such an incredible time. We're very keen on having our guests feel excited to come back. There's nothing more important to us than the happiness of our guests. Thank you again for the fantastic review.  We look forward to your next trip. Have a beautiful day!

Summary: Second time staying here when going to Disneyland.  Great kids suites with bunk beds and divided room.  Large bath with double sink areas.  Lots of tv channels, free WiFi,  free parking and 10 minute walk to Disneyland. Live it!!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review, Mary!  We're pleased to hear that you enjoyed another stay at Portofino Inn & Suites Anaheim. It's wonderful to know that our amenities and spacious accommodations left a lasting impression. We truly appreciate you taking the time to share your thoughts with us. We look forward to hosting you again the next time you're in town!  Have a wonderful day.

Summary Heading: Found large broken glass in kids bed
Summary: My daughter found a large piece of broken glass in her bed. I took the glass to the front desk and showed it to an older woman with short hair. I asked her to have the room serviced and to have housekeeping strip the beds and look for more glass. She said “gee, I don’t know how that could have gotten there.” The clerks tone was suspicious and accusatory as if I planted the glass in the bed. I didn’t ask for any discount whatsoever, I just asked for fresh linens. When I returned that night, no one had come to clean our room, not even to give us fresh towels. I stayed at this hotel because my kids liked the bunk beds but This hotel needs a major renovation. There are nicer, newer, cleaner and closer hotels to stay at then this. Walking past countless homeless drug addicts laying
Manager Response: We appreciate the time you took to give us feedback, Catalina.  Our staff takes a lot of pride in the one of kind service we provide. It's very disappointing to see your experience with us was not the standard we're accustomed to sharing and that your room wasn't properly refreshed before your arrival. We always strive to exceed all of the needs of our guests. We'll be sure to address all off your concerns internally and we would love to show you how hard we work to give our guests the best service in the future.  We hope to share a more positive experience with you soon.

Summary Heading: A good place to stay close to Disneyland and kid friendly
Summary: We usually stay here when we do our Disneyalnd trips. The kids love that they have their own room. Bunk beds and a pull out sleeper couch help for big families. The rooms are seperated by glass sliding doors. Yes this is an older hotel and a little dated, but the cleanliness and service make up for it. I would rather have a clean room and good swervice verses a state of the art room that is dirty. You are at Disneyland so not much time spent in the room anyway. It is a 12 minute walk to Disney. No continental breakfast but good parking with the parking garage finally built.
Manager Response: Thank you for the kind words, Kenneth!  It's excellent you enjoyed your time with us so much!
