We pride ourselves in offering a clean and comfortable environment for all of our guests and your praise tells us we're succeeding. Thank you again for sharing your review with us!  We can't wait to see you again soon for another amazing experience! Have a fantastic day!

Summary: Pictures on website make this place look much better then it actually is. Room was clean and a great size but getting older and showing some wear. No safe in the room and cheap furniture.   Walls are paper thin. We could hear conversations of adjacent rooms. The absolute worst part of the stay was the room above us. Kids were running and jumping for 2-3 hours straight each night, loud enough to wake us and sometimes until 1-2am. We called the front desk 5 nights in a row re this and nothing was done.  We also have kids, we get it, however they were running and jumping loud enough to wake us up and nothing was done. Even a room change could have been offered.   Other items stood out as troublesome as well; locked door to secondary building broken for 3 days, lots of homeless in
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to share your feedback, JMT604.  It's unfortunate your time with us was less than ideal. We're disappointed you had such challenges with the sound insulation in our rooms as well as our service, and that we couldn't better accommodate you. The satisfaction of our guests is important to us so we'll be sure to discuss your feedback moving forward.  We hope for the chance to host you again soon so we can share a more positive experience with you.

Summary: Rooms were fine. It was close enough to Disneyland. But the "heated" pool was barely heated, to the point hardly anyone would go in. It took the fun out of the stay. Next time I'll try somewhere else unless they fix that.
Manager Response: We appreciate your feedback, Daisy.  We're disheartened to hear about the challenges you faced during your stay with us. We strive to offer our guests quality service and comfort. It's unfortunate our pool was not on par with the high standard we're accustomed to sharing. We'll be addressing your concerns with the appropriate members of our team.  Please consider allowing us another chance to provide you with the excellent service we're capable of providing.

Summary: We had 3 family suites and stayed for 4 days.  We stayed here a few years ago and were impressed, not so much this time.  Rooms were run down, one of the rooms had a dirty towel folded up and put with the new ones, trim on mirror in bathroom completely gone down to the wood or whatever base was.  All of us experienced problems with keys not working - not fun when you are tired after a long day at Disneyland.  I heard many other customers saying the very same thing.  This place is in sad shape and needs some serious upgrading.  Staff was very pleasant though.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback, Debi.  We were disappointed to learn that the condition of our hotel did not meet your expectations. Please be assured that this is not the standard that we aspire to and we will share your concerns with the appropriate members of our team moving forward.  We hope you allow us the chance to share a more positive experience with you soon.

Summary Heading: Not bad and a good value.
Summary: This isn’t a 4 star hotel and that’s ok. It’s an older hotel so there are older hotel issues. The first day I got there it was raining and cold and the room heat wasn’t working. I called and they immediately sent maintenance to switch over the AC to heat. The front staff was very nice and accommodating, giving me a first floor room because I mentioned I was tired. The hotel is close to several convenience stores and quick food options. The bed was comfy and the room was spacious. There was only one mirror so I would suggest adding a few more. The surrounding hotels are much more expensive than this hotel so I would recommend this as a great alternative to them. You won’t be blown away but you will feel like you got your money’s worth.
Manager Response: Thank you for the fantastic review, Jennifer!  We're delighted your time with us was so wonderful! It's fantastic you took advantage of our convenient location in the heart of the city. We endeavor to offer a memorable experience for all of our guests. We look forward to hosting you again soon for another excellent experience!  Have a splendid day!

Summary Heading: Not my favorite Disney area hotel
Summary: I really have always wanted to stay here.  I was so disappointed.  First the heater didnt work in our room.  Then through no fault of the hotel the Sheraton employees were on strike and we were woken up at 4am to the sound of chanting and beating drums.  The front desk employees were really nice.  Then the internet was down for 1 1/2 days.  They did upgrade us to make up for it but it was just a little frustrating.  If I got a really great deal I might be willing to try again.  The rooms were clean.  They are right next to CVS, (nice perk) and within a 10-15 min walk to the park so not too bad but it could have been better.  The kids really did love the bunk beds and their own tv.
Manager Response: We appreciate the feedback, Eyoung77.  We're disappointed your time with us was less than ideal. We care deeply about the satisfaction of our guests so we regret the challenges you experienced during your stay. Thank you again for your feedback. We'll be sure to address your concerns with our team moving forward.  We do hope you give us another opportunity to share a more positive experience with you soon.

Summary: A nice hotel a short walk from Disneyland. However,no safe in room. Clean and comfortable. Good value for money. Many coffee shops and restaurants in the area. Beds are good and while furniture is a little dated. Would return. Staff are excellent friendly and helpful.
Manager Response: Thanks for the wonderful review, Ward!  We're thrilled you had such a fantastic stay at our convenient location! It's excellent your room was refreshed properly and that you appreciated our comfortable and clean facilities. That's what we like to see! We strive for excellence and your praise lets us know we're doing our job!  We look forward to seeing you again soon for another fantastic experience! Have a beautiful day!

Summary Heading: Nice room but loud hotel.. no sleep
Summary: We enjoyed the set up of the room but was very unhappy with how noisy the hotel is. You can hear every door close/people running and talking in hallways/ don’t get a room where you have guests above your room.. they kept us up all night. Will not stay again.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, we appreciate the feedback.  We're disappointed you had such challenges during your time with us. We regret the problems you had with the sound levels in the rooms and that your stay didn't exceed your expectations. We care about the comfort of our guests so we'll address your concerns with our team moving forward.  We do hope you give us another opportunity to share a more positive experience with you soon.

Summary: Nice room not fancy but close to the parks balcony was nice check in/out was easy and of course a great location didn't use any of the amenities but fridge was broken when we got into the room only took a few minutes to get a replacement up
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review, Sky!  We're happy you had a pleasant experience with us! It's lovely you enjoyed our rooms and location so much. That's what we like to see! However, we regret your inconveniences due to our accommodations. We endeavor to offer a top-notch experience for our guests so we'll be sure to discuss your concerns moving forward.  We look forward to hosting you again soon for an even better experience! Have a lovely day!

Summary Heading: They made it easy to want to come back for another stay.
Summary: We drove from Victoria BC to spend our vacation at Disneyland, we were running late and called about doing a late check in,as long as we were there by midnight. all was going to be ok. as we arrived late and needed to book and extra day due to a booking error on my behalf..we were still greeted cheerfully by the night manager who checked us in and changed our reservation...she made our visit to this hotel so much better..every time we came into the lobby she greeted us with a smile and big ol hello. nice rooms close to everything...love this place to bits.
Manager Response: Thanks for sharing the excellent review with us, joehO8351AA!  We're so glad that you had an exceptional experience with us from beginning to end. It's wonderful to know that our staff treated you so well and made you feel welcome throughout the entirety of your time with us. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon!  Have a lovely day!

Summary: Let me begin by saying that I LOVE the arrangement of their kid suites, and appreciate the nearness to Disneyland. Traveling as a family of 5 can be difficult to manage, especially with 2 giant teenagers in the mix. That said, the front desk staff was super overwhelmed and forgetful (although nice), but once you step inside, Portofino just looks tired and dirty. Every corner has dust in it, there was a plethora of mold in our shower, large stains on the sofa bed mattress, and just a general feeling of ick in the rooms. Add that to the uncomfortable beds, and no thanks -- I'd rather pay for 2 separate rooms at a nicer hotel than stay here again.
Manager Response: We appreciate your feedback, Adriene.  It's disheartening to hear that you had such challenges during your time with us. We're disappointed that our cleanliness didn't meet your expectations and that your room wasn't refreshed properly. The comfort and satisfaction of our guests is important to us so we'll be sure to address your concerns with our team moving forward.  We do hope for the chance to demonstrate the high-caliber service we're accustomed to sharing with our guests.

Summary: I have always wanted to stay here, heard great things about their mini and kid -suites.   Sadly, we had some issues. Our room was a suite, but very out-dated. The furniture was very worn and dirty. The real issue was the toilet every time we used the toilet we had to call for maintenance. Our room had one working outlet that we had to take turns charging our phones and tablets.   The bed was clean and at the end of a long day walking, you aren’t so picky. The hotel, is more like a motel.  It’s a doable walking distance from the park. I didn’t feel like the staff was very friendly they seemed more bothered. Crossing this hotel off the list, we will not be staying here again.  On vacation, especially a pricey vacation you expect some creature comforts. This did not have it.  Pros-
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback.  I am so sorry to hear about the issues you faced with your room.  We will be addressing this as well as your comments in regards to the staff's response as a team.  We pride ourselves in having excellent service here so I am very surprised to see these comments.  We would appreciate having the opportunity to show you our true level of service in the future.  If you should decide to give us another chance, please feel free to contact me and I will ensure your stay is seamless!

Summary: We spent four days at the Portofino the first few days in January.  We enjoyed our stay. The room was clean, the bunk beds a big hit! We have stayed here at least 6 times, for our Disney trip! We love the kids suites.  The gift shop is nice! CVS is close by, and the Pizza Hut express next door was nice. The only thing, this hotel is due for a update. The bed was very uncomfortable. the sofa bed was sinking in the middle.  We heard our neighbors constantly above us. Loud and stomping.   The location is within walking distance. We enjoyed our stay! We are planning to go back to Disneyland and who knows, we might stay here again, if the price is right!
Manager Response: Thanks for the 4/5 review, Carolyn!  We are glad you had a great experience with us! However, we are disappointed to see some of your concerns and we will let our team know about them. We always work very hard to make sure all of our guests have a pleasant stay. We look forward to hosting you again for an even better experience.  Thanks again, and have a lovely day!

Summary: Hotel was good enough, provided a bed and everything we needed. Was in a great location, just near disneyland entrance, about a 3 minute walk. We had a balcony, the view was nothing special but balconies are still great. It was a bit scrappy, and the walls were so thin that you could hear every conversion the nearby rooms had. The reception wasn’t kind, she looked like she would rather do anything then talk to us. Overall, a moderately good hotel, if you are staying for a short time.
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to share your feedback, Molly.  It's unfortunate your time with us was anything less than ideal and that our team didn't go above and beyond to accommodate your needs. We're also disappointed you had such challenges with the sound insulation in our rooms. The satisfaction of our guests is important to us so we'll be sure to discuss your feedback moving forward.  We hope for the chance to host you again soon so we can share a more positive experience with you.

Summary Heading: Great spot to stay when visiting Disneyland
Summary: This place is perfect for your Disneyland trip. Good price and conveniently located to Disneyland - only about a 10-15 minute walk. Stayed with my wife and 4 young kids (2,4,6 & 8) Booked through our travel agent and they were not aware of the "resort" fee either - seems to be no mention of it on their web site or when you look at any of the online booking services. That aside, when it is only a place to sleep after a long day at Disneyland, I don't know why anyone would want to pay any of the exhorborant prices of the surrounding hotels.  Plenty of options to eat between the hotel and Disneyland - recommend The Pizza Press. The chemist downstairs is handy for the water and snacks
Manager Response: We appreciate the feedback, Eliot.  We're pleased you enjoyed your overall stay with us! It's great you appreciated our prime location and hotel. That's what we like to see! However, we regret to hear that you were caught off guard by some of the fees associated with your booking. It's unfortunate you didn't notice the fees previously. In no way do we intend on hiding it from our guests as the information is readily available on our website. We'll be sure to pass this along to the appropriate members of our team for future improvement.  Thanks again for sharing your feedback. We look forward to hosting you again soon for an even better visit!

Summary: Walking distance to Disneyland (10 - 15 min).  CVS & Walgreens nearby.  Lots of FREE parking. Lots of FREE loaner strollers. Good FREE WiFi (stream videos without buffering). Clean rooms & property.  Lots of HOT WATER - great baths & showers. Grandkids loved pool and hot tub (actually HOT). Staff at desk very motivated to help (especially Amaele) Staff had an electric scooter delivered to hotel (cheaper than renting at park)
Manager Response: Thanks for the splendid review, Rich!  It's fantastic you had such an excellent experience with us at our convenient location and that our team took such great care of you. We want you to feel right at home as soon as you walk through our doors! Our team will love to hear they made such a wonderful impression on you.  We look forward to hosting you again soon so we can share another amazing experience with you. Have a beautiful day!

Summary: We stayed here for 6 nights, paid in full in advance with points. Were told we would be charged a “damage deposit” of $18/day that would be refunded after check out. My husband and I definitely did not damage our room, but to date they have not refunded any of the “so-called damage deposit”. I emailed the hotel to inquire about it but did not get a response. I think we were Scammed!
Manager Response: Dear Guest, we appreciate your feedback.  We apologize for the delayed response in regards to the resort fee. We do charge a resort fee per day as well as authorize an additional amount of $10 per day. We have released the authorization however, the resort fee will remain. Normally our agents are very clear about this information at check in, so I apologize if there was a misunderstanding. Please contact our General Manager if you have any further questions. We thank you for staying with us and look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.

Summary: We stayed here during our recent Disneyland vacation and the staff was really nice however the rooms were not. The room appeared clean but there was crusty filth on the floor around the bathroom area. One of the beds had blood on the sheets, and there was some sort of phone issue with our room because the phone started ringing about midnight and rang 3 more times until I finally took it off the hook. I believe the calls were guests trying to contact the front desk.  Of course they changed the sheets and I was assured the phone issue was fixed but the phone issue continued the 2nd night starting at 1am so again I had to take it off the hook.    We all know how exhausting it is to spend the day at Disneyland and you collapse in bed but between the phone ringing, listening to
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to leave us this feedback, Steve.  We regret that you had such difficulty during your time with us. We strive to offer quality service and comfort for our guests and it's unfortunate your room wasn't cleaned to the high standards we aspire to provide. We're also disheartened you had such challenges with the phone in your room. We'll be sure to address your feedback with our team moving forward.  We do hope you allow us to host you again soon so we can share a more positive experience with you.

Summary: On the plus side, this hotel was built for serious noise control. I have trouble sleeping due to pain, so get up and meander during the night to try to alleviate pain.  There were teenagers running the hall at 2-3 in the morning, laughing their heads off, and I would never have known had I not seen it with my own eyes.  So if you are a light sleeper, this hotel has that plus going for it.  You do not hear what's going on in the next room or the hallway - bonus!  What ticked me off about this place is that we asked about the shuttle our first morning and were told that it comes about every 25 minutes.  So we stood in front of the entrance for 35 minutes, in plain view of the staff, and a shuttle never came.  So we walked to the park, disappointed.  We are not spring chickens and
Manager Response: We appreciate the time you took to give us feedback, Kat.  Our staff takes a lot of pride in the one of kind service we provide. It's very disappointing to see your experience with us was not the standard we're accustomed to sharing. We always strive to exceed all of the needs of our guests. We'll be sure to address your concerns internally and we would love to show you how hard we work to give our guests the best service in the future.  We hope to share a more positive experience with you soon.

Summary: My daughter and I stayed for 5 nights in October, 2018.  Staff was nice but the experience was just okay.  One day our room did not get cleaned, when we arrived back at 1 am there were no fresh towels, the trashcan was overflowing.  No apologies.  No shower curtain was up when we arrived, had to call housekeeping to have one placed.  Hotel is in need of updating.  We did love the convenience of walking to the parks, there is a Starbucks across the street, and a CVS next door for last minute things/water, etc.  Overall decent experience, but for the money ($220 a night) I would expect more.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your honest feedback with us.  We sincerely apologize that we missed servicing your room one day.  Often times, the do not disturb sign was up and we may have missed checking back with you for a more convenient time to clean.  We are happy to hear that you enjoyed the convenience and perfect location of our hotel!  Please feel free to give us a call 24 hrs. a day if you need assistance with anything in the future.  We hope to have another opportunity to show you a wonderful stay from start to finish!  Thank you again for staying with us!

Summary: I booked my stay through hotels.com. I arrived about 11 p.m. when I checked in I was given room keys to an occupied room. I literally opened the door on someone sleeping with all their belongings there. I felt so bad! When I went back down to the front desk to tell them there were other guests telling them the exact same thing! They sent more than just me to occupied rooms. To me this is simply unacceptable and very unprofessional. The rooms themselves are average. Nothing really horrible or great. Hair dryer didn't work. It is only 1.5 blocks from the park entrances which was our main reason for choosing this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing your honest feedback.  I am truly sorry for your experience at check in.  We have revisited some crucial training with some of our newer associates to ensure that this never happens again.  We would like to have the opportunity to make things rights as well as show you a problem free stay in the future.  Please feel free to contact our Front Office Manager and we will ensure your stay is seamless.  Thank you again for staying with us.

Summary: Great location, right near the CVS (25 metres) which is a fabulous 24 hour one stop shop food, water, snacks alcohol and included medical care. Across the road you have about 6 choices of food, mexican, fantastic asian, pizza etc. Enjoyable 15min walk to Disneyland. Pretty safe locality, a few homeless people around but harmless. Disneyland fire works can be easily viewed from the pool area. Internet was good enough for the basics. Pool and gym were good considering the price. Spa was a treat for the kids. Rooms were a bit tired but was to be expected. Laundry was handy but a bit pricey at approx US$3.75 per wash and US$2.50. Approx 3 larger than blocks away from Target which would be an easy Uber ride or approx 20min walk.  IHop directly across the road serves nice omelettes
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing this thorough review!  We appreciate you taking the time to share all of the features of our hotel as well as the surrounding area.  It sounds like you took advantage of all we have to offer and enjoyed our accommodations here at the Portofino!  We thank you for staying with us and hope to see you back in the near future!

Summary: I have stayed here once and my wife and daughter have stayed 3 times and we'll be there again the end October. The staff is always very friendly and helpful. The rooms have been very nice and the location is about 5 minute walk to Disneyland. Great location! CVS around the corner if needed and restaurant and bars within easy walking distance. Parking sometimes gets crowded but great overflow in parking shared parking garage. Overall a great little place to stay!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the wonderful review!  We appreciate you taking the time to share your experience here at the Portofino and are pleased to hear that you enjoyed our room accommodations, service, and location.  We will make sure to recognize our staff for their excellent hospitality.  Thank you again for staying with us, we look forward to welcoming you back in the near future!

Summary: I stayed at the Portofino and was delighted to find that my room had a balcony. The room itself was spacious and clean, and service at the hotel was friendly. The pool isn't very big but its nice, and well kept. Enjoyed the stay overall.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing your recent experience with us!  We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed our Deluxe Balcony Room type as well as our friendly service staff.  We will be sure to share this with them to recognize their excellent hospitality.  Thank you for staying with us.  We look forward to welcoming you back in the near future!

Summary: The hotel upon 1st inspection looks very nice.  The guest rooms have a odor (old lady smell) to them that required us to buy an air freshener next door at CVS.  Decor is nice, although it's well loved and could use some cleaning of the walls and stuff.  The shining attribute here is their employees.  Front desk were fantastic greeting us each time we passed through and always willing to help out.  Some cons: horrible pillows, chaotic parking, no safe in room, no soap dish and no change machine in laundry/snack or ability to use credit cards for either.  There are plenty of restaurants in the area with most desirable ones requiring at least a 5 minute walk.  It would be nice to see a booklet in the room about information on the hotel (ie. where the microwave, laundry, or game
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to share this thorough review!  We appreciate the opportunities for improvement as well as the wonderful comments in regards to the hospitality of our team!  We will make sure to commend them for their excellent service.  We will also address the cons you mention here so that we can create a better experience for future guests.  We appreciate the recommendation and look forward to showing you a flawless stay the next time around.  Thank you again for staying with us!

Summary: Slow internet, crazy hot water (like gonna get scalded hot), weird smells in the hallway and elevator, no soap when we showed up, non-fitted sheets that pull out every night, and one day they didn’t clean our room. Poor.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your honest feedback.  We apologize for falling short of your expectations and will take this as an opportunity for improvement.  In the future, should you encounter any issues during your stay, please feel free to reach out to us 24 hours a day and we will be happy to help you through it.  We hope to have another opportunity to show you our true level of service in the near future.  Please feel free to reach out to me personally and I will ensure your stay is seamless.  Thank you again for staying with us!

Summary: We had a family suite with bunk beds in a separated room, which the kids loved. Our room was perfectly nice. Easy walk to Disneyland from the hotel. The best breakfast option, we found, was to go to the Cafasia cafe in the Sheraton next door, which had good coffee, hot breakfast sandwiches, and pastries, and eat a quick breakfast at one of the tables outside - also a 10% discount there for Portofino guests. Overall, a great stay!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing your recent stay here at the Portofino!  We are so happy to hear you enjoyed our spacious Kid Suite, close proximity to Disneyland, and the breakfast discount options right next door!  Please let us know if there was anything else we could have done to make your stay more enjoyable.  Thank you again for staying with us.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary Heading: PERFECT LOCATION BUT BEWARE OF UNEXPECTED CHARGES
Summary: We stayed at this hotel for five nights in a family suite. The room was perfectly suitable for our needs but was looking a little tired and outdated. The coffee maker and fridge were welcome additions. There wasn’t a safe in the room but you could use one at reception- a little inconvenient but not the end of the world.  However, it’s location was impressive. A 10 minute walk to the parks, surrounded by restaurants and a CVS right next door made it ideal for our needs.  Unfortunately, since coming home, my views of the hotel have been somewhat soured. Despite being confirmed at check out that all of our fees and taxes, including the resort fees, had been prepaid by our agent and leaving the hotel with nothing to be paid the hotel then took almost $200 from my account a week
Manager Response: Thank you so much for providing your experience with us.  We truly appreciate you taking the time to share the pros and the cons from your visit.  While we appreciate your kinds words in regards to our location and accommodations, we also appreciate you providing our opportunities for improvement.  I apologize for the lack of communication provided by the front desk upon check-in.  While your confirmation and booking agent should make the fact that we charge a resort fee apparent to you, we should also bring this to your attention face to face when we welcome you to our hotel.  I have sent you a separate email with some resolutions and explanations so I look forward to hearing back from you.  Thank you again for staying with us.  We look forward to having another opportunity to show you a wonderful stay from start to finish!

Summary: If you are staying in Anaheim, you are most likely going to Disney. If you are going to Disney, and you are like me, you only really need a place to sleep and relax halfway through the day. This place is it. It seems to have been remodeled recently, and the rooms are pretty large for the price. It has a separated toilet and sink area so multiple people can take advantage of the bathroom at once. It is about a 10-15 minute walk to the parks, and the ART bus stops a few feet in front of the hotel. There is no restaurant attached, but several across the street. The pool is small (I can see this being a drawback for families with kids) but it’s still a pool. They also let us check in at 9AM which was super convenient as we were able to put our bags away before going to the parks.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the wonderful review!  We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed our spacious suites as well our convenient location and accommodations.  It was our pleasure to get you in to your room early so you could get a head start on the parks!  We thank you again for taking the time to share your experience with us and look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary: On our first night we were given a room with bunk beds that smelt like a tramps overcoat...not the 2 bed apartment we had booked and paid for! To be fair Esmeralda on the front desk was cool and upgraded our room...still not what we had booked but reasonable. The cleaners do a decent job though and the free parking is a bonus...let’s be fair if you book a hotel here you only sleep in it..there is an array of food outlets opposite 👍
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your honest feedback with us.  I sincerely apologize for the smell you mentioned as well as the room type mix up.  We will be reaching out to the third party vendor to make sure that they fix this issue on their end as well as investigate your initial room. I am happy to hear that Esmeralda was able to make things right for you.  I will make sure to share your comments with her to recognize her excellent hospitality.  We hope to have another opportunity to show you a wonderful stay from the beginning.  Please feel free to contact me upon your next travel plans to the area and I will ensure your stay is seamless!  Thank you again for staying with us.

Summary: The hotel is ok. The staff is terrible. We left an item in our room and they still have not returned it. They received our shipping payment and all necessary information but the item is still sitting there when I called today. It has been with them for over 2 weeks. Checking out of the hotel was also an issue. We booked through a third party website and the hotel double charged us. A two night stay at this cheap hotel ended up costing us over $550.00. This was one of the worst hotel experiences of my life, and we travel often. The purpose of the trip was to have a good time with my family at Disneyland and have a comfortable place to stay. This  hotel was a huge disappointment and caused more stress than enjoyment.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your honest feedback.  My sincere apologies for the miscommunication in regards to the item you left in the room.  We have just received your information today in order to ship your items.  I apologize if it was assumed that we would use the credit card on file for your room in order to ship.  We will certainly revisit some training for our staff to be well versed in explaining how the shipping process works for lost and found items to avoid this issue in the future.  We hope to have another opportunity in the future to show you our true level of service and value.  Thank you again for staying with us.

Summary: We had booked 2 rooms 2 months in advance and when we arrived to check in we found out that they double booked and gave our room away. Staff was very unhelpful, and rude. just said every room was booked for the night and basically told us to leave. As business owners ourselves we could not believe the way we were being treated
Manager Response: Thank you for providing this valuable feedback.  I am shocked to hear that this happened to you here at the Portofino.  We have had situations in which the credit card is not valid so the booking is not guaranteed.  However, we do make several attempts to contact our valuable guests to obtain a new method of guarantee prior to arrival.  I would be happy to investigate the situation fully for you so we may both learn from the situation.  Please feel free to contact me and I will be happy to look in further detail with your name and reservation number.   We hope to have another opportunity in the future to show you our true level of service and value.

Summary: Great hotel great staff! Booked a same day check in as we had to change hotels from one that was roach infested. Prices do get a little crazy at times as if we were across the street from Disney but it was better than sleeping with roaches on our previous hotel. Portofino is clean and nice with a short 5-10 min walk to the Disney gates. Great thing is CVS is on the corner walking towards Disney and is a great stop before or after the parks for snacks/drinks/meds or anything you need! Definitely a good location if you are unable to get a closer hotel as you are still within walking distance.
Manager Response: Wow!  Thank you so much for sharing your recent experience with us.  We are so happy to hear that we were able to come to the rescue for you.  We truly appreciate your kind words in regards to our cleanliness.  I will make sure to commend our housekeeping department for a job well done.  We thank you again for staying with us and look forward to welcoming you back in the near future!

Summary Heading: More like Portofino haha we tricked you Hotel
Summary: One day last minute division to leave to Disneyland early and ended up in the Portofino. Lobby nice and smells of vanilla, hallways to room clean and smells of old wet towels. Rooms......... popcorn ceiling, chipped up dirty furniture, ripped shower curtain, broken cabinet all for the price of $300. Woohoo! (Enter sarcastic face here.)
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your honest feedback.  I am so sorry that we fell short of your expectations.  Yes, portions of our hotel may be beginning to show signs of age, however, we pride ourselves on maintaining the highest of cleanliness standards.  If you would be willing to share more in regards to your room number and stay date, I would be happy to take a deeper look into the situation.  Thank you again for sharing.  We hope to have another opportunity to show you our true level of service and value in the future!

Summary: This was out first time staying at this hotel and it was not bad.  The interior of the hotel is starting to show some signs of age but nothing to bad yet.  The room we had was very lager with enough room for our family of 5 and all of our stuff.  There are lots of quick grab restaurants nearby and a Walgreens right next store. We would stay here.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your recent experience with us.  We are pleased to hear that our room accommodations worked well for your family as well as our close proximity to Disneyland!  We thank you for staying with us and look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary: We stayed two nights, the rooms just felt like that had a deep layer of filth underneath the disguise of a “tidy and clean” room. The room just seemed slightly old and needing some TLC or repair. Not to mention my son and I both got our own queen bed and he woke up on the first morning we were there with what appeared to be some kind of bug bite (5 total) on his upper leg. It was clear that it was not a mosquito bite so I’m not trying to make any drastic assumptions here but there’s only a few type of bugs that leave you with bites like this from the pictures I’ve seen before. The staff all seemed rather stressed out, they did allow me to have a late checkout the last day we were there which was very nice but they all just seemed stressed/unhappy, the environment there just felt
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your honest feedback.  I am so sorry for the room issues you have mentioned.  We are committed to making our guest's stay comfortable and would have been happy to move you to a room that would have been better suited to your needs.  Please feel free to contact me in regards to the bites you mentioned.  I can assure you that we have not had any pest issues and would be happy to investigate for you.    We hope to have another opportunity to show you our true level of service and value.  This is certainly out of the ordinary for us and we would like to be able to win you back.  Please feel free to contact me upon your next travel plans to the area and I will ensure your stay is seamless!

Summary: This is just an OK kind of hotel !  come late and leave early in the mornings ! Most of the guests stay here as this is quite near to the Disneyland ( about 10 min walk ) . The rooms are OK & are clean ! Location is good as lot of restaurants are in the vicinity .  They do not have a restaurant so plan accordingly . Ok for the price they charge !
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your recent experience with us.  We are happy to hear you found our hotel to be clean and convenient.  Our goal is to be an outstanding hotel, so please feel free to share how we can exceed your expectations in the future.  Thank you again for staying with us, we look forward to seeing you back soon!

Summary: Stayed here for the second year in a row for a Vidcon/Disney family trip. Stayed for 5 days this year and had a great time. This place has family suites to accommodate larger families like ours and is centrally located to the Anaheim Convention Center and Disneyland Park as well as several local restaurants. Peets and Starbucks coffee close by too for coffee lovers like myself! No bellhops available tboigh so come ready to lug your stuff up to the room fyi.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing your recent experience with us!  We are pleased to hear you and your family enjoyed your stay as well as our location and accommodations.  In the future please let us know if you need assistance with anything, our staff will be happy to lend a hand with luggage.  Thank you again for staying with us, we look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary: It was good for the price. The bed was very springy! When you sat on it you would bounce off. The kids were amused. The laundry room washer did not work. I had to ring out my own clothes. Our stay was ok for the price!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing you recent experience with us.  We are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay as well as the springy mattress!  We will certainly take a look at the washer.  In the future, please bring any issues you face to our attention and we will resolve as soon as possible.  Thank you again for staying with us, we look forward to welcoming you back in the near future!

Summary: I typically don't write reviews, but this place was so bad I feel the need to warn other people. Dont be suckered in by the pretty rooms they have in their pictures. The rooms here are dirty. The sheets on our bed were stained and had holes. Our TV would randomly turn off and when it didn't our remote didnt work. The staff was incredibly rude. When we went to check in my girlfriend asked a couple of questions and the lady checking us in interrupted her telling her she could ask questions when she was done checking us in and when she knew we actually had paid(I prepayed). The ladies cleaning assumed because I was white I didn't know Spanish and as we were leaving were talking smack about my girlfriend and I. We checked out and then the next day they charged me an 83.30 charge and
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing this feedback.  I am truly sorry that we fell short of your expectations.  This is not the standard of service we provide here at the Portofino and I hope that we will have another opportunity to show you our friendly and welcoming service in the future. There must be some sort of misunderstanding in regards to your resort fee.  The resort fee is charged per night and the remainder that is authorized for any additional charges that you may incur is released within 3-5 business days if it is a credit card, and 5-7 if it is a debit card.  Please feel free to contact me personally if you do not see that authorization release.  Again, I hope that we will have another opportunity to show you a wonderful stay here.  Thank you again for sharing.

Summary: Best stay.  Hotel is great.  Staff very friendly and helpful.  Especially Clauida, she went out her way to help us.  This is our stay hotel when we come to Anaheim.  Always recommend to our friends.  I know at least 5 families that have stayed and really enjoyed their stay
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your recent experience with us.  We are so happy to hear you enjoyed our friendly staff and helpful service!  We appreciate you taking the time to mention Claudia.  I have recognized her for her excellent hospitality!    We truly appreciate the recommendation and look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Thank you again for staying with us!

Summary: We thought the pictures of this hotel were definitely more polished than the experience. We found peanuts on the carpet, dirty door handles and switches. There were holes in the bedsheets. The location was the only positive aspect. Not good value for money. We tried complaining directly, however, they weren't interested and told us to speak to hotels.com. Probably one of the worst hotels I've ever stayed in. We could've stayed in a Hilton nearby for $16.00 more.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing you honest feedback.  This is definitely out of the ordinary for our hotel and we will make sure to use it as an opportunity for improvement moving forward.  I apologize that we did not address your concerns appropriately.  We would be more than happy to have you back with the intent to make things right.    If you would allow us the opportunity to show you our true level of service, I will ensure you are well taken care of.  Please do not hesitate to contact me personally upon your next travel plans to the area.  Thank you for staying with us.

Summary Heading: Location and room concept is Great but
Summary: Easy walk to Disney and restaurants.  We liked the separate bunk room.  However, maintenance issues abounded: shower drain detached, clothes line detaching, light fixture detaching, etal.  They charge a "resort" fee but don't seem to put enough of it back into keeping the place up.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing you recent experience with us.  We are happy to hear you enjoyed the room layout and close proximity to Disneyland!  I apologize for the room condition you mentioned, we are constantly repairing our rooms to make sure that our guests are satisfied so I will make sure to share this with our maintenance team.  Thank you again for sharing, we look forward to having you back soon!

Summary Heading: Rude staff and will charge extra fees a week after stay
Summary: The lady at the front desk was extremely rude. Made me wait almost an hour before checking me in and then told me I'd have to find a place to park away from the hotel or she would charge me $16 a day to have access to the parking lot for the hotel behind them. When I asked for an extra pillow and blanket for my 12 month old son, they gave me a blanket with a wet stain on it. Four days after check out, they charged my bank $20 six times for no reason. They had already charged me resort fees. When I called to ask why, the lady was rude and said that she couldn't pull up old records and that the front desk doesn't receive complaints. I would have to speak with a Manager in the morning but that's if they feel like coming in. Worst hotel experience ever. I had to call my bank to
Manager Response: Thank you for providing this feedback.  I apologize if there was a misunderstanding in regards to the parking as well as how your inquiries were handled.  From what I understand there was a second vehicle that was a part of your group and we do have to charge for any additional vehicles after the one that is allotted for your room.  I would be happy to help you with the charges mentioned here.  Please feel free to contact me if you would like to speak further about your experience as well as to look at the transactions.  We hope to have another opportunity to show you our true level of service in the near future.  Thank you for staying with us.

Summary: Price was fair. Room was clean and nice. It’s just a 10 minute walk to the front gate at Disneyland. They let me stay to park for the day, even after I checked out. Other than some kind of breakfast, what more could you want?
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review!  We are happy to hear you were well taken care of and enjoyed our close proximity to Disneyland.  We look forward to welcoming you back on your next visit.  Thank you again for staying with us!

Summary Heading: Review of Visit to Portofino Inn and suites
Summary: I traveled to Portofino Inn and Suites to take college students to a convention in Los Angeles/Anaheim, CA. The rooms are affordable and perfect to house our 20 - 30 students. The family suites are quite convenient for this reason. There are bunkbeds and a pull out couch along with a large bed. Everyone gets a nice bed. The staff is very helpful! Claudia Silva has helped us for several years in a row and she makes our travels easy and convenient. She and her team give excellent service which is why we come back year after year. The prices are very competitive for what we experience. We received free Wifi and we were  close to the convention center, Disneyland and the Garden Walk. Claudia and her staff will do what ever they can to make your stay easy and enjoyable!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the thorough review!  We are happy our accommodations were so convenient for your group.  I will make sure to recognize Claudia and the team for taking good care of everyone and ensuring your time here was enjoyable!  We thank you again for staying with us and look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary: We stayed at this Hotel for my daughters first birthday, spending the weekend at the Disneyland Resort.  The hotel is about a half mile walk to the park, same side of the street so the walk is a breeze.  Rooms were nice enough, and we weren’t to concerned about that since we were planning on spending most of the time inside the parks.  Where this Hotel really shined is when I forgot my laptop in the room.  We spent our last day at the park, checked out at 8am and didn’t arrive back to get the car ( which they let us leave it in their parking even though we were no longer staying there) and realized I had forgotten it.  AMADA, who was working the front desk, was SUPER helpful and kind during a VERY stressful time for me and I can’t thank her enough.  She, along with their amazing
Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing your recent experience with us!  We truly appreciate you taking the time to recognize Amada for going above and beyond.  I will make it a point to recognize her as well as the team for providing a great stay to you and your family.  Thank you for staying with us, we look forward to seeing you back soon!

Summary: This was a great location near Disneyland within walking distance 1 1/2 blocks  Hotel was clean, comfortable beds, shower amenities, coffee in room...the pool looked nice, though we did not use it. Front desk was efficient and accommodating.. we could not check in early, which would have been nice, but they gave us our parking pass, parked at hotel for free and walked over to Dland. IHOP right across the across the street from hotel for a great breakfast beforehand.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing you recent stay with us!  We are happy to hear you enjoyed our accommodations and location.  We will do our best to get you in early next time!  We hope you had a wonderful time at Disneyland.  Thank you again for staying with us, we look forward to welcoming you back on your next visit!

Summary: Asked for an ADA room which was fine - the guest entrances didn't have handicap access doors.  You had to wait for someone to open the doors for ppl in wheel chairs.  The room smelled like mold and bed sheets had stains!! - the room key didn't work and had to go to the front desk 6 times to get them reactivated!! The staff was BOTHERED and said "did you have the room keys next to your phone?? no apologies! It was in my purse the and nowhere near my cell phone!!NO continental breakfast or even coffee available in the lobby -  Web-site says there is a shuttle available - which there wasn't! 1 pro - The exterior of the property was nice.
Manager Response: Thank you for providing this valuable feedback.  I am so sorry we fell short of meeting your expectations.  I will certainly share your comments with the team and use as an opportunity to improve service.  Normally our team is very kind and helpful, so I apologize if you experienced otherwise. Also, there is a shuttle that picks up at our hotel.  The tickets are $5.50 for adults and $2 for children.  I apologize if this was not communicated to you.  I hope that we may have another opportunity to show you our true level of service on your next visit here.  Please feel free to contact me upon your next travel plans and I will ensure your stay is seamless!

Summary: The hotel shows some wear and tear. It is a family hotel, so that is not unusual.  If you are in the area for a Disney trip this hotel will suit you perfectly. We travelled early April and the pool and hot tub were perfect temp. A CVS, Walgreens, gift shops, and Starbucks are right there. A little bit of a walk and you can get to McDonalds or the Cheesecake Factory. Disney main gate is a straight walk. We had two children in the double stroller and the trip was easy. The fridge and microwave made it easy to have breakfast in the room, however if you prefer to eat out IHOP is directly across the street. We had a suite with sleeper sofa and double doors to offer some separation to bedroom area.  It was nice to have that extra space.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the thorough review of our hotel!  We are happy to hear that our amenities and location were well suited to your needs.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Thank you again for staying with us!

Summary: We came here for a family vacation to Disneyland. The check in was quick and easy, staff was friendly and was able to direct us to the different areas of the hotel we would be interested in.   Our room was clean and ready when we arrived. We got the family room with the bunk beds. We have a 3 and a 4 year old. They LOVE the bunk beds. It is also nice to have our own space. The bunk bed room has a TV, couch, small fridge and coffee maker. The other room has a queen bed, tv, dressers, and the bathroom attached. There is a lot of room in this room. We are very happy with the space and did not expect this much with the price we paid.   If you are going to Disneyland it is a straight shot to the main gate. Maybe a 10 minute walk. I recommend walking. In The time it takes to take the
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your recent experience with us!  The kid suites with bunk beds are a favorite among families with young children.  We are happy to hear you enjoyed the room configuration and amenities.  Thank you again for staying with us, we look forward to welcoming you back on your next family getaway!

Summary: This was a nice place to stay during our Disney staycation. The hotel was clean and our daughter loved sleeping in the bunk beds. The staff was nice and it was only a short 10 minute walk to the park.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review!  We are thrilled to hear you enjoyed the cleanliness and helpful staff.  We hope to have you back soon!  Thank you for staying with us!

Summary: This is a great little hotel in the heart of Anaheim. You are a ten minute walk to anywhere - including Disney. Staff is super friendly and hotel is very clean. It isn’t the most modern hotel ( you can’t link in to your Netflix on the tv etc) but there is a cute little heated outdoor pool and small fitness room. The only thing that could make this hotel better would be free continental breakfast... but I’m not sure that any hotel around here has that!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and for choosing the Portofino Inn & Suites.I am delighted to hear you enjoyed your stay we look forward to welcoming you back the next time you are in the Anaheim area.

Summary: We stayed two nights in a two bedroom suite.  The check-in was fast, efficient and very friendly. The room was nice, clean and just what we booked. Parking is easy.  The hotel is an easy walk to Disney! 😁
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and for choosing the Portofino Inn & Suites. I am delighted to hear you enjoyed your stay, we look forward to welcoming you back the next time you are in the Anaheim area.

Summary: *Hotel was clean *Staff was friendly (Amada took very good care of us)  *After a long day in the park we were able to walk the short distance back to our room and relax and re-charge for day two and three!  *Late night snacks were also available in easy walking distance to finish off the day!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review your stay with us. I am delighted to hear that Amada took good care of you and you enjoyed the location of our hotel while visiting Disney. We look forward to welcoming you back next time you are in the Anaheim area.

Summary: The family room with the bunkbeds was perfect for our family!  Loved this room more than any we've stayed at in the area.  The walk is a bit more vs a maingate property but well worth the savings.  The maids were great and even my 6yo was impressed and wrote them a note.  The front desk made it easy to extend our stay.  The microwave and fridge made it easy to take snacks and sandwiches (from CVS around the corner) into Disneyland.  Would stay here again for sure!
Manager Response: Dear JosieW,  Aren't our rooms spacious too?  Thank you very much for recognizing our housekeeping staff, they love receiving notes and being praised for the hard work and service they provide. Please know upon your next visit you will find cards in the room so you know specifically who serviced the room.    Thank you again, looking forward to your next visit.

Summary: I stayed with my Son's and there families. We all had separate rooms, but was fun to go back and forth. Great time with all my family. The Inn was located walking distance and had a shuttle. This is the third time I stayed there and we always make this the first choice.
Manager Response: Carol C,  We are thrilled to hear we are your first choice!  Looking forward to seeing you and the family soon.

Summary: Excellent service from hotel staff. Nice, clean hotel. Disneyland is about a 10 minute walk. Restaurants located right across the street. CVS right next door. This hotel is always our favorite to stay at. Totally recommend. My kids loved the kids suite! Overall a wonderful experience!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your stay with us.  It sounds like you had a wonderful time here.  We appreciate the kind words and look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Thank you again for staying with us!

Summary: Room was great, a small balcony for us to enjoy. Lobby was very clean and nice sofa's to sit and lounge when you want to get out of the room. Nice bench outside the front door as well to sit and people watch.
Manager Response: SoniaS,  So nice to hear you enjoyed your experience and our staff.  On your next visit we hope you can enjoy our pool area, we think it's a nice getaway too.

Summary: We love staying near the Park but not on property.  Portofino Inn is an easy walk to Disneyland and having CVS and Walgreen's so close is great for picking up groceries for kids for breakfast and lunch.  Amanda at the front desk was extremely kind and gave my two young kids two Disney trading pins which made their day.  We enjoyed staying at this hotel and would consider doing it again.
Manager Response: Dear Matthewecimino,  Thank you for taking the time to recognize Amada.  We love Disney and love our location too.  On your next visit ask our friendly staff about our Kids Corner which has board games, crayons/coloring pages, swimming toys, beach toys etc.  Hope you see you and your family soon.

Summary Heading: Most convenient and cost effective place to stay
Summary: Clean room and excellent customer service, the room divider was an added touch.  Two TVs is very nice.  Pool and hot tub are outdoors.  No plug ins by the bed, very inconvenient.  Cost effective.  Coffee shops nearby, to go marts in walking distance.  Disneyland is close enough to walk to and from, or take a shuttle to avoid parking fees.
Manager Response: Dear Verna M,  We couldn't have said it any better!  Thank you for taking the time to share your comments, they help us and future travelers.  We now  have extension cords at the front desk that can be borrowed during your next visit. Hope to see you soon.

Summary: Clean, comfortable, close to everything the receptionist “Amada” was wonderful knowledgeable friendly helpful  very hospitable.  The only thing I would change: our pillows they’re small lumpy bumpy & uncomfortable, so  bring your own. Also it would be nice to have a microwave in your room otherwise great family place to stay.
Manager Response: Dear ORnurse1,  We are so glad you enjoyed your stay and our location.  Thank you for recognizing Amada for her hospitality, we love to hear everything guests have to say about their stay.  Traveling tip- All our Kids Suites have microwaves and our laundry room has a microwave for guests to use if they are staying in the first building.

Summary: Lovely hotel. Close to Disneyland. We were upgraded to a Kid's Suite. The kids loved having bunk beds complete with lights and their own space. The room was very spacious. Parking is a bit hectic, but once here there's no reason to drive, with being a couple lights away from the park, small shops, restaurants, and coffee all in within a block.
Manager Response: RaeAnne,  We love that you loved your stay! We understand parking can be a bit hectic and that is why we limit one vehicle per room. Ensuring that every guest gets a spot is our top priority.  Thank you for mentioning our location, we agree and are very thankful that everything is in walking distance.    Thank you for taking time to share your stay experience.  Sincerely,

Summary: My family has stayed at this hotel multiple times over the passed 3 years. I wouldn't stay anywhere else. the rooms are always clean and the staff bend over backward to help especially Claudia Silva. It also has a great location only a 10-15 minute walk down Harbor blvd to Disneyland or 5 minutes to the bus stop.
Manager Response: Dear skier3185,  Thank you for your review and for recognizing our staff.  We love to hear about our amazing staff and contribute that success to managers like Claudia Silva.  Looking forward to seeing you again and for many years to come.  Sincerely,

Summary: Hotel is showing its age, but the staff is very friendly (esp mgt). Stayed for a getaway to Disneyland, the park is expensive, but the rates at the portofino were very competitive, and we’ve stayed here before.
Manager Response: Dear Marrshaf,  Thank you for the 5 rating!  Looking forward to seeing you again and providing you with the friendly service you deserve.  Best Wishes,  Hotel Management

Summary: This hotel was alright. It was clean but the rooms are older. This hotel is walking distance from the Disney parks, downtown Disney and the convention center. They have a lovely pool and hot tub too! With that said, we had to be here for 5 nights for business over at the convention center. I guess my main complaints would be the fact that they didn’t give us coffee cups for the rooms, no continental breakfast was offered and there are no coffee stations in the lobby. Not to mention whatever they use to clean the rooms had a funky smell and the mattress was old and you could feel the springs in them. If you’re staying in Anaheim for a longer than a couple of days I’d say go somewhere with more comfort.
Manager Response: Jessica,  We love our pool too!  Thank you for suggestion on the coffee in the lobby, that is something we can look into. Your comments about our beds, not having cups and the room being clean are all being shared.  Thank you again for taking the time to share your thoughts.

Summary Heading: A little extra walk, but nice room
Summary: We had a great experience here.  We had a room with a separate little room for the kids.  The room was clean and well put together.  The location was a little farther from DLand than we normally stay, but it was worth the extra walk.
Manager Response: Heidi,  So glad you loved your experience, we hope to see you again.  Travel Tip- ART passes are sold at the front desk which will take you to Disneyland, Anaheim Garden walk and much more.

Summary Heading: Great location and friendly, personal service
Summary: I've been going to the NAMM music convention for years and always try to stay at the Portofino - both for the great location and the friendly, personal service. This year when I arrived I didn't see any familiar faces at the front desk. Then Claudia (one of the managers) recognized me and came out to greet me. I was early for check in but she made a call on her walkie talkie to housekeeping to see if they could get a room ready for me. Ten minutes later I was in my room with my bags and off to the NAMM show! The next morning one of the NAMM daily newspapers wasn't in front of my door as usual so I asked one of the cleaning folks if there were any extra.  She went and found me one on another floor. I like the family suites when I go. Plenty of room and always clean. Can't beat
Manager Response: So happy you loved your experience and thank you for recognizing Claudia for her outstanding service.  Looking forward to seeing you again next year for NAMM.  Rock on!

Summary: We stayed at this hotel during our recent trip to Disneyland with our grandchildren. The staff was very nice and helpful. We chose Portofino because of the family suites. Super easy to walk to the park and plenty of close by restaurants. Will be staying there anytime we go to Disneyland.

I would absolutely recommend this place to anyone who needs to stay in Anaheim.

This place is a GREAT value,  we can't wait for our next trip!

Had to park in the parking structure at the neighboring hotel. The room was clean - small bathroom and the a/c wasn't pushing out much cool air. Got a little stuffy in the afternoon.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We always stay at the Portofino when going to Disneyland. The rates are good, it's within walking distance to the park, the rooms are clean and the staff is very friendly and helpful! I highly recommend you give it try!
Manager Response: Dear dcjacobs,  Thank you for your loyalty to our hotel. We are happy to hear that we have become your hotel of choice when visiting Disneyland and look forward to hosting you on all your future trips. If there is anything else we can do to make your stay even better, please don't hesitate to let us know!

Summary: I live in San Diego and drive up to Disneyland at least 6 times a year.  I've stayed at different hotels, but this is my favorite so far.  It does not offer free breakfast, but it does have a microwave and a mini fridge.  The rooms are perfect for families as it has a king size bed in the main room and in the other room a king size sofa bed and a 2 twin beds.  The rooms are clean and the staff very profesional.  The price is resonable and best of all it is walking distance to Disney's main gate (less than 2 blocks). There are two pharmacies right behind the hotel which makes it very convinient for picking up snacks. The hotel does not charge for parking, but they do charge a resort fee upon arrival, but it is no more than $20.  I will be returning soon.
Manager Response: Dear Monique,  We couldn't have asked for a better subject line. Thank you so much for the wonderful review. We are humbled and honored to receive such kind words. We hope to have the opportunity to serve you and your family on your next trip.

Summary Heading: Great location, comfortable clean rooms, excellent service
Summary: Our 4 night stay at the Portofino Inn in Anaheim was an overall good experience.  The fellow at the service desk (George?) was efficient, friendly and accommodating even with people in line and phones ringing off the hook.  Check in was super easy.  The hotel has been upgraded fairly recently but you can see signs of age here and there.  Nothing worth mentioning really since it's a pretty nice place to stay.  Rooms are super comfy.  The only thing about the hotel that I would improve but would have NO IDEA how to do so would be to improve the parking situation.  Parking is quite limited but there's plenty of parking in the next door garage and the hotel will validate your ticket for a free stay in that garage.  Not a big deal, but it's not very convenient.  Welcome to SoCal, I
Manager Response: Dear sinatra89,  Thank you for the wonderful review. We thank you for the positive feedback and look forward to your return visit. We are diligently working on improving our parking situation and hope to streamline the process very soon.

Summary: We had a wonderful stay here for one night in a family room. The hotel is conveniently located for shops,places to eat and is only a 10-15 minute walk from Disneyland/Downtown Disney. The staff were very friendly,welcoming and helpful,and a credit to the hotel. We would definitely stay here again and recommend the hotel to our friends.

Summary Heading: Great location from Disneyland at a reasonable price!
Summary: This place was nice and clean and very close to Disneyland. The location of the hotel was very close to Disneyland as we were able to leave Disneyland after a long day then back to our hotel to have a power nap then back out to Disneyland at night conveniently. There are shops and stores nearby with walking distance. The rooms were nice and big enough for our family. We would return here again next time we go to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear mcdgadela,  Thank you for taking the time to post your review. We are thrilled to hear that you had a great experience and cannot way to see you back with us on your next trip.

Summary: Great service and very friendly staff they had room a cleaned rightaway just so we can check in early. Thanks cause' we been' flying all night. Rooms are just perfect I have 3 kids with me. Swimming pool is small but, my kid's are happy. And the Hotel is walking distance to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear leaf1554n,  Thank you for sharing your experience at our hotel through TripAdvisor. We appreciate your feedback and are delighted to hear that you and your kids enjoyed your stay. We hope you will come back and visit us again soon!

Summary: Stayed at this hotel to go to Disneyland with my friends. We were greeted with a smile by Amanda the moment we walked in through the door. The value was great, and the room was very clean. There is access to a pool, although me and my friends did not get the chance to use it unfortunately.

Summary: Great Hotel! Room was nice and very quite! No restaurant on site, but, there were several that were walking distance. The shuttle was not available at night:( Parking was limited, so, I had to park at the Residence Inn, I day was $60.00. Outrageous! I will not do that again!

Thank you again for your feedback and we hope to see you again soon.

Summary: Excellent stay, enjoyed the room- king size bed suite and the room was very clean. Would recommend requesting the suite, very comfortable and seemed like a lot of space. The location of the hotel is great, easy walking to and from Disneyland. There are several coffee locations near by along with restaurants to choose from. The entire hotel appeared to be very clean and well maintained.

Summary: Stayed here on a solo visit. Pleased with my stay and having a patio to sit out on to relax. Location is walking distance from  Disney Parks and near stores for convenience. Pleased with space ans bathroom.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We enjoyed our stay at the Portofino. We had great accommodations and were able to find great food. It is centrally located near Disneyland so you can eat where ever you choose and still be near the park. It's less than a miles from the main gate so put on your walking shoes. It's a good warm up for your day!!!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Our Disney Home Away From Home
Summary: So thankful that we found the Portofino Hotel. My daughter and I are Disney Annual Passholders and we come up from the desert at least every month. We tried several other hotels in the area until we found the Portofino. It is consistently the cleanest, safest ,friendliest  and fairly priced hotel in the area. The walk to disney is an easy one and the bus drops us right in front when we are to tired to walk home. The area is filled with restaurants and stores but the rooms aren't loud at all like the the hotels off the freeway. The staff is by far the BEST. They have gone out of their way to be helpful and kind. If you are looking for a family friendly hotel in a great area with an AMAZING staff the PORTOFINO is the one.
Manager Response: Dear MarcyNGrace,  We appreciate the time you have taken to share the kind words regarding our staff. We are so glad to hear that we have become your hotel of choice when visiting Disneyland and look forward to hosting you on all of your future trips. Summary: The people in front desk are very nice and helpful I wanted to have a quiet dinner and they showed me where to go .Front desk people are great.  If I drink is it is it went into Legoland have a people with help with anything I need towels coffee at different places to go
Manager Response: none

Summary: I saw the pictures if the hotel and the rooms and I knew that getting a discount price for a room would not buy me what they publish online, but you would not expect to get a dirty room. I have never experienced a hotel where you walked clean after a bath and your feet would get black for walking in the room carpet. Note to management: change or deep clean your carpets!

Summary Heading: Good, reasonable choice near Disneyland, next to Anaheim Convention Center
Summary: This is a hotel appropriate for a visit to Disneyland or the Anaheim Convention Center, not a place to stay and relax.  Reasonably priced for the area, about five blocks from the Disneyland entrance and one block from the Anaheim Convention Center.  Room perfectly fine, with normal wear expected in a property of this type.  Rooms have small balcony or patio, overlook parking lots, so don't expect a view.  Pool VERY small.  Parking is tight - you may need to park in the overflow lot, which is the garage for the Marriott next door.  Conveniently, a CVS store is located right next door, along with a PizzaHut carryout and a Coffee Bean and Tea Leaf.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great hotel for a family or several adults for Disney and Anaheim Convention Center
Summary: Just spent 4 nights at the Portofino Inn for the D23 Expo of all things Disney. There were 4 adults and we reserved a kids suite.  It has a queen in one bedroom, a set of bunk beds and a sofa bed in a room separated by sliding doors. There's a sink outside the bathroom and the usual sink, tub/shower, and toilet in the bathroom. You are within a walk of the Disney parks ( granted about 20 minutes for seniors) and about 10-15 minutes to the convention center. The facility is clean and has good security.  Plus I found covered parking and didn't have to move the car for 4 days. They could use a little more counter/storage space and maybe another towel rack.  There are many places to eat also within walking distance. And to top it off our room was ready when I checked in at about
Manager Response: none

Summary: Booked this room on Saturday afternoon for a same night stay based on the availability (it was D23 weekend) and the proximity to  Disneyland.  Wasn't sure what to expect because of that.  The room layout was that of an older hotel, but everything was new and updated. The rooms were on the smaller side but that was ok.  We spent our time out and about and didn't need a car to get where we wanted to go. A very short walk from DIsneyland, the Anaheim Convention Center, and several restaurants.

Summary: That room had everything you could've asked for,plenty of sleeping space,two tvs,a king size bed even...very comfortable by the way and kids did not complain either about thier beds.  We weren't any of the amusement parks that day but just site seeing the LA area, but I would highly recommend hotel because of its service and hospitality and of course of it's great location too Disneyland. We will definitely be coming here again. Excellent job Portafino Inn.

The room next to us must have had a water leak or something as they had the door propped open and fans trying to dry the room out.  The AC vents were filthy and the windows looked like they had a film of dirt on them and needed to be cleaned. As others said, there isn't enough AC outlets so finding a place to charge more than a couple phone is impossible, especially for a family of 5.   We were not happy about the bed. It felt like it was an air mattress and too much movement would have

However, I would like the A/C to be less noisy and the key card problem to be fixed if I am going to rate this hotel excellent.

Summary: Good to pick this hotel if you only need for sleeping. Lobby has a great smell. But hallways for 2nd bldg, elevator is too hot. I cant imagine if summer heat of 90s-100s will be bearable walking to & fro. Room is basic. Do not expect quality. Sheets has stains. Room service Did not change our sheets given we stayed for 3 nights! Bummer. Needs upgrade for the price paid. I didnt bother taking photos.

Here are the issues we had with the property:  -Stains on the carpets -Very few electrical outlets, and the ones they did have hardly held the plugs in place -EXTREMELY noisy...the walls are paper thin -Beds were not comfortable -It was still a decent walk to the Disneyland entrance -Most of the parking is in a parking garage that you have to take your ticket for validation at the front desk every time.  Not a place I would recommend.

The air conditioning is great but incredibly noisy - enough to require ear plugs.

Summary Heading: Super Noisy stay in worn down rooms
Summary: This place gets the job done but we wouldn't stay here again. The rooms are just worn out: old beds, torn drapes, drawers that stick. There was a used spoon on the floor from a previous guest. overall the room was a bit grimy.  My son came out of the shower and both sinks started to back up. We called the front desk and they sent up maintenance while we went to lunch. We returned to find black footprints on the bath mat and marks on a few towels. They didn't really clean up after they left.  The noise factor is a problem with the hotel's structure. You can hear people walk through the hall, in the room above you and every door opening and closing. The building just rumbles and squeaks even when people are casually walking around. The door next to us had a parade of kids going in
Manager Response: Dear Dale B,  We appreciate you taking the time to share some feedback regarding your recent stay with us.
