The moment I entered the lobby, I was blown away by the cleanliness of the  atmosphere. It was very Disney and magical. You have complimentary valet service. It's very convenient with walking distance to EVERYTHING! A convenient CVS store. Ihop is just across the street. Nearby Gardenwalk Shopping Center, Disneyland, California Pizza Kitchen, Bubba
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your glowing review of the Portofino Inn & Suites Anaheim and your compliments truly mean a lot to us. With a spirit to serve, we take great pride in not only meeting, but exceeding your expectations and I am so glad together we made your stay worthy of five stars. It's awesome that we blew you away with the cleanliness of our property and our unbeatable location was the icing on the cake. Edgar, Diana and Claudia are certainly special and associates like them are all over the hotel who help leave positive memories for many guests like you. I am proud of them! Your flattering feedback will definitely be shared with the team as a testimonial that what they do daily makes a difference. It was our privilege to be at your service and we are delighted that you plan to return. See you soon!  Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: The hotel staff was great! We were only there for a few nights and we mostly were around at night when no one was around but the few times we saw the staff they were very helpful. This was the first time my friends and I had stayed in a portofino hotel and loved it. The staff were all very friendly and professional. We will definitely be staying here again.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us recently with your friends and for all of your delightful feedback. I am fortunate to work with highly trained staff who love what they do and I am happy that they added on to your overall satisfaction. Seeing smiles on our guests' faces and reading feedback such as yours lets us know that we've accomplished everything we set out to do. I look forward to sharing your kind comments with my team. It was our pleasure to serve you and are happy that you plan to return. See you soon!  Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: We stayed here for our trip to Disneyland.  It was a clean hotel.  It was a short 15 minutes walk to the park.  The price was fair.  Several gift shops/7-11 close to buy supplies.  We arrived before check in so they held our luggage so we could go to the park.  Check in was quick and easy.
Manager Response: Thank you for your great feedback about your stay at Portofino Inn Suites Anaheim and for the prefect rating. I appreciate your comments regarding our proximity to the parks, clean property and the excellent service you received at the front desk. We are glad you enjoyed the great value for the price we offer. Thank you for your business, we will look forward to welcome you back soon when you are in town.  Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: Nice clean, spacious room, close to Disneyland, pharmacy and restaurants, heated pool and service was excellent, my kids loved the bunked bed and having their own space, we recommend this hotel to families with kids.
Manager Response: Thank you for your terrific review about your stay at Portofino Inn Suites Anaheim. I am highly delighted to know that you and your kids thoroughly enjoyed your immaculate, spacious accommodation, as well as our proximity to Disneyland, pharmacy and area restaurants. We appreciate your kind comments regarding our service, and I am glad that you and your kids had a great time with us. I am pleased to learn that you will recommend us to your friends and families, we look forward to welcome you back soon when you are in the area.  Sincerely,  Dan Kramer

Summary: We really enjoyed our 5 night stay. Our room was in the separate building from the lobby--top floor-quiet, clean rooms. I requested a top floor, quiet corner room--you guys did great taking care of this. Our room was spacious and clean! The maid did a good job and even placed our kiddos stuffed animals cutesy on the bed each day.  Location -- pretty close to Disney--the 15-20 minute walk each day one trip was good exercise for us. CVS right downstairs and 7-Eleven across the street. WE would def. stay at your property again. THe only complaint I have is parking--which I hope will be fixed before our next trip!
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful review of the Portofino Inn & Suites Anaheim. We are so pleased that you enjoyed a quiet five night stay with us and we could provide you with the room of your choice. Guests love that our location is within a few minutes walking distance to Disneyland park and we are happy that it was suitable for you as well. Your appreciation for the service you received, means a lot to us and will be definitely sharing it with the team. We continue to make steady enhancements so I am happy to share that we are building a parking structure very soon. It is great to learn that you plan to return and we anticipate your next visit. See you soon!  Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: Nice location. Only a ten minute walk to Disneyland. Service was wonderful. Stayed in a kids suite. They were just ok. Nothing out of the ordinary. Bunks, pull out and a queen bed. The carpets could have used a good cleaning but overall they were nice rooms for the price. No breakfast but rooms do have a refrigerator so we just brought our own breakfast foods. There's a cvs right next door and a food 4 less about four blocks down the road. Easy access from the freeway.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind remarks in your review of our hotel. Your comments regarding our wonderful location were a pleasure to read and we truly appreciate you for highlighting the same. We are happy that you felt we deliver a great value for the price paid and that the service you received was to your thorough satisfaction. We appreciate your observations and hope to welcome you again the next time you're in the area!  Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: He expected the room.It was bigger because it was a family suite. The two Latin-speaking people who attended us so much Claudia as the girl in the night exelentes helped us in reserves and on excursions. There was a vicarious girls if the company star line that you recommended for excursions this company is deplorable for the Spanish-speaking we re abuse, I hope you have this into account outside the hotel and would not recommend looking for people who speak no English alternative
Manager Response: Thank you for writing about your recent stay at the Portofino Inn & Suites Anaheim We are happy that our staff made such a good impression on you, especially Claudia who delivered outstanding service while you were here. We are also pleased to read that you enjoyed our large family-friendly suites. It was a pleasure serving you and we hope that you will stay with us again in the future.   Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: The one good thing about this hotel is that you can walk to Disney. Other than that this hotel is the worst. The hotel  supervisor Henry is very rude and could careless of any issues you may have. We stayed here for 7 days and a couple of the days housekeeping never cleaned our room. Management seemed not to care when we complained. This hotel is not worth $1. The rooms are not the best and old. The pool is very small and dirty and the game room smells line urine. The carpets are very dirty. The only reason we did not leave is because the hotels around us were fully booked. If there were other hotels that were not booked we would have left. Very bad service. The hotel offers Disney packages that they rather not discuss but have you pay additional cost and this hotel is truly not
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your comments with us. Your satisfaction is important to us and we will be using the feedback you provided to make improvements to ensure we offer an exceptional experience for our guests in the future. I apologize that we were unable to clean you room due to the Do Not Disturb sign on your guest room door throughout the day and upon your return Housekeeping and left for the evening. We have recently upgraded our TV Service provider with an expanded HD line-up. We just updated our Lobby, Guest Laundry, Pool area and Fitness room. We are glad to hear that you enjoyed our proximity to the Disneyland Resort. It's our goal to provide an excellent customer experience and we hope that you will give us another opportunity to prove this to you on your next visit to Anaheim.   Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: We had a kids suite, which was a decent size for the 2 adults and 2 12 year old boys, lots of room to store things, sleep, and just hang out the little time we were in the room. The king bed was very comfortable, no aches or pains in the morning like I usually experience with hotel beds. I liked that we had a sink both in the bathroom and just outside, helped make things easier when getting ready to go. The AC in our room worked great, no issues with feeling muggy or warm.  There were a couple of issues, one being that the carpets were very dirty and our feet would turn black with not much movement, so we had to wear shoes the entire time. Also, there was a stain on the desk/table chair, both of these issues can be easily fixed with a carpet shampooer. There was also some
Manager Response: We're delighted to hear that you and your family had a fun filled multiple night’s stay at the Portofino Inn & Suites Anaheim. We are happy that you loved your comfortable accommodations, our hotel’s proximity to Disneyland along with the facilities that we had to offer. However, I am sorry for the cleanliness issues that you encountered and for any inconvenience it caused. I have taken a note of your observations and suggestions and will surely be working on them. Comments such as yours help us improve our services. We are glad that you had a wonderful overall stay. We hope to see you soon the next time you are in Anaheim!     Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: Recently stayed for 2 nights in a kids suite. I will start with the positive: staff were extremely friendly, and the layout of the kids suite room was great. Negatives: the room was filthy. I tend to bring Clorox wipes to wipe down the remote, light switches when staying in hotels- the amount of dirt and god knows what else I picked up was unbelievable. The walls were stained with dirt and who know what else. The furniture (chairs, tales) were stained and sticky. The carpets left white socks brown after just a few minutes. Also very concerning- there was a woman charging her phone in the hallway during the day while maid staff were out and about- a member of my travel party asked her why she wasn't charging her phone in her room? The woman proceeded to explain that she was
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your comments with us. Your satisfaction is important to us and we will be using the feedback you provided to make improvements to ensure we offer an exceptional experience for our guests in the future. We are glad to hear that you enjoyed the Family Kids Suite with the bunk-beds, sofa, mini-fridge, and microwave. We have shared your observations with our team and we are truly sorry about a non-guest using the hotel’s facilities. Our Staff & Security will continue to monitor the hotel and surrounding area. We thank you for all of your kind comments about our courteous hotel staff. We look forward to seeing you again so you can experience our true first-class hospitality.   Sincerely,  Dan Kramer

Summary Heading: You Get What You Pay For
Summary: I've always heard good things about Portofino, so when I saw a great deal for a kids' suite, I jumped on it.  We spent 3 nights there and I was extremely disappointed.  The pricing was good, but let me start with the problems.  1.  They are in the middle of remodel work on the parking area so there is nowhere to park.  On the bright side they offered free valet service.  On the downside, when I got my car back, it was covered in leaves and other debris from trees.   2.  The king size bed my wife and I slept in, felt like it was about 30 years old.  The mattress was so deteriorated that when I tried scratching my foot, the entire bed shook.  Back was killing me after one night.  3.  The floors were filthy!  Our feet were black from walking across them.  4.  The room was made for
Manager Response: Thank you so much for choosing us during your recent trip to the area.  Although you felt we are reasonably priced, I apologize for your unpleasant experience.  Please accept my sincerest apologies for the disappointing housekeeping issues, as well as, the service issues you encountered.  Be assured we take the cleanliness of our rooms very seriously.  Even though this is not a frequent occurrence we recognize that even one time is too many.  Remedial steps within our housekeeping department are underway to ensure this does not happen again.  I hope you will give us another opportunity to redeem ourselves to make your next visit a better experience.   Sincerely,  Dan Kramer

Summary: We recently took our high school dance team here for 5 nights while we danced in Disney. Great clean affordable choice in Anaheim, a short walk to the parks. The neighborhood is safe and well lit. Staff were friendly. I would definitely recommend to people who are on a budget. We stayed in the two bedroom, two bath suites. It was half the price of some of the hotels in that area! Great stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind remarks in your review of our hotel. We are happy that our location was perfect for you and your dance team on your recent trip to the area. It's our goal to deliver great value for the price paid and we like hearing that we accomplished just that. With our superb service and proximity to famous attractions, great accommodations and all the complimentary features we offer, we are pleased that guests find us to be the best choice in the area. We truly appreciate you for recommending us to the other potential travelers and would love to host your stay the next time you're in Anaheim!  Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: I was a little uneasy after reading some of the reviews of the Portofino Inn and Suites at Anaheim. However, all my worries were completely unfounded. We had a great stay!   The hotel is .7 miles from the gates of Disneyland. It's an easy, well lit walk. There is a CVS next door and a 7-11 on the way to/from Disneyland. Plus, on the other side of Harbor Blvd, there are a number of restaurants and shops. There is a Target about 2 miles south, and since we had a car, we drove there for snacks and drinks to keep in the room.   Check in was pleasant and easy. Parking could be a challenge - spots are very limited. They do offer complimentary valet parking, but I find valet to be annoying. I want my car when I want my car. Thankfully, I was able to find a spot every time.   Room
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience you had at Portofino Inn & Suites Anaheim.  It was a pleasure to know that our proximity to Disneyland, CVS, as well as, area restaurants and shopping outlets was to liking.  We are also glad that our spacious accommodations was perfect for your stay and you also enjoyed our smooth check-in procedure.  However, please accept my sincerest apologies for the housekeeping issues you encountered in your room.  We are passionate about providing our guests with the best service possible, so I am sorry that we did not meet this goal.  I have discussed this issue with our Head of Housekeeping so that we can determine where we fell short and take corrective action.  We are pleased to learn that you will be staying with us again when your travels bring you back to our area!   Sincerely,  Dan Kramer

Summary Heading: Comfortable, but still a walk... and ride to Disneyland
Summary: I selected this hotel to stay at with my children because of previous good reviews and location to Disneyland. It's not as close as it sounds. It is a walk to a parking lot,then a shuttle to get to the gates. The hotel itself was nice a comfy.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay at the Portofino Inn & Suites on your recent visit to the area. We hope that you were overall satisfied with your stay. We appreciate your business and we look forward to seeing you the next time you visit Disneyland!                                          Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: Staff was amazing and courteous!  Kid's suite was perfect with bunk beds and extra TV.  Pocket type doors allow for the "kids" area to be closed off from the King Bed. Parking is an issue, but staff has overcome by complimentary valet parking. Overall, a great deal!!!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share about your experience at Portofino Inn & Suites Anaheim. I am so pleased to read that our family-friendly suites with bunk bed and many facilities worked perfectly for your needs and your recognition for our team's efforts in making your stay enjoyable is much appreciated. Service excellence is our highest priority and reviews like yours confirm that we are on the right track. We look forward to seeing you the next time you visit Disneyland!                                          Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: I recently had the chance to spend a week at the Portofino.  Overall, it is a very nice place.  The room was large (we had a kids suite that included a pull out couch, bunk beds and a king size bed in a separate area.) There were 2 tvs, a microwave and small refrigerator that worked well for us.  The pool area was small, but there were never very many people out there, so it was fine.  The hotel included free wifi and complementary valet parking.  Once we parked at check-in, we very rarely got our car out.  The hotel is within walking distance of Disneyland, so we just used our feet.  There is apparently a shuttle, but we never looked into since we just walked.  But after a long day at Disneyland, you might consider the shuttle.  The hotel staff were all very helpful.  We were
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the detailed response of the Portofino Inn & Suites Anaheim regarding your week long stay.  It's great to read that you loved our terrific proximity to Disneyland, as well as, the spacious Kids Suites with well-kept amenities.  I am glad that you had a memorable stay and my associates took good care of you.  I hope that you'll choose us again for your accommodations the next time that you are in Anaheim.  Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary Heading: Very clean and close to Disneyland
Summary: We visited the hotel in June for my husbands birthday. Front office are really nice and polite. When we got there they upgrade my room to a suite with no extra charge . Room was really big , nice and clean . The pool is clean and hotel is really close to Disneyland. I will visit this hotel next time for sure!!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Portofino Inn Suites Anaheim for the special occasion. Our team works very hard to make sure that every event is special for our guests, and I am so pleased to hear that our service and facilities met your expectations.  I am delighted that my front desk associates were courteous and you loved our clean, spacious accommodations, room upgrade, as well as, the proximity to Disneyland.  It is also wonderful to know that you and your husband will be visiting us again soon.    Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary Heading: Gem of a hotel in a perfect location.
Summary: The Portofino Inn and suites is a hidden gem of a hotel and close to Disneyland. We stayed for 5 nights with my 10 &12yr old granddaughters in a kids suite. This was excellent the grandchildren in their room with bunk beds a sofa bed, t.v. and mini fridge. while the grandparents were in the adjoining room separated by sliding doors, had a  queen bed, t.v., vanity unit and bathroom. Both rooms were spacious, clean and comfortable, and everyone was happy with their own space to relax in after a busy day at Disneyland.  Although a smaller, older hotel, it is a very clean and a well maintained property and has everything you need, games room, laundry, fitness room, spa & pool, and gift shop. From the moment we arrived which was a few hours before check-in was a breeze. Our room was
Manager Response: Thank you for a glowing review. We are thrilled that recent trip to Disneyland was a wonderful one and that you and your grand daughters thoroughly enjoyed a flawless stay from the start to the finish. It is great to hear that our family-friendly suites worked perfectly for your needs and our unbeatable location added to your overall satisfaction. We appreciate you recognizing our team's efforts in adding more value to your stay and for sharing your experience in detail for other potential travelers. It's our goal to deliver great value for the price paid  and we like hearing that we accomplished just that. We are excited that you'll stay with us again on your next family vacation in Anaheim.   Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: We were very satisfied with our stay. They graciously upgraded us to a suite at no additional cost. The bed was comfortable and everything was fine. The close location of the bus pickup to Disneyland was a big plus. The staff was very pleasant and helpful. We will definitely stay here again when we go back to this area.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay at the Portofino Inn & Suites on your recent trip to Disneyland.  We are happy that you enjoyed an impeccable stay with us and that your bed was comfortable. It's great to read that our staff made a good impression on you and seeing smiles on our guests' faces and reading feedback such as yours lets us know that we've accomplished everything we set out to do. We are extremely happy you will choose us again on your next getaway to Anaheim .   Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: I am one of three kids. Our family has two teenaged kids so you can imagine we want our own space. We got two sinks, bunk beds, a queen pullout couch, and a queen sized bed. We could walk to Disney. It was a great stay I loved it.
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful feedback and five star rating regarding your stay experience at Portofino Inn & Suites Anaheim in May 2015.  We are so pleased to read that you enjoyed your suite and had lot of fun.  It was nice to know that you had a memorable stay with us and hope to welcome you and your family back soon!            Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary Heading: Perfect Room for my 16yr old boy,14yr old girl, and 12 yr old boy!!
Summary: I was so HAPPY with the lay out of this room!! The suite had a bunk bed and pull out sofa in a room, with pocket doors, and the parents room on the other side!! It was perfect. The room has 2 sinks, so getting ready was easy. Portofino has a great location, the CVS store is next door, so getting snacks, breakfast food, beer was easy. The rooms have mini fridges, microwaves and blow dryers, we packed in carry ones. It really worked well for our trip! The down fall, was parking, and the small pool, but really... it wasnt a big deal!! We really enjoyed this place, THE BEST ROOM LAY OUT EVER with TEENS!!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience at Portofino Inn & Suites Anaheim.  I am so pleased to read that how much you enjoyed the lay out of your suite, with bunk bed, sofa bed, mini fridge and microwave, and that it worked perfectly for your needs.  I am also glad that our proximity to CVS and nearby shops was to your liking.  We are delighted that you and your family had a fun filled and memorable stay with us.  It was a pleasure to serve you and we look forward to accommodating you and your family in the future!            Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: The hotel is conviently located,  The rooms are very basic, but my kids said its the best hotel we've ever stayed at. We had the kids suite with the bunk beds and they loved it,  they couldn't wait to get back to the hotel.the beds were all very comfy!
Manager Response: Thank you for the wonderful response of our hotel, especially about our accommodations.  We at the Portofino Inn & Suites Anaheim love to hear that our guests had a great stay and they got a good night’s sleep on our comfortable beds.  I am so pleased to read how much your kids enjoyed your suite with bunk beds.  Thank you once again, and we loved having you visit with us and we look forward to accommodating you in the future!            Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: I just spent two nights at this property & it was great.  The room was very clean & tidy.  The air conditioning worked great. The beds & pillows were extremely comfy.  I slept like a rock both nights.  I was very surprised how quiet it was considering the proximity to Disneyland and the amount of children that were probably at the property.  The only noise I heard was from the room above me & that was minimal.  I've stayed in MUCH noisier places around Disneyland.  The staff was very helpful in explaining the Anaheim Resort Transportation (ART) system which I'm very grateful for.  Disneyland is not a long walk but after a full day at the Parks, it's nice to have an alternative to walking.  And the hotel was the 1st stop when coming from the Park.  This hotel is also located next
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your glowing review of the Portofino Inn & Suites Anaheim. It's great to read that you loved the comforts of your room and slept so well. It gave me immense pleasure to learn that the proximity to Disneyland and to nearby area was appealing to you. Your recognition of our staff for the well versed service is much appreciated. We're happy that when your travels lead you here in the future that you'll stay with us again.  Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary Heading: Not the best not the worst
Summary: The rooms we had were very large and price was good . The staff was fantastic at the front desk . The only thing keeping this hotel from being mediocre to great is the fact that its severely outdated and could use a little more parking . It's located in a safe location.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay at the Portofino Inn & Suites Anaheim and I am glad that your spacious accommodations coupled with friendly service at affordable rates were to your satisfaction. I was also happy to read tat you felt safe in our location. However, I do apologize for the inconvenience caused to you due to our limited parking. We do provide valet service during peak times. I hope that we made it up in other aspects of your stay and that you will choose us again on your future trips to Anaheim.  Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: Our family and extended family have chosen to stay at your hotel multiple times over the years, and we have never been so displeased as tonight.  When arriving at a hotel for your family suite, you'd expect that the hotel would understand it's for more than 2 adults. After having a stressful time with car rental place and being given 2 cars instead of one van, we now get to stress over finding parking just to stay at the hotel we booked.  Being told there was free public parking next door, we thought it would be fine. Just to sit looking for a place to park for a week late at night with children because it's not free it's $25 a night! The night supervisor was nice enough to give us a one night pass to park in the next hotels parking, but are we to do for the reminder of our
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for feedback on your recent stay at the Portofino Inn & Suites. We apologize that the Rental Car Company you reserved your vehicle through fell short on delivering you the van you requested. Our goal is to insure all guests at the Portofino Inn & Suites have a very positive and memorable experience. Our Parking Policy is one vehicle per room, But once you shared your experience with our team about the rental car company giving you multiple cars instead of a van. Our Front Desk Supervisor reached out to you and offered additional parking permits and parking passes to our Secured Self Park lot adjacent to our hotel. We are glad to hear that we were able to accommodate your parties extra vehicles and that you were able to enjoy your five night stay with us. We look forward to seeing you during your next visit to Anaheim.  Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: The hotel was pretty nice. The room was generally clean though there was blood on the bathroom door which we had to clean off (not really a big deal though should have been noticed by the staff). Because of the construction next door, the parking situation was challenging. If you plan to use your car regularly, you might consider waiting until the construction project next door is done. They do have free valet service but it is not 24 hours.  Even with the little issues, the stay was still very good.
Manager Response: Dear GTH916,  Thank you for sharing your experience about your stay at Portofino Inn & Suites Anaheim. We're glad to hear that you enjoyed your visit for the most part, but I'm sorry that you weren't happy with the amount of available parking spaces during your stay. We have provided additional parking at a secured lot adjacent to our hotel and are providing valet service during peak times. We sincerely regret the inconvenience that this may have caused you but I'm glad that your overall stay was enjoyable and we hope to welcome you again!  Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: Great hotel! We booked a kids suite for our family of 6 and were excited for the extra space.  When we arrived the rooms were even larger than expected. Kids loved having their own room. Cribs are available upon request. The rooms do have mini fridges, microwaves, blow dryer..etc. The hotel staff was so friendly and helpful. They even let us check in a few hours early, which I was not expecting. There's a CVS right next door, perfect for grabbing water, pop or snacks to take into the park. The pool was small, but the kids enjoyed it and we only used it on the day we arrived. The walk wasn't bad, about 10-15 minutes. If you take the Disneyland Express to/from the airport the drop off/pick up sites are very close by. Overall, it was a great place to stay and we will definitely
Manager Response: Dear DDK78,  Thank you for taking the time to share about your experience at Portofino Inn & Suites Anaheim. It was nice to hear that our front desk team was able to get you in early and that our location was to your liking. I am so pleased to read how much you enjoyed our family-friendly suites with up to date amenities which are specially designed to accommodate entire families and it gave me immense pleasure to know that this worked perfectly for your needs. I am also glad that your kids enjoyed the swimming pool and the staff took care of you while you were here. We loved having your visit with us and we eagerly await your return.   Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: this property is great, clean, nice location, free valet.  there are standard rooms or kids suites which have bunk beds.  although our box spring was broken on the bunk bed, I imaging it was due to kids jumping... we enjoyed the room.
Manager Response: Dear michaelrossi,  Thank you for sharing your experience at Portofino Inn & Suites Anaheim regarding your stay with us in April this year.  I am so pleased to read you enjoyed your clean suite, our central location, as well as, the valet.  We are glad to hear that everything worked perfectly for your family’s needs.  We loved having you stay with us and we look forward to accommodating you and your family in the near future!            Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: Nice little family hotel for an overnighter at Disney. Second time we've used this hotel. The pool is tiny  but the kids enjoyed getting wet. Nice little hot tub. Room wasn't ultra clean but was clean enough. Kids also enjoyed watching Disney channel. Parked there all day the next day before we drove back to SD after a day in the park.
Manager Response: We are so glad that you came back for another visit. We work hard to ensure each guest has a great experience and I’m happy we were able to exceed your expectations with regards to our facilities and accommodations, yet again. Thank you for your gracious words and fantastic rating. We hope that we will be a yearly staple in your family's getaway vacation plans in the future and we will get to welcome you back for many years to come.  Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: The front desk staff was very accommodating and extremely helpful. Tesh was so patient he was the only one on the front desk and several families were waiting to be checked in. He held his composure and greeted us with a smile, he made us feel welcomed. The hotel rooms are dated and is in dire need of updating. Housekeeping  did a great job and the pool area was cleaned each day, however the pool was very small. Walking distance to disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for writing about your stay at the Portofino Inn & Suites Anaheim and for taking the time to compliment our staff. I will be sure to pass on your kind words to my housekeeping staff and especially Tesh for a job well done. I also appreciate you pointing out our location which is walking distance to the Disneyland. Thank you again and we hope to welcome you and your family again soon!     Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: Room was large, price was great, no fee for parking, walk to Disneyland or convention center, staff was great.   No onsite breakfast but ihop across street.  Only issue was early morning noise from construction next door but that is out of their control.  Will definitely stay here again...
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing about your recent stay with us at the Portofino Inn & Suites Anaheim. We are delighted that you thoroughly enjoyed your experience and had a wonderful time. I am so pleased to read that we impressed you with our spacious rooms, convenient location and excellent service. However, I am sorry for any inconvenience you had due to the construction next door. Thank you again and we will be waiting for your return to our hotel.  Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: This was our second time staying at the Portofino Inn, (we stayed a few years ago at the recommendation of a friend). It's just a few minutes walk to Disneyland, making it so convenient to go back and forth to change clothes, get a snack, or even take a quick nap! The Inn is easy to get to, it is clean, fresh and inviting, and the staff is very  accommodating! The Portofino Inn is our families number one hotel choice for our Disneyland get-aways!
Manager Response: The best compliment we could ever receive is having you return for another stay. We're so happy to hear that you and your family had a fun filled and wonderful recent stay experience at the Portofino Inn & Suites Anaheim. It's also great to read that you loved our terrific proximity to Disneyland and all the great restaurants in the area along with our excellent service. We really appreciate you taking the time to share your experience online and we hope to welcome you again soon!    Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: The staff was very accommodating when it came to sorting out the billing and changes we made to our original registration. I had originally booked 4 rooms for family members but some changes were necessary due to circumstances. The staff was very gracious in making those changes and everything worked out fine. The hotel accommodates were very nice. It helped us to achieve a great visit at Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay and taking the time to write about your positive experience.  Our staff takes great pride with their "service with a smile" motto and strive to meet this goal every day with our guests.  I am glad that they are successful in this, as we get so many gracious comments about them.  Nonetheless, it never gets old to share with them such great feedback and I will definitely share yours as well at our next staff meeting and thank them for another job well done.    We are also happy to know that you liked our accommodations and you enjoyed your trip to Disneyland.  Thank you again and we hope to see you and your family at Portofino Inn & Suites Anaheim the next time you are in the area!                         Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: We had a nice kids suite, it was clean and the service was good, I would recommend for an overnight stay.  The location was great for us since we needed to be close to Anaheim Sports Center.  The Pool area was very nice and accommodating not really big but if you get there early and get a good location makes for a great experience.
Manager Response: Dear mamu296,  Thank you for taking the time to share your overnight stay experience at Portofino Inn & Suites Anaheim.  I am so pleased to read you enjoyed your clean kid’s suite, as well as, our service.  We are delighted that our location and its closeness to the Sports Center was perfect for your needs. We are also happy to hear that you were able to take advantage of our swimming pool.  We loved having you stay with us and we look forward to accommodating you in the future!            Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: My family of 5 adults and 1 child (1 year old) stayed here for 4 nights in May and had a wonderful experience. The room was large and with a King bed in one room and 2 Queens in the other as well as 2 bathrooms so it fit all of our needs. The baby had a wonderful time running around the technically three rooms that this suite had (2 bedrooms and a sitting room). The rooms come with ample towels and the housekeeping was amazing because they worked around our cluttered messes in the bedroom and bathroom each day. The staff all around was wonderful and while there was a parking issue due to contruction it was never really an issue as valet was free and the staff in charge of that were quick and very polite. Distance wise to Disneyland the walk was really only a block from
Manager Response: Dear Jessica B,  Thank you very much for selecting the Portofino Inn & Suites Anaheim and for taking the time to write about your experience.  What is most rewarding for me is to read that not only you enjoyed the hotel and the location, but you also found our service to be excellent.  We were thrilled to read your appreciation for our team's efforts, especially our housekeeping and valet associates in making your stay enjoyable.  Service excellence is our highest priority and reviews like yours confirm that we are on the right track.  We are extremely delighted that you, as well as, the baby enjoyed the spaciousness of the family suite and it was perfect for your needs.    I will share you feedback with the team as they always enjoy hearing from our guests.  Thank you once again and we are happy that you and your family is planning a return visit the next time you are in Disneyland!                                          Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: This hotel was a GREAT bargain!  The property was very clean and fresh.  Location was perfect.  The beds were probably the most comfortable beds that I have slept in at a hotel...seriously.  All of the staff was very friendly and helpful.  Parking was free and no resort fees.  We had the family room with the 2 bunk beds, sofa bed, and king bed.  It worked perfectly for our family of 6.  The only negative comment I have is that I was surprised how much of the hallway noise made it into our room.  I couldn't hear any noise from adjacent rooms, but the noise from the hallway came through loud and clear.  The pool was also pretty small, but we didn't care because we spent all of our time at Disneyland.  Overall, I would absolutely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Dean C,  Thank you for your wonderful review of the Portofino Inn & Suites Anaheim and we're glad to hear that you were pleased with the terrific value received at our hotel.  We work hard to ensure that our guests have a comfortable and enjoyable stay, and we are delighted that you enjoyed your clean family-friendly suite with bunk beds and sofa and that it was ideal for your needs.  You are absolutely right, we provide the finest mattresses in all our rooms and continually hear great comments on those from our guests.    Please accept our sincere apology for the noise issues you experienced.  We do place emphasis on the importance of quiet time and unfortunately some of our guests made it a challenge for us.  I am sorry that you had to endure this and hope you will take this as an isolated incident.  Thank you again and we are happy to know that you and your family will be staying with us the next time you are in Anaheim!  Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary Heading: Close enough to walk to Disneyland
Summary: Average place.  Clean.  Comfortable bed.  Pool.  Free parking, although not a lot of it d/t construction.  Pretty much everything you need within walking distance.  I don't even bring shampoo and conditioner with me when I travel anymore, so was disappointed when it was not refilled every day.
Manager Response: Dear Momandthekid,  Thank you for sharing your experience about your stay in April at Portofino Inn & Suites Anaheim.  We're glad that your overall stay with us was comfortable and that you enjoyed your clean, comfortable accommodation and our ideal location with everything available within walking distance.  However, I am sorry for the minor housekeeping issue you had.  I will share your observation with them so that we can improve on our services.  We do hope that we will have another opportunity to welcome you back in the future to make things much better.   Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: We stayed at this location for two nights when we took our kids to Disneyland. Great price and location. We walked to Disneyland, it was close to a pharmacy store where we loaded up on supplies. Walking distance to great restaurants. Hotel has an arcade and a pool. Great place for a family on a budget.
Manager Response: Dear Marco R,  Thank you for your wonderful review of the Portofino Inn & Suites Anaheim.  We work hard to ensure that our guests have a comfortable and enjoyable stay with clean, comfortable accommodations, family-friendly recreational amenities, free Wi-Fi, and an on-site gift and sundries shop.  As you pointed out, we are convenient to Disneyland, CVS, and a multitude of great restaurants so we're always glad to hear that guests are pleased with the terrific value received at our hotel.  Thank you again for your gracious feedback and we hope to welcome you and your family back soon!  We are glad that you had a great stay experience!  Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: This was the first time our family of four has stayed at the Portofino Inn & Suites. We mostly chose the location because of the convenient & affordable kids room suites and its proximity to Disneyland. When you first pull up the hotel looks sharp and its obvious that it has been recently painted/maintained. Once we were inside our rooms, it was a bit disappointing. The layout was convenient, but the rooms were tired and on the dirty side. There are no fans in the bathroom, so there was mold growing on the wallpaper. If you looked to closely at walls, furniture or up into their fluorescent light fixtures there was a lot of dust and grime.   After the long weekend crowd left, we decided to ask the front desk if there was another room we could switch to that was in better shape.
Manager Response: Dear travellingGs:  We would like to thank you for feedback on your recent stay at the Portofino Inn & Suites.  We are glad to hear that our close proximity to the Main gate Disneyland entrance matched your needs. We apologize we fell short in making your guest experience at the Portofino Inn one to remember. Our goal is to ensure all guests at the Portofino Inn & Suites have a very positive and memorable experience, and again, we are sorry you did not achieve this during your stay.  We will continue to do our daily inspections in all of our guest rooms and suites.  We have recently updated our Lobby, Guest Laundry room, Fitness room,  Pool area, and Business Center to further enhance our guest experience.  We hope that you will consider staying with us again so that we can have another chance to provide you superior service.  Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: This weekend will be my third time staying here with my family. The location is pretty good, the rooms are clean & the staff seems friendly. I love that they give Disney pass holders a discount. This is what keeps me coming back. The only down fall is probably the parking, but they are in the process of building a parking structure right next door.
Manager Response: Dear Rodriguez2015,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us once again and for sharing your stay experience at the Portofino Inn & Suites Anaheim.  We are delighted that you thoroughly enjoyed your experience and that your family had such a wonderful time.  We are glad that our location, clean rooms and helpful associates were perfect for your visit to Anaheim!  It is always gratifying to receive positive feedback and I look forward to sharing your comments with rest of my team.  Thank you again for your kind words and we will wait for you and your family to return to Portofino Inn & Suites Anaheim soon!      Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: The Hotel staff were fast, friendly and spot on when recommending things.        Walking distance to Disneyland and close to restaurants and retail stores. Free parking and valet service was a nice touch. Would stay here again if visiting this area.
Manager Response: Dear Sanhnl,  Thank you for choosing to stay at the Portofino Inn & Suites for your recent accommodation needs.  I am happy that our location within a few minutes walking distance to Disneyland surrounded by wonderful restaurants was ideal for your needs!  It was great to hear that my associates were happy to assist you with recommendations and directions, as well as, you enjoyed our free parking and valet service.  We are also happy that you liked our clean, spacious accommodation and in-room amenities.  We are pleased to hear that you will stay with us again on your next visit to Anaheim.   Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary Heading: Great place to REST from all the Disney Land Adventures
Summary: If you are looking for a clean, convenient hotel to sleep in while you spend your day in the thrills of magic, people, symphonies on the mist and the edge of the imagination then this is your hotel. The room is clean! Spacious! And accessible with laundry on the main floor and a microwave? CVS is right next door with fresh fruit and healthy snacks and not so healthy snacks. Hot tub is amazing after standing all day long.
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for your wonderful feedback on your recent stay with us here at the Portofino Inn & Suites Anaheim.  It's great hearing that you enjoyed our close proximity to CVS, as well as, to the Disneyland Main Entrance which makes us one of the best accommodations in the area.  We are glad that we were able to impress you with our clean, spacious accommodation and you liked our facilities which were easily attainable.  We are also happy to hear that you were able to relax in the hot tub.  It is nice to know that your stay with us was memorable and I hope that you and your family will visit us again in the near future.  Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: We were attending an event at the convention center and also visiting Disneyland.  The hotel is perfectly located to do both events.  It is located half way between both.  The room is very nice and the staff is very friendly.  Our room had bunk beds on one side and a queen bed on the other with a glass sliding door in between.  So its like two rooms in one. The pool is perfect for kids, it starts off at 3ft. deep and there is an arcade right beside the pool. The hotel is conveniently located by a CVS that is open 24 hours.  We would stay there again.
Manager Response: Dear ConnieGrant,  Thanks so much for your glowing review and for the five star rating of the Portofino Inn & Suites Anaheim.  It's great to read that you loved our terrific proximity to Disneyland, CVS, as well as, the Convention center which was perfect for your needs.  We are also pleased that you enjoyed the amenities of our family-friendly Kids Suites and I am happy to hear that your kids had a great time in the pool!  I'm glad that your family had a memorable stay and enjoyed the event.  We will be waiting to welcome you and your family the next time you are in Anaheim.  Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: The hotel's location is awesome, the prices are very reasonable (plus as a DL passholder you get 20% off the nightly rate). My 2 kids and I went to DL for the weekend of the 60th Celebration, it was a last minute trip and everywhere was booked. We stayed at a different hotel the first night (way too expensive and never would stay there with those prices) but were able to get a room here our 2nd night. When we checked in they had given us a free upgrade to a kids suite d/t overbooking. Awesome!! The room was decent, there's some obvious repairs needed: door frame of the bathroom, there was hair in the hair dryer they provide as well as the tub, a stain (hopefully food) on the arm of the couch, pistachios between the mattress/frame of the kids bunk beds. Other than those things,
Manager Response: Dear momalisa24,  Thank you for your candid feedback of the Portofino Inn & Suites Anaheim and we are glad that we were able to accommodate you and your children during your recent visit to Anaheim.  We are happy that our proximity to Disneyland, the room upgrade and the great value we offer was all that you needed to make your trip noteworthy.  We work hard to ensure that our guests have an enjoyable stay and it was nice to know that our pool, as well as, the hot tub was to your liking.    However, I am sorry for the minor housekeeping issues in your room.  We are passionate about providing our guests with most clean facilities, so I am sorry that we did not meet this goal during your stay.  I have alerted my housekeeping team so that we can determine where we fell short and take corrective action.  We appreciate your tips and we hope that you and your family will stay with us the next time you are in Anaheim so that we can provide you with better accommodations that you deserve.   Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: My family stayed in a great room with Bunk beds for the kids! Bunk Beds can be closed off with sliding doors. Walking distance to Disneyland or the Toy Story Parking lot is across the street if you want to take the tram instead. Free Valet parking was offered.
Manager Response: Dear Vero6422,  Thank you for taking the time to share about your experience at Portofino Inn & Suites Anaheim and for the five star rating!  I am so pleased to read how much you enjoyed our family-friendly suite with bunk beds and comfortable sliding door to separate the area.  I am also glad to hear that the proximity to Disneyland and Toy Story Parking worked perfectly for your needs.  We are happy that you enjoyed our complimentary valet parking as well.  We loved having you stay with us and we look forward to accommodating you and your family in the near future!            Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: I like staying at this property for attending a convention at the Anaheim Convention center. The hotel has large suites, with sitting areas which makes it convenient for my wife to stay in the room while I am away, and we have stayed here in several suites when we have invited our sons with their families to go to Disneyland.  It is an easy walk to the Convention Center and also Disneyland and the Garden Walk.  They are currently doing construction on the neighboring property--used to be Jolly Roger, but the noise and activity was not noticeable. Our stay was quiet and pleasant with no problems and our room appeared to be recently renovated.  There is an IHOP across the street for breakfast, and a bus stop in front of the hotel if you wish to use the local transit. Be aware at
Manager Response: Dear quasimoto559,  Thank you for posting such a detailed and wonderful feedback and taking the time to share about your experience at Portofino Inn & Suites Anaheim while attending a convention.  I am so pleased to read how much you and your wife enjoyed our spacious family-friendly suite and that it worked perfectly for your needs.  It's our goal to deliver great value for the price paid and we like hearing that we accomplished just that.  With our superb service and proximity to Disneyland, Convention center and many other famous attractions, we are pleased that guests find us to be the best choice in the area.  We loved having you stay with us and we look forward to accommodating you and your wife in the near future!            Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: Nice hotel walking distance from disney we stay at the suite for 8 people big room very comfortable one bathroom only I will go back again.You can park your car and walk to disney . and check in later.
Manager Response: Dear nieveSanDiego,  Thank you for taking the time to share about your experience at Portofino Inn & Suites Anaheim.  I am so pleased to read how much you and your family enjoyed the comfort of the suite.  I am also glad that your liked our central location and had a great weekend.  We loved having you with us and we look forward to accommodating you and your family in the near future!            Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: Stayed here 5 nights (Apr 29-May 5) in room 2513.   Check-in was quick and friendly.  Arrived 215pm, no problem getting room early.   Pool was basic but my kids loved it.   First impression of room not best, very musty odor when entering. We often ate breakfast in room, only 1 small side table and one chair made it difficult for my 2 kids to eat at same time.   Walk to Disneyland averaged 15 minutes.  Big CVS drugstore next door, great for grabbing fruit, treats, wine ect.  They were doing parking renos but did not bother us as we did not have car. I personally would stay elsewhere next time
Manager Response: Dear Tara A,  Thank you so very much for your feedback on your recent stay with us.  It's great hearing that we were able to check you in early and that you enjoyed our close proximity to our Gift Shop, CVS, and the sort walk to the Disneyland Main Entrance.  Thank you for sharing your observations in regards to the seating arrangements in our guest rooms.  It is nice to know that your kids had a great time at the pool!  We do hope that one day in the future, you would consider giving our property another chance, so you can experience our true first-class hospitality.   Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: Motel 6 with cover ups. Bad wifi, stain on carpet with remnants of what stained it, stains on sheet, broken coffee pot, damaged sink, terrible parking, separation between kids room and main room was 2 pull together doors covered by a see thru sheet with no sound or visual barrier, when replacing the coffee pot the hotel took over an hour to bring new coffee pot and the new coffee pot was missing the coffee pod tray.  You can hear everything from the hallway.  The hot/cold was reversed in the shower, and this is more of a pet peeve but every morning during check out hours they had someone mopping the main entrance.  How does that make sense?
Manager Response: Dear Nic F:  We would like to thank you for the feedback on your recent stay at the Portofino Inn & Suites.  We apologize we fell short in making your guest experience at the Portofino Inn one to remember.  Our goal is to insure all guests at the Portofino Inn & Suites have a very positive and memorable experience, and again, we are sorry you did not achieve this during your stay.  We are sorry to hear that the coffee maker in your guest room did not brew properly.  Although we are not aware of any Hot & Cold reversed faucets, We will continue to check the hot and cold tabs during our routine Room Inspections. I apologize that the dividing sliding French Pocket Doors with “Custom Designed” curtain sheers between the Master Suite and the Bunk-bed rooms did not meet your needs.  I assure you we do not use sheets to cover windows they are custom designed curtains for the sliding French Pocket doors.  If you prefer a standard door closure, we do offer a few rooms with that floor plan as well. The sliding French Pocket doors is our hotel’s most popular room style.  We do hope that one day in the future, you would consider giving our property another chance, so you can experience our true first-class hospitality.   Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: We stayed at this hotel and we absolutely loved it. The rooms were very clean and in really good condition. The beds were very comfortable and the staff was really friendly and helpful. We will definitely be staying at this hotel again.
Manager Response: Dear hevmunoz,  Thank you for sharing your comments about how much you enjoyed your stay at the Portofino Inn & Suites Anaheim, and especially how much you enjoyed our well-maintained accommodation.  I am glad you got a good night’s sleep and my associates provided the best service around.  It was a pleasure serving you and your family and we are happy that when your travels lead you here in the future you will stay with us again!   Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: We have stayed here at least four times. Always clean and nice staff. We get the family suite and enjoy the doors that we can close so the kids can sleep, it allows us to get ready without waking them in the mornings. It comes equipped with a refrigerator as well. What is really nice is there are no hidden charges parking is included with your stay. If you have an extra vehicle, they have additional parking next door (which you must pay for) but is convenient. We prefer to stay here with our AAA discount.
Manager Response: Dear Crystal S,  Thank you for sharing your thoughts about your experience at Portofino Inn & Suites Anaheim.  There is nothing more satisfying for us than to read we have earned a guest’s repeat business.  I am so pleased to read how much you enjoyed your family-friendly suite with bunk bed, mini fridge and microwave which are designed to accommodate entire families.  I'm glad to hear that this worked perfectly for your needs.  I am also delighted that you noticed our friendly associates and how appropriate our parking facilities are.  We do look forward to welcoming you and your family back soon and making our hotel your "home away from home".    Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: From check in to check out we had lots of questions about things to do, and what would help make the most of our trip. We spoke a lot with Claudia and Henry. They were most helpful and suggested really great things to do based on our likes and interests. They worked on the best room for our needs, and suggested what to do and not do as far as the parks. The location was in walking distance of everything, so we didn't need the car or bus. I recommend staying at Portofino highly.
Manager Response: Dear leiannk,  Thank you so much for staying with us recently and for all of your delightful feedback about our staff.  Service excellence is our highest priority and reviews like yours confirm that we are on the right track.  I am fortunate to work with highly trained staff who love what they do, and I always enjoy letting them know when their efforts have been noticed by the guests who stay here.  I will share your kind comments with my team, especially with Claudia and Henry.  We really appreciate you recommending us and we hope to welcome you again soon!    Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: The kid rooms were  excellent for families. My wife and I were able to start getting ready while our kids sat in there room. It's also not that far from Disneyland and room rate were  reasonable for the area
Manager Response: Dear fchavez66,  Thank you for taking the time to share about your experience at Portofino Inn & Suites Anaheim.  I am so pleased to read how much you enjoyed your suite and especially the kid’s room.  Our family-friendly suites with bunk bed, sofa bed, mini fridge and microwave are especially designed to accommodate entire families so I'm glad to hear that this worked perfectly for your needs.  With our proximity to famous attractions and the great value we offer our guests find us to be the best choice in the area.  We loved having you visit with us and we look forward to accommodating you and your family in the future!            Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary Heading: Nothing fancy, great to get some sleep and then head back to Disneyland!
Summary: We spent most of our trip outside of the hotel. We were only in the hotel to sleep, shower and go for a quick swim in the morning. The rooms are clean, and the beds are comfortable. The staff is friendly. It is only a 5 minute walk to Disneyland. No complaints about the hotel. But if you are looking for something fancy, or 5 star, this is not the place for you :)
Manager Response: Dear Canada_MexicoBlondie,  We're so happy to hear you and your family had a comfortable stay at the Portofino Inn & Suites Anaheim.  There is nothing more rewarding than reading comments such as yours and knowing that we made your stay everything it should have been by providing clean accommodation and helpful associates in the best location.  You are absolutely right, sleep should be the 1st priority in a hotel and I am so glad to hear that you had a comfortable night’s rest.  We are happy that you enjoyed your experience with us and I will certainly share your comments with my staff.  We look forward to seeing you  and your family the next time you are in Anaheim!     Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: Yes you can walk to Disneyland from the Portofino! Rooms were fine! We did not have a microwave or mini fridge in our room which was kind of a bummer but we didn't need them this trip. Price was very affordable, we used Orbitz. Once they get the bigger parking lot done it will be even better though! We use the pool and jacuzzi, they were fine (but pool was chilly). There is a CVS next store along with a little gift shop, and I-Hop across the street, also a row of eateries at the corner and a 7-11 and other convenience stores right there as you walk to DL! Your feet will get tired but it's totally doable walking the big block and a half to Disneyland or even over to the Convention Center to see a game! Portofino was fine and would stay again!
Manager Response: Dear pinkkid,  Thanks so much for your glowing review of the Portofino Inn & Suites Anaheim.  It's great to read that you loved our terrific proximity to Disneyland and all the great restaurants in the area.  It's our goal to deliver great value for the price paid and we like hearing that we accomplished just that.  We do provide mini fridge/refrigerator according to room types.  Please be assured that we will do our best to accommodate you in a room of your choice.  I'm glad that you and your family had a memorable stay and we are delighted to hear that you are planning to stay with us the next time you are in Anaheim.  Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: We stayed at the Portofino for several nights while we were vacationing at Disneyland.  The hotel is located about a 3 block walk from the main entrance, and we found the walk to be an easy walk, and well lit for the walk back after the park closed.  I found the furnishings and design to be somewhat dated, but the room was clean, and all fixtures were in good working order.  One slightly annoying thing that I found is that there were no electrical outlets in the bedroom portion of the room, and no clock on the nightstand, which was slightly awkward when we were charging our phones in the other room.  The living room area had a comfortable couch, and a small dining table with 2 chairs.  I also felt that the living room area had a lot of wasted space (I like having space, but most
Manager Response: Dear SyracuseWolvrine,  Thank you for staying multiple nights at the Portofino Inn & Suites Anaheim and for taking the time to share your observations and experience.  We appreciate you recognizing our team's efforts in making your stay enjoyable and I am glad our location was perfect for your needs.  While I am pleased that you liked your immaculate accommodation, I apologize for the issues you encountered with your room, especially the housekeeping issues.  I have shared your comments with my Head of Housekeeping so that we can determine where we fell short and improve on our services.  We routinely examine our capital projects and create action plans to address areas of the hotel that may need refreshing and refurbishing.  I appreciate your candid feedback and have made a note of your concerns.  We hope you enjoyed your visit to Disneyland!  Thank you again for choosing to stay with us and we hope to welcome you back again in the future!  Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: For the price, we were very pleased with this room. We had a 2 room "Family Suite" which included bunk beds, a king bed, and a couch. The room was clean and nicely decorated. It included a mini fridge and a microwave. We also really liked that there was an additional vanity and sink outside the bathroom so 2 people could get ready at the same time. There were just a few things we weren't thrilled about. Parking was lousy. They have free valet, but you feel obligated to tip them every time you have to get your car. Also, my husband needed to get the stroller out of the car and the valet just handed him the key and made him walk out to Timbuktu to get it instead of either bringing up the car or going to car and getting the stroller for my husband. Another issue was the lack of
Manager Response: Dear Tracy A,  Thanks so much for choosing to stay at the Portofino Inn & Suites Anaheim during your recent trip to the area and for highlighting us as a family hotel.  We are happy that you found your suite to be clean with all the amenities you needed.  It's our goal to deliver great value for the price paid and we like hearing that we accomplished just that.  We take pride in making sure that our staff members have the right tools and training to provide an enjoyable stay for all of our guests so I regret that we fell short this time. Thank you once again, for recommending us and I am glad our exceptional location close to Disneyland and our affordable rates are going to bring you and your family back soon for another stay!  Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: My only issue was the bathtubs. They have old slippery ones with a small mat that you put down inside of it so that you don't slip. During my second shower there I stepped back, the mat slide up the wall of the tub (still attached by the suction cups), and I fell down hard almost ripping the shower curtain. I bruised my whole left knee, calf, and my left side that had hit the side of the tub where I had landed. Nothing was broke, just really bad bruises but I probably wouldn't stay again unless they upgraded their tubs. Now I know what to ask about next time I stay in a hotel.
Manager Response: Dear rach340,  We would like to thank you for feedback on your recent stay at the Portofino Inn & Suites.  We apologize we fell short in making your guest experience at the Portofino Inn one to remember.  Our goal is to insure all guests at the Portofino Inn & Suites have a very positive and memorable experience, and again, we are sorry you did not achieve this during your stay.  We will continue to do our daily inspections of our facilities and provide tub mats and floor mats in all of our guest rooms and suites.  We do hope that one day in the future, you would consider giving our property another chance, so you can experience our true first-class hospitality.   Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: We booked a 4 night, 5 day stay. First night air conditioner did not work, we notified the front desk and they said they would get it fix right away...no one ever showed until the following day, therefore we had a restless night. We asked for a roll in bed and we were told that they could not provide one because our room had new furniture they did not want to damage in the process; mind you the room did not have new furniture and there was plenty of room for a roll in bed, our 6yr old had to sleep on chairs we put together to make a bed:( We wanted to do laundry and there were only two washers one of which was out of order and not surprisingly so seen how they were old appliances. The $9.99 resort fee is a joke seeing how this hotel is hardly a resort and the $12.75 occupancy
Manager Response: Dear Deborah A: Thank you for taking the time to share your comments with us. We apologize for any inconvenience that your room could not accommodate a roll away bed and AC. Our Deluxe Rooms with the Two Queen Beds, the new desk, new desk chair, new mini-fridge, and new Oversized Sitting chair next to the patio/balcony can not accommodate the additional bed. All hotels are required to charge the same tax which is 17%. We are glad to hear you enjoyed our hotel's location and the close proximity to walk to the Disneyland Main Entrance. If you prefer taking a shuttle back to the hotel instead of the short walk back, We do participate in Anaheim Resort Transportation (Shuttle) program. We are Stop 1 on Route 3. We thank you for allowing us to be your host hotel during your visit to the Anaheim area. Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: My family and I stayed here towards the end of April. The service staff was great and pleasant upon arrival. We stayed in a 2 queen room. We had 2 kids with us, and the space was sufficient. Everything was great the entire stay. The valet was easy and quick, but be sure to check their hours. We were leaving around noon one day and the valet was about to pack up for a lunch break. I don't mind that, but we didn't know the valet would be closed at all, so this could have caused some confusion when getting our car!   As for the hotel - my only minor, and I mean very minor issues were:  the pool says heated. I think it's heated just enough that its "warm" enough to open. it was so cold!! the kids didn't seem to care much tho.  The bed sheets wouldn't stay on! It was almost as if
Manager Response: Dear Akchevie:   Thank you so very much for your feedback on your recent stay with us. We love hearing that you enjoyed our large, clean, and comfortable guest room. We love hearing that our close proximity to the Disneyland Resorts parks met your travel needs. As for the Valet, When they do go on break your keys are kept locked up in the Security office located across from our Lobby Tower. So any guest that needs their car during the break period all you have to do is show your Valet ticket to Security and they will pull your vehicle up for you. We thank you for all of your kind comments about our Hotel staff and the great service that they provided you.  We look forward to seeing you during your next visit to Anaheim. Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: The hotel itself is really nice the rooms are clean, the beds are comfortable, and it's less then a mile away from Disneyland and the convention center. The only bad thing is that there is hardly any parking spots because it was under construction. I only stayed one night so I didn use much of the amenities but it's a nice hotel in Anaheim.
Manager Response: Dear raymond v:  Thank you so very much for your feedback on your recent stay with us. We love hearing that our clean and spacious guest room worked perfectly for your visit. We are glad to hear you enjoyed our hotel's location and the close proximity to the Disneyland Main Entrance and the Convention Center. We look forward to you returning to the Anaheim Portofino Inn & Suites when your travel plans bring you back to the Disneyland Resort. Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: I always enjoy staying at the Portofino Inn in Anaheim when you do our Disney trip.  It is just a quick walk to the main entrance of Disneyland.  The staff at the hotel provide exceptional service every time we stay and they are very accommodating to requests.
Manager Response: Dear Janet G: We are thrilled to hear from another repeat guest who enjoyed their stay at the Anaheim Portofino Inn & Suites Hotel. We are glad to hear that our close proximity to the Maingate Disneyland entrance matched your needs.  We thank you for all of your kind comments about our Hotel staff and the exceptional service that they provided you. We look forward to you returning to the Anaheim Portofino Inn & Suites when your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim & Disneyland Resort area. Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: We come to Portofino Inn 1-2 times each year and love it!! We love being across the street from Disneyland and affordable restaurants. Thanks for being so affordable and pleasant to stay at :) recommend this Hotel to anyone with a family.
Manager Response: Dear Garciafamily88:   Thank you so very much for your feedback on your recent return stay with us. We are glad to hear that you enjoyed our clean and spacious guest room. It is great hearing that our hotel's close proximity and short and easy walk to the Disneyland Main Entrance and nearby restaurants was a good fit for you and the family.  We look forward to you returning to the Anaheim Portofino Inn & Suites when your travel plans bring you back to the Disneyland Resort.  Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: We recently stayed here for two nights. After pulling up with two cars we were told only 1 parking spot for each room. And although the website indicates this, it does NOT tell you that a 2nd parking spot is available at the rate of $25 per night and it is at another hotel next door which is inconvenient if you need something from your car. The staff at the front desk told us this was the norm for this area. The Marriott right next door charges $14 per night and offers many more amenities like a rooftop pool with a view of the fireworks and a full breakfast. You learn from your mistakes. I highly recommend considering other options and all that they have to offer before settling at this location.
Manager Response: Dear Goodday3:  Thank you for taking the time to share your comments with us. We apologize for any misunderstanding you had in regards to the parking policy. We offer parking for one vehicle per room included in the estimated charges in your confirmation and additional vehicles are $20.00. Our rates are very similar to the areas rates including the Marriott. They charge $14.00 per vehicle which makes our parking almost identical.  We thank you for allowing us to be your host hotel during your visit to the Anaheim area. Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary Heading: Great place, not such great maid service
Summary: Everything was great with our stay. Desk staff was extremely friendly and happy with the price. When the maids cleaned, they missed our garbage, didn't refill our ice bucket bags, and left some of our dirty towels. Called the front desk and they had it fixed quickly. Overall an excellent stay and I would definitely stay there again.
Manager Response: Dear jbrizzi321: Thank you for taking the time to share your comments with us. Your satisfaction is important to us and we will be using the feedback you provided to make improvements to ensure we offer an exceptional experience for our guests in the future. We have shared your observations with our team and we will continue to monitor the listed items. We thank you for all of your kind comments about our Hotel staff and the great service that they provided you.  We look forward to seeing you during your next visit to Anaheim. Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: You pay up a little to stay here because it is an easy walk to Disneyland. We stayed in a  two-room family suite with bunks for the kids. The room was fine, and the doors between the rooms were a nice touch affording some privacy.  The hotel offers a really nice pool and a real hot tub that's actually hot. A great way to soak away the Disney aches and pains. However, be warned that construction behind the property places parking at a premium. If you park late, you'll probably have to park -- free -- at the next property. When the weather is good, that's no problem, but if it pours, like it did the night we arrived, you will have a long walk back to the Portofino and you will be very, very wet.   While the front desk staff was very friendly, the one person on duty in the evening
Manager Response: Dear tomcat33333: Thank you so much for taking the time to share your feedback. We are glad to hear that our clean, quiet Kids Suite with the dividing pocket doors allowed you to have a relaxing stay at the Portofino Inn. I apologize that there was a delay on delivering your pillows to your guest room. It is great hearing that our close proximity to the Main gate Disneyland entrance matched your needs. We look forward to seeing you the next time you visit the Anaheim area. Sincerely,	 Dan Kramer

Summary: We stayed at the Portofino Inn in Anaheim for three nights in April of 2015.  The rooms were clean and the location was an easy walk to Disneyland and restaurants.  We took advantage of the discounted park hopper tickets and I felt we received a good bargain.  I wouldn't call the rooms "high end" but they were clean and our room had a king bed with a pull out sofa sleeper that worked well for us.  With the bed folded up, the extra room felt very spacious.  I would recommend this hotel as long as you aren't looking for upper-end accommodations. You are getting what you pay for. The only negative to our room was the air conditioning unit was in the wall next to the bed, literally two feet from my head.  We had to turn the unit off to sleep because of the noise.  Thankfully we were
Manager Response: Dear Zoesdad:  Thank you so very much for your feedback on your recent stay with us. We love hearing that our clean and spacious Suite  with the Sofa-bed worked perfectly for your visit. Thank you for the feedback in regards to the location of the HVAC Airflow vents. We are glad to hear you enjoyed our hotel's location and the close proximity to the Disneyland Main Entrance. We look forward to you returning to the Anaheim Portofino Inn & Suites when your travel plans bring you back to the Disneyland Resort.  Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: The people that manned the front desk  at the Anaheim Portofino Inn & Suites were friendly and helpful.  The room was comfortable and quiet and the maids did a great job keeping it clean.  I would suggest that management invest in some WD40 and fix the squeaky doors!  The door to room 1320 was so loud it felt like we were staying in a haunted house.   The parking situation was confusing.  There are not enough parking spaces, so some cars are parked by a valet at the hotel next door. Inconvenient if you need something out of your car!  And, while the hotel is within blocks of Disneyland, it would've been nice at the end of a long day to have a shuttle, as some of the other  hotels on that block have.
Manager Response: Dear idahotraveler50:  Thank you so very much for your feedback on your recent stay with us. We love hearing that you enjoyed our large, clean, and comfortable guest room.
