Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary Heading: You get what you pay for
Summary: Just left the portifino inn.  We stayed in a family suite.  All 5 of us complained about the how uncomfortable the beds were.  Rooms were clean but old and out dated.  Parking lot was always full so no choice but to use the valet service which was a bit of a pain.   But on the positive .. price was good, it was cheap and it was a short walk to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear Monica G:  Thank you for taking the time to share your comments with us. Your satisfaction is important to us and we will be using the feedback you provided to make improvements to ensure we offer an exceptional experience for our guests in the future. We will continue to ensure the bedding is displayed properly on the bed to allow our guests to have a relaxing worry free stay at the Anaheim Portofino Inn & Suites hotel. We love hearing that our close proximity to the Disneyland Resorts parks met your travel needs. We hope to see you the next time you are in the Anaheim area.   Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: Room was a good size. Phone did not have labels on it and some buttons were missing. Sliding door from main room to kids room did not work well. General Manager took the time to put a nice packet together before our arrival for things to do  based on my phone inquiries.
Manager Response: Dear brendaj243:  Thank you so very much for your feedback on your recent stay with us. We love hearing that you enjoyed our large, clean, and comfortable guest room. As for the phone, I apologize that the phone faceplate was removed and not replaced with a new one. I hope you were able to see all your sites like the Hollywood sign and the Studio Tours. We look forward to seeing you during your next visit to Anaheim. Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: We had a competition that weekend. It was a great hotel and the staff was really friendly. CVS is right next door which is very convenient. There is also many places to eat close by. Convention center was a short walk which was perfect for us that have girls in different teams. Something that was great was we had late check out which helped the girls sleep in a bit more and we didn't have to move our car until the competition was over. We did not have to pay for parking. That was great. I will be staying here more.
Manager Response: Dear CheerMom97:  Thank you so very much for your feedback on your recent stay with us. We love hearing that our nice and clean guest room worked perfectly for your team. It's great hearing that our close proximity to the Convention Center, our Gift Shop, and CVS met your travel needs.   We look forward to seeing you the next time you are in Anaheim.  Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: We checked in and at check-in we asked if we could upgrade our king suite to the two bedroom suite.  The gentleman at the desk was happy to tell us it was available, and then he gave us a special discount for my husband being in the military. It really set of trip up for a great time. We will definitely be staying here again on our next Disney trip!!!!
Manager Response: Dear Maggie G:   Thank you so very much for your feedback on your recent stay with us. We thank you for all of your kind comments about our staff and the Amazing service that they provided you. We love hearing that our clean and spacious Two Room Suite worked perfectly for your visit. We look forward to you returning to the Anaheim Portofino Inn & Suites when your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim & Disneyland Resort area.  Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: The staff is very helpful, knowledgeable about area attractions and friendly.  Room was large, clean and comfortable. Only problem is lack of parking and having to use valet parking every time I needed to go somewhere.  Although valet was complementary it was inconvenient and got expensive with tips.
Manager Response: Dear allisuesue:  Thank you so very much for your feedback on your recent stay with us. We love hearing that you enjoyed our large, clean, and comfortable guest room. As for parking, we do offer the choice of Self-Park or using our Complimentary Valet services. We thank you for all of your kind comments about our Hotel staff and the great service that they provided you.  We look forward to seeing you during your next visit to Anaheim.  Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: What a great hotel.  A perfect place for the whole family to fit.  My sister and her family from San Francisco met up with us for Disney fun!   The kids had fun in the pool. The location to Disney was great.   The room was perfect!  Nicely sized to fit all of us in the two room suite.  No breakfast but IHOP right across the street.  We will definitely come again!
Manager Response: Dear NicoleMonique15:  We are thrilled to hear from another guest who enjoyed their stay at the Anaheim Portofino Inn & Suites Hotel. We are glad to hear that our close proximity to the Main gate Disneyland entrance matched your needs and allowed you to meet up with your Sister for a mini-family reunion.  We look forward to you returning to the Anaheim Portofino Inn & Suites when your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim & Disneyland Resort area. Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: Every year, I attend the Religous Education Congress at the Anaheim Convention Center.I'd made reservations at another hotel thru booking.com when just before our trip, I was sent an email letting us know the hotel had been torn down for 'renovations'. I have a bad leg so I always book something nearby.I was told our reservation had been transferred to another hotel; Portofino Inn. I've always thought it was a really nice looking place but it was even better. The service was excellent. The desk clerks were very helpful and it is just as close to the Convention Center as our original hotel was. It was a total win-win situation.I HIGHLY recommend Portofino Inn. You can't go wrong.
Manager Response: Dear VasquezR5916: Thank you so very much for your feedback on your recent stay with us. We love hearing that our nice and clean guest room worked perfectly for your visit. It's great hearing that our close proximity to the Anaheim Convention Center met your travel needs.  We look forward to seeing you again at the Religious Education Congress in 2016. Sincerely,	 Dan Kramer

Summary: The rooms were great for families, I loved the sleeping arrangements.  The only slight issue was that the pool area was a little small and the pool surroundings were a little sterile.  It would have been nicer if there was more privacy and vegetation surrounding the pool area.
Manager Response: Dear Randy M:  Thank you so very much for your feedback on your recent stay with us. We love hearing that our clean and spacious guest room worked perfectly for your family. Thank you for sharing your thoughts about adding additional scenery to the pool. We will be adding some new landscaping near the pool in the near future. We look forward to seeing you the next time you are in the Anaheim area. Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: Easy walk to Disneyland. CVS right next door is VERY convenient and Walgreens across the street opening soon. Kids loved the bunk beds (highlight of the trip aside from meeting Mickey for the first time). Much cheaper than some of the other hotels in the vicinity that offer suites. Staff was friendly and helpful. They have a laundry room which came in handy. I think they offered stroller rentals although we didn't end up needing one. Room was spacious and comfortable. Free wifi!
Manager Response: Dear lucretiamcc:  Thank you so much for taking the time to share your feedback. We are glad to hear that our clean and quiet Kids Suite with the Bunk-beds and free WiFi enabled you to have a relaxing trip. We love hearing that our close proximity to the Disneyland Resorts parks, our Gift Shop, and CVS met your travel needs.  We look forward to seeing you the next time you are in Anaheim.  Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary Heading: Great place to stay in Anaheim!
Summary: I have stayed here two times now.  Both for WonderCon. It is so close to the Convention Center and Disney.  The staff is always so nice and super helpful.  The rooms are very clean and very spacious.  I had a suite both times and it had a fridge and a microwave.  It is nice for breakfast on the go.
Manager Response: Dear JadaScarbrough: Thank you so very much for your feedback on your recent stay with us. We love hearing that our nice and clean guest suite with the mini-fridge and microwave worked perfectly for your visit. It's great hearing that our close proximity to the Anaheim Convention Center and the Disneyland Resorts parks met your travel needs.   We look forward to seeing you again at the 2016 WonderCon.  Sincerely,	 Dan Kramer

Summary: I was working at the convention center, and this hotel proved a very convenient and nice place to spend the night. I had booked a normal room, but checked in fairly late and ended up in one of the family suites. Very nice and spacious! My kids would have loved the separate little room with the bunk beds. Everything was spotless. I think this would be a fine place to stay if you take the family to Disneyland.  The staff was very accommodating in getting me a quiet room upstairs, the bed was super comfy, there was no bad smell, and the AC unit was surprisingly quiet. (over many years of traveling, I have learned that a higher budget mostly buys you a quieter air conditioning unit). I also always love it when I can actually open a window and get some fresh air in.  No breakfast is
Manager Response: Dear coastlinevideo: Thank you so very much for your feedback on your recent Fantastic stay with us. We thank you for all of your kind comments about our staff and the pleasant service that they provided you.  We look forward to seeing you the next time you are in the Anaheim area. Summary: Staff is friendly, rooms are clean and comfortable.  Walking distance to convention center and Disneyland.  Kids suite is perfect for families.  Lots of food options and CVS next door.  Only drawback is the temporary restriction in parking due to the new garage being constructed.

Summary: The staff were amazing and freindly. Gave directions and reccommendations. Well done to the front desk. Pool was nice and adequate. We will stay again in the future. Was very conveniently located to Disneyland and all restaurants. Was easy to find.

Summary: Portofino Inn is the place to stay if you are looking for a no-frills hotel near Disney. Rooms were well maintained and the staff very friendly. You are across the street from the Disney property and can walk to the main entrance in less then 10 minutes. Most of all you can't beat the price which includes free parking and wifi. If you are coming just to visit Disneyland I would say to not even rent a car. Get a shuttle from the airport to the Portofino.You won't need the car. If it matters to you, the pool is small. Never had a chance to use it. Too many other things to do
Manager Response: Dear steve40k:  Thank you so very much for your feedback on your recent stay with us. We love hearing that our clean and spacious guest room worked perfectly for your visit. Summary Heading: fantastic stay for our disney vacation
Summary: I stayed here with my husband and our three kids for 4 nights in March. This was our kids' third trip to disneyland and  the first time we stayed here.   We booked a kids suite room and absolutely loved it!  The kids enjoyed having their own space, beds, and tv away from mom and dad!  We were on the third floor next to the stairs and it was so quiet.  Disneyland was about a 10 minute walk which we loved and not having to use the transit.  We also enjoyed the newly built CVS next door.  Very convenient and we stopped their many times coming and going to the hotel.  I would definitely stay here again. We got a great deal on the room too.  We usually like continental breakfasts which this hotel did not have but not a big deal. We read that a microwave and mini fridge were in the
Manager Response: Dear jillianne79:  Thank you so very much for your feedback on your recent Fantastic stay with us. Summary: I was really worried after reading reviews but we got a good rate on a kid suite for 3 nights. This is a decent hotel for the area. No I wouldn't consider it a resort however For that area the price is good and the hotel was good. Parking yes is an issue at this time however your able to park in Sheraton lot next to it which is just as close as parking at any other hotel parking lot and we we really in the furthest building from it. No view as our room looked into the building next to ours the CVS and another hotel. The bed was very comfortable and the room was a good size. Our fridge had a small freezer Which I love kept everything ice cold never needed ice. It's a short walk to the parks or the 1st art shuttle stop if your tired of walking which my kids were. The hotel does
Manager Response: Dear Laurie F: Thank you so very much for your feedback on your recent stay with us. Summary: The hotel is close enough to walk to Disneyland.  We had a kids' suite and it was perfect for us!  The little fridg was perfect for keeping our snacks and breakfast items fresh and cold.  The only complaint was that we didn't get fresh towels everyday - we had to call the front desk for them, but once we did, they came promptly to our room with plenty of towels.

Summary: The experience at the potifino hotel was awesome the room was beautiful the friendly staff were all in one great experience we will definatly have to stay many more vacations there.my husbands an I had our honeymoon there along with visiting Disneyland an it was nice to have the both locations so close to each other.

Summary: great time rooms nice clean friendly staff.however, they do not offer breakfast of anykind. It would have been much easier if we had been able to eat there before leaving for the day at Disneyland.  We did not get a rental car so had to catch a bus to go for breakfast then another bus to get to DL. just would have been nice.  The pool was very small, lots of people No lifeguard so must stay with children.  Comfortable pool furniture but again you had to be there first.   Got very crowded quickly. The thing that will keep me from staying there again was the fact that we arrived in the morning thinking that we could get in an extra day at DL. We got there at 9a.m.but we couldn't get in our rooms until 3p.m.. this made it hard, they let us put our luggage in a room And could change
Manager Response: Dear sillyfilly25: Thank you so very much for your feedback on your recent stay with us. We are glad to hear that our nice and clean guest room worked out great for your visit.  Although we do not serve breakfast at the hotel, we do have Molly's cafe across from our lobby that specializes in breakfast and we do have IHOP directly across the street. We thank you for all of your kind comments about our staff and the pleasant service that they provided you.   We look forward to seeing you the next time you are in the Anaheim area.  Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: Location was great, only took us about 7 minutes to walk to the main gate when my brother and I walked without the kids.  With the kids, it took us more like 10-12 minutes.  There is a CVS next door so we were able to get water and other snacks for much cheaper before going to the park.  Only downfall was there wasn't a fan in the bathroom but the two vanities was convenient and the kids loved their bunk beds.  Front desk service was excellent and parking was easy (they let you use the lot next door at the Sheraton if their lot is full and it was just as close to the hotel as their parking lot.
Manager Response: Dear melejay: Thank you so very much for your feedback on your recent stay with us. We love hearing that our nice and clean guest room with the two vanities worked perfectly for your visit. It's great hearing that our close proximity to the Disneyland Resorts parks, our Gift Shop, CVS, and Restaurants met your travel needs.   We look forward to seeing you the next time you visit the Anaheim area.  Sincerely,	 Dan Kramer

Summary: Staff was wonderful! Rooms were very nice and kiddos loves the pool and game room. Loved the walking distance to Disneyland! Even had shuttle access to the park which was well worth it at night after a long day of walking. The only small complaint I have is the parking situation. Not sure if a new lot was being constructed but parking was a pain. Try did have complimentary valet which was extremely nice but there was only one valet and it seemed to take a while to retrieve cars. Not their fault but I think the hotel can manage this better. Overall we will stay again!
Manager Response: Dear AmiteysMom:  We are thrilled to hear from another guest who had another great stay at the Anaheim Portofino Inn & Suites Hotel. We love hearing that the kiddos enjoyed our comfy guest rooms, pool, and spa which allowed you to have a nice relaxing get-away with the family. It is great knowing that our hotel's location and the close proximity to the Disneyland Main Entrance worked perfectly for the family.  We look forward to seeing you the next time you are in Anaheim.   Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: Great choice for my trip to Disneyland. Property was clean and everyone was very nice and helpful. Great atmosphere all around. Plenty of restaurants within walking distance. Valet parked the car and didn't need it until it was time to leave. Highly recommend staying for any occasion.
Manager Response: Dear annetted4: We are glad to hear you had great stay at the Anaheim Portofino Inn & Suites hotel. It is nice to hear you were able to take advantage of our close proximity to Disneyland and the local restaurants during your stay. We thank you for all of your kind comments about our staff and the great service that they provided you.  We look forward to you returning to the Anaheim Portofino Inn & Suites when your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim & Disneyland Resort area. Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary Heading: Good family hotel for a Disney Trip
Summary: We stayed in the Portofino for a quick two day trip to Disneyland.  It is a good 15-20 minute walk with two street lights between to the Main Gate Disneyland and California park entrances.  If you are planning to going back and forth between parks and room by foot be prepared to add some miles to your day.  It is easily 20-30 minutes to get to Downtown Disney.  We had a two queen beds room.  It had plenty of room for two adults and two teenagers.  There was some street noise from parking lot being on the bottom floor but over all pretty quiet at night.    The hotel was able to check us in several hours early.  The valet parking was nice option and the room was clean.  The CVS on the corner was great for last minute medical items, water and snacks.  There is a 7-11 and coffee
Manager Response: Dear azhiker9:  Thank you so very much for your feedback on your recent stay with us. We love hearing that our nice and clean guest room worked perfectly for your visit. It's great hearing that our close proximity to the Disneyland Resorts parks, our Gift Shop, CVS, and the Coffee Bean met your travel needs.  We look forward to seeing you the next time you visit the Anaheim area. Sincerely,	 Dan Kramer

Summary: We booked the kids' suite - our 16 year old loved having her own space and it was quiet and close enough to walk everywhere we wanted to go.  Just a brisk 10 minute walk from Disneyland which we loved as we came back for dinner and then returned for the night.
Manager Response: Dear Ruth F: Thank you so very much for your feedback on your recent stay at the "Oasis" Portofino Inn & Suites hotel. We love hearing that the Family Suite with the bunk beds worked great for the family. We look forward to you returning to the Anaheim Portofino Inn & Suites when your travel plans bring you back to the Disneyland Resort.  Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: There were five of us, 4 adults, 1 kid. Stayed in a two room suite, with a queen bed in one room, bunk beds and sleeper sofa in the other.  It only had a side table with one chair, so it wasn't good for eating in the room.  Still a good deal for us.  Nice staff.  Clean. Walking distance to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear Donna P:  Thank you so much for taking the time to share your experience with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. We are glad to hear you enjoyed the clean and spacious Family Kids Suite with a King bed and Bunk-beds. It is great to hear you were able to take advantage of our close proximity to the Disneyland Resort parks. We look forward to you returning to the Anaheim Portofino Inn & Suites when your travel plans bring you back to the Disneyland Resort area.  Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: Stayed in the Kids Suite with my two (childish) adult friends (okay, I'm childish too but still...) The room was spacious and fun! Has a King bed and bunk bed in a room separated by sliding glass doors and sheer curtains. We thought it was REALLY cute that the bunk beds each had their own little reading lights on the walls. And that there were two different TVs, so parents/guardians or friends-who-don't-agree-on-the-same-late-night-shows can watch different things!  Hotel gives great rates, staff was super friendly, and it's about 2 blocks / 10 min walk from Disneyland's gates. Also RIGHT next to many easy to get to food locations, like Ihop, subway, some other restaurants, a 24 hour CVS, 7-11 and other quickie marts.
Manager Response: Dear BrieanneAntoun: We are thrilled to hear from another guest who had a great stay at the Anaheim Portofino Inn & Suites Hotel. We love hearing that our bunk-beds with the reading lights worked perfectly for your party. We are glad that you enjoyed our close proximity to the Disneyland Parks and Restaurants.  We look forward to seeing you the next time you are in Anaheim.  Sincerely, Daniel Kramer

Summary: Walking distance to both parks, clean, spacious, beds are comfortable (even the pull-out couch in the kids' room), and parking is easy and covered.  They have a pool and spa but we were so tired from the parks that we never used them.
Manager Response: Dear ktlnhunt: Thank you so much for taking the time to share your experience with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. We are glad to hear that you had a great stay and that you enjoyed the Family Kids Suite with the Bunk-beds, Sofa-bed, mini-fridge, and microwave worked out great for the family. It is great knowing that you enjoyed our hotel's location and the close proximity to the Disneyland Main Entrance.   We look forward to you returning to the Anaheim Portofino Inn & Suites when your travel plans bring you back to the Disneyland Resort. Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary Heading: Service and location was great for Disney visit
Summary: Stayed here with two rooms for 5 family members going to Disneyland and California Adventure.  Service at front desk and housekeeping were great.  Complimentary car valet unexpected but great. Near good restaurants.  Property shows some wear and tear but is clean.  We would stay here again.  Very convenient to Disney.
Manager Response: Dear FrenchMD: Thank you so very much for your feedback on your recent stay with us. We love hearing that our clean and spacious guest room worked perfectly for your visit. We are glad to hear you enjoyed our hotel's location and the close proximity to the Disneyland Main Entrance and restaurants were a perfect fit for your stay. We thank you for all of your kind comments about our staff and the pleasant service that they provided you.  We look forward to you returning to the Anaheim Portofino Inn & Suites when your travel plans bring you back to the Disneyland Resort. Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: This hotel was a terrific place to stay for our Disney trip! An amazing value, this hotel is only a ten minute walk to the main gate. There are lots of shops in the area making it easy to dine and stock up on any needed items.   The kid suite had a fun room for my granddaughter. She loved the bunk bed and the personal night light.   The facility is clean and the staff was friendly and helpful.   I'd recommend this hotel to any family going to Disney and would stay again myself!
Manager Response: Dear Hakatai:  Thank you so very much for your feedback on your recent stay with us. We love hearing that our clean and spacious Kids Suite worked perfectly for your visit and that your grand-daughter loved the bunk beds.  We are glad to hear you enjoyed our hotel's location and the close proximity to the Disneyland Main Entrance. We look forward to you returning to the Anaheim Portofino Inn & Suites when your travel plans bring you back to the Disneyland Resort.  Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary Heading: Wonderful and friendly and within 10 min you're in Disneyland!
Summary: The service was great and the staff were very friendly. We walked for 10 minutes and we were in Disneyland! Pool time for kids and hot tub for the adults was a nice way to unwind after a long day of walking around the Disney theme parks.
Manager Response: Dear Alainanordin:  We are thrilled to hear from another guest who had a wonderful stay at the Anaheim Portofino Inn & Suites Hotel. It's great hearing that our close proximity to the Disneyland Parks and our pool allowed you to unwind and have a nice relaxing stay.  We look forward to seeing you the next time you are in Anaheim.  Sincerely, Daniel Kramer

Summary: I stayed one night for the Expo at the Convention Center.  I have stayed at several hotels down in Anaheim.  This hotel includes free parking and wifi, a plus.   Room was clean, bed was too soft for me.  There was a fridge and coffee maker, which I could use for tea as well.  Plenty of restaurants to choose from.  This hotel was convenient as the convention center was around the corner.
Manager Response: Dear Robin S: Thank you so very much for your feedback on your recent stay with us. We love hearing that our nice and clean guest room located next to the Anaheim Convention Center worked perfectly for your visit. It's great hearing that our close proximity to the Disneyland Resorts parks, our Gift Shop, and Restaurants met your travel needs.  We look forward to seeing you the next time you visit the Anaheim area. Sincerely,	 Dan Kramer

Summary Heading: One of the worst hotels I have stayed at
Summary: We came here with our entire family (17 people) and booked 4 rooms. We wanted to leave the minute we walked in but we had already paid for the first night. Elevators were not conveniently located, the pool was small and crowded. The entire hotel was old, and run down with little parking. The only positive is location to Disneyland. We checked out the next day and went down the street to the Crowne Plaza for only $10 more a night which saved our trip.
Manager Response: Dear Kris C: Thank you for your feedback in regards to your stay Last year in April 2014. We do have four (4) elevators located in the hotel including one next to the lobby, the pool, the gift shop, and the parking lot. We have recently updated our hotel including our Lobby, Guest Laundry room, Fitness room, Business Center, and we just installed Mini-fridges in all of our guest rooms.  We are glad to hear you enjoyed our hotel's location and the close proximity to the Disneyland Main Entrance.  We hope that you will consider staying with us again so that we can have another chance to provide you superior service.  Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: Stayed here for a convention a few years ago.  I really only slept in the room.  It was affordable and close walking distance to the convention center and Disney.  The room was nice and clean, if a little small.  A tiny fridge kept my waters cold.  I'm not a coffee drinker but there was a machine in the room.  There is a pool and jacuzzi on the property but I didn't use it.  I wish they had a continental breakfast.  Most of the places down in the area do.  It was sometimes difficult to grab something to eat for breakfast before a long day of working the show.  If they had breakfast I would give them 5 stars.
Manager Response: Dear karansimoni:  Thank you for being a loyal and repeat guest and for taking the time to share your experience with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. Although we do not serve breakfast at the hotel, we do have Molly's cafe across from our lobby that specializes in breakfast and we do have IHOP directly across the street. We are glad to hear that our nice and clean guest room worked perfectly for your visit.  We look forward to seeing you the next time you are in the Anaheim area. Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary Heading: Nice Staff, Clean and Close to Disneyland.
Summary: The staff, especially the front desk and maids, were accommodating and friendly. The room was quiet and clean with a balcony and a comfy bed.  I appreciated the little fridge and coffee pot provided, as there is no continental breakfast offered. The only problem we had was the parking. There was none. We had to leave the car with the valet rather than self park. Although inconvenient having to wait for it the next day, they did a nice job retrieving it and were polite and professional.
Manager Response: Dear Nance S:  Thank you so very much for your feedback on your recent stay with us. We love hearing that our clean and quiet guest room with the balcony worked perfectly for your visit.  As for parking we do offer both options. You have the choice of Self-Park or using our Complimentary Valet services. We thank you for all of your kind comments about our Hotel staff and the great service that they provided you.  We look forward to seeing you during your next visit to Anaheim. Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: Great place to stay. Fantastic location. I called  quite a few places and this was the least expensive for five people for five nights. Staff was very courteous. Great job!!! We'll definitely come back
Manager Response: Dear Levi G: We are thrilled to hear from another guest who had another Excellent stay at the lovely Anaheim Portofino Inn & Suites Hotel. We thank you for all of your kind comments about our courteous  staff and the great service that they provided you and your party.  We look forward to seeing you again, and hope that it will be very soon.  Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: great value and my favourite inn will go there again in the near future. The staff were excellent, the beds were comfy, love the decor and the pool and hot tub were just what we needed after a long day at the parks
Manager Response: Dear  fifi20152015:  We are thrilled to hear from another guest who had an enjoyable stay at the Anaheim Portofino Inn & Suites Hotel. Summary: Great location close enough to Disney to walk.   We loved the family suite - having two bunk beds & a couch in a separate area with sliding glass doors allowed the children to go to bed earlier while we were still up watching tv.   The staff were all fantastic and we enjoyed our stay.   The only thing we missed was a breakfast in the morning, but we decided that the room configuration was more important.
Manager Response: Dear outrgus:  Thank you so much for taking the time to share your experience with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. Thank you for the compliments about our staff and their commitment to providing with great customer service. Summary: Hello and thank you for asking for this review. I wish there was a button between average and very good. What makes it just shy of VERY GOOD was the lack of amenaties. The mico fridge was just that, just enough to keep baby bottles in, no microwave, no continental breakfast, one of the two washing machines was down which ment that being 2nd person there I had to wait. Morning coffee in the lobby would seem to be an easy perk that for me again would move it up a button to Very Good. Overall the front desk people very nice/helpful. Cleaning staff friendly and courteous, room was clean and a nice walking distance to the convention center.
Manager Response: Dear danny_gatschenberger: Thank you so very much for your feedback on your recent stay with us. We love hearing that our nice and clean guest room located next to the Anaheim Convention Center worked perfectly for your visit. We do provide a coffee maker in every room to help start your day with a little boost. We thank you for all of your kind comments about our courteous Hotel staff.  We look forward to seeing you during your next visit to Anaheim. Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: I was leery after reading some mixed reviews but was pleasantly surprised.  Pros: You couldn't beat the 10 min walk to Disneyland. CVS next door. Clean rooms, pleasant staff. Great size kids suite with separate room containing bunk beds. Pool and hot tub.  Cons: Needs some updating(holes in curtains, yellowing stained blankets). There was a funky smell from the bathroom that no one seemed to rectify after I complained about it but it wasn't a deal breaker. Not enough drawer space.  Overall, for the money and the little amount we spent at the hotel, it was a great deal and have no problem recommending it.
Manager Response: Dear Abby S: We are thrilled to hear from another guest who had another great stay at the lovely Anaheim Portofino Inn & Suites Hotel. We thank you for all of your kind comments about our staff and the pleasant service that they provided you. Thank you for your observations. We recently updated our Lobby, Guest Laundry room, Fitness room, and Business Center. And we will continue to update the hotel.  It's great to hear your family enjoyed the Kids Suite with the Bunk-beds.  We look forward to seeing you again, and hope that it will be very soon.  Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: Motel was nice. Having a kids suite was also great. Walk to,the park was not to long. My kids loved the pool and sauna. It was nice having a CVS next door and food across the road. Overall I was very pleased with our stay.
Manager Response: Dear Jp2448: Thank you so much for taking the time to share your experience with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. It is great hearing you enjoyed our hotel's close proximity to the Disneyland Main Entrance, CVS, and restaurants.  We look forward to you returning to the Anaheim Portofino Inn & Suites when your travel plans bring you back to the Disneyland Resort. Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: We were a little leery after reading all the reviews it seamed people either loved it or hated it.  We stayed in a kids suite. It was very roomy and extremely clean.  I thought the bed was hard, but my husband thought it was fine.  The people at the front desk were very helpful. We were able to buy our Disney passes and our ART bus passes at the desk so we never had to wait in line.  There is a CVS right next door so we could by snacks and anything else we needed. The room had a mini fridge and microwave and a coffee maker. The pool was not very large but it was well kept, we used it everyday at least twice.  There was also a very nice coffee shop right next door we went there every morning, the coffee was very good and reasonably price. The hotel was close enough to Disney that
Manager Response: Dear Mary Z: Thank you so much for taking the time to share your feedback.  We are glad to hear that our clean and quiet guest rooms enabled you to have a relaxing trip. Summary: One of our favorite places to stay.  Clean rooms with comfortable beds. Walking distance to Disneyland is a plus.  Have recommended this property to many of my friends planning a trip with the family to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear beckitom: We are thrilled to hear from another guest who had an enjoyable stay at the Anaheim Portofino Inn & Suites Hotel. It is great hearing that our clean and spacious guest rooms met your travel needs perfectly. We look forward to seeing you the next time you are in the Anaheim area. Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary Heading: Nice and clean. Easy walk to Disneyland
Summary: We stayed three nights in a kids suite.  Our room had a king sized bed, bunk beds and a sleeper sofa. Sliding french doors close to separate the rooms. There were TV's in both areas, a refrigerator and microwave. It was very clean, including the carpets (our white socks remained white!). Friendly staff. Free parking. No breakfast, but with the fridge and microwave we brought our own. It was an easy walk to the main gates, about a half a mile.  If you can walk through Disneyland you can certainly walk to this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Linda M:  Thank you so very much for your feedback on your recent stay with us. We love hearing that our clean and spacious Kids Suite worked perfectly for your visit. We look forward to you returning to the Anaheim Portofino Inn & Suites when your travel plans bring you back to the Disneyland Resort.  Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: This was a wonderful experience for the group of students, their parents, families and friends.  Great location and the staff was more than accommodating for our group! I will definitely stay at this hotel again!
Manager Response: Dear  lorialisa5:  We are thrilled to hear from another guest who had another great stay at the lovely Anaheim Portofino Inn & Suites Hotel. We thank you for all of your kind comments about our staff and the great service that they provided you. It's great to hear your group enjoyed our spacious rooms and location.   We look forward to seeing you again, and hope that it will be very soon.   Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: Check in/ out was quick and painless.  Desk staff very pleasant and helpful.  They had our Disneyland passes ready and available.  Room was spacious and well- appointed; great balcony.  Beds were very comfortable.  Could have been cleaner as we found a comb and a sticky substance left by other guests :(  Loved the lobby camera! Otherwise, a more than adequate stay.  Thank you Portofino!
Manager Response: Dear Allison P: We thank you for all of your kind comments about our staff and the great service that they provided you. We apologize that our HSKP team missed a comb in the room. We are sharing your observation with the team. It's great hearing you enjoyed our spacious guest room and Lobby i'snap camera so you could take pics and send them to your email from the hotel.  We look forward to you returning to the Anaheim Portofino Inn & Suites when your travel plans bring you back to the Disneyland Resort area. Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: Been at this hotel at least five times… Even the front lobby personnel knows us at this point! I like the place, but they are having a few issues with parking at this time due to construction. Hopefully the next time I'm there they will have construction completed and we'll be able to park there for a longer period of time. As far as cleanliness, there is no problem at all.  One thing I do recommend that they have to increase the amount of items for the coffee preparation. There is not nearly enough sugar and cream to be able to fill up half a cup.  Other than that, I'll be staying here again on my next trip to Disneyland!
Manager Response: Dear Adriana P: Thank you so very much for your feedback on your recent stay with us. We are glad to hear that you enjoyed our spacious guest room. Thank you for the suggestion about adding more condiments for your in room coffee. To enhance our guest service and experience, we have currently started a parking expansion that will include a five story parking structure. During the expansion, We will have 3 areas to park that are all located near the Lobby entrance. We will be  offering complimentary Valet over the weekends and Conventions.  We look forward to seeing you during your next visit to Anaheim. Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: An outstanding experience for me and the group of students and their families that brought to Anaheim! A very warm and accommodating staff that took the time to treat us as more than just a passing group of tourists! We will DEFINITELY stay here again we come back next year!
Manager Response: Dear Hyattnomire:   Thank you so very much for your feedback on your recent stay with us. We love hearing that our clean and spacious guest rooms worked perfectly for your visit. Thank you for the compliments about our staff and their commitment to providing with great customer service. We look forward to you returning to the Anaheim Portofino Inn & Suites when your travel plans bring you back to the Disneyland Resort area.  Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: The great reviews must come from families who love the bigger rooms, possibly in the OTHER building, because we wanted to check out 10 minutes after checking in. I regret pre-paying on Orbitz $250/2 nights.  Dingy and stuffy. The patio was all muddy, so we couldn't let the kids out. Kept the sliding door open as much as possible to air out the smell. Slept horrible on the beds and heard neighbor tv sounds and alarm clocks too clearly. Visual room blemishes resembling a Motel 6.  The front desk was unmanned most of our stay, and since I was told they were sold out, I didn't bother asking to change rooms.  My biggest complaint is the zero-sympathy for the parking nightmare. Mandated 11pm valet was not how I wanted to drag young kids and bags through on night #1. It was as
Manager Response: Dear Maria_Lopez_9:  Thank you so much for taking the time to share your experience with us. Our hotel is staffed 24 hours a day. We apologize that our complimentary parking was not a good fit for you. It generally comes in very handy when you do arrive late with children. They assist you with your bags and then park your vehicle once you reach your room. We do offer a choice in Self parking or complementary valet services when available. We hope that you will consider staying with us again so that we can have another chance to provide you superior service.  Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: Great place to stay.  Close to Disneyland and the room was perfect for our family of 6.  They even let us check in early so we could park at the hotel and head to the park just after it opened (9:30am). Definitely recommend to others.
Manager Response: Dear TripAdvisor Member:  Thank you so much for taking the time to share your experience with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. We look forward to you returning to the Anaheim Portofino Inn & Suites when your travel plans bring you back to the Disneyland Resort.  Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: I stayed here on the recommendation of a friend based upon 2 considerations. The first was that it is a short walk (15 minutes) to the Disneyland Property. The second was that some rooms had bunk beds for the kids with folding doors to give everybody a bit of privacy. In both cases this hotel delivered. The walk was very reasonable, and allowed us to take mid-day breaks from the Disneyland park, which was very convenient. It was also nice to have the separate sleeping area for the kids, so I'd give this hotel good marks for both of these features.  Unfortunately, there were some elements that were disappointing. One negative element was that, upon opening the door to the room, my immediate reaction was:  "Wow... this room looks very different that their photos on the website (or
Manager Response: Dear Icunliffe:  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with fellow TripAdvisor travelers.  We thank you for all of your kind comments about our staff and the great service that they provided you. Thank you for the observation about the Towel rack placement location and adding an additional exhaust fan in addition to our current wall vent ventilation system.  We hope that you will consider staying with us again so that we can have another chance to provide you superior service.  Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: This was our 2nd stay in a kids suite at Portofino and they really seemed to have stepped up their game since our 2010 stay.  Our room looked refurbished and in good condition. Staff was very helpful and friendly. We arrived at hotel via taxi at 11am and I was pleasantly surprised that our room was ready. Checking in 4 hours early gave us time to rest and relax, what a nice treat.  Location is great. Short walk to Disneyland resort. Probably not much further than Disneyland hotel from park. Adjacent CVS had big grocery selection so we could eat breakfast in our room each day with microwave and fridge.  In room coffee was not good but coffee bean was in the parking lot.  We used fitness center and pool and both were nice but not fancy.  For a nice room that sleeps 6, walking
Manager Response: Dear brennbug:  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us. It's great hearing you enjoyed our clean and spacious Kid's Suite with the separate bedroom with the Bunk-beds, the mini-fridge, the coffee maker, and the microwave.  We love hearing that our close proximity to the Disneyland Resorts parks, CVS, Coffee Bean, and Restaurants met your travel needs. We look forward to seeing you the next time you are in Anaheim. Summary: Highly recommended. The staff was friendly, courteous, and helpful.  The bunk bed suite was perfect for our family. The microwave and fridge were helpful.  The pool was nice too.  If going to Disneyland, stay here.
Manager Response: Dear John B:  Thank you so much for taking the time to share your experience with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. Summary: The Portofino was a great place for us to stay to visit Disneyland. It's a 10-15 minute walk, so we could walk back to the hotel halfway through the day for resting and naptime, then return in the early evening. We ordered a pizza one night from the menu in the room and was the delicious, very greasy kind. Way cheaper than eating at Disneyland and it came right to our door. The hotel was perfect for a quick and affordable trip with our 2 and 4 year old.
Manager Response: Dear BusyMommy79:   We are thrilled to hear from another guest who enjoyed their stay at the lovely Anaheim Portofino Inn & Suites Hotel. We are glad to hear that our clean and spacious guest room worked perfectly for your visit. It's great hearing that our close proximity to the Disneyland parks worked out great for the young ones and allowed them to get in their nap time.  We look forward to you returning to the Anaheim Portofino Inn & Suites when your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim & Disneyland Resort area.  Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: I was a bit unsure when we booked this hotel but was really surprised when we arrived. Clean, large rooms, excellent for families as so much space and with a pool for cooling down after a long day in Disney.  Parks are about a 15 minute walk (straight route so no getting lost). No breakfast options at hotel, but IHop opposite and other hotels for breakfast really close by. Staff were friendly and helpful. Would definitly recommend a stay here if you've visiting Disney.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This hotel is getting a little run down and cleaning could have been more thorough, but overall the hotel was very comfortable.  The small fridge froze all of our food even after we adjusted the temp.  Maybe rely on an ice chest. I'd probably stay again.
Manager Response: Dear AZVAL: Thank you so much for taking the time to share your experience with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. We are glad to hear you enjoyed your Suite with the mini-fridge and microwave. We are sorry to hear that when you adjusted the temperature it made the food too cold. We will continue to update our hotel. We recently updated our Lobby, Guest Laundry room, Fitness room, and Business Center. We look forward to seeing you the next time you visit the Anaheim area. Sincerely,	 Dan Kramer

Summary: As a family of three with hotel connections, we have grown accustomed to staying in the nicer chains. When we decided to do a weekend trip to Disney, we wanted something that could allow the family to spread out, but wanted to be by the parks. After looking at many reviews for several local hotels, we opted to try this one. We figured worse case scenario, it would be a life lesson. We booked a kids suite through Rocketmiles. We arrived late after spending more than enough time on the highway. We were concerned as we had read reviews about the parking, and indeed the lot was full. Luckily, they have complimentary valet. As we were there for Disney, there really was no need to go in and out so it is well worth a couple of tips. The lobby was nice and modern, with a small business
Manager Response: none

Summary: Two adults, 2 boys aged 12 & 5. 10 minute walk to Disney or grab Anaheim Transit bus which stops in front of CVS pharmacy, 15 steps from hotel. Family room with bunk beds, and 1 king bed, microwave, small fridge worked very well for us. Laundry facilities could have been larger, only has 2 washers, 2 dryers. Pool good, hot tub was great. Staff was friendly. Lots of families at this hotel, of course. We stayed 10 days, location good for restaurants, and groceries.
Manager Response: Dear TravelGranny2015:  We are thrilled to hear from another guest who had a perfect stay at the Anaheim Portofino Inn & Suites Hotel. We are glad to hear that our close proximity to restaurants and the Main gate Disneyland entrance matched your needs. Thank you for the kind words about the friendliness of our staff. Thank you for allowing us to be the host hotel for you and your family. We look forward to seeing you the next time you visit the Anaheim area.   Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary Heading: Rooms are good - Parking is unfortunate
Summary: My 11 year old daughter and i decided to have a girls night/day at Disneyland and get a hotel room (we live an hour away but usually just make the drive).  We got a good price on the room at the Portofino and I recalled staying there some time ago as well.    Overall the room was fine, although showing a little wear throughout and I couldn't help but laugh that the drapery shears were completely different lengths, one made it to the ground but one hovered about a foot and a half above.    You could easily walk to Disneyland from the hotel and there is a CVS in the building next door which was really handy for late night Pop Tarts and Chapstick!  Here's the problem however.  They have almost no parking at the hotel proper.  They do provide parking next door at the Sheraton lot,
Manager Response: Dear leeannmorrell:  Thank you so very much for your feedback on your recent stay with us. We are glad to hear that our clean and spacious guest room worked perfectly for your visit. We apologize that the replacement sheer was shorter in length than the other sheer. We change them and rotate them in order to continue to keep a nice clean updated room. We will ensure when they get changed out that the correct sized sheer is used.  In regards to parking, We have currently started a parking expansion that will include a five story parking structure. During the expansion, We will have 3 areas to park that are all located near the Lobby entrance. We do offer complimentary Valet over the weekends and Conventions.  We hope that you will consider staying with us again so that we can have another chance to provide you superior service.  Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: Stayed in the kids suite which had 2 rooms with an option to separate them with sliding doors. One room had bunkbeds, a pull out couchbed, tv, mini fridge, microwave & table. The other  room had a king bed, tv. The space was great for the 6 of us and the kids loved having their own "room". We would definitely stay here again. The price was sooo reasonable  and when we checked in we got more of a discount for being a costco member! Oh and LOVE the fact that cvs and coffee bean & tea leaf are rigjt next door!
Manager Response: Dear wendisfan:  We are thrilled to hear from another guest who had another great stay at the lovely Anaheim Portofino Inn & Suites Hotel. We thank you for all of your kind comments about our staff and the great service that they provided you at check in. It's great to hear your family enjoyed the Kids Suite with the Bunk-beds.  We look forward to seeing you again, and hope that it will be very soon.   Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: We were very pleased with The Portofino Inn and Suites. The room was fantastic,the pool was great. And the front desk people were very helpful. We needed an electric cart for my husband and they helped in finding the company for us. Portofino Inn is only 7-10 minutes from Disneyland by walking. A very nice walk indeed! We will be back someday!! Thankyou again!!
Manager Response: Dear Cindy B:  We are thrilled to hear from another guest who had another great stay at the lovely Anaheim Portofino Inn & Suites Hotel. We thank you for all of your kind comments about our staff and the great service that they provided you. We are glad to hear you enjoyed our hotel's location and the close proximity to the Disneyland Resort Entrance. Thank you for allowing us to be apart of the "First Disneyland Vacation".   We look forward to you returning to the Anaheim Portofino Inn & Suites when your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim & Disneyland Resort area.  Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: To start with the positives, I loved the room we were put in! It was on the top floor and was very quiet. We were right by the ice machine, so that was really convenient. The room was always clean, as well as the entire hotel.   However, I understand that the hotel couldn't do anything about parking, but parking was such a hassle. There was no valet when the front desk said there would be. Parking was very hard to find even if I only left for an hour. I ended up getting special permission to park in the check-in spots since I didn't want to go park next door at the Sheraton. That was a big mess in itself and is a completely different story.   Whenever I went downstairs to ask a question, there usually wasn't a person there, which was extremely frustrating.  There is a

During the expansion, We will have 3 areas to park that are all located near the Lobby entrance. We do offer complimentary Valet over the weekends and Conventions.   We hope that you will consider staying with us again so that we can have another chance to provide you superior service.  Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: We drove up from La Jolla for the weekend. We normally stay at the Sheraton but got a great deal here. It was a short walk to disneyland and the staff was extremely nice. Our daughter loved the bunk beds in the second room. Overall it was a great experience
Manager Response: Dear klocklear88:  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us. We are glad to hear that you enjoyed the short walk from our hotel to the Disneyland Maingate entrance. It's great hearing you enjoyed our clean and spacious Kid's Suite with the separate bedroom with the Bunk-beds, the mini-fridge, the coffee maker, and the microwave.    We look forward to you returning to the Anaheim Portofino Inn & Suites when your travel plans  bring you back to the Disneyland Resort.  Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary Heading: Comfortable bed, close enough to Disneyland, too much noise
Summary: Pros: It is technically close to Disneyland but seems far after a long day walking-take the Candy Cane Inn bus to get you over half way there The bed was comfortable There is a small although freezing fridge and microwave in the suite The room is good size with a separate bunk bed/couch room  Cons: Not super clean in fact there was hair in the shower when we got there-ewww The noise level is bad or maybe the doors and walls are too thin. With all of the families staying here you will here the pitter patter and squeeling and crying above and beside you I think if they don't offer breakfast they should have a stovetop and a real mini-kitchen
Manager Response: Dear Ciao_Gina:  Thank you so very much for your feedback on your recent stay with us. We love hearing that our spacious guest room worked perfectly for your visit.  For Breakfast options, we do have Molly's cafe across from our lobby that specializes in breakfast and we do have IHOP directly across the street.    We are glad to hear you enjoyed our hotel's location and the close proximity to the Disneyland Main Entrance.   We look forward to you returning to the Anaheim Portofino Inn & Suites when your travel plans bring you back to the Disneyland Resort.  Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: This was our second stay at the Portofino, and it went great. The walk to and from the parks is not bad, but at night I would recommend a bus or cab if your dogs are barking. The room was clean, and the staff was very friendly. They offer valet, but do not push it, and one of the valet attendants was nice enough to tell me that a space had just opened up in the (small) garage. It would be nice if they offered some sort of breakfast, which does need to be factored into the overall cost, but it was still worth it for us. There is a large CVS next door, and the adjacent hotel has a Coffee Bean and Tea Leaf. We stayed on the 4th floor of tower 2 with rooms above, below and on either side, and never has any issues with noise.
Manager Response: Dear MissingCabo:  Thank you so much for taking the time to share your feedback. We are glad to hear that our clean, quiet guest rooms and our convenient location gave you a relaxing stay during your visit. It's great hearing that our Valet Company keeps our guests informed so if you choose to self park instead of utilizing the complimentary Valet that they help provide guidance on the location of available parking spots.  We look forward to you returning to the Anaheim Portofino Inn & Suites when your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim & Disneyland Resort area.  Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary Heading: Solid for the show, great location for NAMM show.
Summary: Provided a very solid business hotel while primarily aimed at Disney visitors the room provided all I needed as a business traveler, Ie Ironing facilities, plenty of hangers, free quality wifi, ect.   Room was very spacious and good value.  Bathroom provided good facilities and nice toiletries. Was a bit hard to control water temperature but not the end of the world when you   The manager at the front desk could not have been any more helpful, I had a couple of parcels arrive which where handled by the hotel and the team fantastically.   Would definitely recommend for attending a show or for pleasure.   One thing to note is the website advertised fridges and microwaves in the room no one seemed to know about this so double check at booking.    Location is fantastic right next to
Manager Response: Dear Sbangsuk:  Thank you so very much for your feedback on your recent stay with us. We are glad to hear that our clean and spacious guest room worked perfectly for your visit. We are glad to hear you enjoyed our hotel's location and the close proximity to the Anaheim Convention Center Entrance and Restaurants. All of our Guest rooms do have a mini-fridge in them. However, Only our Suites have a microwave in them in addition to the mini-fridge.  We look forward to you returning to the Anaheim Portofino Inn & Suites when your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim area.  Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary Heading: Good location, big room, friendly staff!
Summary: I was there for work and a holiday, the hotel received a shipment on my behalf even before I arrived. We were able to check in early and the room was large with plenty of space. Location is excellent if you are attending exhibitions at the Anaheim convention center. Within walking distance to the halls and Anaheim Garden Walk where you can get plenty of food. Unfortunately we had to leave earlier, if not we would have enjoyed our stay further.
Manager Response: Dear Lance L: Thank you so very much for your feedback on your recent stay with us. We are glad to hear that our clean and spacious guest room worked perfectly for your visit. We are glad to hear you enjoyed our hotel's location and the close proximity to the Anaheim Convention Center Entrance and Restaurants. We look forward to you returning to the Anaheim Portofino Inn & Suites when your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim area. Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary Heading: Went to Anaheim Convention Center for Trade Show
Summary: Good value, very friendly & helpful staff, from valet parking to housekeeping and of course the ladies at the front desk! Short walk to the convention center.   Quiet property,  clean rooms, close to restaurants and even a CVS drug store. We liked the fact the sliding door opened to a patio we could sit on and enjoy the fresh air.
Manager Response: Dear K H:  Thank you so very much for your feedback on your recent stay with us. It is great hearing that our clean and spacious guest room with the balcony worked perfectly for your visit. We are glad to hear you enjoyed our hotel's location and the close proximity to the Anaheim Convention Center Entrance and Restaurants. We thank you for all of your kind comments about our Hotel staff.  We look forward to you returning to the Anaheim Portofino Inn & Suites when your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim area.  Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: The hotel was very nice, stayed in kids suite which was great with grandchildren. The staff was very pleasant, and went above and beyond to make our stay pleasant. Very impressed that they let us check in early at 10:00AM Easy walk to  Disney resort entrance.
Manager Response: Dear Craig D:  Thank you so much for taking the time to share your experience with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. We are glad to hear you enjoyed the Family Kids Suite with the Bunk-beds, mini-fridge, and microwave worked out great for the family. We are glad to hear you enjoyed our hotel's close proximity and short and easy walk to the Disneyland Main Entrance.  We look forward to you returning to the Anaheim Portofino Inn & Suites when your travel plans bring you back to the Disneyland Resort.  Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: Had a reservation for two nights.  On the day off our reservation I received an email saying our reservation had been cancelled. No explanation. I wrote the GM to complain. Not hearing back right away I spent the next couple of hours scrambling for a hotel room.  After a couple of hours I landed a room for a little more money.   I heard back from the Portofino that the reservation was cancelled in error and that it shouldn't have happened.   My only beef is I wasn't offered any compensation.  I was subjected to one of the traveler's nightmares and I would have appreciated all the explanation and apologies if they had been backed up by restitution.  Having your reservations canceled on travel day REALLY sucks.
Manager Response: Dear Charles Z:  Let me begin by saying we are sorry that you chose to stay at another hotel due to a pre-paid reservation obligation. We were truly eagerly awaiting your arrival and even had the guest room mini-fridge set to cold just like we discussed a couple days prior to your arrival date.  We hope that you will consider staying with us the next time your travel plans bring you to the Anaheim area so that we can have a chance to provide you superior service.  Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary Heading: For the cost it's not worth it
Summary: There are no extra's.the room was not clean needed some updating. Hump in the floor kept tripping over. They never made the room up the first day.had to call for service. Hair in the drain of the shower and bathroom floor . Electric outlet covers were loose and hanging.  The hairdryer did not work. Did not leave us enough towels daily. Travel mugs removed from room and never returned but left the napkin it was sitting on.
Manager Response: Dear califsewn:  Thank you for taking the time to share your comments with us. Your satisfaction is important to us and we will be using the feedback you provided to make improvements to ensure we offer an exceptional experience for our guests in the future. I apologize if we missed your room the first day. We generally clean all guest rooms unless they have the Do Not Disturb sign on the door at time we go to clean the room. We do have daily Housekeeping available from 8am-10pm. WE are not aware of any "humps" in the guest room but we will continue to look for any un-level areas during our daily room inspections. We hope that you will consider staying with us again so that we can have another chance to provide you superior service.  Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: The hotel staff were all very friendly and helpful. Clean lobby and pool. We stayed in a kids suite for 5 nights which was fantastic for a family of four but the room was slightly outdated and in need of some TLC. However for the price and distance from Disneyland we would definitely stay there again!
Manager Response: Dear Trip Advisor Member:  We are thrilled to hear from another guest who had another terrific stay at the lovely Anaheim Portofino Inn & Suites Hotel. We thank you for all of your kind comments about our staff and the great service that they provided you. It's great to hear your family enjoyed the Kids Suite with the Bunk-beds. We recently updated our Lobby, Guest Laundry room, Fitness room, and Business Center. In 2015, We will be updating some of the furniture in our suites.  We look forward to seeing you again, and hope that it will be very soon.   Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: Hotel location was great, Staff was very accommodating and were able to correct an error that I made booking my room. The manager worked with me and upgraded my room so I would not have to change rooms between nights. (my booking error not theirs). Parking was the only hard part but they are building a new parking area and when it is done that will solve the issue. Great overall stay...
Manager Response: Dear 5hamptons:  Thank you so very much for your feedback on your recent stay with us. We love hearing that our clean and spacious guest room worked perfectly for your visit. Thank you for the compliments about our staff and their commitment to providing excellent guest service. It is great hearing that we were able to assist you with your reservation needs.   We look forward to you returning to the Anaheim Portofino Inn & Suites when your travel plans bring you back to the Disneyland Resort.  Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: The room was comfortable for me and the kids.  The location to restaurants and Disneyland was excellent.  The room was comfortable for me and the kids.  The location to restaurants and Disneyland was excellent.The room was comfortable for me and the kids.  The location to restaurants and Disneyland was excellent.
Manager Response: Dear Renee G:  Thank you so much for taking the time to share your feedback. We are glad to hear that our clean, quiet guest rooms and our comfy beds gave you a relaxing stay during your visit. It is great hearing that our close proximity to restaurants and the Main gate Disneyland entrance matched your needs. We look forward to seeing you the next time you visit the Anaheim area.  Sincerely,	 Dan Kramer

Summary: The Portofino Inn and Suites is just a little tired. The wallpaper is tired. The towels are tired and the water coming out of the shower is simply exhausted. But the public areas are nice, staff is friendly, and the Portofino is within walking distance of Disney. (Actually, it's a fairly pleasant walk of just over a half mile along Harbor Blvd.) Parking is scarce, but the hotel has a deal with the Sheraton next door. Upon leaving, the Sheraton's parking machine will ask you for $20/day but with a card you pick up (daily) at the Portofino desk, it's free. For the room, we paid $65/night plus tax through Booking.com.
Manager Response: Dear Glennn999:   Thank you for taking the time to share your comments with us. We have just completed painting our Exterior Towers. We just updated our Lobby, Business Center, Fitness Room, Guest Laundry Room, and Game room. We are currently starting to do some updates in our guest rooms including installing a mini-fridge in every room as well as adding new lamps that will have multiple outlets and usb ports to charge tablets and smart phones. We hope that you will consider staying with us again so that we can have another chance to provide you superior service.  Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: The kids suite is very comfortable, the kids have their space and my kids loved the bunker bed, and the parents get privacy too!  It has fridge and microwave for any late snack. The bed is really comfortable. The location is excellent, everything is walkable. The person at the front desk is very kind and helpful. We definitely stay again when we come back.
Manager Response: Dear Jazg5:  We are thrilled to hear from another guest who enjoyed their "comfortable" stay at the lovely Anaheim Portofino Inn & Suites Hotel. We thank you for all of your kind comments about our staff and the great service that they provided you. We are glad to hear that our clean and spacious Kids Suite with the Bunk-beds worked perfectly for your visit. We look forward to you returning to the Anaheim Portofino Inn & Suites when your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim & Disneyland Resort area.  Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: This hotel is great for the price.  We had the kids suite with bunk beds for the kids.  They had their own room and TV, and they loved it!  We walked to and from Disneyland and California Adventure both days that we were there and even with 2 kids, it was within reasonable walking distance.  Even after we checked out, we were given permission to keep our car there while we spent the day at Disneyland.  Although they do not have breakfast at the hotel, there is an IHop restaurant directly across the street and a Coffee Bean right next door.  Our room was quiet and clean.  We loved it!
Manager Response: Dear Janet L:  Thank you so much for taking the time to share your feedback.  We are glad to hear that our clean and quiet guest rooms enabled you to have a relaxing trip. We love hearing that our close proximity to the Disneyland Resorts parks, Coffee Bean, and Restaurants  met your travel needs. We look forward to seeing you the next time you are in Anaheim.   Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: We were looking for a decent hotel within walking distance of Disneyland and Portofino Inn & Suites was just that. It was nothing fancy, and not a huge hotel, but great for the value. Rooms seemed fairy up-to-date, and we enjoyed the free wi-fi. I'm not sure it was white-glove clean, as I saw a stain or two on the chairs, but nothing to creep me out. Would recommend.
Manager Response: Dear gemini8200-  Thank you so much for taking the time to share your experience with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. We are glad to hear you enjoyed our hotel and the amenities including our Wifi and our close proximity to the Disneyland Resort parks  We look forward to you returning to the Anaheim Portofino Inn & Suites when your travel plans bring you back to the Disneyland Resort area.  Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary Heading: Annual trip to Disneyland with mom!
Summary: Excellent  customer  service.  Very clean. Free WiFi and free Valet for us since parking area very  small. Very close to the theme park with the ART Shuttle service  located  in front  of CVS. I would absolutely  come back again!
Manager Response: Dear Dinorah D:  Thank you so very much for your feedback on your recent stay with us. We are glad to hear that our clean and spacious guest room worked perfectly for your visit. In regards to parking, We have currently started a parking expansion that will include a five story parking structure. During the expansion, We will have 3 areas to park that are all located near the Lobby entrance.    We are glad to hear you enjoyed our hotel's location and the close proximity to the Disneyland Main Entrance and restaurants.   We look forward to you returning to the Anaheim Portofino Inn & Suites when your travel plans bring you back to the Disneyland Resort.  Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: Decent for the price but the moment we walked in the room it smelled like sun block and chemicals and it didn't go away throughout the 4 nights we were there. Also, the water pressure in the shower was minimal. One day my boyfriend was taking a shower and the hot water completely stopped coming out. The only way to get water at all was to turn it to cold... who likes cold showers??? Also, one day we ordered pizza from across the street and brought it back to the room to eat. It was a fairly large box so I asked the employees at the front desk where a larger garbage was to throw the box away. They told us to leave it out in the hall and they would have maintenance come pick it up within the hour. We went back to the park and when we got back after a few hours, the box was was
Manager Response: Dear Kendra S: Thank you for taking the time to share your comments with us. Your satisfaction is important to us and we will be using the feedback you provided to make improvements to ensure we offer an exceptional experience for our guests in the future. Our devoted team are trained to provide a memorable experience to all of our guests and fulfill our guest needs. We are truly sorry that the pizza box was not picked up immediately during your stay. And thank you for informing us about the perfume smell in the guest room. We will continue to monitor the guest room scents so that our guests can have a nice relaxing worry free stay.   We hope that you will consider staying with us again so that we can have another chance to provide you superior service.  Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: This is our second time staying at Portofino because my kids love it.  They love the kids suite which has bunk beds.   Having the kid's suite is awesome.  The kids have their own space/room to relax and hang out and the adults have the other side of the room to relax after a long day at Disneyland.  Beds are comfortable and the hotel is very clean.  The only thing that is a bit unpleasant is the extra fees (resort fee and taxes) because that could rack up the balance.  Also, if you go during summer the pool is very small for the size of the hotel.  But, those thing won't stop us from booking here again especially when the hotel specials are running.
Manager Response: Dear 3910momma: Thank you so much for sharing your comments about your awesome stay at the Anaheim Portofino Inn & Suites Hotel. In regards to the resort fee of $9.99 per night. It does include parking for one vehicle, access to Pool/Jacuzzi, access to our fitness room, and complimentary Wifi.  It's great hearing you enjoyed our clean and spacious guest rooms including our Kids Suite  with the separate bedroom with the Bunk-beds for the kids with the mini-fridge, the coffee maker, and the microwave.  We look forward to seeing you the next time you are in the Anaheim area.  Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: Over all this property was not bad.  Rooms were kept clean but not up to date.  For the price of a King Suite and what you received was not the same.  Pool and hot tub were standard but the bathroom needed to be better maintained.
Manager Response: Dear Cara A:  Thank you for allowing us to be your host hotel for the Family Holiday. Thank you so much for taking the time to share your feedback. We are glad to hear that our clean, quiet guest rooms gave you a relaxing stay during your visit. Thank you for the suggestion about offering different pillow types.   We look forward to seeing you the next time you are in Anaheim.   Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: We booked room 3 nights four days. On arrival parking lot was full so we used valet parking which was fine but they park your car next door parking lot. When we got to our room we found a silverfish in restroom and lots of ants. I called the lobby to advise them of our findings but staff said they     (bugs) come from outside. Which i was very uncomfortable with. No one wants to take any kind of bugs home with them. I sent email to managers and i was only compensated for one night. They also claimed rooms been updated but they need a little remodeling.
Manager Response: Dear vacation68:  Thank you so much for taking the time to share your feedback. We thank you for all of your kind comments about our Hotel staff. I assure you we have a national vendor that comes on a regular basis and treats all exterior and interior portions of the hotel. We recently updated our Lobby, Guest Laundry room, Fitness room, and Business Center. We hope that you will consider staying with us again so that we can have another chance to provide you superior service.  Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: Great location, near Disney, and major highways....Parking is atrocious, but thank heavens for valet parking. Had family suite, my only negativer is that the TV cannot be seen from the bunk beds, I found that incredible...how can i say nicely, "inconvenient". Really for a kids room not to be able to see the tv from the Bunk Beds is relally silly.  The staff was always hospitable. I had an issue printing out some tixs for the Science Center (Endeavor) from the public Computer in the lobby, but the front desk jump in and assisted me with any hesitation and it was greatly appreciated. The kids liked the jacuzzi and we were there when it was the coldest evenings ever in LA. There are eateries everywhere nearby..
Manager Response: Dear BigDogAZ:  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with fellow TripAdvisor travelers.  We thank you for all of your kind comments about our staff and the great service that they provided you. Thank you for the observation about the TV placement. We are glad to hear that the Valet parking service worked perfectly for your visit. We look forward to you returning to the Anaheim Portofino Inn & Suites when your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim & Disneyland Resort area.  Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary Heading: Large suite with 2 bathrooms, 2 bedrooms & living area
Summary: I booked the 2 bedroom, 2 bathroom suite for 4 adults and 2 children.  I thought it would be two separate rooms but the King bed was behind a door whereas the 2 queen beds were behind sliding French doors.  It was fine though and we found it worked well and the adults would hang in the living room on the couch and chairs in the evening.  We walked to and from Disney with a 5 and 10 year old but did use an umbrella stroller for the 5 year old.  There's a convenience store in the building and a 7-11 convenience store and a small grocery store just past the hotel.  We did not mind the 'no breakfast' because there were plenty of options on the walk to Disney.  The room wasn't very clean  and when we slid the doors closed there was food and other garbage that had to be cleaned up.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Love the hotel, super kind staff, and very informed.  Love the proximity to stores, restaurants, and of course Disneyland!  Would gladly stay here again. The parking situation is tight, but they have accommodated everyone with valet parking. Hopefully that part is better for the hotel soon, but it's really beyond the hotels control due to some construction nearby.
Manager Response: Dear David H:   Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with fellow TripAdvisor travelers.  We thank you for all of your kind comments about our staff and the great service that they provided you.  It is nice to see that the Valet parking service worked perfectly for your visit. We are glad to hear you had a "very nice" stay at the Anaheim Portofino Inn & Suites hotel. It is great hearing the close proximity to the Disney Resort parks matched your needs.
