We look forward to you returning to the Anaheim Portofino Inn & Suites when your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim & Disneyland Resort area.  Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary Heading: Trip to Disneyland with a stay at The Portofino
Summary: This is our third time staying and it has been very good every time.  Obviously, we are down to go to Disneyland, and the Portofino is very convenient and not outrageously priced.  We did miss having the Jolly Roger close by but made due with restaurants close by.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Good service but rooms need a little updating
Summary: Upon arrival we were told that our originally room was not available, but the front desk staff kindly offered to upgrade us to a suite or find another hotel.  As it was late, we selected the suite which was spacious and clean.  It had a king size bed with pullout couch and bunk beds that were separated by a sliding door which would be great for a family with kids.  I also appreciated that there was two sinks as my roommate and I were there for business and needed the extra sink and mirror.  Location was good as there was a CVS next door to pick up anything I forgot, easy walking distance to Downtown Disney and Disneyland.  The only reason they didn't get 5 stars is because the rooms needed updating -- need new carpet and more lights and outlets.  Also, the coffee in the room was
Manager Response: none

Summary: I have a family of five. This is our second time staying at the Portofino. I was very please with the King suite my wife and I stayed. My teenage kids had thier own room which was a Deluxe with 2 queen beds and a balcony and was very nice as well. The front desk was very helpful when ever I had any questions. I was also very pleasantly surprised that they had Complementary Valet parking...a real nice bonus! The proximity to Disneyland is great...only a 10 min walk! I would highly recommend this hotel to all my friends that would be staying in Anaheim. This will continue to be my "Go To" place to stay when ever I come to Disneyland!
Manager Response: Dear WDC328:   Thank you so much for allowing us to celebrate the holidays with your family. We love hearing that our Deluxe Rooms with the balcony allowed you some time to sit and relax in between Disney park visits.  It is nice to hear you were able to take advantage of our close proximity to Disneyland and that you were able to have the convenience of just walking to the Disney Resort parks. Thank you for the compliments about our staff and their commitment to providing excellent guest service.  We look forward to seeing you the next time you visit the Anaheim Area.  Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: Website says, "New beds featuring plush bedding, sheets and duvet covers" Bottom sheet, mattress pad pop off. One day bottom sheet inside out, did they just flip the sheet? Puke! Brown stains, flip it!
Manager Response: Dear kristin h:  Thank you for taking the time to share your comments with us. Your satisfaction is important to us and we will be using the feedback you provided to make improvements to ensure we offer an exceptional experience for our guests in the future. We have recently updated our Bedding package including the new duvets. We will continue to ensure the bedding is displayed properly on the bed to allow our guests to have a relaxing worry free stay at the Anaheim Portofino Inn & Suites hotel. We hope that you will consider staying with us again so that we can have another chance to provide you superior service.  Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: Nothing special but clean and a good value for being so so close to the parks. Walk to Disney in less than 10 minutes. Parking at hotel was kind of a pain, but probably like that at most hotels in the area.
Manager Response: Dear emer7: Thank you so very much for your feedback on your recent stay with us. We are glad to hear that our clean and spacious guest room worked perfectly for your visit. In regards to parking, We have currently started a parking expansion that will include a five story parking structure. During the expansion, We will have 3 areas to park that are all located near the Lobby entrance.   We are glad to hear you enjoyed our hotel's location and the close proximity to the Disneyland Main Entrance.  We look forward to you returning to the Anaheim Portofino Inn & Suites when your travel plans bring you back to the Disneyland Resort. Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: We only stayed one night at the hotel and we spent the day at Disneyland. The staff were very nice and helpful. We were accommodated an early check in which was nice. The valet service was prompt, and the front desk were attentive and the room was clean and comfortable. Thank you, we will be back :)
Manager Response: Dear Christina C:  We are thrilled to hear from another guest who enjoyed their stay at the lovely Anaheim Portofino Inn & Suites Hotel. We thank you for all of your kind comments about our staff and the great service that they provided you including the early check in request.  We are glad to hear that the Valet parking service worked perfectly for your visit.  We look forward to you returning to the Anaheim Portofino Inn & Suites when your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim & Disneyland Resort area.  Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: Great Disneyland location. Close walk to Downtown Disney and Disneyland! Walk to restaurants and attractions! Clean and quite with free parking. They sell Disney Tickets too, single and multiple day tickets and park hopper passes. No line!
Manager Response: Dear Bergnyc2:   We are glad to hear you had a nice, quiet, and relaxing stay at the Anaheim Portofino Inn & Suites hotel. It is nice to hear you were able to take advantage of our close proximity to Disneyland and the local restaurants during your stay. It is great hearing that purchasing your Disneyland tickets at our hotel allowed you more time in the parks instead of waiting in line to buy them at the park.  We look forward to seeing you the next time you are in Anaheim.  Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary Heading: It's quiet, clean and close to Disneyland
Summary: We had a great stay..... It's safe, clean and quiet! Not to mention its across the street from IHOP. Stayed here before and will continue to stay when we come to Disneyland in the future. The staff is friendly and the free valet parking is handy cus the parking filled up quickly.
Manager Response: Dear Nessag711:  Thank you for being a loyal and repeat guest and for taking the time to share your experience with fellow TripAdvisor travelers.  We thank you for all of your kind comments about our staff and the friendly service that they provided you. We are glad to hear that the Valet parking service worked perfectly for your visit.  We look forward to you returning to the Anaheim Portofino Inn & Suites when your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim & Disneyland Resort area.  Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: This hotel was simple and convenient. The price was good as so was the location.  The down side, there was no hotel parking on the premises so we had to go next door. They were completely full, so it was a bit of an inconvenience. Especially since we could not see our vehicle from the room.
Manager Response: Dear  5rods :  Thank you so much for taking the time to share your feedback. We are glad to hear that our clean, quiet guest rooms and our convenient location gave you a relaxing stay during your visit.  We are currently expanding our parking lot and We hope that you will consider staying with us again so that we can have another chance to provide you superior service.  Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: The room was ok. I had reserved a suite with two bathrooms but ended up with only one bathroom for six peopke. Luckily it was for one night. The room with the king bed had a funky smell, other than that location and price was ideal. Would stay again.
Manager Response: Dear Rmte:  Thank you so very much for your feedback on your recent stay with us. We are glad to hear that our clean and spacious guest room worked perfectly for your visit. We apologize that the  Two Room Suite only had one bathroom. We are glad to hear you enjoyed our hotel's location and the close proximity to the Disneyland Main Entrance and local restaurants.  We look forward to seeing you the next time you visit the Anaheim Area.  Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: We had a very good stay at the portofino. We were walking distance to the park. One night we took the car out to go to dinner and when we came back their was no parking. The front desk told us to park our car at the hotel next door which was ok but we had to park far away. So the hotel needs more parking. The room was clean.
Manager Response: Dear Michele K:  Thank you so very much for your feedback on your recent stay with us. We are glad to hear that our clean and spacious guest room worked perfectly for your visit. In regards to parking, We have currently started a parking expansion that will include a five story parking structure. During the expansion, We will have 3 areas to park that are all located near the Lobby entrance.   We are glad to hear you enjoyed our hotel's location and the close proximity to the Disneyland Main Entrance and restaurants.  We look forward to you returning to the Anaheim Portofino Inn & Suites when your travel plans bring you back to the Disneyland Resort.  Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: We love staying at the kids suite, the bunk beds and sofa bed are perfect for our 3 kids. The king bed is very comfortable. In the kids suite, the fridge keeps everything cool.  The only compliant is the hotel needs a refurb in furniture. With all the new hotels around the area, and update is necessary. They painted the outside of the hotel, looks beautiful. It an easy walk to Disneyland, and the ART is the first stop off from Disneyland. The route changed from 3 to 1. Its nice to have CVS close by, the portofino has a small shop with drinks , snack and more, however, the lady made sure, we were aware, the store closed at 10pm. It was only 945pm, so we took our business elsewhere, to CVS. Over all, a good experience,.
Manager Response: Dear carolyn p:  Thank you for being a loyal and repeat guest and for taking the time to share your experience with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. We are glad to hear you enjoyed our spacious room and our comfortable beds. Thank you for the kind words about the new update of the exterior of the hotel. We just completed updating our fitness room, game room, guest laundry room, and our lobby to help make your stay more enjoyable. We look forward to seeing you the next time you are in Anaheim.  Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: We stayed in the regular rooms. Very nice bedding, very comfortable. The room was large and airy. The front desk staff was very nice and helpful. Will definitely stay again. I got a great deal on an eWEB price!
Manager Response: Dear Lisa19701:  We are thrilled to hear from another guest who enjoyed their stay at the lovely Anaheim Portofino Inn & Suites Hotel. We thank you for all of your kind comments about our staff and the great service that they provided you. We are glad to hear that our clean and spacious guest room worked perfectly for your visit. We look forward to you returning to the Anaheim Portofino Inn & Suites when your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim area.  Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: We were looking for a suite (online) at an affordable price with close proximity to the resort at the last minute and stumbled upon the Portofino.  Since many of the other choices were sold out, we booked immediately and were not disappointed with the property.  The suite was ~ $200/night out the door on a high traffic weekend, a fifteen minute walk from the farthest edge of Downtown Disney, and clean with free wifi.  Our only issue is that the late night delivery restaurant that the hotel pimped via the table tent in the room never showed up.  But that is out of their control so no complaints about the Portofino.
Manager Response: Dear that_guy_is_taken:   We are thrilled to hear from another guest who had a pleasant stay at the Anaheim Portofino Inn & Suites Hotel. We are glad to hear that our close proximity to restaurants and the Main gate Disneyland entrance matched your needs. We will share your observation with the pizza delivery restaurant and ensure they show up when promised. We look forward to you returning to the Anaheim Portofino Inn & Suites when your travel plans bring you back to the Disneyland Resort area.  Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary Heading: Cheap Disneyland Hotel-You get what you pay
Summary: Friendly staff, clean lobby. But, our room was rundown, old, and very dirty. There was graffiti on the bunk beds -names etched in on the wood frame. When we got to the room the sheets on the kids bed had blood on them and the main bed had a bunch of hair on the sheets. Later that night, I discovered more blood on a pillow which had a clean slipcase. My child was running around barefoot and after, her feet were dark from all the dirt on the rug. At checkout, we noticed an empty mini alcohol bottle behind couch left behind by a previous guest. (Good thing the kids didn't find it.) There is construction going one nearby and right at 8am the earth shook with the drilling they were doing. Thankfully, they were done at night. We needed a room just to clean up and sleep, didn't spend
Manager Response: Dear DisneyMom247: Thank you for taking the time to share your comments with us. Your satisfaction is important to us and we will be using the feedback you provided to make improvements to ensure we offer an exceptional experience for our guests in the future. We are glad to hear the spacious rooms worked out well for your party. We have shared your observations with the team. Although, We were unable to find any issues with any of the linen we will continue to monitor the linen. In regards to the painting, we have completed and finished painting the hotel. The company that painted the building used several precautionary measures to ensure any car near the hotel was fully covered and they did not paint during any inclement weather. We hope that you will consider staying with us again so that we can have another chance to provide you superior service.  Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: I'm not sure why the last reviewer said it was dated or complained about the cleanliness.  Our room we very clean when we arrived and throughout our stay.  The finishes and furniture are simple but modern.   We stayed for 4 nights during our Disneyland visit.  We have been doing a 3-week road trip with our twin 4-year-old boys and have stayed at a lot of hotels lately.  We were quite pleased with this one.   Parking is included in your stay and we didn't find any trouble finding a spot.   The hotel is very walkable to Disneyland.   There are cheap eats within a block (not the best food but certainly cheaper than in the park). There is a CVS Pharmacy 2 doors down that has a selection of groceries.  We were able to get cereal and milk and some snacks.   Our room was clean, the
Manager Response: Dear mbungay:  Thank you so much for taking the time to share your feedback.  We are glad to hear that our clean and quiet guest rooms enabled you to have a relaxing trip. We love hearing that our close proximity to the Disneyland Resorts parks, our Gift Shop, and CVS met your travel needs. In the very near future, we will be installing Mini-Fridges in all of our guest rooms. So on your next visit, you won't need an additional cooler. We thank you for all of your kind comments about our Hotel staff and the great service that they provided you. We look forward to seeing you the next time you are in Anaheim.   Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary Heading: A good value, but dated and needs to improve cleanliness standards
Summary: The great news, it is close to disneyland and reasonably priced.  Bad news, parking is congested (but should improve in late 2015), our room was moldy smelling (I am allergic to mold and would see my allergy symptoms flare every time we slept in the room) and my family who were in another room had to ask that their room be cleaned before they were in it.  We will pass on this property next time we are at Disney.
Manager Response: Dear phxmars: Thank you for taking the time to share your comments with us. Your satisfaction is important to us and we will be using the feedback you provided to make improvements to ensure we offer an exceptional experience for our guests in the future. The hotel has not experience any moisture issues but we will continue to monitor all guest rooms. In regards to parking, We have currently started a parking expansion that will include a five story parking structure. During the expansion, We will do have 3 areas to park that are all located adjacent the Lobby entrance.   We hope that you will consider staying with us again so that we can have another chance to provide you superior service. Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: We had excellent service from beginning to end. This is a hotel is great for a family. We faced days of rain and we were thankful for the laundry facilities. Close enough to walk to Disney with a stroller and 7 year old. Great coffee shop on the corner and the Garden Walk restaurants nearby for great dining choices. Cvs pharmacy right downstairs for water and snacks. It was obvious to us that this hotel is working on improving it's facilities for everyone to enjoy. Our bathroom had a bit of a moisture problem, evident in the paint peeling on the ceiling. The beds were comfortable and we loved being able to close the doors while the kids were asleep.
Manager Response: Dear CathyRMT:  We are thrilled to hear from another guest who had a pleasant stay at the Anaheim Portofino Inn & Suites Hotel. We are glad to hear that our close proximity to restaurants and the Main gate Disneyland entrance matched your needs. It's great knowing that the recently updated  fitness room, game room, and guest laundry room helped make your stay more enjoyable.   We look forward to seeing you the next time you visit the Anaheim area.  Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: Great set up, kids loved the bunk beds.  Only issue was that the sofa bed wasn't very comfortable.  Easy walk to Disneyland Parks or Downtown Disney.  Overall a great vacation.  Definitely going back again.  Hopefully next time the parking structure will be completed.
Manager Response: Dear Stephanie W: Thank you so very much for your feedback on your recent stay with us. We love hearing that you had a great stay and that our spacious Family Suite with the bunk beds worked great for the family. We have shared your observation and suggestions with all Dept. in regards to the sofa bed. It is nice to hear you were able to take advantage of our close proximity to Downtown Disney and the Disneyland Resort parks.  We look forward to seeing you the next time you visit the Anaheim Area. Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: Very clean and comfortable rooms.  Hotel staff provided excellent service and were very friendly, professional and helpful.  Staff was very accommodating.  Great value for the money. Excellent location close to Disneyland within walking distance.  If you prefer shuttle Anaheim shuttle service nearby.
Manager Response: Dear Carol W:  Thank you so very much for your feedback on your recent stay with us. We love hearing that our clean and spacious guest room worked perfectly for your visit. Thank you for the compliments about our accommodating staff and their commitment to providing excellent guest service. We are glad to hear you enjoyed our hotel's location and the close proximity to the Disneyland Main Entrance.  We look forward to you returning to the Anaheim Portofino Inn & Suites when your travel plans bring you back to the Disneyland Resort.  Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: We planned a 1 day stay in Disneyland but on site hotels were fully booked, also they recommended Porto Fino. He is closed to the Resort (10 minutes walking), motel style with parking for guests.  If you arrive by train, take octa bus 50 on Katella for 2 dollars.  Rooms are very spacious, free wifi available and necessarily equipped. Tickets available at reception but they sell Park Hopper (Disneyland Park and Disney California Adventure Park). If you just want one of them, need to be purchased at the Resort.  Coffee shops and dining available on Katella street.
Manager Response: Dear Traveller02062010:  Thank you so very much for your feedback on your recent stay with us. We are glad to hear that our clean and spacious guest room worked perfectly for your visit. We are glad to hear you enjoyed our hotel's location and the close proximity to the Disneyland Main Entrance and restaurants.   We look forward to you returning to the Anaheim Portofino Inn & Suites when your travel plans bring you back to the Disneyland Resort.  Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: My family and I arrived on a Friday. Parking was all full as it turns out there is extremely limited parking. We were asked to park at the adjacent hotel and walk back. It was a fair distance. More of an inconvenience. We stayed in a kids suite which was fair in size. The room was dirty. The bunk beds were old, and dirty. The mattreSes on the bunks were paper thin and had stains on them. Below the matress was a lot of dus, hair, etc. The bathroom tub was old and lookedike it had not been cleaned but rather wiped out. I cleaned it before allowing my family to use it. The bathtub clogged up everyday. My coffee maker was missing the basket. A plus is there is a coffee bean store right around the corner. The noise level however was very contained. You could hear people in the halls
Manager Response: Dear Tia5150- Thank you for taking the time to share your comments with us. Your satisfaction is important to us and we will be using the feedback you provided to make improvements to ensure we offer an exceptional experience for our guests in the future. We are sorry to hear we did not meet your hotel needs. We have a devoted team are trained to provide a memorable experience to all of our guests. We use Ecolab cleaning products which is industries leading manufacturer. We will continue to monitor and ensure our hotel provides our guests with a relaxing and care free stay. We have recently upgraded our TV Service provider with an expanded HD line-up. We just updated our Lobby, Guest Laundry, and Fitness room. We are glad to hear that you enjoyed our proximity to the Disneyland Resort.  We hope that you will consider staying with us again so that we can have another chance to provide you superior service.  Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary Heading: Convenient for what we needed it for.
Summary: The room we stayed in (kid's suite) was fine.  The bathroom shower curtain was made of cloth, and the water therefore, didn't stay in the tub, it got all over the place, and caused the siding to be completely rusted.  If I was to scratch my foot on it, I would need to go to the hospital for sure.  The parking lot was very small, and valet was complimentary, which was nice.  On one evening, the valet didn't write our car number in the tag, so the valet the next morning had to run all over the place trying to locate our car.  On the last morning, there was no valet at all, and no one to tell us where our car was parked.  We were given no future notice, and had to run all over the place to find our own car between different hotel lots in the surrounding area.  Also, when we
Manager Response: Dear apandabearcub: Thank you so very much for your feedback on your recent stay with us. We love hearing that our clean and spacious Kids Suite worked perfectly for your visit. Thank you for sharing your observations in regards to the shower curtain. Although our shower curtains are cloth, each shower curtain has a separate curtain liner attached to it, This enables the floor and the  surrounding area to remain dry.  We hope that you will consider staying with us again so that we can have another chance to provide you superior service. Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary Heading: Great location for Disney and very reasonable.
Summary: We stayed in a kids suite in November, there were 4 adults and a baby.  The room was very large and is deprecated by a sliding door.  The pull our sofa was comfortable for an adult, however the mattresses on the bunks were not comfortable.  The room was clean and there was a fridge/freezer and a microwave which was ideal for traveling with a baby.
Manager Response: Dear Sian J: Thank you so much for taking the time to share your experience with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. We are glad to hear you enjoyed the Family Kids Suite with the Bunk-beds. It is great to hear that our suite with the mini-fridge and microwave were ideal for the baby.    We look forward to you returning to the Anaheim Portofino Inn & Suites when your travel plans bring you back to the Disneyland Resort area.  Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: My husband and I went to meet other family members for a multi-day visit to Disneyland/California Adventure.  This was a very pleasant hotel for our visit. Our plane arrived late but the hotel was very accommodating to our late arrival.  The clerk at the front desk, Henry was very pleasant to work with.  When I let him know our daughter was also staying at the hotel and had not yet arrived he arranged for our rooms to be located next door to each other.  As we only get to see the grandkids a couple of times a year we were very pleased with this thoughtful arrangement.   The only downside is lack of airport shuttles and parking for those guests who drive or utilize a rental car.  Additional parking is available at a nearby hotel though its not as convenient as onsite parking.  A
Manager Response: Dear Lorraine S:  We are glad to hear you had a relaxing stay at the Anaheim Portofino Inn & Suites hotel. It is nice to hear you were able to enjoy our hotel's great location and spacious guest room.  In regards to Airport Shuttle service, We do prefer utilizing the "well known natl. companies" like Super Shuttle because they have been very consistent in their arrivals and departures to ensure our guests have a worry free stay with us. Thank you for the compliments about our staff (Henry) and their commitment to providing excellent guest service.  We look forward to seeing you the next time you are in Anaheim.   Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: We spent 6 nights at the Portofino for a Disneyland Trip with our Grand Kids, and Kids.   The rooms were clean and the bed was comfortable, and the property was very quiet!   We actually had 2 rooms.  1 room had a bedroom for the kids.   When we checked in we wanted our room as close as possible, and in the same building as our kids and grandkids.   Even though the property was full, the front desk stafff was very accomadating and made it happen.  I would stay again in a heart beat.  It's less than half a mile from the turnstyles at Disney.
Manager Response: Dear Gordon S:  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us. We are glad to hear that you enjoyed the short walk from our hotel to the Disneyland Maingate entrance. It's great hearing you enjoyed our clean and spacious guest rooms including our Kids Suite  with the separate bedroom for the kids and the mini-fridge, the coffee maker, and the microwave. We are very grateful that you allowed us to be your host hotel during your families visit to the Anaheim area.   We hope that you will consider staying with us again so that we can have another chance to provide you with a superior experience.   Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary Heading: The Room was nice and big
Summary: First lets start by saying the room was nice, big, clean, and updated. Check in was smooth, staff was nice and helpful. This is close to the parks and the convention center. We spent 5 nights there was a hidden "Resort" fee that was not disclosed at time of booking so be forewarned that they will tack on a $12 a day fee. There is some construction close by and it started at 6am with the hammering and what ever other noise there is, so If your a light sleeper like me you might want some ear plugs. The room deserved a higher ranking then 3 but the noise and hidden fees knocked it down a few I would rank it 2.5 if I could.
Manager Response: Dear chefaleslie:  Thank you so much for your positive comments about your stay at the Anaheim Portofino Inn & Suites Hotel. We apologize for any inconvenience or miscommunication in regards to our resort fee of $9.99 per night. It includes parking for one vehicle, access to Pool/Jacuzzi, access to our fitness room, and complimentary Wifi. We do list it on every reservation confirmation as follows: Occupancy Fees: There is a 17 percent occupancy tax and a $9.99 resort fee per room per night (not included in room rate). We are always pleased to hear that our associates were extremely friendly and helpful during your stay.  We look forward to seeing you the next time you are in the Anaheim area.  Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: This was our second stay at this location in the family suite that sleeps 6, and it is a perfect fit for our extended family!  Having a fridge and microwave makes having breakfast in the room so convenient.  Being so close to Disneyland makes this the "best on the block".   My only complaint is that we were not informed that only one car would be allowed on the premises and the second car would have to be parked at the Sheraton @ $16/day. We should have been told before our arrival.
Manager Response: Dear MaryannRDH:   Thank you so very much for your feedback on your recent stay at the Portofino Inn & Suites hotel (aka Hidden Gem hotel). We love hearing that our spacious Family Suite with the bunk beds worked great for the family. I apologize for any inconvenience for the one vehicle per room guideline. Thank you for the suggestion about elaborating on our website that an additional vehicle may be parked at our overflow lot for an additional cost per night. It is great to hear you were able to take advantage of our close proximity to the Disneyland Resort parks.  We look forward to seeing you and your family the next time you are in Anaheim.  Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: We spent 4 nights at Porto fino for our Disneyland vacation and our stay was mostly satisfactory. Our room was spotless and the bed was very comfortable. We enjoyed the balcony but not the heavy smoker next door. Everything in the room worked well and the TV had lots of channels to choose from if we were not so tired from spending all day in the park. The small pool and hot tub looked inviting but it was a little to chilly to take a dip. The front desk employees were extremely helpful. As a member of our party is handicapped we needed to drive to parking and we were delighted to find Disney ' s Toy Story parking lot with shuttle bus around the corner from the hotel. The only downside we found was the lack of parking because a garage is under construction. One night we were given
Manager Response: Dear linsully-  We are thrilled to hear from another "Satisfied" guest who enjoyed their stay at the lovely Anaheim Portofino Inn & Suites Hotel. We are glad to hear you enjoyed the close proximity of the hotel to both the Disneyland Main Entrance as well as the Toy Story Parking Lot and shuttles.  Thank you for sharing your observation in regards to the guest room fridge. We will be adding a mini-fridge to every guest room by January 2015 to better enhance our guest experience.   We look forward to seeing you during your next visit to Anaheim.  Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: The motel and room were nice enough and the staff as well but how can they book more rooms than they have parking for?  We ended up parking in another motel parking lot and it was 99% full, we were lucky to have gotten a spot there, then had to haul all our luggage from there.  Just strange they don't have the parking to accommodate the patrons.  Our room was ground level and we heard every sound from the outside.
Manager Response: Dear Brent T: Thank you so very much for your feedback on your recent stay with us. We are glad to hear that you enjoyed our spacious guest room. In November 2014, we just changed to a new TV Service provider and we just expanded our HD line-up. We just updated our Lobby, Guest Laundry, and Fitness room.  To enhance our guest service and experience, we have currently started a parking expansion that will include a five story parking structure. During the expansion, We will have 3 areas to park that are all located near the Lobby entrance.   We look forward to seeing you the next time you are in Anaheim area, so that we can have another chance to provide you superior service.  Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: Stayed for 1 night in a 2-bedroom suite.  Rooms were nice, but upon waking at activity outside the hotel, we all agreed that the walls & windows were quite thin.  We were also awoken by cleaning staff simply walking down the hallways.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This is the second time we have stayed at Portofino Inn& Suites when going to Disney land with our family. There staff is always friendly , polite,  professional and helpful.   We came in Early Friday and they let us check in early because they had our room available.  I was extremely grateful .  Our room was  clean and in excellent condition. the only thing I wish they provided was a continental breakfast, other than that this is the prefect hotel for a family.  Also the location is great , it is only a few blocks from the Disney land entrance.  We had a great time and I would recommend this hotel to anyone staying in the area.  Thanks :)
Manager Response: Dear TishaOrd :  Thank you so very much for your feedback on your recent stay with us. We love hearing that our clean and spacious guest room worked perfectly for your visit. Thank you for the compliments about our staff and their commitment to providing excellent guest service. For Breakfast options, we do have Molly's cafe across from our lobby that specializes in breakfast and we do have IHOP directly across the street.   We are glad to hear you enjoyed our hotel's location and the close proximity to the Disneyland Main Entrance.   We look forward to you returning to the Anaheim Portofino Inn & Suites when your travel plans bring you back to the Disneyland Resort.  Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary Heading: Pleasant place to spend a few nights
Summary: My parents and I shared a suite at this hotel for a week in September. The suite was great for a little privacy, and the sofa bed was comfortable enough. We all thought the room looked very nice and was clean and comfortable.  The fridge and microwave allowed us to save some money on meals. We picked up some cereal and milk at the 7-Eleven across the road which we ate on mornings we didn't have any breakfast plans at Disneyland. The staff were great and very helpful, although they did book a shuttle for 4am for my parents instead of 4pm!  The pool area was pleasant, but got hot during the day. It would be nicer with a bit more shade available. There was only one working washing machine in the laundry. We were lucky enough that it was always available when we wanted it, but it
Manager Response: Dear zanzibar138:  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us. We are glad to hear that you enjoyed the short walk from our hotel to the Disneyland Maingate entrance. It's great hearing you enjoyed our clean and spacious Suite with the separate bedroom, the mini-fridge, the coffee maker, and the microwave. We love hearing that our close proximity to restaurants, 7-11, and retail stores met your needs.   We look forward to you returning to the Anaheim Portofino Inn & Suites when your travel plans bring you back to the Disneyland Resort.  Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: I stayed here with 3 friends for 4 nights at the end of a big trip across the USA. We booked a 2 bedroom apartment which gave us plenty of room to spread out and have our own space. Having 3 tv's in the apartment was an extra bonus! Rooms were clean and well appointed with a microwave and mini fridge which was great for keeping drinks in.  It is a walk away from Disneyland and there are plenty of restaurants around. Breakfast wasn't available, however there is an Ihop directly across the road.  Staff were friendly and very helpful. We had an issue with a blocked toilet and maintenance was quick to respond and fix it.  I would definitely recommend this property to families and groups who are visiting Anaheim!
Manager Response: Dear t_la1982:  We are thrilled to hear from another guest who loved their stay at the Anaheim Portofino Inn & Suites Hotel. We are glad to hear that you enjoyed our spacious Two Bedroom suite and our close proximity to restaurants and the Main-gate Disneyland entrance. We look forward to providing you with another "Great" stay when you travel back to Anaheim and the Disneyland Parks.  Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: My family of 5 (2 adults, kids ages 7, 4 & 2) visit the Disney Resort yearly. We recently stayed at the Portofino Inn for 6 nights in the family suite (king bed plus bunk). Hotel was clean, front desk friendly, room was great-- the kids loved their bunk bed and we loved being able to close the parting doors to have our own space. Housekeeping was ok- we walked past them a few times during our stay and I found it very strange that not one of them greeted or even acknowledged us. One day they totally forgot to give us towels.  Mini fridge and microwave were very helpful especially for our kids with severe food allergies. We swam our first day, the pool was small but it wasn't a big deal. We visited the Disney Parks for 3 days and walked back and forth. It was quite the walk to be
Manager Response: Dear FrannieQ:  Thank you so very much for your feedback on your recent stay with us. We love hearing that our clean and spacious Kids Suite worked perfectly for your visit. Thank you for sharing your suggestions in regards to the housekeeping team being more interactive. We have shared that with the team.  We are glad to hear you enjoyed our hotel's location and the close proximity to the Disneyland Main Entrance as well as the availability and convenience our ART Shuttle pick up and drop off service. We hope that you will consider staying with us again so that we can have another chance to provide you superior service.  Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: We stayed for 6 nights and eating out 3 meals a day for 5 people can get expensive. We were really counting on at least a Continental breakfast, come to find out there was nothing. Other then that part the hotel was very accommodating. Close to lots of restaurants and about 10 minute walk to DL. Would stay again.
Manager Response: Dear queenc31-  We are thrilled to hear from another guest who had a pleasant stay at the Anaheim Portofino Inn & Suites Hotel. Although we do not serve breakfast at the hotel, we do have Molly's cafe across from our lobby that specializes in breakfast and we do have IHOP directly across the street.  We are glad to hear that our close proximity to restaurants and the Main gate Disneyland entrance matched your needs.   We look forward to seeing you the next time you and your family visit the Disneyland Resort.  Sincerely,  Dan Kramer

Summary: The lobby is nice but the room was not so nice. I got really itchy with the blankets and my TV was slow and low. The location is nice but I just don't see myself staying here again. I hear the kids suites are very nice though.
Manager Response: Dear melisssadee-  Thank you so very much for your feedback on your recent stay with us. Your satisfaction is important to us and we will be using the feedback you provided to make improvements to ensure we offer an exceptional experience for our guests in the future. During the week of  October 27, 2014 we just changed to a new TV Service provider and we just expanded our HD line-up. We just updated our Lobby, Guest Laundry, and Fitness room.   We hope that you will consider staying with us again so that we can have another chance to provide you superior service.  Sincerely, Dan Kramer General Manager

Summary Heading: Great place to stay w/o paying excessive room rates!
Summary: Clean & well maintained rooms & facility. Friendly staff, prime location reasonable rates. This will be our home away from home when visiting L.A and the surrounding area. Great neighborhood too! Walking distance from Downtown Disney.
Manager Response: Dear Damaris Catalin... S:  We are thrilled to hear from another guest who had a great stay at the lovely Anaheim Portofino Inn & Suites Hotel. We thank you for all of your kind comments about our staff and the great service that they provided you. We are glad to hear that our close proximity to restaurants and Main gate Disneyland matched your needs. We look forward to being your "home" away from home the next time you visit the Anaheim area.  Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: Great location across the street from Disneyland. Good size 2 room suite, great for the price; not a 5 star hotel, yet worth every dollar. Stayed here 15 years ago, property is a little better than back then, good to see a great priced hotel actually improve over time. Will stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Sojourn65-  Thank you for being a loyal and repeat guest and for taking the time to share your experience with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. We are glad to hear you enjoyed our clean and spacious   Two-Room Suite. It is nice to hear you were able to take advantage of our close proximity to Disneyland. We look forward to seeing you the next time you are in Anaheim.   Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: The kids loved the bunk beds and separate suite. The parking lot was very small but the front desk gave us a voucher to park at a neighboring hotel which was nice. We all enjoyed our stay and would come back again.
Manager Response: Dear ajp9876:   Thank you so very much for your feedback on your recent stay with us. We love hearing that our Family Suite with the bunk beds worked perfectly for the kids. In regards to parking, We have currently started a parking expansion that will include a five story parking structure. During the expansion, We will have 3 areas to park that are all located near the Lobby entrance.   We look forward to seeing you again, and hope that it will be very soon.   Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: Our return visit lived up to our memory if our first visit three years ago. We were pleased with our bright airy room. The kids loved being back in the kids suite and we took advantage of the pool and spa this time. We will be back!
Manager Response: Dear Pippips-  Thank you for being a loyal and repeat guest and for taking the time to share your experience with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. We are glad to hear the family enjoyed the bright and airy Kids Suite with the Bunk-beds and the pool. We look forward to seeing you and your family the next time you are in Anaheim.  Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: We chose this hotel mainly for the fact that it was walking distance to Disneyland and they offer a kids suite so everyone can have their own bed. There was a peculiar smell to the room and the walls are extremely thin and we could hear everything from the neighboring rooms as well as from the rooms above. The common areas were very warm and uncomfortable but the airconditioner in the rooms worked well.
Manager Response: Dear trcrotelli-   Thank you so very much for your feedback on your recent stay with us. We love hearing that our clean and spacious Kids Suite with the bunk-beds worked perfectly for your visit. We will continue to monitor the hotel's corridors to ensure they are kept at a comfortable temperature. . We are glad to hear you enjoyed our hotel's location and the close proximity to the Disneyland Main Entrance.  We look forward to you returning to the Anaheim Portofino Inn & Suites when your travel plans bring you back to the Disneyland Resort.  Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary Heading: Outstanding on every level, I'll definitely be back!
Summary: The room was just what I expected, clean, roomy, very comfortable bed. Everything was in working order, the hotel staff was very friendly and accommodating. The location is perfect, right next to CVS so we could get anything we needed, great dining choices in the area and right down the street from Disneyland! I can't wait to come back in another couple of years and I will absolutely recommend this hotel to my friends and family!
Manager Response: Dear Lisa D-  We are thrilled to hear from another guest who had an excellent stay at the Anaheim Portofino Inn & Suites Hotel. We are glad to hear that our close proximity to restaurants and the Main gate Disneyland entrance matched your needs. Thank you for the kind words about the friendliness of our staff. We look forward to seeing you the next time you visit the Anaheim area. (Hopefully sooner than a couple years from now).   Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: This is my second stay at the Portofino, and it is once again terrific. The kids suite is just the right size for my family of 6 to all fit comfortably, and it's a short walk to Disneyland but also has a shuttle stop right out front.
Manager Response: Dear Amy E-  We are thrilled to hear that you had another terrific stay at the lovely Anaheim Portofino Inn & Suites Hotel. We thank you for all of your kind comments about our staff and the great service that they provided you. It's great to hear your family enjoyed the Kids Suite with the Bunk-beds. We look forward to seeing you again, and hope that it will be very soon.   Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: Very helpful staff,  clean room and super quiet. Really close to Disneyland. Loved the King size, bed, very confortable, no road noice or night traffic.  What would be nice would be to have a restaurant on site. We were told that there was a free shuttle from hotel to Disneyland, that the Hotel had run out of vouchers and that the transportation system ART, was free to Disneyland and it would cost $5.00 to ride back to the Hotel from Disneyland. that wasn't the case, it cost both ways, when asked the bus driver said she knew nothing about that arrangement. It is walking distance to Disneyland however, if you have a family member that is missing a partial right lung and still recovering 2 blocks is a little overwhelming.
Manager Response: Dear John I :  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us about your stay at the Anaheim Portofino Inn & Suites Hotel. We thank you for all of your kind rating in regards to our Staff Guest service and our affordability. As you mentioned, the Anaheim Resort Transportation (ART) ran out of tickets for their clients. We apologize on their behalf. We were told by the agency that since there is a shortage in tickets supply for the hotels in the area that all the guests had to do was inform the drivers that they were staying at the Portofino Inn (for example) and the drivers would be made aware that the trip from the hotels to the Disney Resort would be complimentary until they replenished their supply.  We apologize on behalf of the hotel(s) and ART that some of information from the Transportation Dept. did not reach all parties.    We hope that you will consider staying with us again so that we can have another chance to provide you superior service.  Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: Overall a great place to stay. Housekeeping did an excellent job, desk staff was great to work with. The only drawbacks were having the microwave and refrigerator in the "kids" room, towels not restocked regularly at the pool, and the laundry facility was closed for renovation during our vacation.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Staying at Portofino Inn & Suites Anaheim Hotel
Summary: WE stayed in a suite and it was lovely.  We have 4 kids and it was great to be in a suite with french doors that we could close when the kids went to bed.  We had access to a microwave and bar fridge and its about a 10 minute walk to Disneyland.  My only complaint was the parking; there wasn't alot of it. But to be fair, their isn't alot of parking at most the hotels along the "Disneyland Strip" and the pool isn't huge but it is refreshing.
Manager Response: Dear Holly 403-  Thank you so very much for your feedback on your recent stay with us. We love hearing that our Family Suite with the bunk beds worked perfectly for the kids. In regards to parking, We have currently started a parking expansion that will include a five story parking structure. During the expansion, We currently have three areas to park  your vehicle that are all located near the Lobby entrance.   We are glad to hear you enjoyed the easy walk from the hotel to the Disneyland Main Entrance. .   We look forward to you returning to the Anaheim Portofino Inn & Suites when your travel plans bring you back to the Disneyland Resort.  Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary Heading: No parking! Don't bring a vehicle.
Summary: This hotel has over 190 rooms and 55 parking spots. We have had a great stay, until we went out for dinner. When we came back, the parking lot was beyond full. People parked their cars in some areas they shouldn't be in. Spoke with staff at the desk. They are aware of the issue and said it will continue to be an issue for the next 2 plus years. Their solution was to give me a pass to a nearby hotel. I thought, awesome, until I found that lot full too. My vehicle is now parked over a mile away from my hotel.   This tarnished an otherwise great stay. The front desk folks and housekeeping staff are top notch. The rooms were quiet, comfortable and clean. All of our requests were met without issue. Well, except for one, PARKING.   We will be staying elsewhere when we return to
Manager Response: Dear Tunacan32-  Thank you so much for taking the time to share your feedback. We appreciate your business and kind comments regarding our property and team of service professionals. We are glad to hear that our close proximity to the Convention Center, Garden Walk, Downtown Disney, and the Disneyland parks met all your needs. Thank you for sharing your observations about the parking. We have recently started a parking expansion that will include a five level parking structure on the west side of our hotel. During the expansion, We will have three designated parking areas located near the hotel entrance.    Thank you for allowing us to be your host hotel during your stay in the Anaheim area.  Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary Heading: Close enough to Disney to be able to walk to the park but far enough to not be encumbered by the crowds
Summary: This is our third time staying at this hotel. It is very nice and clean and close to the theme park. We are able to buy our Disney tickets here and save the time in line. Hotel staff was friendly and helpful. Parking is a little bit of a challenge because of the construction all around. There is a brand-new CVS pharmacy right next to the hotel which makes it convenient to be able to get snacks and other necessities as you travel.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Clean, tidy, great pool, helpful staff , close to Disneyland. We were impressed when we arrived early and were able to access our room. Would have liked to be able to receive breakfast at the motel but restaurants were on the way to Disneyland
Manager Response: none

Summary: The hotel was average. It was a short walk to Disneyland which was very convenient. The staff was very friendly. The air conditioner went out but the staff was very accommodating and moved us to another room.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We thought this was a great place to stay.  My family of 6 stayed in one of the kid suites.  It was perfect.  Kids ages 4-9; nice sized room, enough for all of us for the time we were there.  Pretty easy walk to Disney entrance -- with the 4 yr old in a stroller; 20 min back to the hotel at the end of the night - pushing one in the stroller and carrying 1.  Probably a quicker walk in the morning when all are excited.  Clean room; friendly staff; good proximity to Disney and nearby restaurants.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Our disney trip with the grand children
Summary: Even with not getting our room we received for over 6 months, and being down graded room wise our stay went well       The park was a short walk, the store next door was close by. It is to bad the new motel next door has blocked the view of disneys. Nightly fire works
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great stay for a reasonable price
Summary: The only thing I would change, is I would love to see them have a shuttle to Disney. It's only a 10 minute walk to/from the park, but at the end of a very long day, when you have some very tired children, that 10 minutes seems like an eternity.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Very nice and quiet room. Courteous service by everyone. Only negative was that TV reception failed 3 times in less than 2 hours. A problem that will certainly be attended too. We will definitely stay at the Portofino again.
Manager Response: Dear Alexander B- Thank you so much for taking the time to share your feedback.  We are glad to hear that our clean and quiet guest rooms enabled you to have a productive Business trip . In the very near future, We will be upgrading our broadcast provider and Hi-Def line-up. We thank you for all of your kind comments about our Hotel staff and the great service that they provided you. We look forward to seeing you the next time you are in Anaheim.   Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: The beds were comfortable, the a/c worked well, the rooms were quiet and we had a  nice visit.  Only nit picky complaint is the, popcorn ceiling doesn't go with the renovation, it makes it look out of date.
Manager Response: Dear Cruella04-  Thank you so much for taking the time to share your feedback.  We are glad to hear that our clean,quiet guest rooms and our comfy beds gave you a relaxing stay during your visit. Thank you for the suggestion about the next time we do some room upgrades to keep in mind to update the ceiling to give it a more modern look.  We look forward to seeing you the next time you are in Anaheim.   Sincerely, Daniel Kramer

Summary: We stayed at portofino inn for 6 days last week and it was very nice! let's be clear, it is not a luxury hotel, but we weren't looking for that but for a Hotel VERY near Disneyland , comfortable and with a decent rate, which it fullfils perfectly well, I'd stay again at Portofino anytime! eyes closed!
Manager Response: Dear Fernando V-  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. We are glad to hear you "loved" your stay at the Portofino Inn & Suites hotel. It's great seeing that our close proximity to the Disney Resort parks was a perfect fit for you. We look forward to seeing you the next time you visit the Anaheim area.  Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: This was  a very good one week stay for our family with no compaints.  We were happy with our choice of hotel.  The family/kids room/suite worked well.  The room was clean and comfortable and met our needs.  It was a 10 minute walk with kids to Disney bus loop and 15 mins to front gate/turnstiles. It was nice not having to wait for a ART bus at the end of our day.  I reported two problems with the room . ie toilet would not stop running and french door came of the hinge and maintenace quickly fixed the problems to our satisfaction.  Our family used the pool and it was never too busy as most people were at Disney during the day. The hot tub got a bit busy at night after 7:30 ish.  The price we payed was great for the room but the taxes were very high 18 % plus.  The customer
Manager Response: none

Summary: I stayed at Portofino over this last weekend with my kids. We dont go to Anaheim for Disneyland, we go for hockey. We booked the family suite and LOVED it! If you are travelling with kids the best room to get is the suite with the bunk beds. At check in we were greeted by the front office supervisor. I am so sorry but I cant remember his name. He was incredible and even used my name when talking to me. He told us exactly where we needed to go, the best place to park and get to and from our room.  Best check-in by far at a hotel. I work in the hospitality industry and even I rarely see front desk agents like this.  We will be coming back to Portofino every trip to Anaheim for now on.
Manager Response: Dear Charmaine P-  Thank you so very much for your feedback on your recent stay with us. We love hearing that our clean and spacious Kids Suite worked perfectly for your visit. Thank you for the compliments about our staff and their commitment to providing excellent guest service.  We are glad to hear you enjoyed our hotel's location and the close proximity to the Honda Center and was able to enjoy your Hockey game. We look forward to you returning to the Anaheim Portofino Inn & Suites when your travel plans bring you back to the Ice Rink.  Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: Stayed 2 days here to visit Disneyland. Got a really great room rate for a suite- king bed with separate living room with a pull out sofa. Room had 2 tvs, a microwave and a refrigerator. I really liked the bathroom had a sink, toilet and tub and then outside there was another sink! Room also had a coffee maker. The staff is really kind! They answered our questions and were so helpful. Every time we saw and or spoke with a staff member they were very nice! Bed was very comfortable and the sheets were soft. This might sound silly to some but I gotta tell you, the tp in the bathroom was so soft!! Not the cheap cardboard stuff lol. We parked one time and left the car there our entire stay. We took the ART to Dland and it was easy enough! Bought day passes for $5 each from the front
Manager Response: Dear shelli323-  Thank you so very much for your feedback on your recent stay with us. We love hearing that our clean and spacious King Suite worked perfectly for your visit. Thank you for the compliments about our staff and their commitment to providing excellent guest service. We are glad to hear you enjoyed our hotel's location and the close proximity to the Disneyland Main Entrance as well as our ART Shuttle pick up and drop off service.   We look forward to you returning to the Anaheim Portofino Inn & Suites when your travel plans bring you back to the Disneyland Resort.  Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: This hotel is located about a half mile from the entrance to Disneyland and took us about 10 minutes to walk it with our children. The room was fairly well kept and clean but a little out dated. The fridge is small and not a whole lot of extra room in a family suite with 2 adults and 4 children staying there. The room had a strange odor to it. I read other reviews where people stated electronics went missing. I noticed when housekeeping were cleaning our neighbors rooms they would open the door and walk off to other places leaving the room unsecured. Making it easy for anyone to walk in and make off with personal belongings. The hotel get loud in the mornings. We have older kids so tried sleeping in but could hear other people's children running around screaming early in the
Manager Response: none

Summary: The Portofino Inn and Suites anaheim Hotel is in an excellent location for Anaheim attractions. Within walking distance of Disneyland and plenty of restaurants. Room are quiet. The hotel is easy to find. Staff was pleasant and helpful.
Manager Response: Dear Deckall- We are thrilled to hear from another guest who had a excellent stay at the Anaheim Portofino Inn & Suites Hotel. We are glad to hear that our close proximity to restaurants and the Main gate Disneyland entrance matched your needs. Thank you for the kind words about the friendliness of our staff. We look forward to seeing you the next time you visit the Anaheim area.  Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary Heading: Beautiful Hotel in Walking Distance to Disneyland !!
Summary: I originally booked this hotel because a discount I received through a professional association. I was looking for a hotel close to Disneyland at a reasonable price, that had kid suites or family suites. I was really impressed with the hotel. It's a 5-10 minute walk to Disneyland. The gift shop in the hotel has souvenirs and trinkets. The only thing I didn't like is the parking situation and the location/direction of the kid suites. The parking lot is a little beat up and the parking garage is extremely small (maybe 15-20 spaces). Due to safety reasons the Kids suites don't have balconies so you can't really see the firework show at Disneyland from your room. We will probably stay here the next time we visit Disneyland.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The Pro's - Wonderfully close to Disney - 10 min stroll, close to cheesecake factory (for Aussies this is worth trying it is NOT anything to do with Cheesecake Shop!) & Johnny Rockets (kids LOVED the shakes). Hotel is a bit dated but VERY clean staff are uber friendly and helpful. Wonderful to have vague room partition between us and kids (sliding glass door).  MUCH cheaper option than many in area.  Huge new chemist/general store just opened 2 doors down which is very convenient. The Cons - bit tired but site is accurate, pool is very basic but mini spa was nice after long haul flight. Our room was directly in front of ice-vending machine which was very noisy.  Overall VERY pleased with Portofino
Manager Response: none

Summary: This hotel must have the "happiest staff on earth".  From the moment we walked into the lobby, to the time we checked out, all we saw was smiles from every employee we encountered.  Ironic, since we chose this hotel for its proximity to Disneyland, "the happiest PLACE on earth!"  Their efficiency matched their cheerfulness and exceeded our expectation in every regard.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The Portofino Inn and Suites was clean and comfortable for us.  Walking distance to Disneyland and many eating options close by.  We had the kid's suite and it was nice to have the refrigerator and microwave.  The one downside was the parking.  We had 2 rental cars (two families sharing the room - 4 adults and 2 children) but only could park one car on the property.  The pool was small but we never had a problem with it being overcrowded.  The hotel does need a facelift.  A little beat up but nothing major.  However, it was a nice place to stay.  It would also be nice to have a shuttle to and from the airport.
Manager Response: Dear ladybug7_jt -  Thank you so much for taking the time to share your feedback.  We are glad to hear that our close proximity to Disneyland's Main-gate and nearby restaurants met all your needs. In the very near future, we will be adding a large parking complex in our rear parking lot that should provide plenty of parking space. We look forward to seeing you the next time you are in Anaheim.   Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: Walking distance to Disneyland. Great Family Rooms that allow the kids to go to sleep in a separate room while the adults can stay awake. This is a must with small kids that need an early night after a massive day in Disneyland. Rooms can be a bit noisy as there are plenty of excited children about, but that is to be expected.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Portofino Inn and Suites was perfect for our family! It was clean, comfortable, within walking distance to Disneyland, and their Kids Suite was ideal for our family of 5. All our needs were met almost instantly, and the staff polite and friendly.
Manager Response: Dear momoftheteam- It was a true pleasure being your host hotel during your visit to the Disneyland resort parks. It is nice to see everyone enjoyed the kids suite with the bunk-beds. We are glad to hear the hotel's location worked out great and you just had a short walk from our Lobby to the Disneyland entrance. We thank you for all of your kind comments about our staff and the Exceptional service that they provided you.   We look forward to seeing you the next time you visit the Anaheim area.  Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: Went and stayed for an overnight to take in one of the attractions nearby (there are many!). Carpet and bedding looked fairly new in the rooms and beds were comfortable. The rooms were nice and quiet!! The front desk personnel were very friendly as well. Easy walk to a variety of restaurants and free wi-fi available. Ours was a standard 2 queen room but they had family suites with bunks and a sofa sleeper-a neat alternative. Would definitely stay there again!
Manager Response: Dear thomkat1- Thank you so very much for your feedback on your recent stay with us. We love hearing that our spacious guest rooms worked perfectly. I would like to Thank You for the kind words about our friendly staff. We are glad to hear our hotel was centrally located so that you were able to visit the local attractions.   We look forward to seeing you and your family at the Portofino Inn & Suites the next time your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim area.  Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: We wanted to enjoy Disneyland so we wanted somewhere close. This hotel was in great location so we didn't have to drive to Disney. Rooms are a bit outdated. Staff was amazing!!! Everyone I saw in the building was so nice, smiles on their face.
Manager Response: Dear Lainerbopper:  We are thrilled to hear from another guest who had an excellent stay at the lovely Anaheim Portofino Inn & Suites Hotel. We thank you for all of your kind comments about our staff and the great service that they provided you. It's great hearing that our centrally located hotel fit your needs perfectly and allowed you to be that care free kid again.   We look forward to seeing you again, and hope that it will be very soon.   Sincerely, Dan Kramer General Manager

Summary: Overall, this hotel was a great hotel for just an overnight trip when you are planning to go to Disneyland. I love the location, because it is very close and you could walk there if you wanted to. I did love that the room was spacious. I did not like that even though the rooms were non-smoking, it was clear that someone had smoked in my room and people were smoking down the hall. There was a few chips of paint in the walls and the room just needed a little bit of TLC. But, overall the stay was pleasant.
Manager Response: Dear Hillary N- Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. We are glad to hear you enjoyed our clean and spacious Guest Rooms. We will continue to walk the hallways to ensure maintain a Smoke Free environment. It is nice to see that our close proximity to the Disneyland park entrances matched your needs. We look forward to seeing you again.  Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: Our stay was decent. Room service forgot to service the room one day and the other they didn't leave any towels. The room had some blemishes like cracked tiles and sticky spots on the floor. The AC unit was incredibly loud and literally next to your head in the children's suite. I did like that there was a fridge and microwave in the room and the set up with the kids separation area was nice. The location to the park was great and for the rate it was a deal. Parking was frustrating since there was construction next door and they put the garbage bins directly behind our car and we had to ask them to move them so we could leave.   And the construction workers park in the same lot so space was limited.
Manager Response: Dear Katy B- Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. We are sorry to hear that we made an error and had your room as a Do Not Disturb room. We will continue to monitor our room updates and ensure that error is not repeated. I apologize that the parking lot was a little bit tighter to maneuver. The neighboring hotel is scheduled to be completed very soon in Oct. 2014 and in the very near future we will be expanding our parking lot. It's great hearing that our Kid's Suite with the refrigerator, microwave, and separated room worked nicely for the family.    We look forward to seeing you and your family the next time you are in the Anaheim area.  Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary Heading: Great place to stay with family
Summary: I traveled with my sister, her two grown kids and we picked up my two grandkids (ages 10 and 11) who live in CA but had never been to Disney.  The "kids suite" fit us perfectly!  Having a vanity in the bathroom and outside the bathroom was a great time saver.  We had a refrigerator (perfect for drinks and water since it was in the low 100's when we were there) and a microwave.  Beds were comfortable--even the pull out sofa bed.  Free wi-fi was perfect.  Across the street is a very efficient and tasty iHOP.  Staff was always accommodating.  Easy walk to Disneyland.  I highly recommend it and would stay there again.
Manager Response: Dear Vicki P- Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. We are glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay at the Portofino Inn & Suites hotel and that the Kids Suite was a perfect fit. It is great hearing the close proximity to the Disney Resort parks and restaurants met your needs. Thank you for the kind words about the friendliness of the staff. We look forward to seeing you the next time you visit the Anaheim area.  Sincerely, Dan

Summary: This hotel was perfect!!  It was just a short 10 min walk to Disneyland and California Adventure!  There is plenty of Dinning around if you don't want to eat at the Park! Our rooms were clean and comfortable.  Opening very soon right next door to this hotel is a CVS, and they are building a Walgreens right across the street!  The pool area was clean and there was plenty of towels on hand.  The staff was extremely helpful and very friendly.  Check in and check out was literally only minutes!!  We will defiantly stay here again the next time we are in Anaheim!!  Highly recommend!!
Manager Response: Dear Kim R-  We are thrilled to hear from another guest who had an "great" stay at the lovely Anaheim Portofino Inn & Suites Hotel. We thank you for all of your kind comments about our staff and the great service that they provided you.  We are glad to hear that our close proximity to restaurants and Main gate Disneyland matched your needs. And that you were able to unwind and relax in our Pool & Spa.   We look forward to seeing you again.  Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: Stayed here with a family of four plus grandma and grandpa - the suite was great! Kids got their own beds, good to have another sink & mirror outside the bathroom, AC worked GREAT, lots of outlets for charging, free Wi-fi, very clean, close enough for a 10-15 minute walk to lots of restaurants and probably 15-20 to Disneyland entrance and downtown Disney. Only things that would have made it better are another chair (or two) in the room, and a little cooler in the hallways.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The beds were comfortable, the room was really clean and the a/c worked Fantastic! It's a 10min walk from Disneyland for adults and 15with kids,  but ALL of the hotels are a walk. Also, a little store is right next door with cheap water, and you can catch the city bus back to the room if you're tired for $2 a person it stops right before the hotel.  I'd stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Natalie H- Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us. We are glad to hear that you enjoyed the short walk from our hotel to the Disneyland Maingate entrance. It's nice to see that after a long day at the parks, you were able to utilize our Anaheim Resort Transportation (A.R.T.) shuttle to return back to the hotel. It's great hearing you were able to stop by the gift shop to pick up some water for your magical day at the parks.  We look forward to seeing you and your family on your next visit to Anaheim.  Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: Okay, let's get the grumbles out of the way. My only request when booking the room was a balcony facing Disneyland so we could watch the fireworks. Uh...we did get the balcony...and it was facing Disneyland...but there was the other Portofino hotel building between our room and Disneyland. Our lovely little balcony (which I really did like) faced directly into the rooms of the other building. Where was I supposed to look? I felt uncomfortable sitting out there. Was told we'd have two king-size beds, a microwave and refrigerator. We had two double beds, no microwave, no refrigerator. In retrospect, this disappointment worked out. The two of us fit comfortably in the beds. I also discovered we would have been charged extra had the promised appliances been used by us. Didn't quite
Manager Response: none

Summary: Whilst it was very reasonably priced, the photos do not depict the rooms accurately...there is a work to be done to bring it up to the standard of the surrounding hotels.In saying that, the front desk staff were fantastic and couldnt be more helpful.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The staff was extremely friendly. The beds were comfortable and we had little to no trouble sleeping through the night. The bathroom wasn't as clean as I would have liked, but over all, we really enjoyed our stay.  We would stay there again!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Let the customer know any additional cars, is $20.
Summary: Nice hotel. They don't tell you that if you have more then one vehicle, it's an additional $20. Also when you have more then 2 people in a room, we need more then 1 mirror, more plugs. We need to be able to get ready. Very limited parking.  Beds were confirmed!!
Manager Response: Dear MartinaCaligirl1-  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. Thank you for the suggestion about changing our website from only 1 vehicle allowed to additl. vehicles may park at an off-site lot for $20.00 a night. And Thank you for sharing that it would be helpful to have a 3rd mirror in the guest rooms. Our Deluxe rooms currently have the vanity mirror and the two closet door mirrors. Our Suites have a vanity mirror and a full length mirror.  We look forward to seeing you the next time you are in Anaheim.  Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary Heading: Stayed here for the convention event and was overall happy!
Summary: Just stayed here this week for the recent convention and overall was happy with the room/stay. Room 2301 is difficult to close the door (seems to be broken) with the lock in place when trying to close the door. I was on the look out for bed bugs and ants per some of the previous/recent reviews left for this hotel. BUT I did not find any (thank god). Overall the room was clean and the bathroom needed a little TLC but nothing major. Everything worked fine as it should. This was a great value for the price we paid (discounted because of the expo we attended). I wouldn't mind staying her again in the future as it was within walking distance to the Anaheim convention center, local restaurants, conveinence stores, Disneyland, etc. And yes the hallways are hot during the day and night.
Manager Response: Dear chapinalover-  Thank you so much for taking the time to share your feedback.  We are glad to hear that our close proximity to the Convention Center and nearby restaurants met all your needs. Thank you for the suggestion to look at the lock location and the door. We look forward to seeing you the next time you are in Anaheim.   Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: Loved the spacious Family Suite, it was plenty of room for kids and the added privacy of the separator door was perfect.  Plus we each had a tv!  Bathrooms were also spacious and had two sinks.  Front staff was very pleasant and accommodating.  Great value for a family vacation or business if you have to be at the convention center.
Manager Response: Dear TripAdvisor member:  Thank you so much for taking the time to share your experience with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. We are glad to hear you enjoyed the Family Kids Suite with the Bunk-beds. It is great to hear that our close proximity to the Disneyland Resort parks and the Convention Center is a good fit for work and play.  We look forward to you returning to the Anaheim Portofino Inn & Suites when your travel plans bring you back to the Disneyland Resort area.  Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary Heading: Great location, short walk to Disneyland
Summary: We enjoyed our stay and we were happy with the location. The bunk beds were a hit with the kids. There was construction going on next door which we were not aware of when we booked however it turned out that it became our alarm clock for us to be up and ready for each day at Disneyland. Also the air-conditioning was a little noisy. We were overall happy with the condition of the rooms and amount of space we had. It was also handy to have a minibar fridge in the room for cold drinks. Overall i would recommend and choose this hotel again.
Manager Response: Dear Belinda M -  Thank you so very much for your feedback on your recent stay with us. We love hearing that our spacious Suite with the bunk-beds were a "hit" with the kids. I apologize that a neighboring hotel being built on the corner was loud at times. The hotel is scheduled to be completed very soon. It's great hearing that the mini-fridge and microwave in the suite were a good fit for the sodas and snacks.   We look forward to providing you and your family with another great stay.  Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: stayed there 3 nights in their kids suite, a short walk from the happiest place on earth. Nothing fancy but clean, as advertised and a great and friendly staff. If you can't afford to stay at one of the Disney hotel, this is a great find.
Manager Response: Dear Arno G-  It was a true pleasure being your host hotel during your 3 day visit to the Disneyland resort parks. It is nice to see everyone enjoyed the kids suite with the bunk-beds. We are glad to hear the hotel's location worked out great and you just had a short walk from our Lobby to the Disneyland entrance. We look forward to seeing you the next time you visit the Anaheim area.  Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary Heading: Close to Disney but needs breakfast and working laundry
Summary: This hotel's greatest asset is it's close proximity to the Disney parks (about 3/4 mile). We had a regular room with 2 double beds.  It was clean and comfortable; typical hotel size.  The kids loved the small patio.  Our room was quiet.  There was construction near the suites's building.  There is an average sized pool that is sunny in the afternoon.   I had a lot of difficulty with the laundry room.  There are 2 washer/dryer units that tend to eat your coins, need an hour to dry a small load and does not use the powdered detergent properly.   There are several sundry stores nearby for water, souvenirs, sunscreen etc.  There is also an IHOP across the street.  Unfortunately, the hotel does not offer breakfast. We got a rate of $111/ night but you need to add 15% , $10 per night
Manager Response: Dear DMDP-  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. We are glad to hear you enjoyed our quiet and clean Guest Rooms. Thank you for the information about the On-Site Guest Laundry room. We will continue to monitor the machines to ensure the Coin Dispenser is working properly. As for the construction, The neighboring hotel is near completion and construction should be done in the next few weeks.
