It is great to hear you were able to enjoy our close proximity to the Disneyland parks and sundry stores.   We look forward to seeing you and your family the next time you are in Anaheim.  Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: Nothing special about hotel but did cover what we needed, clean room, safe and friendly people working there. Husband booked trip through Expedia. They cancelled our reservation but we not aware of it. The desk manager went above and beyond to find out what happened and got us a room even though hotel booked, cancellation had just come in so we got their room.
Manager Response: Dear Sue M- Thank you so very much for your feedback on your recent stay with us. We love hearing that our Front Desk Manager Edgar was able to find a room and take care of you and your husband.    Thank you for the suggestion about breakfast. It is something we may be looking into in the near future. In the meantime, we do have Molly's cafe across from our lobby that specializes in breakfast and we do have IHOP directly across the street. We look forward to seeing you the next time you and your family visit the Disneyland Resort.  Sincerely,  Dan Kramer

Summary: I have stayed at Portofino before but never with young children.  We had a perfect experience.  The room was exactly what we needed, bathroom was very clean as was the rest of the suite.  Pool and hot tub were welcome relief from three days at Disneyland.  Buying Disney passes and transit passes at the hotel saved us loads of time.  I would have liked to have had a time schedule for the bus to Disneyland so we could plan our waiting time a little better.  All in all a wonderful experience.  I would come back again to the Portofino.
Manager Response: Dear maheaston:  We are glad to hear you had a nice, quiet, and relaxing stay at the Anaheim Portofino Inn & Suites hotel. It is nice to hear you were able to take advantage of our close proximity to Disneyland and the pool during your stay. It is great hearing that purchasing your tickets at our hotel allowed you more time in the parks instead of waiting in line to buy them at the park. We look forward to seeing you the next time you are in Anaheim.  Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: Room was clean and comfortable and in a good location near Disneyland and the Anaheim Convention Center but when we would enter the room it had a slight mildew smell, also would have liked to have a small refrigerator in it.
Manager Response: Dear Diane H:  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us. We are glad to hear that you enjoyed our close proximity to the Convention Center and to the Disneyland Maingate entrance. It's great hearing you enjoyed your clean and comfortable Deluxe room. At the end of 2014, All of our guest rooms will have a refrigerator in them. We hope to see you the next time you are in the area.  Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary Heading: High traffic means you need to do more maintenance
Summary: Hotel itself was okay, the staff was nice,location was good. BUT, the pool was depressingly small, the rooms, although fairly clean, needed an update. There were nicks and gouges in the woodwork and paint, a kind of ragged bedspread, a broken light in one of the bunk beds. Also, there is absolutely NOTHING pleasant about looking out into the car parking lot. I mean put in some friggin trees, that at least would make it okay, a little.  Same old story here, absolutely NOTHING good to eat (except at Downtown Disney) for at least a mile.  Would not stay there again.
Manager Response: Dear Latham w-  Thank you so very much for your feedback on your recent stay with us. Your satisfaction is important to us. We are glad to hear you enjoyed our clean and spacious suite. We apologize for that your room view overlooked the parking lot. We recently updated our bedding package including a new "textured" white duvet. It is great to hear you enjoyed our close proximity to Disneyland. We hope that you will consider staying with us again so that we can have another chance to provide you superior service.  Sincerely, Dan Kramer General Manager

Summary: Booked a kids suite on the top floor. Loved the size of the room and the location. Really good value for money. The staff were super helpful with making any and all arrangements we needed, will definitely stay here again next trip.
Manager Response: Dear Keely S-  Thank you so very much for your feedback on your recent stay with us. We love hearing that our Family Suite with the bunk beds worked perfectly for the kids. Thank you for the compliments about our staff and their commitment to providing excellent guest service. We look forward to you returning to the Anaheim Portofino Inn & Suites when your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim area.  Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: Overall property is OK but dated.  8 of the 12 pool lounge chairs were an attorneys dream.  Meaning they were so ripped and torn that they should be taken out of service before someone sits on them and falls through.  House keeping was above par and the front desk help was outstanding.  That said the best selling point was its a short 2 mile walk to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear XCHIPPYCTC173-  Thank you so much for your positive comments about your stay at the Anaheim Portofino Inn & Suites Hotel. We are always pleased to hear from our guests that they had a quiet and relaxing  stay with us. The pool furniture is being removed and getting Re-upholstered. Thank you for the kind words about the friendliness of the Front Desk and Housekeeping staff.  We look forward to you returning to the Anaheim Portofino Inn & Suites when your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim area.  Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: We stayed in the kid's suite. The room was clean and smelled clean.  We were helping our daughter move into her apartment in preparation of going to school nearby for the Fall semester. The hotel has a policy of only one parking pass per room but because of some hardships we had in getting our daughter's car there, the hotel staff was nice enough to give us a second parking pass so we did not have to pay for our daughter to park her car until she was able to move her car over to her apartment complex.  They were also very nice about letting us take out the garbage and just get some clean towels the first day as we wanted to sleep in the first day and not be bothered by house keeping.  The hotel is only a block and a half from Disney. I've seen some people complain that Disney is
Manager Response: Dear JoeCasa1-  Thank you so very much for your feedback on your recent stay with us. We love hearing that our clean and spacious guest room worked perfectly for your visit. Thank you for the compliments about our staff and their commitment to providing excellent guest service. We are glad to hear you enjoyed our hotel's location and the close proximity to the Downtown Disney Market place.  We look forward to you returning to the Anaheim Portofino Inn & Suites when your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim area to visit your daughter.  Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: I found my stay pleasant. We stayed in a family suite and enjoyed the bunk beds as well as the eating area. The door separating the adult area from the kids' area was great, but for parents who are light sleepers, kids getting up in the middle of the night repeatedly to walk across their portion of the room to use the bathroom might get annoying.  I got heat stroke and spent a large portion of my second night in the hotel hugging the toilet, which, like the rest of the bathroom, was as clean as I'd keep mine at home. I've seen some nasty hotel bathrooms, so the cleanliness of this one was delightful.   Pool was great and really clean.  We especially enjoyed the convenience of the microwave and fridge in the room, it was big enough to store enough perishable food for a couple
Manager Response: Dear CB: It was a true pleasure hosting your family and being a part of the Family trip to Anaheim. It is great hearing that the Anaheim Portofino Inn & Suites was perfectly located to all the attractions and an easy walk to Disneyland. We are sorry to hear that the hot weather kept you indoors for a period. We look forward to seeing you and the family again maybe in the Fall or Spring when the weather may be a little cooler.  Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: We stayed for 3 nights in a kids suite with bunk beds. The room was spacious, and the bunk beds worked out great. Also, the sofa in the kids section is a fold out bed, ideally located in front of the kids TV. Good place for the kids to wind down after a hectic day in Disneyland, and Universal Studios.  Location is great for Disneyland. It's only a 10 min walk to the main gate (at children's pace). There are plenty of restaurants within walking distance. Everything from fast food to good family restaurants. This made up for the fact that there is no food service. There's a small kiosk on the hotel building, but also a 7-eleven just around the corner.   There's plenty of parking close to the lifts.  The staff was very friendly, and accommodating. There is no business centre, that
Manager Response: Dear Rjuncker:  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us. We are glad to hear that you enjoyed the short walk from our hotel to the Disneyland Maingate entrance. It's great hearing you enjoyed the amenities in our clean and spacious Kids Suite such as the Bunk-beds, mini-fridge, the coffee maker, and the microwave. Our current business center is the Kiosk near the Front desk. However, We are updating the Business center which will include an additional counter and computer to provide more of a business center environment instead of Kiosk feel.  We are very grateful that you allowed us to be your host hotel during your visit to the Anaheim area. We look forward to seeing you again the next time you visit the Disney parks.  Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary Heading: Easy on the wallet and good for families with kids.
Summary: This was my first time staying off the Disneyland property, but we were looking to save some money on our accommodations and the "Kids Suite" sounded like a good fit for our family of five.   The hotel is located directly across the street from a 24 hr IHOP, which is perfect for early breakfasts and late dinners. It is a short walk to the main entrance, which was fine for the mornings. I suggest hopping on board Anaheim Transit Route 3 when you're ready to leave. It picks up right at the main gate, every 20 minutes or so, and will quickly deliver you to the Portofino, since it is stop number one.  The hotel is older and, if you have an eye for little details, you will notice some of the older design features, but the kid suite #2409 was clean, neat and tidy and our kids enjoyed
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Noisy AC in room and can't trust the cleaning person.
Summary: We have recently stayed there. Everything went fine except the morning on the 18/aug/14. When we checked out, we left to have some breakfast and realized that our iPad is gone. We went and search through our luggages twice and couldn't find it. We called the hotel and told them that we lost our iPad and we are on the way back to look for it. When we got back to the hotel. I asked front desk for the key and went up to our room to look for it but It wasn't there. The room looks like half way clean but the clean person wasn't there. I came down to speak to the manager. His name is Edgar. He told me to file a incident report and that was it. For the past 2 days we been tracking our iPad through find my iPad but we couldn't get through it. Obviously the iPad his been turned off. If
Manager Response: none

Summary: Great location for Disney with a easy walk to the park! We booked the room with bunk beds which our kids loved having them and everyone had a place to sleep instead of on the floor.  The bunks are divided by French doors with sheers so you get some privacy but it's sheers, it wasn't a problem for is since our whole purpose of Disneyland. The room had a fridge and a microwave which was very handy! Pool area is nice but small but for our purposes it worked because we didn't go there for the pool. I requested a room in quiet area and it sure was quiet!!  Staff was friendly and helpful and would stay there again!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Hotel was located directly in front of Disneyland entrance that's a plus, the rooms were clean and well kept , will definitely stay here again.   Centrally located to the attractions with shuttle service to the major park
Manager Response: Dear Daniel V-  We are thrilled to hear from another guest who loved their stay at the Anaheim Portofino Inn & Suites Hotel.  We are glad to hear that you were able to enjoy our hotel's clean spacious guest rooms and our close proximity to the Disneyland Resort Main entrance.   We look forward to seeing you and your family on your next visit to Anaheim.  Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: I thought our room had a fridge, but was mistaken. When I inquired she checked for extras and immediately brought one to our rom! After checking out we drove to San Diego for our next activity. When we got there our envelope of several tickets was missing. Turns out someone in our family accidentally threw it in garbage. We called hotel. They found it and called us back, offering to fax, mail, or do whatever they could to help us. By faxing it, we were able to proceed with that day's plans, then drove back up to get it later.
Manager Response: Dear Lisa P-  We are thrilled to hear from another guest who had an excellent stay at the lovely Anaheim Portofino Inn & Suites Hotel. We thank you for all of your kind comments about our staff and the Exceptional service that they provided you. It's great hearing that our centrally located hotel fit your needs perfectly and allowed you to be able to visit all the local theme parks in the area including some of the attractions in San Diego. We are glad to see everything worked out with the items left behind in the envelope.   We look forward to seeing you again, and hope that it will be very soon.   Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: We've stayed here many times and have always enjoyed the facility.  We have stayed in a single bed room, the children's suite room and a double bed room.  Each one was nice.  Two out of the 3 had a refrigerator.  It would be nice if all rooms had a refrigerator and it should be implemented.  The one problem that irks me is the parking.  It is so very difficult to find parking on the lot.  I've been told that a new parking lot is to be built but it will be a 3-year project.  During that time they will offer valet parking - hopefully we will not be charged!
Manager Response: Dear MargoD-  Thank you so much for your positive comments about your stay at the Anaheim Portofino Inn & Suites Hotel. We are always so pleased to hear from our guests who enjoyed their overall experience, the wonderful amenities, and the great location that our hotel has to offer. You provided me with some great feedback. I can share with you that we will be adding a large parking structure in our back lot in the near future. Once the large covered parking structure is completed the parking lot will have plenty of extra spots. I assure you it will not take 3 years. We look forward to providing you with another pleasant stay, and we hope that will be soon!   Sincerely, Dan Kramer General Manager

Summary: The elevators and hallways are really hot!  The location is good if you are planning on disney, but with small kids you can also get an ART (Anaheim Resort Transportation) Pass from the front desk for a minimal fee and just hop on right by the hotel.  The staff was helpful, the room was clean.  The room was not exactly what I thought.....I was hoping for more privacy for my husband and myseld from our children.  The french doors between the rooms had a sheer (see through) curtain and the only bathroom was on our side of the door.  So not much relaxation time for us!!!
Manager Response: Dear Mrsbossman-  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. We are glad to hear you enjoyed our quiet and clean Guest Rooms. Thank you for the kind words about the friendliness of our staff. It is great to hear you were able to enjoy our close proximity to the Disneyland parks and the ART shuttle service. We look forward to seeing you and your family the next time you are in Anaheim.  Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: We enjoyed staying here about 10 years ago.  This time, we noticed that the area has changed, with more hotels and other services.  Portofino is close enough to Disneyland without being too close.  Good hotel for families with fridge and microwave.
Manager Response: Dear AHofTricity:  We are glad to hear you had a nice, quiet, and relaxing stay at the Anaheim Portofino Inn & Suites hotel. It is nice to hear that the family was able to take advantage of our close proximity to Disneyland and that they enjoyed the in-room fridge and microwave. We look forward to seeing you and your family the next time you are in Anaheim.   Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: I Had a very nice time I liked the room a lot and the location was great it was nice Not having to take a shuttle To Disneyland. It was only a 5 minute walk ! wish it had a bigger swimming  pool,But besides that everything was great!
Manager Response: Dear tiffany M-  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. We are glad to hear you had a "very fun" stay at the Anaheim Portofino Inn & Suites hotel. It is great hearing the close proximity to the Disney Resort parks matched your needs perfectly. We look forward to seeing you the next time you visit the Anaheim area.  Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary Heading: Super noisy, but within walking distance, good sized rooms
Summary: We stayed in their biggest, two bedroom suite, for 4 nights.  Pros: Walking distance to Disneyland.  Not too bad of a walk. Had the room configuration that we wanted and needed. Room was quite large. Free wi-fi. Decent sized pool with good hours that it was open (7 am to 10 pm). Little strip mall kitty corner from the hotel had a few places with very inexpensive, decent food.  I recommend Subway for breakfast.  Cons: VERY noisy - construction going on next door, steel plates on the street with buses running over them made it VERY hard to sleep, especially in the room facing that side of the street.  Woke my kids up, who easily sleep through the fireworks on New Year's Eve in Hawaii (rumbles that shake the house). Not well kept up - outlet plates falling off the walls, chips in
Manager Response: Dear M S-  Thank you so very much for your feedback on your recent stay with us. We love hearing that our spacious Suite was configured and set up just the way you needed it to be. I apologize that the Marriott being built on the corner was loud at times. The neighboring hotel is scheduled to be completed very soon. We will continue to monitor and check any loose outlet plates and check for squeaky doors. We hope that you will consider staying with us again so that we can have another chance to provide you superior service.  Sincerely, Dan Kramer General Manager

Summary: Ok first off this is a hotel and offered a great price with my annual pass. The hotel is close and the staff was very nice. The only complaint I could think of would be the lack of a mini fridge. 10 min walk to the park kiddy corner to a bunch of food options. I will deff be staying here again with my family.
Manager Response: Dear Paul M- Thank you so very much for your feedback on your recent stay with us. It's great hearing that you enjoyed our family friendly hotel. Thank you for notifying us of your experience with the mini-fridge. All of our Suites do have a mini-fridge and microwave. With recent feedback about how convenient the in-room fridges are.. We are currently looking at the room configuration to determine the possibility of putting fridges in all room types in the very near future.  We are glad to hear you enjoyed the easy walk from the hotel to the Disneyland Main Entrance.  We look forward to you returning to the Anaheim Portofino Inn & Suites when your travel plans bring you back to the Disneyland Resort.  Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary Heading: Family of 6, 3 days at D-land 1 day at the beach, thoroughly pleased!
Summary: Room was outstanding for a large family (kids suite). I would definately come back in the future. Room cold and plenty of restaurants that deliver (wide variety). Overall, awesome experience even though it was minimally utilized.
Manager Response: Dear Armando P-  Thank you so much for taking the time to share your experience with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. We are glad to hear you enjoyed the Family Kids Suite with the Bunk-beds. It is great to hear you were able to take advantage of our close proximity to the Disneyland Resort parks and the nearby OC beaches. We look forward to you returning to the Anaheim Portofino Inn & Suites when your travel plans bring you back to the Disneyland Resort area.  Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: Room was open and had a nice feel, beds were just right! Hotel was within easy walking to park, and other places to eat, staff was quick to handle all request and needs. Only thing need a little extra care was the painted areas around the bathroom door trim, sights of rust needed to be touched up for that well kept feeling! Overall great place to stay!
Manager Response: Dear Yatesnlv:   We are thrilled to hear from another guest who had a pleasant stay at the Anaheim Portofino Inn & Suites Hotel. We are glad to hear that our close proximity to restaurants and the Main gate Disneyland entrance matched your needs. Thank you for the bathroom trim suggestion. It's great hearing that the open spacious room was the perfect temperature.   We look forward to seeing you the next time you visit the Anaheim area.  Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: Our family stayed at this hotel for a couple of nights and we found it to be very pleasant. The staff were very friendly, the room was clean and it was very close tp Disneyland (5 to 10 min walk). The room itself was fairly basic however it was good value for money. We would stay there again and recommend it if you want a cheap hotel near disneyland
Manager Response: Dear Trip Advisor Member:  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. We are glad to hear you had a very pleasant stay at the Portofino Inn & Suites hotel and that the close proximity to the Disney Resort parks was a great fit for you.  Thank you for the kind words about the friendliness of the staff. We look forward to seeing you the next time you visit the Anaheim area.  Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: The location was great. Room was a nice size though, beds comfortable. Employees where nice.  Choose to not  have room cleaned until we left.  I asked for an extra roll of TP from one of the cleaning ladies and I was told to go to front desk.  However the outlet plugs in the room all need to be replaced because when you plug in anything it falls out of the plug.  The hair dryer provided was horrible.  It doesn't have an on/off switch you have to hold the trigger the entire time.  The lock on the bathroom door would get stuck and trap person inside for a couple of minutes until the door was jiggled enough to open.  Walls were really thin so noise was sometimes a problem.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Worst hotel I have ever stayed at. It was dirty, falling apart. There was food on the bed skirt. I wouldn't stay there if someone else paid for it.  The people at the front desk were helpful. I stayed in the kids sweet. There were black spots on the pillow and if that wasn't enough the fire detector needed new batteries. so it beeped till morning because there was no one there yet go change them. The maintenance worker told me it happens all the time.
Manager Response: Dear Steph361978- Thank you for taking the time to share your comments with us. Your satisfaction is important to us and we will be using the feedback you provided to make improvements to ensure we offer an exceptional experience for our guests in the future. Our devoted team are trained to provide a memorable experience to all of our guests and fulfill their our guest needs. We are truly sorry that the smoke detector started chirping during your stay. I can assure you that the detectors are monitored and checked regularly, including battery replacement. Thank you for the kind words about the friendliness of the Front Desk staff. We hope that you will consider staying with us again so that we can have another chance to provide you superior service.  Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: This hotel was very clean and in a great location.  The hotel staff was really nice.  Only downfalls were the bathroom, no ventilation and the laundry room only had 2 washers and 2 dryers and one of each did not work. The staffs service was so good that i I would definitely stay at this hotel again.
Manager Response: Dear Linda C-  Thank you so very much for your feedback on your recent stay with us. We love hearing that our clean and spacious guest room worked perfectly for your visit. Thank you for the compliments about our staff and their commitment to providing excellent guest service. We want  to thank you for the suggestions about adding an additional vent in the restroom area.  We are glad to hear you enjoyed our hotel's location and the close proximity to the Disneyland Main Entrance.   We look forward to you returning to the Anaheim Portofino Inn & Suites when your travel plans bring you back to the Disneyland Resort.  Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary Heading: Clean Room, Friendly Staff, Easy Walk to Angel Stadium
Summary: I stayed here on a Saturday night. I was allowed to check in about 40 minutes early for free, which was very helpful. I was in town to see a baseball game, and the walk from the hotel to Angel Stadium is a rather easy 2 miles. As a bonus, Tacos Y Pupusas is on the way to the park--and I recommend it. The room was clean. I was on the ground floor, and I did hear my upstairs neighbors making some noise, but it wasn't too bad. Many of the reviews mention terrible parking. I had no trouble finding a spot, but I will say it has some of the narrowest parking spaces I've ever seen. If someone parks off center it can make things miserable for the short side neighbor.
Manager Response: Dear Benjamin H- Thank you so much for taking the time to share your feedback.  We are glad to hear that our close proximity to the Angel's Stadium and nearby restaurants met all your needs. In the very near future, we will be adding a large parking complex in our rear parking lot that should provide plenty of parking space even if there are a few cars that are parked "off center". We thank you for all of your kind comments about our Hotel staff and the great service that they provided you. We look forward to seeing you the next time you are in Anaheim.   Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: Family trip to Disneyland, two adults and two kids ages 2 and 5. Thankful we didn't have a car as parking was tight. After being given the wrong room (booked a kids suite, sent us to a non suite), it was settled quickly and we ended up with the bunk bed suite.. the girls loved it.. even has a sofa bed. Nice to have refrigerator and microwave handy.  Pool is very small, had to get out because too many people in at one time and it was not fun anymore.. Room was very quiet, we were on 4th floor, luckily barely heard neighbors above us and never heard ones next to us. My biggest complaint- CONSTRUCTION NEXT DOOR. For some reason they thought it was a great idea to start at 6 am.. YES 6 am.. very annoying and woke the kids up early every time. Other than that, nice hotel, decent walk
Manager Response: Dear norab38 - Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us about your stay at the Anaheim Portofino Inn & Suites Hotel. We are glad to hear that you enjoyed our spacious Family Suite with the Bunk-beds. As you mentioned, the Marriott being built on the corner will be completing construction in the very near future and we are going to be expanding our parking lot as well.  We look forward to you staying with us again so that we can have another chance to provide you superior service.  Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: The kid suites room are wonderful and comfortable. The service was great and the location was perfect.  There was always parking and my nephews enjoyed the pool. I will definitely recommend this hotel to my friends and family with kids.  Our overall experience was nice.
Manager Response: Dear nglez510-  We are thrilled to hear from another guest who had an excellent stay at the lovely Anaheim Portofino Inn & Suites Hotel. We thank you for all of your kind comments about our staff and the great service that they provided you. It's great to hear your nephews enjoyed our pool and that the Kids Suite with the Bunk-beds was a perfect fit for the family. We look forward to seeing you again, and hope that it will be very soon.   Sincerely, Dan Kramer General Manager

Summary: This trip was with my family to go to Disneyland. We stayed in the kids suite with the bunk beds. Lots of space in the room and only 2 to 3 blocks from Disneyland. It was walking distance. The room was nice and comfortable to have a family of 4.
Manager Response: Dear Amanda S-  We are thrilled to hear from another guest who had a great stay at the lovely Anaheim Portofino Inn & Suites Hotel. We thank you for all of your kind comments about our spacious and comfortable Kids Suite. We are glad to hear that our close proximity to the Main-gate Disneyland entrance matched your needs. We look forward to seeing you again.  Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary Heading: Great place for kids and adults!
Summary: This place is close enough to Disneyland to walk. It was more than enough space for my family of 3 adults and 2 kids. The kids loved the bunk beds! We had a perfect stay! Thank you Portofino Inn! We'll definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Dear Angie B-  Thank you so very much for your feedback on your recent stay with us. We love hearing that you had a fun stay and that our spacious Family Suite with the bunk beds worked great for the family.  It is nice to hear you were able to take advantage of our close proximity to the Disneyland Resort entrance and walk to the parks. We look forward to seeing you the next time you visit the Anaheim Area.  Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: Myself, Mom and 2 year old stayed for a short trip to see the mouse and we couldn't have been happier with our stay. They room was comfortable and clean and they even have a laundry room! There was a great balcony to set on and we really were just a short walk away from Disneyland!
Manager Response: Dear Teah19-  Thank you so very much for your feedback on your recent stay with us. We love hearing that our Deluxe Rooms with the balcony allowed you some time to sit and relax in between Disney park visits. It is nice to hear you were able to take advantage of our close proximity to Disneyland and that you were able to have the convenience of just walking to the Disney Resort parks. We look forward to seeing you the next time you and your family visit the Anaheim Area.  Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: We really enjoyed our stay. We were suppose to have stayed at the Jolly Roger hotel but they were closing it down so they transferred us to Portofino. It was nice, clean, and the beds were really comfortable.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: What u see, is not what u get
Summary: This hotel at first seemed ok but as the days went on it turned bad. First of all not enough parking on site. Got from Disneyland late & discovered there was no more parking stalls. People parked in fire lanes & walkways. Second, the towels looked clean but I came across some with stains. Not sure if they knew what laundry soap was or how to use it. Third, the hall way felt like a oven. No AC at all in the hall way. Lastly, the picture of the pool on the web site is a fake. Looks big in the picture but in person, it is way smaller. Oh the gym consist of 2-3 treadmills. The kids suite is a good size but only for a family of 5 or less. We have 6 in our family. Should of stayed else where. And yes the walk to Disneyland is short. About 10 min.  For the price this hotel charges,
Manager Response: none

Summary: To begin with, the location of this hotel is great.  You can walk about 10-15 minutes to Disney Parks or to the Disney Parking Shuttle area and take the shuttle.  IHop is right across the street, Baba Gump and Cheesecake Factory is are 5 minute walk.  There is construction going on next door but they don't start until 9 or so and were always done before we got  back to the hotel.  I am not sure what some other folks are talking about when they say construction noise because we did not hear anything.  Also, our rooms had blackout curtains on the windows. Someone complained about heat turning on by itself...yes that is true.  Their thermostat are programmed to not heat of cool the room during daytime because obviously you are not there.  You can easily override this setting if you
Manager Response: Dear Pakilegacy-  Thank you so much for your positive comments about your stay at the Anaheim Portofino Inn & Suites Hotel. We are always so pleased to hear from our guests who enjoyed their overall experience, the wonderful amenities, and the great location that our hotel has to offer. Thank you for the suggestions about the game room and guest laundry room. That is an item we are looking into in the very near future. We are looking at doing a separate Activity (Game/Arcade) room and Guest Laundry room in 2015. We look forward to providing you with another excellent stay.  Sincerely, Dan Kramer General Manager

Summary Heading: I love the service but the parking was horrible
Summary: The service here is amazing! But the parking wasn't!!! I've stayed year for years and always loved it but I think its time for a few touch ups. The hotel is starting to look a little run down. Plus Two of the outlets weren't working so I needed to Inform the management but they took Care of it quickly!
Manager Response: Dear Brats4x-  Thank you for being a loyal and repeat guest and for taking the time to share your experience with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. The neighboring hotel is scheduled to be completed very soon and in the very near future we will be expanding our parking lot. We look forward to seeing you and your family the next time you are in the Anaheim area.  Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary Heading: clean room. basic hotel. good location to Disney.
Summary: We stayed one night 2adults & 2 teens. Room was clean. Basic hotel with basic pool. 10-15 minute walk to Disney. Front desk staff friendly. No luggage charts available when we checked out.  Free parking.
Manager Response: Dear dav8979- We are glad to hear you had a nice and relaxing stay at the Anaheim Portofino Inn & Suites hotel. It is nice to hear you were able to take advantage of our close proximity to Disneyland. We look forward to seeing you the next time you are in Anaheim.   Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: We stayed for three nights during the peak of summer.  We were there for a basketball tournament, however this hotel is about a block away from the Disneyland park, so there is a lot of foot traffic at all hours.  The hotel barely has an adequate amount of parking spaces, so when arriving back later in the evening, it was difficult to find a spot.  That was really the only negative.  The front desk staff were very friendly and helpful, and the cleaning staff were also very friendly and cleaned our room early every day.  The rooms were basic but clean, and there is free WiFi.  I would recommend staying here, especially if you are coming to visit Disneyland - park at the hotel and walk on over.
Manager Response: Dear Tanis W-  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. We are glad to hear you enjoyed our quiet and clean Guest Rooms. Thank you for the kind words about the friendliness of our staff. It is great to hear you were able to enjoy our close proximity to the Disneyland parks and restaurants. We look forward to seeing you and your family the next time you are in Anaheim.  Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: We stayed at Portofino Inn for 4 nights while we made the Disney run. Hotel was nice, staff was friendly. We had the kids suite, had a king bed with a tv, adjoining room had bunk beds, sofa sleeper,  microwave, mini fridge and a tv. I liked the sliding divider between where the king bed was and where the bunk beds were. The bathroom was nice, had a sink, shower, tub and mirror. There was also another sink and mirror on the outside of the bathroom. We were only in the room to sleep, shower and to get ready, for we spent all day everyday out at the parks and the beach and for that the room was perfect for us. The only reason I docked a point was for parking, at times it was difficult and inconvenient since there seems to be just enough parking spaces to go around, not enough for
Manager Response: Dear yaditt-  Thank you so very much for your feedback on your recent stay with us. We look forward to seeing you the next time you visit the Anaheim Area.  Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary Heading: Just OK. Room was small for a two room suite.  Sofa Bed mattress was way too thin, didn't sleep well. Very clean.
Summary: Just OK. Thought room would be bigger. Quite small for a two room suite.  Sofa Bed mattress was way too thin, didn't sleep well. Very clean. Staff was very friendly and helpful. 15 min. walk to Disneyland was great:)
Manager Response: none

Summary: Rooms were decent sized and my only disappointment was that there wasn't a safe in the room location was close enough to everything. Staff was very friendly and helpful. My family had a great time we were within walking distance to everything the only other downfall was paking. More rooms than parking spots. They did have construction going on

Summary: This is one of the only hotels in the area that has suites big enough for two families. Instead of having to rent two rooms, we (Grandma and Grandpa) stayed in the first part of the room, and our kids (2 adults, 2 children) stayed in the bunk bed/pull out sofa part of the room. There's a sliding door that has thick sheers you can pull together to separate the rooms for sleeping. Our granddaughers loved the bunk beds. Ask for a 4th (or higher) floor room that faces Disneyland, and you can watch the fireworks from your window. Our grandkids loved this, too, as we were home early with them while their parents stayed late at Disneyland. The hotel seems very willing to please and is more of a mom & pop type of hotel. There seems to be ample parking, but it gets full at peak Disney
Manager Response: none

Summary: Needed a staycation. Comfy beds, close to coffee, theme park, and diners. Ahhh nice! It was a great hotel! Got in around the late afternoon, thought it would crazy busy. It was bust but the staffed worked quickly through the line. Parked on the back by the pool, used that elevator to quickly get to our floor. And I jumped into the super comfy beds.
Manager Response: Dear Traveloohlala-  Thank you for allowing the lovely Anaheim Portofino Inn & Suites Hotel to be apart of your "staycation". We are glad to hear that our close proximity to restaurants and Main gate Disneyland matched your needs. We look forward to seeing you again on your next get away.  Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: Wasn't expecting much after staying in horrible hotels back in downtown LA so was pleasantly surprised to see such a clean room and comfortable beds. Room was decently big and had a balcony (though not much of a view) Pretty near to disneyland and there're plenty of dining options around. Front desk staff were really helpful, only issue was that they said the disneyland tickets I reserved prior to arriving were out of stock because they "only reserved but did not buy the tickets" which I found quite odd as what's the point of reserving when the tickets still go out of stock? Ended up having to go to the next hotel to get the tickets which took quite a bit of time.  Overall still a good stay for the price, I'd choose to come back again. Or maybe i'd try candy cane inn as its

Sincerely, Dan Kramer General Manager

Summary Heading: Ok, somewhere between poor and average
Summary: I booked this hotel because it was somewhat last minute and the only one I could get within this time frame and room size. And the overall reviews were good. I will go through my personal take on the pro's and con's. I will say, I have stayed here before, but it was 11 years ago.  Pro's: Decent location for Disney. The walk is not that bad. We have been to Disney World several times and that is the walk from the front of most Disney resorts to the rooms, so no points lost there for me.  We were in a kid suite and the king bed was very comfortable to us. Even the pillow was good. New comforters and sheets made it all the better. Check in was easy and quick. Pool is small, but they have very nice patio furniture, plenty of towels and it was nice for the kids.  I like that we had
Manager Response: none

Summary: This hotel was great! I booked 2 mystery suites on bookit.com. I ended up with the portofino inn and suites (I'm a little obsessive and with lots of research, i kinda knew what hotel I would get when I clicked purchase) check In was a breeze and the gal was very friendly (Sandra? I think?) we were given 2 kids suites which were perfect!! Bunk beds, king bed, and pull out sofa-bed in each room..plenty of room!! The walk to disney was about 15 minutes in the morning and a bit longer in the evening...we ended up in a room that faced the hotel parking lot. Yes there is construction going on and yes it is right next to and across from hotel..however, we did not hear one drop of obnoxious construction noise....we did not book a good neighbor hotel to sit inside and listen to

Summary: The room was everything we wanted, location to Disneyland was perfect! The front desk people were amazing, they were kind, always willing to help. The only downer was that the pool was being renovated, but we were allowed to use the pool at the hotel next door. We will be staying there again.

Summary: I would love if the shower walls had some hooks to hang my body sponge, and maybe some very curvey hooks for the towels, other than that everything was very accommodate, front desk service was excellen and housekeeping was also excellent.

Summary: Portofino Inn & Suites Anaheim Hotel is a great place to stay! Not too far from Disneyland ! :) Perfect for family to stay in.   Room clean and staff friendly! I can't sleep without the noise of a fan on and they brought one up to my room for me ! Life saver !

We look forward to seeing you and your family at the Portofino Inn & Suites the next time your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim area.  Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: We felt so at home staying here. We had not been here before or stayed at a good neighbor hotel and we chose a great one! My family and I all had the best time. It was clean and child friendly, very safe. They were helpful at the front desk and always smiling. We loved the photo stop in the lobby area!!

We look forward to seeing you again.  Sincerely, Dan Kramer General Manager

Summary: Everything was great except for the availability of parking space. Had to drive around for almost 30 mins to find parking. Had to wait for a guest to leave to get a parking space. Room was clean . The tv in the living room kept shutting off and had to reset for several times.
Manager Response: none

Summary: we stayed at Portofino Inn and Suites from June 14 to June 26, 2014..it was an enjoyable stay.. close proximity to Disneyland, knotts Berry Farm Universal Studios..staff was friendly, rooms were up kept...maybe another washing machine and dryer can be installed..walls are thin however, overall very good stay with Portofino..
Manager Response: none

Summary: Clean rooms, friendly staff and great price. Kids suite was great for families we had 3kids with us and there was plenty of room. Great stay for families close to disney and shopping, only thing better would be breakfast.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The room was large enough to have a small couch or loveseat in addition to  the table and two chairs.  It would also be nice if you did not have to pay  extra for a small refrigerator.  The stay was overall pleasant.  The bus to disney was fairly convenient across the corner diagonally.
Manager Response: Dear Garth Jensen-  We are glad to hear you enjoyed our clean and spacious Deluxe Guest Rooms. Thank you for the suggestions of adding a chair or small loveseat. We look forward to seeing you and the family the next time you visit Anaheim and the Disney Resort parks.  Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary Heading: If you're visiting the Mouse, here's a quiet friendly House!
Summary: Not far from the Disney theme parks and Downtown Disney, this nice resort welcomes you!  There's two buildings and an outdoor swimming pool, limited underground parking under one building. No restaurant, but an IHOP is across the South Harbor Boulevard - you find a way to cross six traffic lanes of busy traffic! There's not much of a view, you'll probably see the distinctive  Anaheim Convention Center.  Our visit was after what appears to be extensive room upgrades, and our room was pleasant and very suited to our stay. We did not use the pool but it was popular with other guests.  The next lot is to be (yet another) hotel. During our stay there was the typical sounds of construction, which could have been a problem if we were in rooms on that side.
Manager Response: Dear Peter S-  We are thrilled to hear from another guest who had a pleasant stay at the Anaheim Portofino Inn & Suites Hotel. We are glad to hear that our close proximity to restaurants, the Convention Center, and the Main gate Disneyland entrance matched your needs.  We look forward to seeing you the next time you visit the Anaheim area.  Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: We loved our recent stay here! It was a very easy walk to and from Disneyland and we did it several times a day so our grandchildren could nap mid-day. The staff was very friendly, efficient, and helpful. Housekeeping had our room made up every day before noon so naptime would be undisturbed. We easily rented a stroller from the hotel to use for our stay and we appreciated the large two-bedroom, two-bathroom unit that our family of six shared. Our only suggestion would be for the hotel to put in new and better sound-proof windows, since the road noise was quite bad, even on the top floor. However, we'll definitely stay here again when we return to Disneyland!
Manager Response: Dear AKlowden- We are thrilled to hear from another guest who had an excellent stay at the lovely Anaheim Portofino Inn & Suites Hotel. Summary Heading: The room was in poor working order

Summary: This place is not bad. I booked the room on hotwire.com and the total came out to 93 dollars , plus a $40 deposit . The room was not bad and even had a balcony. Was visiting disneyland so it worked out great as far as location. And compared to other hotels in the area and the quality of this hotel; the price is not bad. P.S. The old school game room in the first floor can keep you or your kids busy for a little bit. Nothing fancy just a few old arcade type games

Summary Heading: Overall was a great place needs some upgrades

Also if your room faces the street there is a lot of traffic noise.

Summary Heading: Stay here: great value, location and cool kid suites!

Buy Disney park tickets at hotel lobby and get old entrance fee price while supplies last. Kid suites rooms are roomy and cool with bunkbeds and there own tv. But suggest to stay on top floor to avoid upstair walking noise and avoid staying in tower on the right due to constuction next door. You get one car free parking at hotel.

Summary: This was my first stay at the Portofino Inn and I was impressed. The room was clean and comfortable. I would have liked to have had a mini-fridge, but that was the only inconvenience. The front desk staff was especially helpful, even getting us a driver to take us to Angels Stadium. It is one of the more reasonable hotels in the area and I will come here again when I'm back in town. Thank you!

All of our Suites have Microwaves and mini-fridges and we do have some additil. fridges that can be delivered to your guest room.  We look forward to seeing you again the next time you are back in town.  Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary Heading: Clean, comfortable, and spacious accommodations within walking distance of Disneyland.
Summary: We stayed in the kids suite and the room was perfect for families. The main room has a king bed and still had enough space to easily park our stroller in without having to break it down. The bed was very comfortable, and the bedding was all white which I like because you can easily tell if it's not clean. The kids room had bunk beds plus a pull out sofa. Perfect for our three kids to all have their own space. The bathroom was in the main room, and the cleaning staff was great at leaving plenty of towels for our family of five. There were two separate sinks for added convenience. One inside the bathroom and one just outside. This was helpful for everyone to be able to get ready. The only bad part was that you couldn't open the bathroom door if someone was standing in front of the
Manager Response: Dear Linda B-  We are thrilled to hear from another guest who enjoyed their stay at the lovely Anaheim Portofino Inn & Suites Hotel. We thank you for all of your kind comments about our Housekeeping staff and the great service that they provided you. We are glad to hear that our close proximity to restaurants, 7-11, and Main gate Disneyland matched your needs. Thank you for your suggestion about the additional wastebasket.  We look forward to seeing you again.  Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: Location was great we walked to Disneyland. There's a IHOP across the street we had our breakfast there. It would of been nice if the hotel had more parking spaces. The staff was very nice very helpful.
Manager Response: Dear Rjgvks-  We are thrilled to hear from another guest who had a great stay at the lovely Anaheim Portofino Inn & Suites Hotel. We thank you for all of your kind comments about our staff and the great service that they provided you. We are glad to hear that our close proximity to restaurants and Main gate Disneyland matched your needs. We look forward to seeing you again.  Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: Clean, comfortable, liked the bunk beds in the kids suites! Walking to the park was about 20 minutes & saved bus fare-the only down side was limited parking near our room but since we checked in & walked most places not a real issue-would stay here again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This is our 5th stay at the Portofino, we love the kids suites!! My sister had a double queen room which was nice for their family.  The bunk beds are great, sofa bed comfortable and the king bed also comfortable.  The bottom drawer on the dresser was stuck, and we would pull from the bottom to open the drawer.  We always had hot water, and shower pressure great.  The room meets your needs for a Disneyland Vacation.  We used the pool, there were no towels, called the front desk to make them aware of the situation, still no towels.  After 2 attempts, no towels arrived.  We used the gift shop, prices great for snacks.  We used the ART for the ride back to the hotel, Portofino is the first stop off the ART.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The room was clean, although the carpet could be cleaned or updated. The bed/ bedding was comfortable, and having a refrigerator in the room was convenient. Any interaction was staff was fine, and I appreciated them streamlining the check-out by putting the bill/invoice under the door during the night.  I do wish that the hotel provided a shuttle like the Candy Cane Inn, which is next door, because the walk back was a little tiring after spending the day in Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear Disnoid-  Thank you so very much for your feedback on your recent stay with us. We love hearing that our Suites with the fridge and microwave worked perfectly for you. Thank you for the compliments about our staff and their commitment to providing excellent guest service. IN regards to the shuttle, our hotel offers convenience of the Anaheim Resort Transportation shuttle picking up our guests in front of our hotel. We are the first stop on Route 3 for the (A.R.T.) shuttle. We look forward to you returning to the Anaheim Portofino Inn & Suites when your travel plans bring you back to the Disneyland Resort.  Sincerely,  Dan Kramer

Summary Heading: Great Family stay in AWESOME location
Summary: My family and I just returned from a wonderful stay at the Portofino Inn & Suites. The Front office Supervisor, Claudia was warm and welcoming from the moment we entered the office. The night crew greeted us with a smile, when we waddled in from a long day at Disneyland. Thank you so much for providing our family with exceptional service. I know our family will only stay at Portofino Inn & Suites anytime we are in the Anaheim area.   - Lacey Family
Manager Response: Dear Jessica L-  Thank you for being a loyal and repeat guest and for taking the time to share your experience with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. We are glad to hear you had a great time staying at the Portofino Inn & Suites hotel and that you enjoyed the warm welcome from our FD Supervisor Claudia and the her FD Team. We look forward to seeing you and your family the next time you are in Anaheim.  Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: We stayed at the portofino in 2007 when my kids were elementary school age. My 3 kids are 13 18 and 21 now and we remembered the large kids suite that the hotel has. We decided to pay a little extra to get the nice over sized kids suite.  It has 2 bunk beds and a pull out couch, King size bed for adults. There is a sliding glass door if you decide you want to close it between the rooms. The kids had their own tv and pretty much stayed on there side while we had our own tv and I really like that. I can actually watch the news! The room fits 6 so we were also able to bring one of the kids friends.  The walk to disneyland took us 12-15 minutes walking at a decent pace. The room was clean...we did not have any noise issues at all. We were on the third floor. We did hear a baby
Manager Response: Dear tinyninja-  Thank you so very much for your feedback on your recent stay with us. We love hearing that our Family Suite with the bunk beds worked perfectly for the kids.. Thank you for notifying us of your experience with the mini-fridge. We are glad to hear you enjoyed the easy walk from the hotel to the Disneyland Main Entrance.   We look forward to you returning to the Anaheim Portofino Inn & Suites when your travel plans bring you back to the Disneyland Resort.  Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: 20 min. walk to Disney main gate. Several food choices nearby. Kid's Suite room was roomy and clean. Shower faucet leaks in rm 2217. Friendly staff. Room was ready early and they let us check in. Luggage room was very helpful to keep bags after checkout for later retrieval. Would stay there again. Floors and walls are a bit thin and other guests start the day early. Excited kids feet sounds through the ceiling = early wakeup call.
Manager Response: Dear Dan R-  Thank you for the kind words about our Kids Suite with the Bunk-Beds. We are glad to hear you enjoyed the close proximity of the hotel to the Disneyland Main Entrance and near by restaurants.  Thank you for sharing your observation in regards to the faucet. I will personally look into making the proper changes in order to better enhance our guest experience.   We look forward to seeing you and the family during your next visit to Anaheim.  Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: Portofino's primary charm is is location- just minutes from the convention center, Garden Walk, downtown Disney, and of course, Disneyland. The other big pluses about Portofino: outstanding customer service, free parking for guests, free Wifi, and a nice lobby. Negatives were tiny pool, hot tub jets didn't work, room was just so-so, and little to no onsite amenities like food, continental breakfast, cookies, fruit. They did have chilled water in the lobby, which was nice. The beds weren't the worst I've slept in, but certainly not the best. Pets are not permitted and sadly, I had to leave my tiny dog at home. Room was clean but very plain. Ample towels of average size/softness. Small bathtub in each room. Again, loved the staff - from housekeeping to the front desk, they were
Manager Response: Dear slowdiva-  Thank you so much for taking the time to share your feedback. We appreciate your business and kind comments regarding our property and team of service professionals. We are glad to hear that our close proximity to the Convention Center, Garden Walk, Downtown Disney, and the Disneyland parks met all your needs. Thank you for allowing us to be your host hotel during your stay in the Anaheim area.  Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: My family and I came for a quick DIsneyland vacation. We got the room with the bunkbeds and my son loved it. The other beds were comfortable. After all day on your feet at Disneyland, a sleeping bag on the floor would have been comfortable. The only complaint we have was the walls were so thin that we could hear everything going on in the hall and rooms close by. I can't it's the fault of the hotel, so much as it was the rude, inconsiderate guests making all the noise. Proximity to disneyland was good and it was nice to have the shuttle( for a fee ).
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: stayed a week in september with 4 adults, 2 kids
Summary: We didn't love the shower. Don't know if they use water softener and hotel soap left us feeling almost like there was lotion in it. a bit of a slimy feeling.  Other than that the room was great  The room was very clean and lots of space.
Manager Response: Dear Colleen C-  We are glad to hear you had a great quiet and relaxing stay at the Anaheim Portofino Inn & Suites hotel. It is nice to hear you were able to enjoy of our spacious suites and the in room amenities. We look forward to seeing you the next time you are in Anaheim.   Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: Pros - great set up for kids (bunk beds), walking distance to the parks, near food and convenience locations, microwave and fridge, heated pool, comfortable beds, free parking!  Cons - no clean/dry towels at outdoor pool, no night light situation in kids room with bunk bed ( just left TV on with no sound and it worked great), no table for eating in the room, no room service/continental breakfast.
Manager Response: Dear RBlunt-  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us. We are glad to hear that you enjoyed the short walk from our hotel to the Disneyland Maingate entrance. It's great hearing you enjoyed the amenities in our  clean and spacious King Suite such as the mini-fridge, the coffee maker, and the microwave.   We are truly sorry that we fell behind on our pool towel rotation. We will continue to monitor it to ensure the pool towel area is always adequately stocked.   Our bunk-bed rooms do have a little light switch that turns on a small reading light next to both the top and lower bunk bed.  We are very grateful that you allowed us to be your host hotel during your visit to the Anaheim area. We hope that you will consider staying with us again so that we can have another chance to provide you with a superior experience.   Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: Lobby staff were very friendly and service oriented.  Convenient location, short walk to main gate with a 7 Eleven on the way to pick up goodies.  Free parking which is great.  No real amenities though - no lobby coffee bar or cafe or even continental breakfast.  Rooms are clean if not opulent.  Good bargain place suitable for families.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We were impressed with the Portofino Inn and Suites.  Although it wasn't the newest hotel out there, it was clean and spacious.  The staff was helpful and we enjoyed our week there.  We especially loved the proximity to the Disneyland Resort.  And the ART stations were really close.  We never had to wait very long for the bus, and we were only on the bus for a few minutes because the Portofino is the first stop!
Manager Response: Dear Amy S-  Thank you so very much for your feedback on your recent stay with us. We love hearing that our clean and spacious guest room worked perfectly for your visit. Thank you for the compliments about our staff and their commitment to providing excellent guest service.  We are glad to hear you enjoyed the easy walk from the hotel to the Disneyland Main Entrance. It's nice to see that after a long day at the parks, you were able to utilize our Anaheim Resort Transportation (A.R.T.) shuttle to return back to the hotel.  We look forward to you returning to the Anaheim Portofino Inn & Suites when your travel plans bring you back to the Disneyland Resort.  Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: Everything was excellent, very friendly people at the front desk always ready to help, they have a computer that you can use for free, also have vending and ice machines in every floor.  Very good location close to everything. The pool a little cold.
Manager Response: Dear Irma N-  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. We are glad to hear you enjoyed the business center kiosk, the close proximity to the Disney Resort parks, and the pool.  Thank you for the kind words about the friendliness of the staff. We look forward to seeing you the next time you visit the Anaheim area.  Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: Kids like the bunk beds(each with a light). King bed was great. The pool was sufficient. Front desk staff was very helpfull. The only negative I can think of is, we could not get phone to work, even after staff said they would look at it.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Easy check in. Although parking is very tight, but always managed to find a place to park.  Great location, to ALL Anaheim attractions, and venues. Rooms were clean, great price, no xtra charge for parking. Balcony was great! As is always the case near Disneyland. Kids running up & down the halls, at the crack of dawn, excited to see Mickey Mouse. Heard many parents telling the kids to quiet down. Other than that a great stay, lot's of fun!
Manager Response: Dear hoodoo2003-  It was a true pleasure hosting your family and being a part of the Family weekend trip to Anaheim. It is great hearing that the Anaheim Portofino Inn & Suites was perfectly located to all the attractions and an easy walk to Disneyland. We will continue to monitor the corridors to ensure the level of excitement of going to Disneyland is with in reason and doesn't disturb other guests in the hotel.  We look forward to seeing you the next time you and your family visit the Disneyland Resort.  Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: The room was very clean with a balcony, the parking was great, and the pool and spa were Amazing. The best part was the price. Its nearby Disney Land. Me and my family will stay here again. Food nearby as well. Parking is safe with security patrolling.
Manager Response: Dear gus25oro-  We are thrilled to hear from another guest who loved their stay at the Anaheim Portofino Inn & Suites Hotel. We are glad to hear that our close proximity to restaurants and the Maingate Disneyland entrance matched your needs. We look forward to "wowing" you and your family on your next visit to Anaheim and Disneyland.  Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: Very nice room, clean. Recent upgrade. Great location. Not sure what else to say but Trip advise requires 200 characters. Blau do de da blau, Blau do de da blau, Blau do de da blau, Blau do de da blau, Blau do de da blau, Blau do de da blau, Blau do de da blau, Blau do de da blau. Good-bye.
Manager Response: Dear Jeff S-  We are glad to hear you had a relaxing stay at the Anaheim Portofino Inn & Suites hotel. It is nice to hear you were able to enjoy our hotel's great location and spacious guest room. We look forward to seeing you the next time you are in Anaheim.   Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: We were a little apprehensive about our stay at the Portofino due to a recent negative review, but upon our arrival, we were pleasantly surprised. I reserved a Kids Suite room, which included a specialized sleeping section for my two children. The space was separated by French doors. The suite had bunk beds, a television and a refrigerator. Me and my husband slept comfortably on a king size bed. The hotel is within walking distance of Disneyland. In fact, it took us about 10 minutes to reach the park on foot. We were able to find parking at the hotel for our vehicle, and the accommodation's staff members were pleasant and helpful. The construction next door did wake us up, but I knew that it was taking place and felt that it may have played a part in my receiving such a great
Manager Response: Dear amberharvest-  Thank you so very much for your feedback on your recent stay with us. We love hearing that our Family Suite with the bunk beds worked perfectly for the kids. Summary: We stayed for 3 nights.  1st night was great.  2nd night we came home from Disneyland at 10pm and the a/c was not working.  Maintenance guy came and did some tweeking...it worked for most of the night but then got hot again in the middle of the night.  3rd night, same thing.  Different maintenance guy came and it worked fine throughout the night.  I asked for a discount but the front desk person said they have to send the maintenance guy first.  No one followed up.  However, the hotel was close to Disneyland and very convenient to eateries and convenience stores.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This hotel/motel is basically good enough for a 1 or 2 night stay if you're planning to visit Disneyland. 15 minute walk to the Park. Some nice family friendly restaurants in the area. Do not expect a superior hotel, the accommodation is clean and basic, and perfect as a base to visit Disneyland. Staff were extremely friendly and helpful. Family rooms are good. We planned a 4 night stay in LA and booked here, but decided to change hotels after 1 night as we accomplished what we wanted to do, visit Disneyland. We moved to Santa Monica afterwards, as it was a better location for further activities in LA.
Manager Response: Dear RonWalboom-  Thank you so much for your positive comments about your stay at the Anaheim Portofino Inn & Suites Hotel. We are always pleased to hear that our associates were extremely friendly and helpful during your stay. We are glad to hear you were able to enjoy some of the coastal regions during you Southern Ca. visit. We look forward to seeing you the next time you are in the Anaheim area.  Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: The hotel is about a 15-20 minute walk from the entrance to Disneyland.  It's a nice hotel, but seems older.  We stayed in the Family suite which worked out perfect because we had 2 adults and 3 kids.  The outlets were horrible.  The chargers kept falling out of the outlet.  The carpet looked quite worn as did the furniture.  The housekeeping staff did a poor job at cleaning each day, even when we left a tip.  Things like new shampoo and conditioner weren't replenished or the coffee filters.  We had to call almost everyday for them to bring something because housekeeping forgot to replenish it.  I really liked the space we had for all five of us, but when traveling with kids, a hotel closer would be more convenient.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Good hotel, great location, awesome for large family
Summary: This is a great place to stay, especially if you have  a large family (we were 6 and chose the kids suite). What makes it a great value is the proximity to DL (about 15 minutes walk - 2 blocks). It allows you to get to the park early and come back in the afternoon and return in the evening (a must if you small kids). Staff were friendly and accommodating. Has quite a few eating options nearby. One car can be parked free and 2nd car parks for $20 for the entire stay. Rooms could be a cleaner, but like I said the kids suite is exceptional value. No complaints and will stay here again
Manager Response: Dear rockyMountianRajah-  Thank you so very much for your feedback on your recent stay with us. We love hearing that your stay in the Family Suite with the bunk beds was an "awesome" fit for the family. We are glad to hear that our close proximity to restaurants and Main gate Disneyland matched your needs We look forward to you returning to the Anaheim Portofino Inn & Suites when your travel plans bring you back to the Disneyland Resort.  Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: On our recent family trip to Disneyland we stayed at the Portofino Inn & Suites.  The location is perfect for walking to the park. We found the pool a little small for the number of guests the Inn can hold.  The rooms were air conditioned and clean.  The down side of the trip was the hallways that were NOT ventilated and stuffy.  We were on the third floor and had guests in the room above us who made loud noise late in to the night.  Our family member who stayed two doors down experienced the same thing.  Guess the area between the floors is not well insulated.
Manager Response: Dear Paula V- Thank you so very much for your feedback on your recent stay with us. Your satisfaction is important to us. We are glad to hear you enjoyed our clean and spacious suite. We apologize for any noise disturbance that you experienced during your stay. We will continue to monitor the hallways and ensure the temperature is maintained and the noise level is controlled.  It is great to hear you were able to take advantage of our close proximity to Disneyland and you were able walk to the Disney Resort parks. We hope that you will consider staying with us again so that we can have another chance to provide you superior service.  Sincerely, Dan Kramer General Manager

Summary: Customer service was very helpful, I even want to come back next time with my family for vacation. It was a great location I just Walked to the conference for less the 3 blocks and I slept all night no disturbance at all.
Manager Response: Dear Guadalupe G-  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with fellow TripAdvisor travelers. We are glad to hear you enjoyed our quiet and clean Guest Rooms. Thank you for the kind words about the friendliness of our staff. It is great to hear you were able to enjoy our close proximity to the Convention Center and restaurants. We look forward to seeing you the next time you are in Anaheim for that family vacation.  Sincerely, Dan Kramer General Manager

Summary: When we checked into this hotel we were talked into getting an upgraded room (going from $119 to $139/night).  The reason being: there is no fridge or microwave in the cheaper room!  The room we ended up taking has a separation screen in the middle of the room & had 2 bunk beds, a couch, microwave, fridge, tv, & table on one side & a king bed, tv  & a few pieces of furniture.  This is about the only bonus to this room.  The kids were able to have their own beds & we could close the partition when they went to bed.   Our room was directly across from an ice & pop machine, so we were blessed with hearing that thing dispense ice at all hours.  Also the rooms lack soundproofing & we could hear anything & everything other guests were doing.  Again, being woken up at all times.  The

Summary Heading: Best surprise room we've ever had
Summary: We had stayed there before,  but we got the corner room, 1202, this time and we're shocked when we opened the door. Huge room, perfect location,  great price and great value. I recommend you guys to everyone!
Manager Response: Dear Julie B-  We are thrilled to hear from another returning guest who had an excellent stay at the lovely Anaheim Portofino Inn & Suites Hotel. We thank you for all of your kind comments about our affordability and our spacious suites.  We look forward to seeing you again, and hope that it will be very soon.   Sincerely, Dan Kramer General Manager

Summary: Recently stayed here with my family.  Room was great,  staff was excellent.   Good walking distance to Disneyland Parks, good selection of restaurants close by as well.  Kids enjoyed the bunk beds.  Tour bus stops outside hotel for pick up and drop off,  so does Anaheim transit system.   Only down side was pool was closed for maintenance,  but we're able to use pool at the Sheraton with no hassle,  not that we used the pool.
Manager Response: Dear Cindy C- Thank you so very much for your feedback on your recent stay with us. We love hearing that our Family Suite with the bunk beds worked perfectly for the kids. We look forward to you returning to the Anaheim Portofino Inn & Suites when your travel plans bring you back to the Disneyland Resort.  Sincerely,  Dan Kramer

Summary: Had a great time, quite, room was fine and parking was good but did not like that the Hotel did not have a place to have at least breakfast. Check in and out was ok, the place seemed lacking in staff, came up to the front desk on two different occasions and had to wait a few minutes for someone to come out and answer my question.
Manager Response: Dear Covidioperez-  Thank you so very much for your feedback on your recent stay with us. Although we do not serve breakfast at the hotel, we do have Molly's cafe across from our lobby that specializes in breakfast and we do have IHOP directly across the street.   We look forward to seeing you the next time you and your family visit the Disneyland Resort.  Sincerely,  Dan Kramer General Manager

Summary: Many stays here with family, always happy and comfortable returning!  Great location to Disney, quite, clean, great customer service, walking distance and can park for free for the day.  Competitive prices.
Manager Response: Dear Darrin S- Thank you so much for your positive comments about your stay at the Anaheim Portofino Inn & Suites Hotel. We are always so pleased to hear from our returning guests and how they enjoyed their overall experience, the wonderful amenities, and the great location that our hotel has to offer. Thank you for the kind words about our staff and their "great customer service".   We look forward to providing you with another excellent stay, and we hope that will be soon!   Sincerely, Dan Kramer General Manager

Summary: Good hotel 2 blocks away from Disneyland, you get what you pay for so don't expect any luxury or great beds and pillows. We stayed for 8 nights from April 28th. through May 6th. (room 1302) We are a family of 5 my wife and 3 kids ages 7, 5 and 5 so we got the suite that has the bunk beds and the sofa, the kids were very happy. The pool is heated and is a fairly good size the only issue was that it was so windy it kept blowing the tree leafs into the pool and it looked bad. There was always a spot to park and we really didn't noticed any noise from the construction nearby.  The only problem we had was a wire stiking out of the sofa bed that scratch my daughter's leg,  I went to the reception and they sent somebody right away to fix it.  So if you are a big family and don't want
Manager Response: none

Summary: We were lied to from before we even got on the airplane to fly to California. We called and specifically asked about the "renovations" we heard about and wanted to know more about the room we booked specifically. The girl who helped us said our room had been fully renovated with new bedding, carpets, furniture, etc. and that she knew we'd be satisfied with the room. None of that was true. The carpet was old, our furniture was beat up, stained, and scuffed, wallpaper coming off the walls, and the bathroom fan was broken and made the loudest most unpleasant noise when you turned it on. So at night, when we didnt want to wake our kids, my husband and I used our cellphone flash lights to go to the bathroom.   We also received an email from the general manager stating that if there
Manager Response: Dear Brianne S-  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us.  On behalf of our entire team, I would like to apologize for failing to exceed your expectations. Your satisfaction is important to us and we will be using the feedback you provided to make improvements to ensure we offer an exceptional experience for our guests in the future. I have shared your comments with our staff and Management team so that we can learn from your observations and continue to improve in the Maintenance and Housekeeping Dept.   We are saddened to hear that you were unable to have relaxing stay with us due to the shuttle pick up. We do have our own pick up and drop off.  We are the first hotel listed on the Shuttle schedule on Route 3. You do not have to go to the Sheraton for the ART shuttle.   I apologize that you sent an email that was unanswered. In most cases, The reservation confirmation has the Reservation Manager's number for any inquiries or changes. We have made a test res. and this is the message that appeared on the reservation confirmation. "Please call us at 888-297-7143.Warm regards, Reservations Manager." Once again, We are truly sorry for any inconvenience we may have caused you. We are very grateful that you allowed us to be your host hotel during your visit to the Anaheim area. We hope that you will consider staying with us again so that we can have another chance to provide you with a superior experience.   Sincerely, Dan Kramer

Summary: We stayed here the first of May while on a trip to Disneyland.  We stayed in a kids suite which was quite roomy.  it has a mini fridge and microwave.  The staff is all very friendly.  The room itself is run down and not cleaned well.  It is only surface cleaned.  There was food and dirt in corners.  The drawers hadn't been cleaned in a long time.  The bathroom had dust and rust in several spaces.  The room needed a very good deep clean!!!   if you are just needing a place to crash at night I guess it would work, but for my family it wasn't what we like.  My daughter even broke out in an all body rash due to cleaning chemicals in the room or on the sheets and towels.  We will not stay here again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This property was clean, spacious and compact.  We stayed in a king suite.  It came with a refrigerator, microwave and a coffee maker.  Adequate supplies were available (towels, coffee).  The bed was comfortable.  The location is about one block from Disneyland, on the same side of Harbor Blvd.
