Also, we do have a large gift shop offering beverages, snacks, sundries and Disneyland® souvenirs, as well as many restaurant options within walking distance from our hotel.  Again, thank you for staying with us and completing the review.  Come back and see us again soon!  Best, Mitch Healy, General Manager

Summary Heading: Wasn't what was promised or expected
Summary: Prior to my stay, I had e-mailed the guest manager to assure a patio or balcony in the newer section of the hotel.  I did in fact receive a return e-mail that ALL their rooms included this amenity.  Upon arrival into our room, I didn't know whether I was in the newer section or not?  For starters, I had a great view of the parking lot!  So much for that request?  Further there were two of us - Mother and son, but the room was equipped for one as far as towels, which I requested more from housekeeping. We never got any view of the fireworks because of our location, in addition, the noise from other travelers was unbearable in the morning in the parking lot.  Furthermore, carpets need to be cleaned.  And finally....to run out of hot water in a hotel at 9:00 a.m. was the last
Manager Response: Dear TripAdvisor Member,  Our sincerest apologies goes out to you and your son for the miscommunication and inconveniences that occurred.  All of our rooms include a patio or balcony and should always be prepared with towels and toiletries for at least 2 guests, depending on the room type.  We are sorry for our housekeeping oversight and have followed up on this detail, as this is extremely out of the ordinary.  Be assured that we do our very best to fulfill all of our guests' requests, however, unfortunately, this is not always possible, especially during the busy summer months.  Again, we regret that we failed to deliver an exceptionally enjoyable experience for you and your son. Thank you for taking the time to give us your feedback by completing the review.  Best, Mitch Healy, General Manager

Summary: I loved the family suite with bunk beds.  My kids each had their own bed. Easily sleeps 4 children. 2 queen beds and bunk beds, what a brilliant idea.  Although we hardly spent any time in the room, it was a great option to crash at after 16 hours of Disney.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This is our 3rd stay at the Portofino. We love the kids suites!! The bunk beds and sofa bed, work so well for our children. The king bed was great too. However, during the refurb of hotel, the table and chairs were totally removed from the room, The dresser and TV stand were the same older furniture from years ago. The furniture really needs to be replaced. The drawers would not close completely. The shower head is low, for my husband.   The staff is friendly. The pool and the hot tub were average, kids loved it!! We walked to the park, and took the ART home at night. Overall, for a comfortable room to sleep it works, if you need more amenities, this hotel is not for you.
Manager Response: Dear carolyn p,  Thank you for returning to stay with us.  We appreciate your business and value your feedback on your recent stay.  It's great to hear that you and your family enjoy our Kids Suites and friendly staff.  Your insight on certain features and amenities have been taken seriously, as our number one goal is providing the best experience for our guests time and time again.  We want you as our loyal guests and look forward to welcoming you back for your 4th stay at the Portofino Inn & Suites Anaheim Hotel!  Kind Regards, Mitch Healy, General Manager

Summary: hi well we had a lot of fun staying there only one unsatisfing situation when i called to book this room they told me about the tickets discount and when i got there to check in and buy some tickets the gentelmen in the front counter told me there was no discount tickets there but as i was going to my room i saw a poster right by the elevator that said you guys had some discount for disneyland tickets so what happen their why didn't i qualify for that discount our stay was for two nights but we added a third night  the guy also told me i had to buy my tickets at the door in disneyland  and i had to buy seven of them a regular price very un happy with this situation wish i could of been better
Manager Response: none

Summary: Nice hotel, close walking distance to Disney, staff was friendly.  The rooms were ok, could use a little updating, would have also been nice too have a fridge in room.  Overall, we would probably stay again, oh, nice they offered Government rate!
Manager Response: none

Summary: We had read some reviews mixed on this hotel but I have to say the place is clean and comfortable. The staff was pleasant and accommodating. The beds felt good and smelled clean. Rooms were clean too. Pool was nice although a bit small but clean and cared for. It could use an upgrade soon but kids loved it. We stayed in a double queen and could have used a refrigerator. That was really the only downside. Definitely would recommend staying here. Disneyland was only a block and a half away too!!
Manager Response: Dear Jodi K,  Your review and fabulous compliments are greatly appreciated!  Thank you for staying at the Portofino Inn & Suites and sharing your enjoyable experience with us.  It was our extreme pleasure to exceed your expectations, as your comfort and enjoyment is our top priority.  Please keep in mind for your next stay, there are refrigerators included in our King and Kids Suites and for guests staying in our rooms and deluxe rooms we have them available for a nominal daily fee.  Thank you for your high recommendation of our Anaheim hotel.  We enjoyed having you and your family as our guests.  Best, Mitch Healy, General Manager

Summary Heading: Good location but would not stay again
Summary: We stayed here for 4 nights. The staff upon arrival was helpful and kind. We had a kid suite room with bunk beds in separate room which kids enjoyed. Our room smelled funny as well as third floor in hallway. The room was a bit rundown and needs updating. The outside sink stopper was broken and plugged so we couldn't use it. We made 2 requests to fix and never got done. On last day before checking out our toilet handle broke. It was a nice location near Disneyland and decent price with Disneyland package purchase but would not choose again.
Manager Response: Dear Carrie P,  We apologize for our oversight and the inconvenience.  Thank you for your patience and understanding.  We have taken immediate action to further investigate the details described in your review, as we are committed to listening to our guests'  feedback and making the necessary improvements to ensure the best experience.  We are pleased that you did enjoy our helpful service, amenities and amazing location.  Your business is very important to us and we hope to have another opportunity in the future to impress you.  Thank you for completing the review on our property.  Best, Mitch Healy, General Manager

Summary: Well, I was looking forward to an amazing hotel experience, since I believe that the property was either owned or supported by Disney, but the hotel wasn't as great as I thought it was going to be.  It seemed old and rather beat up, though in the pictures looks very new. Our room smelled like mold and the vent in the ceiling was coming off. We drove down the street to Target and had to pick up dryer sheets to stick in the vent and Febreeze to stay in the room because it was so smelly. This made it..almost bearable. The convenience of two pools was great and the hotel lobby was pristine, but the room was kind of gross. The funniest thing about the room was that one of the paintings of a flower vase had been hung upside down :D All in all, it served its purpose as a room, which
Manager Response: Dear HopeGracePeace,  Thank you for taking the time to provide us with your feedback by completing the review on TripAdvisor. We are extremely disappointed that your experience fell short of your expectations and apologize for the inconveniences that occurred.  Our team follows up on all of our guest's comments and has immediately taken action to locate the room you stayed in and resolve any issues.  Please also know that it would have been our great pleasure to relocate you into another room to ensure your comfort.  Again, thank you for your review.  We do hope you will consider returning to enjoy an experience that will exceed your expectations.  Best Regards, Mitch Healy, General Manager

Summary Heading: It worked fine for what we needed...
Summary: We stayed for 2 nights but were barely even in the room. We got the king suite with the sliding door divider. The kids slept on the sofabed. I wish the sliding door had a darker curtain on it to block out the light/tv from the king room as they went to bed earlier than we did. I also wish there were a couple more outlets to plug chargers, etc. in the room. I didn't see any in the main king side of the room at all, unless I missed them. Each day there was a big daddy long leg type spider in the shower, but other than that the room seemed clean.  The full day and night that we were there we left the room at 7:30 am to go to the park and came back at 3:00  pm for a nap. Our room was still not made up so before we left to go back to the park  at 5:30 pm, I called the front desk to
Manager Response: Dear Julie E,  Thank you for taking the time to provide us with your feedback and bring very important details of your stay to our attention.  We apologize for our housekeeping oversight and have addressed your experience with our staff to ensure this remains an isolated incident.  Thank you for your patience and understanding.  We are glad that you and your family did enjoy your overall stay in our King Suite.  We appreciate your business and want you as our loyal guest.  It is our hope that you and your family will return to our hotel and give us the pleasure of accommodating you again.  Kindest Regards, Mitch Healy, General Manager

Summary: Stayed in the kids suite comfortably. Room was perfect. Clean fluffy white bedding. The kids loved the bunk beds. We hit the food for less around the corner and loaded up on food. Some food fit in the room fridge, some in our cooler. We fit 2 adults on the king and one kid, two adults on the sofa bed, and two kids on the bunk. There are french doors that seperate the rooms if desired. Room was clean, everything worked and I just don't have any complaints.
Manager Response: Dear Chantel H,  Thank you for making us a part of your family's visit to California!  We are very excited to hear that our Kids Suite worked out perfectly for you and your family of 7! The separate rooms, extra space and great amenities are certainly the ideal accommodations for any family.  it was a pleasure to have you and your family as our guests.  We look forward to welcoming you back to Anaheim and serving you again.  Best, Mitch Healy, General Manager

Summary: we went to disneyland this past weekend and stay at the portofino, it was our first time staying there, when i made the reservation online a couple of months ago i decided on this hotel because of the pictures it had on the site it showed spacious rooms since we are a party of six... At our arrival to the hotel i have to say it was good everyone was super nice, we stayed for 2 nights and the room we stayed was ok, only that the tv's brightness was a low and didn't have the feature to fix, rooms had the bunk bed and pull out bed so for our second night we requested another room closer to the pool and the room was even better( that was in the main building where the reception is) i loved the pool though small but water temperature very nice, since the other swimming pool is under
Manager Response: Dear gurrumina2000,  Thank you for choosing to stay at our Anaheim hotel.  We are very happy to learn of your family's comfort in our Kids Suite and it was certainly our pleasure to relocate your suite to better fit your preference.  Thank you for mentioning that you also enjoyed our heated pool and extremely convenient location.  Being located so close to all of the Disney excitement and so many dining and shopping options definitely sets our property apart from all the rest!  We appreciate your business and consideration of our property for your next visit to Anaheim.   Thank you for your great review!  Kindly, Mitch Healy, General Manager

Summary: Although the Service was satisfactory, it was disappointing to see the furnishings in our room as poor.  The bed sheets had holes in them, the chairs were squeaky, the bathroom needed a new paint job.  We were told after the booking, that there was no continental breakfast provided and upon checking in, we had to pay $10.00 extra for a refrigerator.
Manager Response: Dear Lupe M,  We apologize for the condition of your room described in your review.  Please know that this certainly is not the typical experience at our hotel, and we have immediately followed up on your comments.  Also, all of our amenities, as well as any fees, are listed on our website and third party websites.  We regret this miscommunication with you and appreciate your understanding.  Standardly, if any fees apply to certain guest's requests they are reviewed by the reservation agent if booking by phone and are displayed on your reservation before confirming if booking online.  Again, we apologize for missing our mark at providing the comfortable and enjoyable stay you deserve.  It would certainly be a great pleasure to exceed any expectation you may have on your next visit to Anaheim.  Best, Mitch Healy, General Manager

Summary: Great hotel, walking distance to Disneyland, very convenient.  Just wish there was a continental breakfast, but you can't have everything.  The price was right and the location was convenient.  The pool and hot tub were a plus and having a kids suite with microwave and fridge were very nice extras.
Manager Response: Dear Karen B,  It certainly is encouraging and rewarding for our staff to receive your 5 star rating and fantastic review on your recent stay at the Portofino Inn & Suites Anaheim!  Thank you for taking the time out of your busy schedule to let us and other TripAdvisor travelers know how much you enjoyed our Anaheim hotel.  We appreciate your business and can't wait to welcome you back to enjoy another 5 star experience!  Best, Mitch Healy, General Manager

Summary: We have traveled a lot, so I have much from which to base an opinion.  We would not stay there again but my reasons might not matter to some.  The bad:  The sound proofing is horrible, you can hear everything from other rooms at all hours of the night/day.  This was the overall worst part of the hotel.   Much worse than most hotels and not recommended if you are a light sleeper like me.  There was two guest laundry washer/dryers, and one was broke, and there was a constant battle over getting access to the one that worked - everyone wanted to use it.  The beds weren't very comfortable.  The TV worked only sporadically - I was told the new cable boxes were not communicating well with the TV's.    The good:  the rooms were nice and it was great to have the kids' suite with their
Manager Response: Dear M P,  Thank you for taking the time to tell us about your experience at the Portofino Inn & Suites Anaheim.  We are sorry to hear of the noise you experienced; please accept our sincerest apologies.  It would have been our pleasure to move you into a different room that better fit your preference.  Also, please know that the washer/dryer that was briefly out of order has been repaired and is working properly.  Thank you for your patience and understanding.  We appreciate you noting that you and your family enjoyed the extra space and amenities in our Kids Suite, our responsive and helpful service, clean property and unbeatable location!  We hope that you will keep all of these great details in mind when planning your next trip to Anaheim. Our staff would certainly appreciate the opportunity to deliver a quality stay that exceeds your expectations.  Warm Regards, Mitch Healy, General Manager

Summary: Would never stay at this hotel again.  Too expensive and not worth the money and the parking is horrible and a little scary.  And make sure to bring your own covers and sheets.  On the walk back from the park there are a couple of stores incase you need or forgot something.
Manager Response: Dear Stacy4_13,  We regret that your recent stay failed to impress you.  Please know that our housekeeping staff works extremely hard to ensure our guests have a clean and comfortable stay, and we are sorry that we missed our mark on this occasion.  It would have been our pleasure to immediately visit your room to resolve any details described in your review and, perhaps, relocate you into a different room.  We are always at your service and appreciate any opportunity while you are staying with us to make your experience an enjoyable one. Also, please understand that when operating at full capacity our front parking lot can get busy; however, there is an additional lot, accessible through our front lot, that is located on the other side of the pool area.  Again, we apologize for any inconvenience and appreciate your time in completing the review.  Best Regards, Mitch Healy, General Manager

Summary: The hotel is what you might guess for the price .It really didn't look like online pictures. The pool pictures must have been taken years ago. What we found that was not good at all,  was that they offered us discount tickets to Disneyland over the phone after I had booked the hotel. I was going to purchase and print tickets on line to save us time and money. The lady told me that we could purchase them at the hotel at the same discount price. When we arrived she informed me that they no longer did that. She told me that I could go next door to the Jolly Rodger to purchase them. We went next door to the Jolly Rodger Hotel and the prices were higher than what than I could have printed on line. The man at the desk was very rude when I decide not to purchase they're tickets. He
Manager Response: Dear Pam P,  Please accept our sincere apology for any miscommunication or inconvenience that occurred.  Our discounted Disneyland tickets are always sold at the same price, whether you purchase them when booking your reservation or once you arrive at our property.  At the end of last month, we did experience a very high demand for tickets from our guests and, unfortunately, our supply was briefly depleted.  Please also know that beginning June 2 Disneyland ticket prices increased, which also affects the discounted price that we are allowed to offer our guests.  Again, we are sorry for this unintentional mishap.  It is always our goal to exceed any expectations of our guests, and we regret we missed our mark on this occasion.  We do hope you and your family will decide to revisit our hotel and give us the pleasure of providing an improved experience.  Thank you for your review.  Kind Regards, MItch Healy, General Manager

Summary: The service we received was excellant.  Employees were very nice and helpful.  The room was a little dated, but comfortable and clean. Especially nice was the seperate room for the kids with bunkbeds and pull out couch, and their own tv.  Having a mini fridge, microwave, and hairdryer was nice too.  There were not enough plug ins for phones and ipads though.
Manager Response: Dear Kathyrrt10,  Thank you for your valued feedback on our excellent customer service and comfortable accommodations.  We appreciate your detailed comments on our Kids Suites and are glad that you  and your family enjoyed the extra space and amenities.  Again, thank you for your comments and suggestions.  We want you as our loyal guests and hope to welcome you and your family back to Anaheim on your next trip to California!  Best, Mitch Healy, General Manager

Summary: This place was ok. I've stayed in much better places around Anaheim. The location is great though, a very quick and easy walk to the parks. It was fine to sleep in but I wouldn't want to spend a great deal of time here. Staff seemed friendly enough but this place needs a bit of an update. probably wouldn't stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Kristy G,  We're sorry that missed our mark at exceeding all of your expectations.  Thank you for mentioning that you did enjoy our great location and friendly staff. .  We do our very best to provide each of our guests with a comfortable, quality experience.  It would certainly be a pleasure to have the opportunity to impress you by providing an improved stay.  Thank you for your review.  Best Regards, Mitch Healy, General Manager

Summary: This was a great choice for my family. We stayed 2 nights 3 days in a kids suite which was perfect. Very clean, spacious, and friendly. They let us check in our bags early and hang out at the pool. Would definetaly stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear RoxNR,  It's wonderful to learn that you and your family had a great stay with us.  Hearing that our Kids Suite was perfect is always music to our ears!  It was our extreme pleasure to accommodate you by checking in your baggage early so that you could enjoy our pool.  Your comfort and enjoyment is our top priority from the moment you arrive.  Thank you for your review.  We can't wait to provide you and your family with another quality stay.  Kindest Regards, Mitch Healy, General Manager

Summary: I only stayed one night but the beds and pillows were so comfortable that we didn't want to get out of bed. The room was so spacious so it was easy to spead out our things. It's random but I liked the showerhead too. The front desk staff was so helpful and friendly with giving directions to Disneyland, Downtown Disney, and other places to eat in the area. Not many channels work in our room, so I assumed it may have been our particular room but we didn't spend much time watching tv, except at night before bed, so it wasn't a big deal.
Manager Response: Dear Ashley G,  Thank you for sharing the details on all that you enjoyed while staying at our Anaheim hotel! Our plush new bedding, including sheets and duvet covers, certainly adds to the great comfort you enjoyed in our beds.  We completely understand how you didn't want to get out of bed!  We also would like to thank you for your valued insight on your new shower heads.  Your comment really isn't random at all; you should expect to enjoy everything about our hotel, including our showers!  Please know that your comments on the television in your room have been followed up by our maintenance team.  Again, thank you for your 5 star rating and review on your entire experience with us.  We can't wait to serve and accommodate you again soon!  Best,  Mitch Healy, General Manager

Summary: We stayed at this hotel in May 2013.  We were excited about the bunk bed and sofa bed in a separate room option for our 4 kids, that was a great feature.  However...we found food splattered on the curtains and the wall and the wall paper was peeling in the bathroom.  Aside from that the overall appearance of the room was okay.  The entrance door to the building had no working lock on it and it was completely open to the public!!  The main reason I gave this hotel only 1 star is because when we arrived at home after our trip and I unpacked our "souvenirs bag" which we had not used other than to put our items that we only used for travel time or to store our souvenirs in I found several items missing from it.  We had hardly opened this bag during our trip so I found this to be
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great location, good rooms, awful staff!
Summary: We are currently staying at the portofino for our family Disneyland trip. The location is great!! Just a short walk from the main gates. We have had no problem walking with our two young children multiple times a day. The rooms are good. You can tell they have made some updates but still lacking in some areas. The kids suite is PERFECT for the kids and very large!! However the staff was not very helpful. We stratigrcally planned our flight into LA around the promised check in time of 3 pm. We arrived at the hotel at 4 pm with hot cranky kids who desperately needed to lay down. When we went to check in we were told our room was not ready and in fact was still occupied. We were told to wait and we would be notified when it was ready. At 6 pm the room was still not ready!! After
Manager Response: Dear Sacramentocustomer,  We are extremely sorry for the inconvenient delay in checking into our hotel that you experienced, as well as for failing to express our regret in person. Your patience and understanding is greatly appreciated.  Our standard check in time is 3:00 p.m. and guests are checked in as they arrive at our hotel.  Please know that when we are operating at full capacity, our options to check you into another suite are limited.  Your review has been discussed with our staff to ensure that the correct information and proper sentiment is expressed in the future. Thank you for not only bringing this to our attention, but for also sharing all the wonderful things you enjoyed.  We do hope that our perfect family accommodations and great location brings you back to stay with us.  It would be a pleasure to serve you with the impressive and attentive service you deserve.  Best, Mitch Healy, General Manager

Summary: Enjoyed every aspect of our stay, room was extremly clean, staff was friendly and helpful, and the distance to the parks is so convinient that anyone feels comfortable doing the ride.  There are plenty of restaurants to visit arround, a seven eleven across the Street, and a 2 mile walking to Target to fuel up my girls supply of "food".
Manager Response: Dear ComalaHostessMara,  It's very exciting for us to hear that you and your family enjoyed every aspect of your stay at the Portofino Inn & Suites Anaheim!  Thank you very much for letting us and other travelers know how comfortable you were in our accommodations and that you enjoyed friendly and helpful service.  We are also pleased that you found our amazing location not only convenient to the Disney parks, but to many restaurants and stores.  Thank you for your excellent review!  We hope you will return to enjoy another 5 star experience in the very near future!  Kindest Regards, Mitch Healy, General Manager

Summary: This was our second stay at the Portofino.  The first time we enjoyed ourselves so much we didn't think twice about staying here again.  Unfortunately, in the year and a half since our previous stay the hotel had diminished considerably in both service and upkeep.  We stayed in a family suite this trip with my mother and our 5 year old daughter.  Our room was neat but there was a plumbing issue that caused an "odd" smell to come up through the sink regularly during the night.  We also had a direct line of communication with a neighboring room through the vent in the bathroom.  Unfortunately, we did not really want to hear everything that was going on in this other room at all hours of the night.  The hotel is conveniently located to Disneyland and reasonably priced.  It's an
Manager Response: Dear SBJ1218,  Thank you for returning to stay with us.  While we are glad that you enjoyed our neat rooms and amazing location, it is quite disappointing for us to hear that we missed our mark at providing a comfortable and memorable experience. Please accept our sincere apology.  We appreciate you bringing the odor from the sink and neighboring guest disturbance to our attention.  Please know that we are at your service at all times during your stay.  We are always happy to accept and welcome any opportunity to make your stay with us the very best experience you can possibly enjoy.  We appreciate your business and want your continued patronage.  It would be our extreme pleasure to have you back and impress you with an improved stay.  Best Regards, Mitch Healy, General Manager

Summary: Our room was clean, and the service was excellent.  Parking near the door into the buildings is a little sparse, but there's parking available a short distance away.  Walking to Disney (Disneyland, California Adventure, Downtown Disney) is simple and easy.  It's about a 1/2 mile.  We walked it twice a day.  We ate breakfast at the nearby IHOP and Dennys.  They got a little crowded because they are so close to Disneyland.  I'm sure there were more choices nearby, but we didn't look for any alternatives.  I recommend this hotel if your trip is based on Disney.
Manager Response: Dear Mike S,  It's wonderful to hear that you and your family enjoyed our clean hotel, excellent service and, of course, our incredible location!  Thank you for sharing how simple and easy the walk from our Anaheim hotel to the Disney Parks truly is.  We appreciate you recommending our hotel to other TripAdvisor travelers seeking accommodations conveniently located near the Disney Parks.  We hope to see you on your next visit to California.  Best, Mitch Healy, General Manager

Summary: We stayed in a kid suite after a friend recommending the hotel.  Things we liked : bunk beds, having a fridge, layout of the room, friendly staff.  Things we didn't like so much: too many things needed updating.. Toilet and shower leaked, one light didn't work at all, laundry machines need to be replaced.. They were pretty gross. The card lock didn't work half the time, laundry room door didn't ever lock.
Manager Response: Dear WOlthoff,  Thank you for deciding to stay with us on a friend's recommendation.  It's great that you enjoyed several features that our Kids Suites offer.  We appreciate you bringing to our attention the details of your room that need immediate follow up and/or repair.  Our maintenance team has already taken the necessary steps to locate this room to ensure the appropriate repairs are completed.  If there is anything further that you would like to discuss about your stay, please do not hesitate to contact me directly at the hotel.  We do hope that you and your family will return to the Portofino Inn & Suites Anaheim.  Thank you for taking the time to complete the TripAdvisor review on our property.  Best Regards, Mitch Healy, General Manager

Summary: Let me stary off by saying I loved our stay, The staff is very friendly and helpful. The giftshop Pauline was so nice to put togther a basket with goodies balloons and a Minnie and Mickie ready in our room for our arrival. Thanks... We had a room on the 5th floor amazing view at night. Kids loved the bunkbeds. We stayed here for 4 nights. the first 3 were great  but we noticed a few bites on us at first we thought a mosquito. Then on the last night my husband and I were covered in bug bites literally between the two of us we had over 40. WOW . Apon checkout i showed the lady at the reception cause it was 6 am and no manager was available. She said it seems we might have a problem on the 5th floor.? Really! I reported to MITCH the next day.  ( Hes great ) He took care of
Manager Response: Dear L R,  Firstly, we sincerely apologize for the inconvenience you and your family experienced.  As your comfort is of paramount importance to us, we would like to thank you for giving us the opportunity to immediately address and resolve this isolated incident to ensure that others do not experience it.  Unfortunately, the reality of our global industry is that incidents do occur in every region of the country, and most hotels experience this at one point or another.  We are extremely aggressive in our proactive and preventative measures, including a strict professional pest control regimen throughout our entire property.  Please know that your room was taken out of service in order for a thorough professional inspection and treatment to be completed. The process that we require our pest management professionals to use is a heat treatment, which is much more aggressive than other methods. After 48 hours and 72 hours, additional inspections were conducted in this room and neighboring rooms to ensure that our efforts were successful.  Thank you for taking the time to mention our respectful and honest attention to this matter. We appreciate and commend your strength of character in reviewing your entire experience fairly and are happy that you loved your stay.  It’s wonderful to hear that you would definitely return to stay with us, as your business and guest loyalty means the world to us. Again, we apologize for this unforeseen and unfortunate incident, and look forward to providing a comfortable and impressive experience on your return visit.  Best Regards, Mitch Healy, General Manager

Summary: I really wanted to love it - the price was fantastic for a Disney ticket inclusive package.  That, and the very friendly front desk staff are where the positive elements end.  Not that anything was horrific mind you, just so many small things that bugged me (all personal preferences - your opinion may differ).  The room we had was a kid's suite with bunk beds in a separate space (glass french doors do nothing for privacy as they don't block light or sound).  Microwave and fridge were in the kid's portion of the room, vanity and bathroom are in the main part. This type of room does not have opening windows or a balcony; nor does it have a ventillation fan in the bathroom. Things like no closet (there is a wardrobe with a small space for hanging clothes), no waste can in the
Manager Response: Dear ronandannette,  Thank you for taking advantage of our Disney package and sharing your experience on Tripadvisor. It is disappointing for al lot us to learn that we failed to exceed your expectations.  We do appreciate your comments and suggestions, as we are committed to listening to our guests and implementing the necessary improvements.  Please keep in mind that we do offer several different room types that may better fit your preference.  We are pleased that you enjoyed our friendly customer service and hope that you will decide to return to enjoy an improved stay with us.  Thank you for your valued feedback.  Best, Mitch Healy, General Manager

Summary: The worst part ... I could only sleep for about 4 hours one night. Due to our neighbors above us. It was a bunch of "kids" - middle to high school age. Why they wouldn't put them on the 1st floor, I'm not sure. I finally called to complain about 1am. It was quiet until 5am, when I woke to them wrestling upstairs. Not at all sound proof!!!  Hotel was good distance to Disney - very walkable, even when you are tired at the end of a long Disney day. Across the street from 7-11, where we got coffee and water for each day. Not a whole lot of restaurant options very nearby. Mortons very close and ihop across the street. There was a subway kitty corner as well. Comfortable and clean. Kids loved the bunk beds. Our cleaning lady was great! She cleaned and organized. Even arranged the lego
Manager Response: Dear Christie A,  While we are glad that the majority of your stay you and your family were comfortable and enjoyed our Kids Suite and amenities, we regret that your sleep was disrupted one of your nights with us by neighboring guests.  Please accept our apology for this inconvenience and know that we are always at your service at all hours.  We would have been happy to assist and ensure your comfort in this situation.  Thank you for taking the time to let us and other travelers know that you had an overall good experience us.  We appreciate your business and hope to have the pleasure of having you and your family as our guests again.  Best, Mitch Healy, General Manager

Summary: I have stayed here before and I am a little disappointed that there isn't a refrigerator in each room.  Yet, the room was pretty clean and the shower had water pressure.  The bed was comfortable and overall, I would stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Renea K,  Thank you for returning to our Anaheim hotel.  It's great to hear that you and your family enjoyed our clean accommodations, comfy beds and great water pressure in our shower.  Please know that we do offer room types that include a refrigerator, and we also have refrigerators available upon your request for a nominal daily fee.  Thank you for sharing with other TripAdvisor travelers that you would stay with us again.  We appreciate your continued patronage and look forward accommodating you and your family again.  Best, Mitch Healy, General Manager

Summary Heading: Great place to stay for Disney trip
Summary: This was our second time staying at Portofino.  Our family loves it, great quality for the price.  The staff is friendly and helpful.  It's clean and spacious in the kid bunk rooms.  My only complaint would be that when it's busy the pool can be a bit yucky.. too small for a lot of people. Close, easy walk to Disney!
Manager Response: Dear Rebecca O,  Thank you for returning to stay at the Portofino Inn & Suites Anaheim!  We are very happy to have you and your family as our loyal guests and appreciate all of your great compliments on our hotel, staff and convenient location.  Thank you for completing the review on TripAdvisor.  We can't wait to welcome you back and earn another 5 star rating across the board!  Best, Mitch Healy, General Manager

Summary: I recently stayed at the Portofino Inn for three nights along with my daughter's family which included a three year-old and six year-old. The hotel was part of a Disneyland package via CostCo. Originally, I reserved a deluxe room with two queen beds, but upon checking in, discovered that the kid suites were in a separate building from the deluxe rooms. Since one of my roles was assistant child wrangler, this situation would not work for us. When I found out that upgrading to a suite was only $30 more per night, we were able to get two adjoining suites, and the children could go back and forth safely and easily.  The Portofino is a 10-15 minutes walk to the gates of Disneyland. This was fine for the children on the way there, but they really dragged going back. There is a bus
Manager Response: Dear Kathryn B,  Thank you for the great review on the Portofino Inn & Suites Anaheim!  We are very happy that you and your whole family enjoyed all that our hotel has to offer, and are certain that your extensive details and tips will be helpful to other travelers.  We are happy to inform you that very soon we will be installing brand new air conditioning units!  Thank you for your wonderful compliments on our customer service, accommodations and unbeatable location!  We appreciate your recommendation of our Anaheim hotel and hope you will take advantage of our affordable rates and Disney packages again on your next visit to our area.  Best, Mitch Healy, General Manager

Summary Heading: Ok place if you want to just sleep.
Summary: i initially chose this place because it said it was close to disneyland and we would get a great view of the caliornia adventure. we get there and we have no view, just a view of a construction site, which was extremely loud in the morning. they also told me when i made my reservation that they would do something specail for my sons 4th birthday. so im expecting something when we check in. and comes to find out that they didnt do anything for him. which was such a big disappointment. the rooms were small and carpet and room looked dirty. there were spills on the floor by the fridge, mattress was dirty and chairs. but it was a place to sleep. we didnt spend much time in the room which was fine. but experience couldve been alot better!! also front desk staff never explained what
Manager Response: Dear Samantha T,  We are extremely sorry that we missed the opportunity to express our well wishes for your son's birthday.  Please accept our apologies for this miscommunication.  We have immediately followed up on your comments to ensure that going forward pertinent information such as this is noted in the proper section of the reservation, that is then forwarded to the appropriate staff members at our hotel.  We do enjoy acknowledging a special celebration at our front desk and in the guest's room and, again, are sorry for failing to do so on this occasion.  All of your valued feedback is greatly appreciated.  We do hope that you will decide to return to enjoy an improved experience with us.  Best Regards, Mitch Healy, General Manager

Summary Heading: Always a good place to stay
Summary: I've stayed her multiple times.  The rooms are always clean, the hotel is near the convention center AND the Disney parks, as well as easy access to shopping, restaurants, etc., all in walking distance.  The recent updating (new carpet and linens) is nice.
Manager Response: Dear KSargen,  We greatly appreciate your continued patronage and valuable insight on our new carpet, bed sheets and duvet covers.  Your comfort and enjoyment is our top priority and we are pleased to receive your positive comments on our renovations.  Thank you for mentioning our amazing Anaheim location that is, indeed, conveniently located near the Disney Parks, Anaheim Convention Center, many restaurant options, shops and much more!  It is our great pleasure to have you as our loyal guest and we look forward to earning another fantastic review on your next visit.  Kind Regards, Mitch Healy, General Manager

Summary: We booked a Kid's Suite Disney package that included two 2-day Adult park hopper tickets and very happy with the accommodations and convenient location. It was nice having a separate room for the kids when it was their bedtime.  The pool was small and got crowed in the evening after the parks closed, but we didn't have a lot of time to spend in it anyway.
Manager Response: Dear KGerken,  Your excellent review and 5 star rating on your experience with us is greatly appreciated!  Thank you for choosing to stay with us by taking advantage of our Disney Package.  Our Kids Suites were specially designed with families in mind.  They are always a huge hit with our younger guests and the extra space and privacy is enjoyed by their parents!  Once again, thank you for your valued feedback.  We are anxiously awaiting your return visit!  Best, Mitch Healy, General Manager

Summary: We have stayed at the Portofino Hotel before and it was always a bit above average but the location is what drew us back. the hotel room was dirty and had a very unpleasant odor. The shower had mold on the tiles and the carpet looked as if it had not been cleaned in years. there were mystery stains in the drawers, so we left our close in the suitcases.It is a short walk to Disneyland, which was the reason for our visit. You can hear every person in the hallway so don't plan on sleeping past 6:30am
Manager Response: Dear trcrotelli,  We are disappointed to hear that your most recent experience with us failed to deliver the above average stay that you should expect as our guests.  Thank you for bringing these important details of your stay to our attention.  Please know that we appreciate any opportunity given during your stay to ensure your comfort and enjoyment.  It would have been our pleasure to investigate any inconveniences you were experiencing and relocate you into another room.  Also, be assured that we have taken immediate action to follow up on your comments mentioned in your review.  Thank you for your valued feedback.  It is our hope to have you as our guests again and provide you with the improved stay that you deserve.  Kind Regards, Mitch Healy, General Manager

Summary: We have stayed here every time we come to Disneyland for the last 5 years and we have never been disappointed.  It it always clean, the beds are comfy and the kids love the bunk beds.  I would recommend this hotel to all of my loved ones.
Manager Response: Dear Jessica P,  Thank you so much for your continued patronage throughout the last 5 years!  We are very happy to receive your fantastic review on all that you and your family enjoyed while staying with us.  It is our pleasure to provide you with comfortable and clean accommodations, along with great times at our Anaheim hotel.  Your recommendation to all of your loved ones means the world to us!  We will look forward to earning another 5 star review on your next experience at the Portofino Inn & Suites Anaheim!  Best Regards, Mitch Healy, General Manager

Summary: Pool was only negative. Clean but small and basically in parking lot. Not enough room in pool for kids without bothering other guests. Very accommodating staff. Disney "blocks" are very long, so for these 2 blocks you are better off with public transportation which adds about $5 per person per day for unlimited rides.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for your review and great rating on your stay with us.  Your compliments on our accommodating service are appreciated by our entire staff.  As you mentioned, the Anaheim Resort Transit (ART) shuttle is a great way to visit everything Anaheim has to offer for a nominal daily fee.  Again, thank you for choosing to stay at our Anaheim hotel.  Best, Mitch Healy, General Manager

Summary: The hotel itself is very clean, pretty, & a great location.  Just a little bit of a walk to Disneyland, less than 10 minutes so we didn't need to worry about moving our car at all or taking a shuttle.  The mattresses could use updating.  My husband and I sank to the middle for a couple of nights & finally decided to see about getting a new mattress.  They did accomodate quickly and we had a much better nights sleep after that.  Although there was a building being torn down right next door and the construction crews were well at work long before 7:00am.  We didn't really appreciate that but not the hotels fault.  A bonus was the strip mall accross the street that has a Subway, pizza, mexican & chinese places.  At night we'd walk over there, everyone got to have their own pick for
Manager Response: Dear Amanda C,  Thank you choosing to stay at our Anaheim hotel on your recent visit to California.  We appreciate your valuable feedback on all that you and your family experienced.  Thank you for bringing the mattress in your room to our attention and giving us the opportunity to make things right while you and your family were still guests in our hotel.  It was our pleasure to promptly accommodate your needs in order to ensure your comfort.  We're also glad that you found our amazing location convenient for your family to visit the Disney Parks, as well as the many dining options well within walking distance.  We look forward to being a part of your family's next visit to Anaheim!  Warm Regards, Mitch Healy, General Manager

Summary: The first night we stayed in a room where the shower was full of hairs and had obviously not been cleaned.  Vacuuming was questionable.  There was a terrible odor coming from the shower drain that you could smell in the whole room unless you shut the bathroom door.  It was late and we were too tired to move, so we went to bed.  The room we moved to the next morning was much better.
Manager Response: Dear Amy K,  Thank you for completing the review and bringing these important details of your stay to our attention.  We apologize for the housekeeping oversight found in the first room you were checked into.  It was our pleasure to relocate you into another room and we are glad to hear of your comfort.  We do hope that you and your family will decided to return to stay with us in the future.  It would be great to have the opportunity to delver the impressive stay you deserve throughout your entire experience with us.  Best, Mitch Healy, General Manager

Summary: We stayed at this hotel in February with our two children who are 6 and 3 years old.  We really enjoyed being able to walk to and from the parks each day as they are so close.  The room was a good size for our family of 4 and we loved having the refrigerator and microwave in the room.  On advice from a friend who had stayed in the past, we placed an online grocery order to Vons (Safeway) and had it delivered to our room the night we arrived.  This allowed us to eat healthier and more inexpensively for breakfast and lunch, and then we ate out for dinner each night.  We didn't get to try out the pool or hot tub as it wasn't warm enough during our stay.  The room was very quiet despite a fair number of people staying there at the same time.  Bonus--we had a room on the 5th floor
Manager Response: Dear Hope I,  Thank you very much for taking the time to share all of the wonderful details about your recent experience at our Anaheim hotel.  It was our pleasure to provide you with comfortable accommodations along with incredible views of Disney's firework show from the comfort of your room.   Also, we greatly appreciate you bringing the incident with your son climbing on the bed to our attention.  Please know that follow up has immediately taken place to ensure that all bunk beds are positioned correctly and safely, as originally placed.  Again, thank you for your valued feedback.  We are extremely happy that you and your family will definitely be back to stay at  the Portofino Inn & Suites Anaheim.  Kind Regards, Mitch Healy, General Manager

Summary: The room was clean and staff was great. I wish the exercise room would have been open every morning so that I didn't have to go to the front desk and have them open it but overall this is a great place to stay! We will be back!!
Manager Response: Dear Kristin D,  Thank you very much for your 5 star rating on your recent experience at the Portofino Inn & Suites Anaheim!  It's thrilling for all of us here to receive your wonderful comments on our customer service and accommodations.  Please know that our fitness center is open from 7 a.m. to 10 p.m., and we apologize for any inconvenience that occurred.  We appreciate you bringing the issue with the your bathroom door to our attention, as our maintenance team promptly resolved the issue.  Thank you for sharing that you enjoyed a great overall stay.  We can't wait to welcome you back!  Kind Regards, Mitch Healy, General Manager

Summary: My sister and brother -in- law recommended Portofino.  We stayed in a Family Suite for 5 days.  We were told there was a kitchen area, nope there was not!  There was a fridge and a microwave hidden away in an old beat up dresser.  There was an old very small round table with two chairs, not enough space for a family of nine!!  We were not comfortable at all.  We were all crowded.  The air conditioner was tucked away in the king size bedroom suite, very loud and noisy. We were by the main street with lots of traffic, not a very good spot for small children trying to sleep. The curtains were falling of the rods and the carpets were very dirty.  The grandkids bare feet would end up dirty and black after waking around even after having a bath! The main bathroom had a hole in the
Manager Response: Dear Chad M,  We’re sorry we failed to provide the quality stay you deserve and should expect while staying with us. Please accept our apologies for the issues in your room and know that we have immediately followed up on your comments in regard to the condition of your room, as this is not the typical guest experience.  If you return to our area, we hope you will reconsider returning to enjoy an improved and impressive stay.  Best Regards, Mitch Healy, General Manager

Summary Heading: Would stay at the Potofino again
Summary: Staff was wonderful, rooms clean. Would definately recommend this Inn. Location to Disneyland was fabulous. The only negative was the demolition of the old Jolly Roger adjacent to our room, it was a bit un-nerving at 7:00 am.
Manager Response: Dear Rose R,  Thank you for your great review!  It's very nice to hear that you an your family enjoyed our clean accommodations and fabulous Anaheim location.  We are extremely pleased that you would stay with us again, and appreciate your recommendation of our hotel to other travelers.    Best,  Mitch Healy, General Manager

Summary: This hotel was so close to the Disneyland Resort.  We were able to walk there.  The room was clean and a great size.  The beds were comfortable as well.  The wi-fi was fast and the refrigerator and microwave were really nice as well.  We enjoyed the pool and the hot-tub and were able to watch the fireworks from both.  I would highly recommend the Portofino inn and Suites to anyone wishing to stay close to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear ElizabethStocks13,  We are very excited to receive your 5 star rating and review on your recent stay at our Anaheim hotel!  Thank you for mentioning a few of our recent updates, including our new fast and efficient wi-fi system and our brand new comfy bed sheets and duvet.  Your high recommendation of the Portofino Inn & Suites Anaheim means the world to us! We can't wait to have you as our guests again!  Thank you for your time in completing the TripAdvisor review.  Best, Mitch Healy, General Manager

Summary: Took my family to Disneyland on May 2-May 5th, 2013. We had the best experience ever from this hotel and i will be defiantly going back to them when visiting again next year. We got there early since we live far. We wanted to be there by the time the park opened on friday morning. Once we arrived i let the front desk know that we were early, they said no problem gave us our parking pass and also let us know if our room was ready before the check in time they would contact us. Overall best service ever.
Manager Response: Dear Serena R,  We are ecstatic to hear that you had the best experience ever at our Anaheim hotel!  Thank you for your fantastic compliments on our customer service.  It's not just our job to provide our guests with the superior service they deserve; its what we enjoy doing. It was our pleasure to take care of all the details upon your early arrival so that you and your family could begin your day at the Disney Parks.  We appreciate you taking the time to share your impressive experience and hope to see you and your family again real soon!  Kind Regards, Mitch Healy, General Manager

Summary Heading: Great place to stay for Disney trip
Summary: Within walking distance to Disney Parks. Rooms are spacious and clean. Stayed here twice this year and will keep this hotel as first choice. Pool is small, but that doesn't matter when you spend all day at Disney!
Manager Response: Dear Chelese H,  We couldn't agree with you more; the Portofino Inn & Suites Anaheim Hotel is a great place to stay!  Thank you for your continued patronage and your time in sharing how much you enjoy our hotel.  We are honored and excited to be your first choice in Anaheim accommodations, and anxiously look forward to welcoming you back!  Kindest Regards, Mitch Healy, General Manager

Summary: We stayed here for 3 nights in the Kids Suite and my experience at the Portofino was wonderful.  The rooms were well kept, check in was friendly and fast, we required some additional towels and received them within 5 minutes.  Available was free internet [---] and it worked fine in our room.  For Disneyland the location is great.  It is a 10 minute walk to the front gate.  Don't bother taking the shuttles. We did not use the pool.  The parking gets tight towards the end of the night but there is more parking out back.  There is no breakfast in the hotel but there is plenty of places to eat on Harbor or Katella.  There is ongoing construction next door at the old Jolly Roger hotel and the workers start at 7am.  Yes, the construction will wake you up so bring earplugs if you stay
Manager Response: Dear M E S,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us during your 3 night stay in Anaheim. We are pleased that you enjoyed our updated accommodations, complimentary wifi (exclusively available to our guests) and our prompt customer service.  Our staff is excited to hear that you and your family were happy with your choice to stay us and we hope to have you as our guests again in the near future. Thank you for your review and rating on our Anaheim hotel.  Best, Mitch Healy, General Manager

Summary Heading: Great location! Wish the pool was open longer
Summary: We had a great trip! The bathrooms and rooms were very clean but the decor is a little dated. The bed is very comfortable. It is a very short walk to the Happiest Place on Earth!! The pool closes at 10 pm on Friday and Saturdays and I wish it was open longer.
Manager Response: Dear Tricia V,  We appreciate the kind words you wrote about our hotel, as well as your suggestion in regard to our pool hours.  We do our very best to take all of our guests into consideration when setting operating hours for our fitness center, heated pool and other amenities.  It's wonderful to hear that you found great comfort in our beds; our brand new bed sheets and duvet covers certainly add to the luxury! Thank you very much for staying with us and sharing that we are just a short walk away from the Happiest Place on Earth.  Please come back and see us the next time your travel plans bring you back to Anaheim.  Best, Mitch Healy, General Manager

Summary: Unless you plan to stay more than two days. Don't do the kids suite with the adult park hopper tickets. Opt for the two queen beds and buy single day tickets at the park. Room was ok, staff was good. Description of the room and amenitites was lacking and needs better clarification on what is include and what isn't. No resturant or cafe located on site, so expect to pay hire prices at the park or close to it. If you can afford to stay at one of the Disney Land Resort Hotel; do it.
Manager Response: Dear Randy H,  We are sorry to hear that you and your family did not find the opportunity to enjoy the extra space and amenities that our Kids Suites offer.  Please know that full room descriptions are found on our website and all third party travel websites.  Also, we are always more than happy to review these details with you, as well as answer any questions you may have.  Keep in mind for your next visit to Anaheim, that our hotel is conveniently located near many restaurant options outside of the Disney Parks. Thank you for providing us with your valued insight on your stay.  We do hope that you will decide to return and, perhaps, enjoy a room type that better fits your preference.  Kind Regards, Mitch Healy, General Manager

Summary: I'm impressed with this hotel. We stayed here for 2 nights for Disneyland and had a wonderful experience overall. Check in was painless, no lines, quick, and the lady at the front desk was very nice and helpful. The room was spotless clean, had a nice balcony, and beds like clouds. There is ample parking in garage and outdoor near the pool. If you want a quiet stay, ask for a room away from the street. It's a short to Disney parks, also next to 7-12 and ABC Store, very convenient. Overall, a very comfortable stay!
Manager Response: Dear Cici808,  We greatly appreciate the time you have taken to share your experience with us and other travelers on TripAdvisor.   Your feedback has been shared with our staff, as it is always a great pleasure and extremely rewarding to receive positive and encouraging remarks such as yours.  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. We are very happy that you thoroughly enjoyed your comfortable stay with us and will look forward to delivering yet another 5 star experience on your return!  Sincerely, Mitch Healy, General Manager

Summary: We stayed at the Portofino for 3 nights. Sat - Mon. The walls are thin, and our neighbors were loud Saturday night. But on Sun and Mon one could hear a pin drop. Very quiet. My advice is to stay there at the beginning of the week. The room was clean but VERY smelly. We had our sliding glass door open until we went to bed for fresh air. Overall an average hotel experience.
Manager Response: Dear Trafor,  Thank you for your feedback regarding your weekend stay with at the Anaheim Portofino Hotel. We constantly strive to provide our guests  with the best experience by exceeding their expectations, and we apologize for missing our mark.  Thank you for your bringing your comments to our attention, as we are committed to following up on our guests' insight and making the necessary improvements.  We would love to have you as our guests again to deliver the overall impressive and enjoyable stay that you deserve.  Best, Mitch Healy, General Manager

Summary Heading: Great Value & Floorplan for Kid's Suite
Summary: Good Value for Space and Amenities in Kid's Suite  I found a good deal for Portofino via their internet package where for $266/night you receive two-2-Day adult Disney park hopper tickets. We stayed for 3 nights in the 2nd week of April 2013. Elevators were pretty quick. You needed your guest card to swipe at all entrances to the hotel (except lobby), fitness room & pool area. We stayed on the 3rd floor in the building closest to Disney. The customer service was good for check in and out. There is a ~15 min walk to the Disneyland admission areas.  We made use of the pool, mini-frig and coffee maker. Pool area had towels for the guests to use. Yay! The kids enjoyed the heated pool and hot tub the first night. The kids were so excited about the bunk beds, but we moved the top
Manager Response: Dear Vacationrus,  We are thrilled that you had a great experience with us!  Thank you for taking advantage of our all-inclusive Disneyland package and sharing your extensive details on the great value you enjoyed.  We are certain that your comments and tips will be very helpful to other travelers.  You are absolutely correct; we have just renovated and refreshed our rooms and suites, which includes new beds, bed sheets, duvet covers, carpets and drapes! It's also great to hear that our brand new wifi system delivered seamless complimentary internet connection throughout your stay.  Again, thank you for your wonderful review.  We appreciate your business and hope to see you and your family again soon!  Best, Mitch Healy, General Manager

Summary: Our family of 4 stayed at this hotel for spring break at the end of March 2013 and liked it a lot. Our children are 12 and 14 and the room set up with the Kid’s Suite at this hotel is great. I don’t know why more hotels do not offer a floor plan like this hotel does with the Kid’s Suite. This is the perfect room for a hotel by a location like Disney where so many of the guests will be families. We have visited Disneyland many times over the past 10 years. We go almost every year. We have stayed at the 3 Disney hotels and at 3 Good Neighbor hotels. I can recommend all of the hotels that we have stayed at for different reasons. The main reason I would recommend the Portofino in is the Kid’s Suite rooms that they have. A few tips: This room has a microwave and a mini fridge. If you
Manager Response: Dear ColoradoFamilyDenver,  Thank you for bringing your family of 4 to Anaheim and choosing to stay at the Anaheim Portofino Inn & Suites.  We very happy that you found our Kids Suite the perfect room type!  As you mentioned, the extra space, amenities and divided rooms make it the ideal choice in accommodations for any family.  We also hope you enjoyed our new updates throughout our property, including new bedding, carpet, retouched furniture and brand new televisions!  We appreciate your business and recommendation.  Thank you for your detailed review on your stay.  It would be an honor to have you and your family as our loyal guests, and we hope to welcome you back to Anaheim on your next visit.  Best Regards, Mitch Healy, General Manager

Summary Heading: Very dissapponting compared to previous visits
Summary: We have stayed at this hotel many times before and love the Kid Suites with the bunkbeds and the proximity to Disneyland.  The website stated that the rooms had all beem "newly refurbished" so we were excited to see the changes.  Our room did not appear to be "refurbished" or even cleaned.  There were stains on the walls and holes in the wallpaper.  The wallpaper was peeling off the walls in several places and there was mold in the bathroom.   I called the front desk to ask for a different room and was told they were full.  When I said there was a sign in front that said "Rooms Available" I was told the Mgr had told them to leave it out.  I asked for the Mgr and they said he would contact me the next day.  No one did.  I even tried to change hotels but everyone was booked for
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great place for families. Awesome value!
Summary: This place is a little old but its great. 5 minute walk to Disneyland and heaps of restaurants close by. Most of the time your out so why do you need something flashy. The front desk service was excellent. They helped us with tickets and directions. The only negative is that the room does not have a fridge. This is not good for families that need to store cold stuff. Overall for the price it's awesome.
Manager Response: Dear Ubangy,  Thank you for sharing the details of the awesome value you enjoyed at our Anaheim hotel!  We always love hearing from our guests, and are so glad that you and your family had a great stay.  Please keep in mind for your next visit, that we do have refrigerators available for a nominal daily fee.  Also, our Kids Suites and King Suites include a refrigerator, as well as many other amenities.  We have just completed many updates to our hotel, including new bedding, retouched furniture, new carpet, stylish bathroom fixtures and much more!  It would be great to have you and your family back soon to enjoy more of all that we have to offer.  Best Regards, Mitch Healy, General Manager

Summary: We really enjoyed our stay at the Portofino.  Loved the Kids' Suite with a pull out sofa and bunk bed twins behind french doors and a king at the front by the bath.  Two vanities made it much easier to get everyone ready at once.  Housekeeping was excellent.  Towels requested at front desk when pool towel supply was exhausted were delivered immediately to pool area by housekeeping.  Front desk friendly and super efficient.  Room well appointed, loved the bedding.  I want some of those pillows for home!    We walked to Disneyland with 3 kids ages 7, 7, and 11.  No complaints from them about the distance (half a mile or so), even after 12 hours at the parks!    My only complaint was the electrical outlets.  Room 2213 has a very loose outlet behind the sofa bed, it moved in the
Manager Response: Dear mythreeJs,  We are extremely happy that you and your family really enjoyed your experience at the Anaheim Portofino Inn & Suites!  Our Kids Suites is definitely the ideal choice for any family seeking accommodations specifically designed for them.  Thank you for mentioning that the short walk to Disneyland prevented complaints from the kids, and that you enjoyed efficient and friendly service.  Also, thank you for bringing the electrical outlets in your room to our attention, as we have immediately followed up on resolving this issue.  Again, thank you for your great review!  Warm Regards, Mitch Healy, General Manager

Summary Heading: Great place to stay with family for Disneyland
Summary: My husband, 2 year old son and I stayed at Portofino in later March 2013. I will start with the things that I loved about this hotel.  It was a 15 minutes walk from the hotel to the actual turnstiles at Disneyland. That was much faster than driving and parking and taking the shuttle. We were able to come back each day and nap in the afternoon. The room had good storage space for our luggage, clothing, etc. The housekeeping was wonderful. They always had our room cleaned before we returned for our afternoon nap and it was a delight to come back to a room with clean floors, emptied garbage, made beds, fresh linens and toiletries. We used the laundry room while we were there and it was clean and convenient. The housekeeping staff was friendly, quiet and did a great job. The beds
Manager Response: Dear mommybear7,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us while visiting from Oregon.  We are very happy that you and your family enjoyed all that we have to offer!  We appreciate you taking the time to extensively details your experience, and are certain that your review will be helpful to other travelers.  Your compliments have been shared with our staff, as well as your suggestions on improvements.  We value your insight and appreciate your business.  It's great to hear that you and your family will definitely stay with us again!  Best, Mitch Healy, General Manager

Summary Heading: Close Walk to Disneyland - but kind of run down
Summary: We only stayed here because of problems we had at another nearby hotel, and every other hotel in the area was booked.  We ended up ending our trip early, even.     This hotel could work if you don't mind an older, kind of run down room.  Lower parts of the  bathrooms walls had water damage, and there's nothing new or nice looking.  Beds were not comfortable and the wall air conditioner was super loud.   The staff was quick and attentive, however, which was a plus, and the room was in a clean condition.  Its's also a close walk to the parks.   I did like that the doors open inside a hallway, rather than outside.   Would definitely not stay here again, but if you don't expect much, it could work.
Manager Response: Dear greekgoddess122481,  We are extremely excited to inform you that we have just undergone many new and nice looking transformations at the Portofino Inn & Suites Anaheim; new quilted bed sheets, countertops, bathroom fixtures, flat screen televisions and a brand new wifi system with increased bandwidth!  We have also installed new carpet and wallpaper in our hallways.  There's quite a lot to be excited about and we would love to have you back to show you all of our updates and renovations.  Thank you for your great compliments on our quick and attentive staff.  We appreciate your time in completing the review and hope you and your family decide to return.  Best Regards, Mitch Healy, General Manager

Summary: The hotel is very average.  I would say it is not a nice hotel, but a cheap convenient place to stay.  The halls were noisy.  The swimming pool is small.  The hotel staff forgot to give us coffee one day and shampoo another.  Easily fixed by finding a housekeeper in the hall, but inconvenient.  No breakfast included.  I hop is across the street, but it was disgusting.  7 11 on the corner was pretty decent for grab and go food.  They had fruits yogurts sandwiches etc...  There was a pizza place across that was pretty good too.  Coffee was a nightmare to find in anaheim!  the hilton is the only starbucks.  Overall, I would find somewhere nicer next time.
Manager Response: Dear Svanoo,  We are extremely sorry that we failed to deliver a memorable experience.  Please be assured that we have followed up on your comments in regard to our housekeeping staff.  We replenish toiletries when they are depleted upon room cleaning and they can always be delivered to your door at your request at any time.  Again, we do apologize that your stay with us was less than impressive and would appreciate you reconsidering a return visit.  We have recently updated and transformed many features throughout our hotel and would be grateful for the opportunity to deliver an improved stay.  Sincerely,  Mitch Healy, General Manager

Summary Heading: Good place to take a family
Summary: We took our family over spring break to Disneyland (big mistake). While the park was insanely crowded, the hotel was close by and comfortable. We got the kids suite since we had 4 kids and 2 adults. It was smaller than the photo but it worked out fine for our family. The service was great and parking was great. Very friendly staff. There is a convienent store on the property so that was nice as well. I would stay there again.
Manager Response: Dear Leslie Q,  We are so glad that you found the Portofino Inn & Suites Anaheim a good place to take your family!  Thank you for sharing how comfortable you and your family of 6 were in one of our Kids Suites.  We appreciate your positive feedback on our complimentary parking, friendly staff and convenient location.  Your recommendation of our Anaheim hotel means the world to us and we are so happy that you and your family would stay with us again.   Thank you for completing the review.  Kind Regards, Mitch Healy, General Manager

Summary: My family of 5 will be staying here very soon and all I can say is I hope the customer service is significantly better than they are on the phone. I called when I noticed there is a breakfast package, and I wanted to know if this was something I could add because it states you need to have one of two rooms to be able to get it which we did and when they were speaking to me they were rude and made me feel stupid for asking if we could add it after we had made our reservations a month ago. If we wanted to add it, we would have to pay an extra $100 a night! That is a little outrageous to add it and if it isn't possible to add, then the ladies (yes I spoke with 2 different people because I was transferred) got rude that I pointed out the price difference and she told me I should've
Manager Response: Dear AnnePaige,  Please be confident that we are constantly focused on our guests and delivering an enjoyable experience.  Thank you for your review on the phone call you placed to our hotel, as the details described are not typical of our staff.  We look forward to welcoming you to Anaheim and having you as our guest soon!  Best Regards, Mitch Healy, General Manager

Summary: Four of us (wife, 3 and 5 year old) stayed one night to get an early jump on Disneyland. The hotel was extremely noisy from the halls and the room(s) above. The thumping from above didn't end until midnight and began again at 5:45 am. I am not sure if it was one bad group above or if this is common, either way some of us didn't get a lot of sleep. The room had a user friendly floor plan to have separation between the kids and adults. We felt the room wasn't properly cleaned, as we found long black hairs on the towels, bathroom ceiling and hair dryer. No one in our family has dark hair so our find was obviously disturbing. The 15 min. walk to Disney and back to the hotel wasn't to bad. They did let us park at the hotel for the day which we appreciated ans saved $15
Manager Response: Dear Scott R,  Thank you for providing us with you feedback by posting a review on TripAdvisor. We regret that your experience was not favorable and that the noise caused by neighboring guests kept members of your family from enjoying a good night's sleep.  Please know that we are at your service at any time throughout your entire stay, and are more than happy to resolve any issue in order to ensure your comfort.  We apologize for the condition that you found your room and appreciate you bringing this to our attention. Your comments have been shared with the appropriate departments for immediate attention and I will, personally, follow up on this to make certain this remains an isolated incident.  Again, thank you for your review. We hope you will consider staying with us again to enjoy an improved and impressive experience on your next visit to Anaheim.  Best, Mitch Healy, General Manager  Sincerely,

Summary: Recently my husband and I took our 8 yo granddaughter to Disneyland for a weekend. We usually stay at the Candy Cane Inn, but they were booked as were many of the hotels within a comfortable walking distance to Disneyland.  We were pleased with our accommodations at the Portofino Inn, the two queen bed room was clean, smelled fresh and was rather spacious compared to other hotels we've stayed at in this vicinity. It takes a bit over 15 minutes to walk to the parks, not too bad all-in-all.  There is no free breakfast - no restaurant on site, but an IHop across the street and several other reasonably priced eating establishments within a short walk.  Our room had a nice size balcony with two plastic garden chairs and a small table. We thought we'd have a view of the fireworks, but
Manager Response: Dear BestNana_93505,  It was our pleasure to have the opportunity to accommodate you and your family.  We are very excited to hear that your check in experience was one of the best in recent memory!  It is extremely important to our staff to go above and beyond for our guests in any way possible to ensure their comfort and enjoyment, from their arrival all the way through to their departure.  Please keep in mind for your next visit that we do, indeed, have several rooms with spectacular views of Disney’s firework show!  Also, we apologize for your room keycard inconvenience.  We regret that we had not yet received our brand new keycard encoder while you were staying with us.  Please know that is has been installed and is working seamlessly.  Thank you for your detailed review on our hotel.  We would love to have you and your family as our loyal guests and hope to welcome you back to Anaheim on your next visit!  Best Regards, Mitch Healy, General Manager

Summary Heading: Great value for people with young kids
Summary: I recently stayed at the Portofino with my wife and 2 1/2 year old son.  He goes to bed early, so we wanted a place with two separate sleeping areas.  We wanted to walk to Disneyland everyday, and many of the other hotel options were very expensive.  The king suite at the Portofino was perfect.  We put extra blankets over the sliding glass doors to make his room even darker.  He slept while we stayed up late in our room.    The hotel staff is unbelievably friendly, the hotel is in a great location (10 minute walk and you're in Disneyland) and the price is right.  I would stay at the Portofino again and recommend it to any family in a similar circumstance to ours.
Manager Response: Dear CalgaryRadioGuy,  Thank you for providing us with your response. We appreciate the time and effort you took to give us your feedback. It's great to hear that our King Suite was perfect for you and your family.  Thank you for mentioning that the separate sleeping areas provided you with the space and privacy that you were looking for to ensure that your son got his much needed rest while you and your wife stayed up late.  Again, thank you for your review and recommendation.  We're glad that you enjoyed your stay and look forward to serving you in the future.   Kind Regards, Mitch Healy, General Manager

Summary Heading: Great location, good for the price
Summary: Let's start by stating that this is a hotel in a heavily visited spot, geared toward kids, and set up for that purpose.  This is not a luxury hotel, nor is it a resort.   However, the rooms are geared toward families with children, with all the pros and cons you might expect.  We were in Anaheim for a competition with a group, so we had to find a hotel that could be budget friendly for all.    Pros: we stayed in a  Kid Suite room.  This layout features a main room with a large, comfortable bed for the adults, and a room by the window, with a sliding glass/French door divider, with a bunk bed and sofa bed for the children.   The children loved the bunk beds, and we didn't need the sofa for anything but sitting.  There is a large flatscreen TV in both rooms, and a minifridge and
Manager Response: Dear sunbunny31,  We appreciate your time in detailing all that you enjoyed while staying with us, as well as the suggestions you provided on room feature preferences.  Your insight is extremely important to us as we will use your comments as part of our ongoing efforts to provide the best hotel experience possible.  It's great to hear that you and your family were happy with the value you received and enjoyed your stay.  Please come and see us again on your next visit to Anaheim!
